29a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mgrin gcig du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim na
29a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i nyes pa dang / sdom pa yang dag par spyod pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'dir
29a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim na gnas pa la nyes pa'i skyon chags pa ji snyed pa dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon mtha' yas pa mngon sum du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
29a5(dkon brtsegs): cag rnams rab tu phyung ste/ bde bar gshegs pas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la bsnyen pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa
29a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams rab tu byung ba ni byung bar bka' ste/ spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag par bsgrub
29a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba yang 'byung bar bka' ba lags
29a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rab tu byung ba'i slad du skabs dbye bar gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'tshal lo// 
29b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dag la rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs bye ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'abyams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams ca
29b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sras blangs pa khyod gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di rnams rab tu phyung la bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas
29b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khyim bdag dgu steng rabang byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cid rnam par dag pas ni khyim bdag bdun steng btu phyung ngo // byang chub
29b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i rgyun bstan pachos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags stong du tsha bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
29b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed do// / bam po gsupaste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
29b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi sa dang / khyim na gnas pa de nongs pa dag ni bshad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
29b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / spyod pa dang / 
29b8(dkon brtsegs): cho ga phun sum tshogs pa de legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas gus pa
30a1(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las don ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
30a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod gong de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon+ta dang / yo bad basma ba dang spyod / 
30a3(dkon brtsegs): cho ga phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dri ba ni leg so log so// khyi mo bdag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ji ltar gnas pa
30a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol nas khyim bdag dag shul bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
30a5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to// khyi bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'di ltar bdag su'i ched la khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung snyam du gzhal
30a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ste/ des mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du ye shes yongasu btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// de de ltar yongasu 'jal ba'i thog ma nyid du 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la rab tu gnas
30a7(dkon brtsegs): shing sbyangs pa'i yon+ta dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rig bzhi po de dag la rab tu gnas pa yin zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di
30a8(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sema' dpa' rab tu byung ba ni chos glo dadan kyis chog par 'dzin po yin// chos gos nganan gyis tshog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod pa yin te/ de chos gos kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi bye'o// tshes rba/ 
30b1(dkon brtsegs): marnyed na yang mi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba med// chos gos rnyed na yang chags pa med/ rmongs pa med / dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chag pa med/ 
30b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod/ chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi skyed cing gzhan la mi smod/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni bsod pa snyom ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ bsod snyom dang
30b3(dkon brtsegs): don gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjed pa yin te/ des bsod snyam kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas chel por mi byed/ bsod snyoms ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing yong su gdung ba med do/ bsod snyoms rnyed na yang cham
30b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med// zhen pa med cing zhen par mi la gyur ro// nyes dmigs mthong la 'byung bar rab tu shes na sa/ chags pa med par skyed de/ bsod snyoms ngan ngon gyis/ 
30b5(dkon brtsegs): chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi stod cing / gzhan la mi smad/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mal chang ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa yin/ 
30b6(dkon brtsegs): mal chang ngan don gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjed pa yin te/ dmal cha'i phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshor bar mi byed do// mal cha ma rnyed na yang mi
30b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chad cing yongs su gdung ba med do// mal cha rnyed na yang chags pa med rmongs pa med/ dga' ba med/ zhen pa med cing zhen par mi 'gyur
30b8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs mthong la 'byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ mal chang na ngan gyis chog par 'dzin pa
31a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag la mi bsad cigazhan la mi swA dang // khyim bdag gzhan yang byung chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bzhin pa'i gsos spya dang mo byang nA na gyis rtog par 'dzin pa/ 
31a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod pa yin te/ de na pa'i gsos sman dang yo byad kyi phyir tshul dang mi 'dra bas tshol bar mi byed// 
31a3(dkon brtsegs): na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ma rnyed na yang yi mi 'chad cing yongasu gdung ba med do// na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnyed na yang chags pa med rmongs pa med dga' ba med zhen pa med cing zhen par
31a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ nyes dmigs mthong la byung ba rab tu shes nas chags pa med par spyod de/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan don gyis chog par 'dzin pa de bdag la mi bstod
31a5(dkon brtsegs): cing gzhan la mi smod do// spong ba la dga' ba yang yin/ te spong ba la mos shing spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la/ brtson no// de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams spangs pas
31a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur te ma spangs pas ni ma yin no// de bsgom pa la dga' ba yin te bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson no// dge ba'i chos bsgoms pas dga' bar 'gyur te mi bsgos
31a7(dkon brtsegs): pas ni ma yin no// spong ba la dga' ba spong ba la mos pa spong ba la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pa/ bsgom pa la dga' ba bsgom pa la mos pa bsgom pa la dga' ba'i sbyor ba la
31a8(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa de bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod do// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po dag la gnas pa yin no// ci'i phyir
31b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs shes bya zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'di la gnas pas de'i lags pa'i rigs shes bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/ 
31b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bas phan yon la dga' ba bcus chos gos lus la bcang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ngo tsha zhing 'dzem pas dkri ba dang / sha sbrang dong sbrang bu dang / rlung
31b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg par 'gyur ba g.yog pa dang / dge sbyong gi kha dog dang rtags bstan pa dang / ngur smrig de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
31b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten yin no snyam nas mchod rten gyi phyir yang dag paragazung bar byu ba dang / de dag ni yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas khang ge bsgyur ba yin te
31b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni 'dod chags kyis kha dog bsgyur ba ma yin pa dang / 'di dag ni nye bar zhi ba dang mthun pa yin gyi 'di dag na nyon mongs pa 'bar ba dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / ngur
31b6(dkon brtsegs): smug 'di dag gis dkris shing g.yogs nas sdig pa las ldog par bya ba dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba dang / chos gos kyis cha sbyor ba la brtson pa ma yin pa dang / ngur
31b7(dkon brtsegs): smig 'di dag 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs dang mthun pa yin par shes nas ci nas skad gcig gcig la yang rnyog pa dang 'grogs par mi bya ba dang / ngur smrig rnams bcang bar byas te/ 
31b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon la dga' ba bcu po de dag gis chos gos lus la bcang bar bya'o// khyim bdog gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung
32a1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsod snyoms spyod pa btang bar mi bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rang dbang du gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'tsho bar bya'i gzhan
32a2(dkon brtsegs): la rag lus pa ma yin pa dang / sems can gang dag bdag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms byin pa de dag kyang dkon mchog gsum la dkod de phyis bsod snyoms blang bar bya ba dang / 
32a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag bdag bsod snyoms 'dod pa la bsod snyoms mi ster ba de dag la snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can de dag gtong ba la gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya ba dang / 
32a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas te bsod snyoms bza' ba dang / bdag gis dade bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun par byas par 'gyur ba dang / dgang sla zhing bso sla ba'i phyir bdag gi rgyu/ 
32a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis nga rgyal bcagapa bsten par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis spyi gtsugabaltar mi mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ba de
32a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag mthong nas de bzhin du slob par 'gyur zhing bdag skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo la brten par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms yang dag par blang ba'i spyod pa yang bdag sems
32a7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la sems snyoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshogasu 'gyur ba ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji
32a8(dkon brtsegs): srid 'tsho'i mtha'i bar du bsod snyoms pa mi btang bar bya'o// gal te de la la zhig gis mgron du bos na des lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dad pa dang dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro bar bya/ 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): ste/ tshul 'chos pa ni ma yin no// gang la la bsod snyoms blangs te bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs par byed nus na ngas byang chub sems dpa'adi 'gron du 'gro bar gnang ngo // khyim
32b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu mthong nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sman bkrus pas cho ga shes par bya ste/ bcu gang shi na/ de bzhin gshegs
32b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi ngor blta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bstan par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mi mthun pa'i
32b4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes so sor nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ro bro nga ba la chags pa yang bdag gis tshegs chu ngas spangs par 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams
32b5(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag la yid rton par 'gyur ba dang / bdag kha/ zas srungs pa mngon du gyur par 'gyur ba dang / bdag la sman yongasu tshol ba'i phongs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / 
32b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems la nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gnod pa med par byas par 'gyur ba dang / de ltar zhugs na myur du nyon mongs pa'i nad dang 'bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 
32b7(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du sman bkrus pas chog shes par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang
32b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas phan yon bcu pa mthong na ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa la gnas pa yongasu mi gtang bar bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na
33a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi nyam rangs pa dang / bdag gi dbang du 'gro ba dang nga'i ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / mal cha lhag par gtong ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas/ 
33a2(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba dang ma bral ba dang / gnas rnams don nyung zhing byed pa nyung ba dang / g.yog gi tshogs 'dor zhing lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / dben par dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yod/ 
33a3(dkon brtsegs): su spang ba dang / las byas pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon yongasu gtong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i sems rtse gcig pa dang / yid la byed pa bla gab med pa dang / 
33a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa'i sgrib pa med po ste/ khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas pan yon bcu po de dag mthong nas ji srod 'tsho'i bar du dgon par
33a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yongasu mi btang bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa chos nyan par 'dod dam/ slob dpon dang mkhan po blta
33a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod dam/ nab dri ba'i phyir grong gi gnas 'ongs na/ des dgongasu slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de gal te lung nod pa dang / kha den byung/ 
33a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la rag las te/ gtsug lag khang na gnas na yang des dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyos gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang / chos tshol bas mings
33a8(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid dgon pa la gnas pa yin no snyam du bsam mo// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas 'di ltar ci'i phyir dgon pa la gnas/ dgen
33b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni dge slong ma yin no// 'di ni ma byang ba ma sbas pa ma zhi ba ma dul ba mi 'grus pa rab tu mi brtson pa/ 'di lta ste ri rigs dang speru dang bya mang po dang chom rkun dang gdom
33b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang mang du gnas te/ de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pas gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste dge sbyong gi don de yongasu rdzogs par bya'o snyam du brtag
33b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang / shes pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa
33b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / byams pa bsten pa dang / snying rje bsten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur da ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs
33b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / thab mkhas pa'i ye shes bsgom pa dang / sems can 'dul ba dang
33b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongasu mi gtong ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjesu dran pa dang / thos pa dang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul bzhin du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang yang dag par rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa rnams shes pa dang / skyon med par
33b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pos yang dag par lta ba dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu chad
34a1(dkon brtsegs): pas yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pas yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las zad pa yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag pa'i las/ 
34a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcom pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chud pas yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / brjod
34a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i chos kyis yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su thob pas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stong pa nyid kyis mi skrag pa dang / mtshan ma med/ 
34a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la mi zhum pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dgong ba dang / bsams bzhin du ye shes kyis srid pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / don la rton gyi yi ge la mi rton pa dang ye
34a5(dkon brtsegs): shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa dang / chos la rton gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / nges pa'i/ don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la mi rton pa dang
34a6(dkon brtsegs): thog ma nas ma byung zhing mi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mi rtog pa de ni khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i dge sbyong gi don ces bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang
34a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa med par mang du bya'o// des 'di ltar yong bdag ni sems can dang 'dris par mi bya ste/ bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i
34a8(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba bskyed par mi bya'i bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de ltar mod kyi khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i
34b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'grogs/ 
34b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i phyir 'grogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'dres pa med pa dang 'grogs pa ste/ khyim bdag byang
34b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i 'grogs pa bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'o// khyim bdag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas 'grogs pa las rnam
34b4(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs snyam du brtag par bya ste/ 
34b5(dkon brtsegs): des yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyiradagon par 'ongs// ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag ce na/ 'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag/ gros 'a grag
34b6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis 'jigs shing sgrog ge/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang 'chab pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ chags pa dang phrag dog dang ser snas 'jigs shing skrag
34b7(dkon brtsegs): go gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg byas 'jigs shing skrag go// phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'a
34b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// lha'i bu'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// mi rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar
35a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go// bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'dzi/ 
35a2(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag go/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ sred pas 'jigs shing skrag go// 'khor bar 'jigs shing skrag go// sgrib pa dang chod pa dang / 
35a3(dkon brtsegs): kun nas ldang bas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'jigs tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing skrago/ bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrago/ rgod pas 'jigs
35a4(dkon brtsegs): shing sgrag/ 'gyod pa dang the tshom gyis 'jigs shing sgrag/ sdig pa'i grogs pas 'jigs shing skrag/ rnyed pa dang bkur bstis 'jigs shing sgrag/ mi dge ba'i bshes
35a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag/ ma mthong bar mthong ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag/ mthos par thos so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing sgra go/ ma dran
35a6(dkon brtsegs): par dran no snyam byas 'jigs shing skra go/ bye brag ma phyed par bye brag phyed nga snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ mi shes par shes snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 
35a7(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing skrag go/ gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams
35a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jigs shing skrag go// sred pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang yid dgas kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jig
35b1(dkon brtsegs): shing skrag/ mi khom pas 'jigs shing skrag go// mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'jigs shing skra'o/ bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag gis 'jigs
35b2(dkon brtsegs): nas dgon par 'ongs te/ khyim na gnas pa dang / 'du 'ji la gnas pa dang / mi 'grus shing rnal 'byor la mi brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas
35b3(dkon brtsegs): pas ni 'di lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pa de dag las yongs su thar bar mi nus te/ gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
35b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dadog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// 
35b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par
35b6(dkon brtsegs): grol te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jigs pa med par thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
35b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de dag thams cad kyang dgon pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
35b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pa thob bo// de bas na bdag kyang 'di la 'jigs shing skrag go/ 'jigs pa thams cad las ni shin tu 'da' bar 'dod/ mi 'jigs pa ni rje su thob par 'dod pas
36a1(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas par bya'o snyam du yongasu dpyad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'jigs shing skrag nas dgon pa'i/ 
36a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas la gnas pas 'di la cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin po las skyeso// bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu yongasu 'dzin pa dang
36a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag la srid pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag gir gnas pa dang / bdag tu yongs
36a4(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pa dang / bdag bsrung ba las skyes te gal te dgon pa la gnas la bdag tu 'dzin pa yongasu ma spangs / bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang / bdag tu 'dzin
36a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bdag gi gzhi dang / bdag la sred pa dang / bdag tu shes pa dang bdag tu smra ba nye b.ralen pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag gi gnas/ 
36a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag tu yongasu rtog pa dang / bdag bsrung ba yongs su ma spangs na ni bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don med par 'gyuraro snyam du bslab par bya ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa la
36a7(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa med do// gzhan du 'du shes pa la yang med do// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// dmig
36a8(dkon brtsegs): bar lta ba la ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// phyin ci log tu lta ba ni dgon pa la gnas pa med do// khyim bdag mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes pa la yang dgon pa la gnas pa med/ 
36b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi 'du shes can lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o// chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par/ 
36b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'o// mtshan ma thams cad las mi chags par gnas pa'o// gzugs thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya thams cad la mi brten par
36b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'o// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'o// sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par
36b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las brgal bar gnas pa'o// brtan par gnas pa'o// ngan ngon gyis chog shes par 'dri
36b5(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dod pa chung bas/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la/ rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o// dgang sla zhing gso sla bas chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o// shes
36b6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin la sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la so sor rtog pas thar par gnas pa'o// 
36b7(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun pas ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi bar gnas pa'o// shin tu rnam par dag pas bya ba byas
36b8(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa'o// khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na dgon pa la rtswa dang shing gel pa dang nag tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ro// khyim bdag de bzhin du
37a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang rtsig pa dang shing dang mig yor lta bu dang sgyu dang nus pa'i 'du
37a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'di la su zhig 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'di la su zhig skrag par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de 'jigs shing skrag pa lta na 'di ltar lus
37a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gamo/ shod las skyes sam/ shed bu med de/ 'di ltar 'jig
37a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun rtags pa yin gyis bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin brtag par
37a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// des ji ltar dgon pa la rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal gnas pa rnams nga yi ba med/ pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
37a6(dkon brtsegs): yang nga yi ba med pa yongasu 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad dgon pa nyid do snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa nyon mongs
37a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gcod pa ste nga yi ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang mthun pa'o// 
37a8(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa nin ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la gnol ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi phung po 'tshogs pa'o// mgon pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'grub
37b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa la gnas pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba'o// mgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rab tu bsten pa'o// 
37b2(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis sdud pa'o// mgon pa la gnas pa ni bde ba rnam par rtogs pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni phung po rnams yongasu shes pa'o// / 
37b3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa ni khyim rnams kyi chos dbyings dang mnyam par 'jal ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni skye mched rnams sel ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub kyi sems
37b4(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pas skrag pa med pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni chos kun tu 'dzin pa'o// dgon pa la gnas
37b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chud mi gzon pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
37b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis bstod pa'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bkur ba'o// dgon pa la gnas pa ni thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsten pa'o// dgon pa la gnas
37b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa'o snyam du bslab par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas/ 
37b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dgon pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la mi lta ba
38a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag ji ltar byang chub sems
38a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba
38a3(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa le rab tu gnas nas sdom pa gsum gyis yang dag por bsgrubs te/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa
38a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na bya nga chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i
38a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs para'agyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub semasadapa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni sems can la/ 
38a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems med cing sems can thams cad la byams par byed la de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bzod pa yin te/ de ltar mgon pa la gnas pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
38a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur
38a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab byung ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag dgon pa 'di las ldog par mi bya'o snyam du slob ste/ de ltar
38b1(dkon brtsegs): dgon pa la gnas pa de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i bsam
38b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu
38b3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ste/ sems can yongasu smin par byed kyang yal bar mi 'dor la 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang srogs par 'dod pa yin te/ de ltar na dgon pa la gnas pa de'i bsam gtan
38b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// / khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
38b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ khyim bdag gang byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba 'di la lus ji lta ba dgon pa yang de bzhin no// lus ji lta ba
38b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang de bzhin no// snyam du slob ning de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtog rnam par mi rtag ste/ de ltar dgon pa la gnas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par
38b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro// khyim bdag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pa tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// khyim bdag byang
38b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan na dgon pa la gnas par gnang ba yang yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba mang du thos pa
39a1(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ thos pa 'dzin pa chos rnam par nges pa la mkhas pa/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson zhing chos dang chos kyi rje su mthun pa bsgrub pa des dgon pa la
39a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni nyon mongs pa shas chen des nyon mongs pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'gregs pa med par dgon pa la gnas
39a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ des nyon mongs pa tshar bcad par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pa yin te/ de lha dang mi dang gan/ 
39a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang dri za rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir dgon dpal gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang bya chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas sengs rgyas kyis dgon
39a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas par bka' stsal par shes nas dgon pa la gnas par bya ste/ des dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar brtan nas
39a6(dkon brtsegs): phyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs te chos bstan par bya'o// khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa'
39a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgon pa la gnas par gnang ngo // khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba la lung dang kha don gdon pa'i phyir tshogs kyi nang
39a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug na des der gus pa dang bcas pa ste/ slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams dang / gnas brtan dang / bar ma dang / dge slong gsar bu rnams la zhes dang bcas par bya/ @
39b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms las med par rang gis bya ba dang / gzhan la gdung ba med par bya'o// des bsnyen bkur la gdu bar mi bya'o// des 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
39b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lnga
39b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin du bcas pas mchod pa/ sbyin gnas su gyur pa de yang sems can thams cad la gang las kyang rim gro bya bar bdag gir mi mdzad na/ bdag cag ma bslabs pa slob 'dod pa rnams
39b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ci smos te/ bdag gis ni sems can thams cad ngal bsnyen bkur bya'i gang las kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba bad/ ga gir ni mi bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
39b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag dge slong bsnyen bkur la gdub ni yon tan gyi rjesu gzung ba chud gson pa yin te/ des gang dag sdud pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag
39b6(dkon brtsegs): ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdud kyi chos kyi phyir ni ma yin no snyam ste/ de bdag nyid kyi dad pa chud gson no// gang dag bsnyen bkur byed pa 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa de dag gi yang don chen
39b7(dkon brtsegs): por mi 'gyuraro// 'bras bu chen por mi 'gyur ro// de slob dpon dang mkhan po'i nang du 'gro na yang slob dpon dang mkhan pos ma dad pa'i bag gang yang rung ba zhig nas brtags nas/ bdag la
39b8(dkon brtsegs): lung 'bog pa dang / kha don bya ba dang / rjesu bstan pas phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus dang sems lusu rung ba dang sems cad shes pas 'gro bar bya'o// des lung gnod pa dang
40a1(dkon brtsegs): kha don gyi phyir lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// yon tan don du gnyen
40a2(dkon brtsegs): bas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshigasu bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bar bya'o// khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung gnod pa dang kha don du gnyer bas gzhan dag la tshig bzhi
40a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogasu bcad pa tsam 'am/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang ldan pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs bsags
40a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyan tam/ lung mnos sam bzung na des slob dpon dal chos kyi phyir gus par bya'o// ming dang tshig dang yi ge ji snyed kyis tshig su bcad pa bstan pa gal te de snyed kyi
40a5(dkon brtsegs): bskal par slob dpon la g.yo med pas bsnyen bkur dang g.yog byas shing rnyed pa dang bkur bsti thams cad kyis mchod par byas su zin kyang / khyim bdag
40a6(dkon brtsegs): dadung des slob dpon la rim gro bya ba rdzogs par mi 'gyur na chos la rim gro bya ba lta ci smos/ khyim bdag dad pas mnyan cing bsgom pa dang / kha don la 'jug pa de'i sems dang
40a7(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ba'i dge ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa 'am/ chos dang ldan pa 'am/ dge 'dun dang ldan pa 'am/ skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa'am/ 
40a8(dkon brtsegs): byang ba dang dul ba dang zhi ba dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa gal te de snyed kyi bskal par slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byas su zin kyang / khyim bdag dadung slob dpon la slob dpon du rim
40b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rdzogs pa ma yin no// khyim bdag rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med cing ye shes khong du chud pas tshad med pa de ltar rig par bya'o// khyim bdag de lta bas na/ 
40b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'i chos tshad med pa ye shes khong du chud pa tshad med pa dris pas bdag gi slob dpon yang tshad med do snyam nas byang chub sems dpas chos la ri mo tshod med pa bya'o// khyim bdag gzhan
40b3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas par bya'o// khyim bdag ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas pa yin
40b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dbyung ba tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos nas de slob ste bzhi po 'di dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// bzhi
40b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la gnas pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad sbyangs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / khyim na gnas pa dang rab
40b6(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med par dgon pa la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims
40b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus bsdams pas lus mi dmigs pa dang / ngag bsdams pas ngag mi dmigs pa dang / yid bsdams pas yid mi dmigs pa
40b8(dkon brtsegs): dang lta ba dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ 
41a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ ngar 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang / chang pa dang rtag pa dang dral ba dang / rten pa'i chos la 'jug pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul
41a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phung po rnams la byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang / khams rnams la chos kyi
41a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings yongasu 'jal ba dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang / tha snyad btags pa rnams la mngon par mazhen pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o/ 
41a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ debazhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med par 'du shes pa bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi dmigs pas
41a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la mi smod pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pas rlom semasu med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas g.yo ba med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims
41a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mi skrag pa dang / sems can
41a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la cher snying rje ba dang / bdag med bdag med pa la bzod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa'o// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab
41a8(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongasu dag pa thos na de la slob ste/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa de gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad la brtson pa med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
41b1(dkon brtsegs): pas gnyisu dbyer med pa dang / sems la su rung ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / sems nges par 'byung ba dang / sems mi 'phro ba dang / sems kun tu mi rgyug pad / 
41b2(dkon brtsegs): sems mi gnas pa dang / sems nges par sems par byin gyis rlob pa dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba dang / sems 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la mi chags pa dang // 
41b3(dkon brtsegs): sems chos la rgyu ba so sor rtog pa dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ji ltar mi skye mi 'byung zhing mnyam pa nyid pa de ltar khyim bdag byang chub sems dang / 
41b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin yongasu dag pa la so sor rtog go// khyim bdag gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa
41b5(dkon brtsegs): thos na de la slob ste/ shes rab yong su dag pa dgang zhe na/ de 'di ltar so sor rtog go// chos thams cad mngon sum du shes pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba
41b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sems can gzhan dag la chos go bar shes pa ste/ khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
41b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba shes rab yongasu dag pa la so sor rtog go// khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba 'di la shes rab 'di ni lus med pas thog ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do// 
41b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba med pas gzung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// skye ba med pas gnas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// na mkha'i ngo bo nyid pas mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid do snyam du rab tu slob bo// khyim bdag
42a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na gang 'di ltar chos la so sor rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags/ 
42a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyim bdag de dag thams cad las phal cher ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// srog chags
42a3(dkon brtsegs): sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// de nas khyim bdag drag shul can dga' la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas mgu ba dang / yid
42a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba skyes te/ brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos pu zung bcom da ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa
42a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'adis sems can thams cad la sprul to// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rnams kyi bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa de ltar byang chub sems/ 
42a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa gang lags pa de dag gi chos yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bslab pa bcas po'i yang de ltar
42a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi chos yong su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos du zhig dang ldan na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dralang bul can la/ 
42b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa chos lnga dang ldan na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ lnga gang she na/ khyim
42b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa mi blta bar dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pas rnam par smin
42b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la re ba med pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa tshangs par spyod cing gtsang ba yin te/ yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa mi spyod na mtshan gnyis
42b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa 'am/ yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sem/ dadapa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la
42b5(dkon brtsegs): mi reg cing khyim stong par zhugs nas thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gtan bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dang / 
42b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa khyim na gnas pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas nges par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan yod byang chub sems
42b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa bdag kyang dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin cing / gzhan yang dam pa'i chos la sbyor bar byed pa ste/ khyim bdag byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa khyim na gnas pa
42b8(dkon brtsegs): chos lnga pa de dag dang ldan na/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag drag shul can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ba'i
43a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal lo// rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la slob po// chos mnyam pa nyid 'di lta bu la yang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas
43a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog
43a3(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
43a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa rnamasu 'od kyi snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon pa/ 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
43a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa
43a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
43a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
43a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis khyim bdag drag shul can 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ chos
43b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa mthong ngamagasapa gcam lda da zhag da gshes pa yang lagasas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul/ 
43b2(dkon brtsegs): can 'di ni gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la rim gro byed par 'gyuraro// bsti stang dang mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// 
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rtag tu yang khyim bdag tu gyur nas rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub de yang rgyas par byed par 'gyuraro// 
43b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag drag shul can la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag rgyu gang rkyen gang gis gang khyim na gnas shing rdul la gnas pa la
43b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed/ drag shul can gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo rdul chung zad med de snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bdag bde ba la mi re ba yin no// btsun pa kun
43b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir kyang bzod do sems can rnams yongasu mi gtong ngo // de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
43b7(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyim bdag drag shul can 'di khyim gyi sa la gnas nas bskal pa bzang po 'di la sems can rab tu mang po yongasu smin par byed/ 
43b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa stong ngam bskal pa brgya stong du yang de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di la
44a1(dkon brtsegs): yod pa'i yon tan rnams ni rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong la yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad
44a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos
44a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di drag shul can gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa sgrub pa zhes bya bar yang chu shig/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya
44a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shing / kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang / chos mang po
44a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob ste/ brtson 'grus zhan pas bskal pa/ brgyar tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pas ni de lta ma yin no// kun dga' bo de bas na bdag kyang brtson 'grus
44a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang brtson 'grus la gzung bar 'dod pa dang / bdag kyang yon tan gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan
44a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos mnyam pa nyid thams cad la dgod par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kun chub par byed klag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
44a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang yang rgya cher yang dang yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du
44b1(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang mi 'bral bar gnas pa de sangs rgyas dang
44b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar bstan to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ klog pa dang mi 'bral ba de sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mtho/ 
44b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang mi 'bral lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du yon tan thams cad 'dus shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bslab pa bsgrub pa'i lam gyi yon tan
44b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag dpar rab tu bshad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don
44b5(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes rab tu gang ba yang 'bogs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// 
44b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang ba tsam yang ri mor byas te slob dpon la phul nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par
44b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che las so sor byas te mchod pa
44b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis mchod la/ de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen/ 
45a1(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed cing / gang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bran dang slobs pa las blangs te bsnyen pa gas
45a2(dkon brtsegs): su zin kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa 'dzidzin/ mi'achang / maklog/ kun chub par mi byed/ 'jug par mi byed cing / bsgrub pa 'di la yang mi gnas na kun dga' ba byang chubs
45a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang ches kyi rnas
45a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyan cing kun chub par byed pa/ dam pa'i chos dayun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi / rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir gzhan dag la rgya cher yang ngas
45a5(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu ston cing bsgrub pa 'di la yang gnas na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' des 'das pa dang / mi 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
45a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gus pa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ che dang ldan pa
45a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / khyim bdag drug shul can dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs/ 
45a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // 'phags pa dag na mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u snang phrag brgya ba las/ drag
45b1(dkon brtsegs): shul can gyis nus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa bcu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// sho loka dgu brgyabs po gsum mo// rgya gar gyi mkhan pos
45b2(dkon brtsegs): rin dra bo d+hi dang bu chen gyi la tsA ba dang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phag// bad skad du/ glog thob kyis zhus pa/ 
45b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba zag pa chen pa'i mang / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sad bdag gis zas
45b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ril/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum
45b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa stong dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu
45b6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa spobs pa thogs pa med par gyur pa/ mi skye ba'i bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam
45b7(dkon brtsegs): par rtsen pa/ sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang
45b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed dang / byang chub/ 
46a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gras dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin pa che'i yon tan 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang / byang chub sems
46a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyan/ 
46a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / byang chub
46a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i
46a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ro dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sang byed dang / byang chub sems da / spyod bsgyur ba la mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab
46a6(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi ba'i spyod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang brgya byin lha 'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten gyi kham/ 
46a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po las sra/ 
46a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongasu dag pa dag 'dus par gyur pa
46b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal me sbyar nas
46b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tsom cung zad cig mchis te/ deng zhu bar 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan cing gnang
46b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' klog thob la bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
46b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la skabs phyes/ khyed ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang // / khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis/ 
46b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches ji lta bu'ig nga ldan par gyur na/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
46b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid cing / skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas sems can de dag drangs te/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan 'gronas/ 
46b7(dkon brtsegs): su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten na gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos
46b8(dkon brtsegs): par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu zhing / rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi su mthong ba dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa gsum la rab tu gnas kyang snyoms
47a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'jug par sems can gyis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs su sbyangs nas skad cig ma gcig la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
47a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po klog thob kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshogs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/ 
47a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na ma mchis mi yi gtso// mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad ma mchis/ ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ni// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad// sems can kun la snyoms par
47a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// 'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad// log dang yang dag lam bstan nas// mthar thug bde la dgod par mdzad// yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas/ 
47a5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen sna tshogs phung po 'dra// 'jig rten shes rab nyi ma khyod// khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags/ theg pa chen po bkas bshad nas// byang chub lam ni rdzog/ 
47a6(dkon brtsegs): par mdzod// zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra// zhi gnas dag ni phun sum tshogs// nyer ni chos ni rab bstan nas// nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad// byang chub spyod pa bkas bshad nas/ 
47a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol// sangs rgyas zhing dang sku tshe dang // gzugs sku dang ni 'khor rnams dang // phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang // thams cad kun ni rnam
47a8(dkon brtsegs): par dag/ bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi// rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar bdud ni gdul bar bgyi// ji ltar chos rnams bstan par bgyi// ji ltar dran
47b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams mi 'gyur// khyod kyi bkas ni bshad du gsol// ji ltar dpa' bo dag gis ni// 'khor ba kun du zhugs gyur kyang // mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing // chos la rtag tu
47b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo mi 'gyur// ji lta sangs rgyas rnams la ni// rten cing mchod pa bgyis na ni// rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang // mthar ni mtshan ma spong 'gyur lags// rnam thar gsum pa
47b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon bgyis kyang // mkha' la bya ni 'phur ba bzhin// yon tan phun tshegs ma gyur par// nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' lags// dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs nas// 'jigs pa ma
47b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis rjes 'brang zhing // mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par // sems can de dag smin bgyid lags// sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas// slad kyis dang ba'i sems bskyed// 
47b5(dkon brtsegs): de ye shes gya nom phun tshogs pas// bla med byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba// 'di 'dra'i zab mo gya nom don / de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshad gsol// 
47b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la/ phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang
47b7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu zhus pa leg so// legs so// de'i
47b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir glog thob shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo
48a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gter chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun du
48a2(dkon brtsegs): zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter phun sum tshogs par gyur pas/ rgud pa rnams gtan du spong zhing
48a3(dkon brtsegs): gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa yang yong su rdzogs par byed la/ tshogs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyuraro// lha gang
48a4(dkon brtsegs): zhen 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter dang / gti mug spyod pa'i gter dang / cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter dang / chos thams cad kyi gtar
48a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'o// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams
48a6(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i rjesu mthun zhing phyin ci log gis bcings pas/ mtshan ma rnams kyi rje su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la sogs pa'i yul dag la
48a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshog su rnam par brtags nas/ brtan pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dang / bde ba la chags shing myos par gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi sems kyi
48a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas/ sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang / spyod yul gang la chags shing goms pas 'thun pa
48b1(dkon brtsegs): can du gyur pa dang / dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan zhing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu skyed pa dang / theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsab
48b2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed yod pa dag nam zhig na yongs su smin par gyur pa yang rab tu shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang / de dag gi/ 
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir shin tu legs par brtogs nas yongs su gso bar byed do// glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i bye brag
48b4(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus na/ so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs can rnams kyis / 
48b5(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci dgos/ glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par/ 
48b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yod do// sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa'i yul la reg pa tsam 'am/ 'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu
48b7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa yang yod do// sems can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par 'gyur zhing zhig par mthong ba nyid
48b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzugs mi rtag par khong du chud par gyur nas/ 'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/ mi rtag pa nyid shin tu yid la byed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod/ 
49a1(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed pa yang yod do// sems can kha cig ni bud med mthong ba na/ mngon par zhen pa skyes pa med kyang / phyis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags
49a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems skyes nas/ de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la byas nas/ rjesu chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do// sems can kha cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag mthong
49a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa skyes nas/ yid la byed cing yongasu gnyer bar byed pa yang yod do// sems can kha cig ni bud med kyi sgra thos pa tsam gyis 'dod chag/ 
49a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sred pa bskyed par byed la/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas bla na med dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu smin par byed
49a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang yod pas/ de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nang rnam pa sna tshogs gangayin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sman gang yin pa de dag thab/ 
49a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas legs par khong du chud kyang / chos kyi dbyings la gnyisu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma yang med la/ chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag la yang snying rje chen po
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed do// glog thob 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes shes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigasu med pas/ byang chub
49a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa rang bzhin gyis stong shing dben pa/ btags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa/ tshogs shing
49b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bskyed par byed pas/ bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas/ 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur
49b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la gnas nas/ sngon gyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu smin par
49b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam du sems so// skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'dod chags lci ba skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpas bud
49b4(dkon brtsegs): med shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang ldan pa rgyan rnam dpa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar
49b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjesu chags pa dang / shin tu mngon par zhen par gyur pa ston par byed de/ de dag gi
49b6(dkon brtsegs): nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan pa
49b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar gyur to// bud med gang zhig skyes pa dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i
49b8(dkon brtsegs): lus bstan nas 'dod chags kyi dug mnga' dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed do// glog thob 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang
50a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs par brgyad khri ba ni stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi sgo ma bye ba stong phrag chad med pa
50a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/ sems can gyi khong du chud par byas nas thams cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa yang med la sems can rnam
50a3(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar gyur pa yang mi dmigs so// glog thob 'di lta ste dper na mtshom dris pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas sems can
50a4(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / skams la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi che bsil ba dang rlan gyis me tog dang 'bras bu dag rgyus shing 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin
50a5(dkon brtsegs): tu bde bar byed kyang / klu'i rgyal po de bdag gis chu klung bzhi po 'di dag phyung ngo // dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems/ mod kyi 'on kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bar cing sems can/ 
50a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams nye bar spyod par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
50a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas 'khor ba'i yongs su bdud pa thams cad bsal te/ lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba sbyin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de bdag gis chos bstan to// / 
50a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis snying rje chen po bsam pa la gnas nas sems can rnams so sor brtags te ci rigs par chos ston par byed do// 
50b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang grog thob 'di lta ste/ dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i ring dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po
50b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongasu rdzogs par myong bas de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni dang lnga'i dbang po dang lhan cig rjes so snyam du
50b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang yang dag par lnga'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par gyur pa ci yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can yongasu bzla ba'i 'o su gyur pa de dag gi bsam
50b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu smin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do// gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'an
50b5(dkon brtsegs): ri mthon po'i rtsil shar ba'i tshe 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling kun du snang bar byed pas gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
50b6(dkon brtsegs): dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni kha dog gcig pa 'od gcig pa nyid de tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du
50b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing de dag gi/ 
50b8(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyisu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do klog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod
51a1(dkon brtsegs): chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ bskal pa 'am bskul ba las lhag pa sems ca
51a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta bo bzhin du lus tshad med pa bston nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 
51a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na gser yang dag pa ni mger ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogasu byas te/ mtshan nyid
51a4(dkon brtsegs): tha dad par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur/ dpa ci yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par brtags nas
51a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshos/ kyis chos ston byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis gyur
51a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid med de/ 'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di lta bu thob par gyur
51a7(dkon brtsegs): na sems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pa de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur
51a8(dkon brtsegs): pas 'khor ba'i rgud pa dag gtan du yongasu spong byed do// gzhon yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 
51b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas yun ring po nas byams
51b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bzod pa ma bsgoms pa zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rjesu dran par ma gyur pa zhe sdang gi gdugs pas g.yogs/ 
51b3(dkon brtsegs): pa chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi byed kyi 'di snyam
51b4(dkon brtsegs): du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gi rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas rab tu dben zhing shi ba dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/ 'dum pa med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/ 
51b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa'i chos nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa zhe sdang dang / khon du 'dzin pa rgyas par gyur to snyam du sems pa kho nar zad
51b6(dkon brtsegs): de snyam du bsams nas kyang snying rje chen po la gnas te rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/ gal te lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig yod na yang
51b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu gnas par byed do// gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad pa de dag phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyab kyis
51b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs shing zhe sdang dang / khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongasu rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa
52a1(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas pa des 'di ltar byams pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par mi 'gyur zhing / gang / 
52a2(dkon brtsegs): mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongasu bsal ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang glog
52a3(dkon brtsegs): thob byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/ 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin no// kye ma sems can 'di
52a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni zhe sdang gi rjesu 'brangs nas yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa chos 'di nyid la zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed pas sems can
52a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to// gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid mthong bar gyur/ na ni gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba zhig
52a6(dkon brtsegs): na chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ma rtogs pas/ de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par gyur te zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la lhag par snying brtse bskyed nas snying
52a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po la gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed la rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par bzhig pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshogs/ 
52a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can gyi zhe sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings
52b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa phyir ro// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa rab tu bsal
52b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa bsalo nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yong mun po sel bar byed pa med de/ 'di ltar mun pa dang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid nam
52b3(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med po'i ye shes de la brten nas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan
52b4(dkon brtsegs): tezhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur dbapa med do// glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil
52b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
52b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa nyi
52b7(dkon brtsegs): khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongasu grub pas sems can de dag gi
52b8(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjesu chos ston par byed kyang / bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to// ston to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de
53a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ 
53a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjesu tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / brjod pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston
53a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyang / zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems
53a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par nga bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// 8/ gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
53a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ zhe na/ glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin tu dkar ba'i dngos po yin te
53a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rje su 'brang ba gzhan la gnod par byed pa ma rig pa'i mngal gyi sgo ngas kun tu bkros pa dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbying/ 
53a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i thabs med pa bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rtog pa bdag tu lta ba la mngon par zhen pa/ lam log par zhugs pa byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa nges par 'byung
53a8(dkon brtsegs): par dka' ba yin pas 'di lta bu la sogs pas rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/ ngal zhing sdug pa yang med de
53b1(dkon brtsegs): le lo yang med par rkyen gang dang mos pa gang dang / chos bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur/ 
53b2(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/ sems can de
53b3(dkon brtsegs): dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur par rig nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to// ston to// ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems/ 
53b4(dkon brtsegs): pa med de/ 'on kyang de sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba legs par so sor brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo ma brgya stong du ma bstan te/ 
53b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do// glogathob 'di lta ste dper na sman pa bzang po nad mang po
53b6(dkon brtsegs): gso ba la mkhas pa/ sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu goms par gyur pa ni nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu sngags dang sman btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur pas
53b7(dkon brtsegs): des gsos pa gang yang mi sos pa med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis
53b8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed/ 
54a1(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gi gter 'di thob par
54a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de dag
54a3(dkon brtsegs): gi rang bzhin dang 'dum pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed
54a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med
54a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o// 'di ltar gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang / spyod pa gzhan
54a6(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpas yongasu spong ba'i phyir/ chos kyi sgom brgyad stong du ma rab tu phye nas yang dag par ston pa gang
54a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod/ 
54a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gter ces bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper ni me long gi dkyil 'khoran tu dag cing yongasu gsal ba/ dri ma med pa la lam bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan
54b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/ na/ 
54b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu byi dor legs par byas na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bang
54b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par byi ngor byas pa rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgyad
