54b4(dkon brtsegs): stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas/ de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byasakyang / chos kyi mtshan ma dang / sems can gyi mtshan
54b5(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byung chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / spyod pa bzhi pa
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang/ 
54b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtogs par byed pas/ gnyisu 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med de/ chos kyi dbyings dang // 
54b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag gnyisu med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro// glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
55a1(dkon brtsegs): satshan pa yang mdal/ rnam par bzhag pa yang med/ de bzhizhi du byang chub sems dpa' yang rnas kyi dkyi ma shin du lags pa rnams nag
55a2(dkon brtsegs): nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtags pa dang / sngon gyi sman lam gyi mthus sems can gyi snad pa ji lta ba bzhizhi du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang / 
55a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do// glog thob cha mnyam pa'i spring pa 'di la nyi khri tshig steng yod pa dang / spyad pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri ba ni steng du gyur pa de
55a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang / byang chub sems dpas sa sar brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa nad dang / sman
55a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong ba rab tu shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sa
55a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can rnams kyi ched du/ bskal pa 'am/ 
55a7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang / spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi
55a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang / spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid
55b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o// / bam po gnyis pa ste tham/ gzhan yang grog thob byang / 
55b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par gyur pas/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs
55b3(dkon brtsegs): pas gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ de dag rab tu gdul zhing de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dang 'thun par 'dod pa rnams la yod
55b4(dkon brtsegs): su spyod pa dang / bu dang chung ma dang / khyim gyi so chos phun sum tshogs pa ston par byed kyang pad+ma de bzhin du des gos shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do// 
55b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes bas 'di snyam du blo dang ldan pa su zhig/ so so'i/ 
55b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dang tha mi dad par 'dod pa rnams nyam su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du sems par byed de/ sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems
55b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu mi gtsang ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus par mi 'gyur bas/ las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar
55b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur na yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang ba'i gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongasu zad nas/ gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa/ 
56a1(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu bkod par byed do// glog thob 'di lta ste dper na/ me rab tu 'bar ba ni/ rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa ni/ thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i
56a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi ma 'bar bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
56a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas/ shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
56a4(dkon brtsegs): te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos shes bya'o// gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ da ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/ 
56a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang de'i rjesu kha dog sngon po dang // ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa
56a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid du gyur par byed de/ gal te bai DUR+Ya'i ngos su phyin na ni/ thams cad kyang bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do// gser gyi kha dog gi ngo su
56a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin na ni/ thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do// dngul dang / chu shel gyi kha dog du gyur pa yang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma
56a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i chos thob pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin
56b1(dkon brtsegs): cing lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du gyur par byed kyang de'i sems mi gtsang zhing / rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi sa
56b2(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang / smon
56b3(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur pa la bkod par byed do// glog thob sngon
56b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med dpag tu med/ grangs/ med pa na/ snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
56b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
56b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par gyur te/ da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe sems
56b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu che ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas/ pha ma dang phun dang grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa/ 
56b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi rjesu mi 'brang ba byas pa drin mi gzo ba/ rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/ g.yo sgyu dang / rku bo'i sems dang ldan pa/ ban tshun gcig
57a1(dkon brtsegs): la gcig gnang bar byed pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ ser snas zil gyis non pa
57a2(dkon brtsegs): yi dgas kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas par gyur pas na/ shin tu gdul dka' bar gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon gyi smon las
57a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshigs na nyo khro'i stong
57a4(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dza m+bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dang bar gyur pa/ 
57a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig yod pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar zla ba gsum spyan drang te/ mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas/ mchod cing rim gro
57a6(dkon brtsegs): byas so// de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba/ sems can yongs su
57a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par byed pa la/ rtag par ngal ba med pa/ re ba med par chos ston pa/ mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/ gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/ byad bzhin
57a8(dkon brtsegs): sdug cing mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing / rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/ dge slong gser bu dag
57b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rje su 'brang zhing rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la/ thogs pa med par gyur pas/ gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 
57b2(dkon brtsegs): mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang / rim gro byas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus kyi sdom pa dang / sems kyi
57b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/ rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang / 
57b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ rnam par g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/ dbang po rnams dmi sdom pa/ chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa dge
57b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi tshul med pa da nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad logapar bzhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe
57b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan+dan dmar pos sku bzhu nas mchod pa byas te/ ring bsrel gyi mchod
57b7(dkon brtsegs): rten ngos bzhi kun tu tsan+dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/ pad+ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/ bye ba phrag brgyad bcu brtsigs so// de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan 'dra
57b8(dkon brtsegs): des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang
58a1(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongasu btul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to// 
58a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa/ rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/ bdud kyi bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste/ 'di skad du rgyal pos bku
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thags thogs ma mchis te/ dge slong ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags la/ dus ma lags par yang zas
58a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ spos dang phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyis pas/ yang dag par tshangs par spyod dpa ma lags pas mchod pa mdzad pa mi rig so// bdag
58a5(dkon brtsegs): cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir mchis nas rgyal po la gsol/ pa lags kyi/ slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdza cig/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs
58a6(dkon brtsegs): mi ches pa yang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smraso// de'i tshe bdud sngag can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugasu bsgyur nas/ rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste/ snga ma bzhin du smras
58a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pas yang dang yang du de skad smras pa thos kyang 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med pa ni rab tu brtson zhing blo dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te
58a8(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni gnas med de snyam mo// de nas nga'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams bar snang las lus byed bstan nas/ rgyal po de la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po bza
58b1(dkon brtsegs): yi sgyu rtsal spobs// dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis// rgyal pos de ni ma shes na// mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyan thos dgra bcom pa// ye shes chen po ldan/ 
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// tshig dag la ni mi rten par// ci yi phyir na chad par lta// dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir// khyod la bden tshig smras pa yin// chad smra ngan 'gro 'gro ba'i mi// yang dag cha
58b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod ma yin pas// de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du// btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse// rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis// legs par rtogs la the tshom sel// rgyal pos dngos po 'di
58b4(dkon brtsegs): thos pas// sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes// 'khorarwa rnams dang ni lhan cig tu// myur zhing rings par pho brang dong // de tshe dri med pho brang nang // chos rnams rang bzhin
58b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa dang / bdag dang sems can med pa yi// dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed// rgyal po dmag/ 'khor bcas pa rnams// thams cad bdud kyis bslus
58b6(dkon brtsegs): pas na// pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams// dge slong yongs bskor mthong ba dang // zhe sdang glang chen myos pa bzhin// gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba// dge slong nga yi btsun ma
58b7(dkon brtsegs): bslus// sdug bsngal chos kyi chad pas chos// blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na// dge slong nyes pa med pa la// sems kyis gnod pa bya bar
58b8(dkon brtsegs): bsams// gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang // dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung // rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na// ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung // dri med rgyal po la smras pa/ 
59a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'// res shig skad cig sdod cig dang // bdag ni bsad pa'i long yod do// rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos nas// gshed ma
59a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag la sdod cig bsgo// bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod// khyod kyis myur du smra bar rigs// lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan 'gyur zhing // snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas// sor mo bcu
59a3(dkon brtsegs): yi thal sbyar te// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod// gal te yang dag nyes med na// sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos// mkha' la me tog char phob shig/ 
59a4(dkon brtsegs): de skad tshig 'di smras ma thag/ sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yo ngas// mkha' la lha yi me tog babs// bdud 'kho rumya ngan skyes par gyur// de tshe rgyal po dang bskyes// rkang la
59a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas bzod par gsol// bdag ni dmyal bar lhunga'agyur na// mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod kyi// / kyi hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas// gdug pa'i sems ni
59a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes 'brang nas// mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med// ston pa chen po ma gtogs par// phyogs bcu bdag gis mgon byed med// bdag gis
59a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid spangs nas ni// nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabasu mchi// dge slong des ni rgyal po dang // g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas// dam pa'i chos ni rab tu bshad// rgyal pos thos nas
59a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ba thob// 'khor ni bye ba brgya stong dag/ rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung // sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na// gzhan gyis mgron gnyer yang mi len// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang / 
59b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams// dam pa'i don ni thos pas na// phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur// rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin// la ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar// nyin
59b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan rtag par sdig bshags kyang // 'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad// lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong // sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad// sngon ni bsreg par byas pa'i rgyus// rnam smin lhag/ 
59b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rtag par smin// mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas// so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu// thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad
59b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dang mtshan mthun par// yon tan grags pa zhes byar rgyu dar// de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin// dge slong byams ban dad de la ni// gdug pa'i sems ni bskyed pas na// lo ni bye ba
59b5(dkon brtsegs): mang por yang // sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas// ngu'i/ da chen por ltung bar 'gyur// rnam sman de ni zad nas kyang / slar yang mi lus thob gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa
59b6(dkon brtsegs): kun spyan phrad// rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad bcu dag ni rim gro byas// de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa// de ni nga bdag nyid yin no// chos smra nyes
59b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa la// gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni// ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin// de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang // btsun mo'i 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams// 
59b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed// sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas// de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas// sems can phan gdags smon lam gdab// sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas// sa sa/ 
60a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// ngas dang khyod la bsgo ba ni// thams cad gnod sems ma bskyed cig/ gang gis byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags// myur du/ 
60a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub chen po thob// de lta bas na glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / rang bzhin dang bsam pa dag la mi mkhas pa dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// 
60a3(dkon brtsegs): glog thob 'di lta ste dper na ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog dang gtso bo dang / bla na med par gyur pa
60a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// 'di lta ste dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya ma tshe mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya
60a5(dkon brtsegs): che bar gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang gtso bo dang bla mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin
60a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no// glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod/ 
60a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing se gol gtogs pa gcig/ 
60a8(dkon brtsegs): la thams cad yong su sdud pa mdzad do// glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par
60b1(dkon brtsegs): rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tsom med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyad pa ji snyed pa dag rab tu mkhye/ 
60b2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs pa/ 
60b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongasu gdungs nas/ nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing don med par dus las 'das par byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cig zag so// 'dod chags
60b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gdungs pas lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu khyen ci gzig so// zhe sdang spyod pa'i sem sra can zhe sdang gi zol gyis non pas gcig la gcig zhe sdang gi
60b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog byed pa dang gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas/ su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzi/ gso// gti mug spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems
60b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ma rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba'i rjesu 'brang ba la mos par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to// 'os gyur pa dang / 
60b7(dkon brtsegs): 'osu mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phel zhing rtsol ba dang bcas pa dang / log cing nyams par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
60b8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du zhugs/ 
61a1(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni cang mi gsung zhing gtang snyomasu bzhag nas sems
61a2(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag ni chos la rmongs par gyur pas khong du chud par mi 'gyuraro snyam du dgongaso// de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing dus rab tu
61a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i phyir 'dul ba'i 'os gyur pa dang / bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang / bzod par nus pa'i 'o su gyur pa dang / tshig legs par nyan par gyur pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen te/ de
61a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yong su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do// de lta bas na glog thob byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang dag pa'i gnas
61a5(dkon brtsegs): skabasu ma zhugs pa/ sems can rnams kyi lhag pa rje bsam pa legs par khong du chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa 'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ thams cad ku
61a6(dkon brtsegs): la smon cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag pa nyid la gnod par 'gyur bar mi bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la
61a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
61a8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems can gang rnam par /  nga yong su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyams par gyur na nam yang yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyu ro zhes gsungs paso// byang chub sems dang
61b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gal te 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/ sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems// zhe sdang
61b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gti mug gi gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na yang 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du semaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad na
61b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur na sman yongasu btsal te thabs mkhas pas yongasu gso ba'i rigs pa las/ bdag sngon sems can gyi nad bsal bar yid dam bcas
61b4(dkon brtsegs): na deng yal bar bor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyamang du sems pas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltabu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing
61b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems bskyed par byed do// gal te gsod pa 'am lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing btub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par bsgom pa na 'das pa'i me dge ba'i las ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad
61b7(dkon brtsegs): cing ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur la// ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// grog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs
61b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mar mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes
62a1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig
62a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe shan pa 'jig su rung ba zhes bya ba khrog tum che ba gsod pa la dga' ni
62a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa lag pa khrag gis bskus pa mthong po thams cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe shan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te/ nang
62a4(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs naso bsod par byas pa las glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la ba
62a5(dkon brtsegs): der song ngo // de'i tshe shan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi/ bzhini bsnyags pas glang de skrag nas g.yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung nas srog chad la thug pa tsam dun zhing sdug
62a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo // de'i tshe shan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te/ g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs nas mtshon thogs te bsad par byas pa las mtshon dam btab pa'i bar
62a7(dkon brtsegs): skabs der de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongasu bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste/ 
62a8(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi byed du bye ba rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa// 
62b1(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
62b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par
62b3(dkon brtsegs): phye ste ston par mdzad pas/ glog thob rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la/ 'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi rtog go// de bzhin du skye ba
62b4(dkon brtsegs): yang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog la// de ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dmigasu med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/ dran pa med pa/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa
62b5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/ phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no// so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thob pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no// 
62b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no// 
62b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/ sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'dzin du 'dzin par
62b8(dkon brtsegs): byed/ bdag med pa la bdag gir 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi bskyed par byed do// phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing / sems
63a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rje su mngon par zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i sred pa 'tshang ba gcod pa mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor bar gyur pa yin no// mkhas pa dag ni
63a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtogs par byed pa'i phyir/ bdag dang gang zag dang sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yang yod par yang dag par
63a3(dkon brtsegs): rjesu mi mthong la// skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang gsod pa dang gnod par byed pa dag kyang mi dmigaso zhes gsungs pa dang / glo go thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jig su rung bas rkyang nas/ de
63a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go bar gyur pas de ma thag tu gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi ba gyur nas/ mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas/ 
63a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
63a6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshalo zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
63a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ de rigaso// dge slong legs par 'ongaso zhes gsungs ma thag tu dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas bsnyen pa rdzogs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu
63a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongasu smin par mdzad nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan par 'jig su rung ba thos / 
63b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to// glang de yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas sems
63b2(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas/ shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skyes nas byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// glog thob de ltar na sems can rnams kyi
63b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang / rnam par rig par dka' zhing shes par dka' ba yin te/ de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su
63b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bar 'dod pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems
63b5(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas te chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o// ci bdog pa rnams yongasu spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o// bzod pa la
63b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par bya'o// brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par bya'o// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par
63b7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po de dag yongasu rdzogs par gyur na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// / 
63b8(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub byed pa'i phyir ro// glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gter gang / 
64a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs shing bzod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa
64a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba gang yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang she na/ 'di lta ste den so so yang dag par rig
64a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams
64a4(dkon brtsegs): la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro// gzugs kyi ngan dgang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don dam pa gang yin pa'o// don dadam pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gzugs dmig su med pa gang yin
64a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ don dam pa'i ye shes la 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi chos rnams yang
64a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/ 
64a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnams la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// 
64a8(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ston par byed kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i sems can
64b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mthun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis gyur pa med de/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
64b3(dkon brtsegs): bya dang chos kyi bar du yang de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter
64b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongasu gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyi dar/ de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re res la sa
64b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes
64b6(dkon brtsegs): rab la yang 'grib pa med cing chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjesu 'brang ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams
64b7(dkon brtsegs): cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thoba'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o// chos kyi gter 'dis sems can dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum
64b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par gyur te/ 'khor ba'i rgud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang / zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / kun
65a1(dkon brtsegs): du zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa dang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam
65a2(dkon brtsegs): yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi
65a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// 
65a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas pa com ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi
65a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba mchis pa'i ye shes gang gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
65a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjesu mthun par dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o// 
65a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas dran pa gnas med pa rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang / de sngon gyi smon lam dang ye shes yongasu
65a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnamasu rnam pa sna tshog su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang / rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi
65b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med pa dang / bsdu ba 'dings pa bzhis sems can yangasu smon par byed kyang sems can gang yang yang su bzlas pa meng pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gang thams cad yang su spangs
65b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjesu dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du rgyu bA/ 
65b3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyi sama?/ 
65b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi ra ba yongasu rdzogs par byed kyang gang byas pa de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa yang med do// de'i cha bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa
65b5(dkon brtsegs): na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// rgyal byin lha'i dbang po yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas te steng gi bar
65b6(dkon brtsegs): snang las me tog man da ra ba dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dang / pun da ri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 
65b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te// sems can gang la reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to// 
65b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' grog thob la bka' stsal pa/ glog thob 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / 
66a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu
66a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od
66a3(dkon brtsegs): zer chen po bskyed par mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
66a4(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la nga 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags bdag gis ji ltar yongasu
66a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ ba/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter zhes bya'o// chos thams cad dbyer med
66a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya ste khyod kyis de ltar yang mong yongasu bzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang
66a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te
66a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i
66b1(dkon brtsegs): le'u ste// 'dus pa nyi shu ba rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar skad du/ b+hU dra mA la kA ra byA kAr Na nA ma ma hA ya nA sU tra/ 8/ 
66b2(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po thog ma gcig/ sangs rgyas deng byang chub sems dpa'
66b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
66b4(dkon brtsegs): yo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob/ pa/ gzungs thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi cha 'phrul
66b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di/ lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song
66b6(dkon brtsegs): ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
66b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po kha lo bsgyur ba chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang byed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
66b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po 'di gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal bdang
67a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kha lo bsgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa byams
67a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la sogs pa/ skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
67a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang yang thabs gcig go/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs gcig go// rgyal po chen po
67a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang yang thabs gcig go// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang yongasu bskor to// de nas bcom
67a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la brten cing bzhugs/ te/ rgyal po dang blon po chen po rnams dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus
67a6(dkon brtsegs): par byas/ bla mar byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byas// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong ni brnyes bcom
67a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi grangs pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
67a8(dkon brtsegs): su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams
67b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen thams cad ni gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan
67b2(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi/ 
67b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba dang ni ldan/ spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'drul ni brnyes// 
67b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/ grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mthas
67b5(dkon brtsegs): gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug/ dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang shing dang rir ban+da/ pa 'di na mkha'i l-i skal ba 'am/ skal ba las lhag par/ 
67b6(dkon brtsegs): skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin par mdzad do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/ gsang sngags la
67b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mkhas pa/ bzo dang rig pa la mkhas pa/ las kyi mtha' byas zin pa/ rab tu byed pa byas pa/ sgra grags pa/ yul ma ga d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag
67b8(dkon brtsegs): gi mchog tu grags pa phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/ des yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas pa rmongs par byas mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi
68a1(dkon brtsegs): chos la bkod de/ bden pa mthong ba rnams dang dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams ni ma gtogs so// des
68a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang chagasu bcad pa yang lhag par rnyed do// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / 
68a3(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa dang tshigasu bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rishigang dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar
68a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul dba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyiston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen
68a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad gzigs pa ste/ thams cad ni mkhyen tha mas cad ni gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ni ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
68a6(dkon brtsegs): pab bzhi dang ni ldan/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ni ldan/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas
68a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan spyan lnga dang ni ldan/ cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
68a8(dkon brtsegs): ni brnyes so// bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa grong rdal dang bcas pa/ sa dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba dang bcas pa/ ri rab dang bcas pa
68b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/ rtswa dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di na mkha' la bskal pa 'am skal pa las lhag par skra'i rtse ma'i
68b2(dkon brtsegs): cha shas tsam la 'dzin par mdzad do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas rmongs par byas mgo 'khor
68b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/ bram ze dang khyim bdag chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi ming gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
68b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung ma bgams rmongs par ma byas mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyis ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
68b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o// song / nas kyang bgam par bya ste/ gal te rmongs pa 'am mgo 'khor bar bya nus pa lta na de lta na yul ma ga d+ha thams/ 
68b6(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag la gcig tu 'dus bdag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro snyam mo// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang
68b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // song nas kyang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po de bzhin
68b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba// zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/ sku shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/ mdzod spu nor
69a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba/ spyan pad+ma dang ud pal sngon po kha bye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/ spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang bltar mi mthong ba/ 'khor gyi nang
69a2(dkon brtsegs): na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang des sku de lta bu mthong gsung gi phrin las de lta bu thos nas sems dang bar gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems
69a3(dkon brtsegs): te ma la bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam 'on te/ ma yin bgam par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang
69a4(dkon brtsegs): pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgam pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs tshed la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to// 'di snyam du yang sems
69a5(dkon brtsegs): te ci 'dis bdag gi sems shes sam 'on te mi shes zhi ga gu/ gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// tso ste mi shes na ni de na 'ong bar 'gyu ro snyam mo// de nas
69a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad nas/ mkhyen bzhin
69a7(dkon brtsegs): du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te cang mi gsungs pas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di bdag rnam
69a8(dkon brtsegs): par tho 'tsham pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma yin la thams cad gzigs dang ldan pa yang ma yin no snyam mo// de nas
69b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos
69b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i za ma tog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di la tho 'tsham par 'gyur ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me'u
69b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang / ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lta
69b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho 'tsham par mi nus so// / mo'u dgal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod chags ni tho 'tsham/ par byed pa yin/ zhe sdang ni tho 'tsham par byed pa yin
69b5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug ni tho 'tsham par byed pa yinan/ de dag ni de bzhin gshe gas pa la bag la nyal ba dang bcas te zad dral yongasu gyur gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/ des na
69b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho 'tsham par mi nuso// mo'u dgal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas sgyu ma yang dag pa ma
69b7(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/ des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mo'u dgal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su/ 
69b8(dkon brtsegs): gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang / 
70a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang grangs su yang bgrang bar yang dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
70a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par kun du ston nus sam/ gsol ba/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
70a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun du ston par mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs
70a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan par ni mi 'gyur ro// mo'u dgadal gyi bu phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yo/ dad pa 'di lta ste rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya/ 
70a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yongasu gcod par byed cing yongs su bcad nas
70a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jig par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun du 'thor byed dang / rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas yongasu 'jog
70a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na ri phal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa
70a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag yin pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces bya ba sreg pa'i skal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil
70b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnam par bsgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis bsreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi bar byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
70b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun du khebs par byed pa dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs shes bya ba gang gis na bsreg pa'i skal ba'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang / 
70b3(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems shes bya ba gang gis na chus 'jig pa de lhag par skems par byed pa yod do// mo'u dgal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te skal pa 'am
70b4(dkon brtsegs): skal ba las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa das rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa las mthar thug pa med do// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam
70b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
70b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'u dgal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi nang du spyod lam bzhis gnas par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi
70b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du 'jog par mdzad 'jug par mdzad la/ yungs 'bru de yang rnam par 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing / yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang // 
70b8(dkon brtsegs): bar ston par mdzad la/ rlung de dag phan tshun thug par yang mi 'gyur ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no// 
71a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngag
71a2(dkon brtsegs): mthun par tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis legs par rnyed par legs par rnyed de/ ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di ltar mthu che ba
71a3(dkon brtsegs): ni bdag cag gis legs par rnyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing / mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na med
71a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa legs// / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal pos khab kyi grong khyer chen
71a5(dkon brtsegs): po ga la ba der song ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thas cad kyi brtsog dgu dang / mi mthun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang 'byung
71a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda ldi dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/ gzhi lag 'thil ltar mnyam pa me tog bkram pa spos bzang po mchog gis
71a7(dkon brtsegs): bdugs pa steng du bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to// rin po che'i shing ljon
71a8(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yogs pa rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri g.yas g.yon su yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa
71b1(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to// 
71b2(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byed pa gos dkar po bgos pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya yang mngon par sprul to// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rgyal po chen po
71b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi lus chen por sprul nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi rgyas kyi ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan pa ma so 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshed
71b4(dkon brtsegs): la spyan drangs pa dang / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas/ yongasu longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod dpa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 
71b5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la ma chod pa'i las bya ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu lon+da spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi
71b6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shog/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gnang ba dang / de nas
71b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to// de nas yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan
71b8(dkon brtsegs): cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der seng nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / 
72a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bzang po kho bo cag kyang
72a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang / khyod la bstang pa'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig
72a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
72a4(dkon brtsegs): bo brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed dang / yongs 'dus brtom/ 
72a5(dkon brtsegs): bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang / rgyal po ni/ na po bzhi'i bkod pa yang mgo mog por byas par gyur to// 
72a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang / mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te lhags pa dang sbyar na
72a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas/ bdag gis sems can mchog de lta bu la thob rnam par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dog der gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan
72a8(dkon brtsegs): bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed de dag med par byed do// gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brgal kyang / zhal
72b1(dkon brtsegs): zas dang rim gro dang 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa dang seng ge'i khri yang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang / de shin
72b2(dkon brtsegs): du ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sngon cad ni 'dod na sgyu ma ston par yang byed/ 'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med
72b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed ma nus so snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa de sems kyis yongasu shes nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces
72b4(dkon brtsegs): smras// bzang ba ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i daphyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med par bya ma nus pa de de bzhin du bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed
72b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de yang med par ma 'gyur te/ de dag gi de ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnga bar gyi rgyur 'gyuraro// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' dgu yid
72b6(dkon brtsegs): rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshad la bab pa bskul bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod lags pa'i dus dang
72b7(dkon brtsegs): tshod la bab na/ gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos gsol lhung bzed thogs te/ dge slong gi dge
72b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dang la gshegs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/ 
73a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs snyam du shes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur
73a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs can dang spyod pa dang kun du rgyu dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de
73a4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'khor gyi khyams der dong ste/ de ring da dge sbyong go'u ta ma la tho 'tsham pa blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ 8/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad pa dige slong dang dge slong
73a5(dkon brtsegs): ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas/ de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bgam pa yang mnyan par bya/ cho 'phrul
73a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po yang blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang kheng pa nges pa bcom nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
73a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par tho brtsam pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegasu gsol pa gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chagaso// bcom
73a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzhan yang zhal zas sprul pa dang rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang / seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang / 'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la
73b1(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam te shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis/ 
73b2(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi rngo ma thog nas/ zhal zas dang rim gro bgyid pa dang seng ge'i khri dang 'khor gyi khyams kyi dkod pa yang de kho na bzhin du gda'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'dra/ 
73b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa yang 'di lta ste las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po dge/ 
73b4(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun 'di yang 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sgyu mas spu/ del pa yin no// bzang po nga yang 'di lta ste ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po stong gsum gyi
73b5(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 'di lta ste sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste rkyen tshogs pa'i sgyu
73b6(dkon brtsegs): mas sprul pa yin no// bzang po 'on kyang de'i dus la bab par shes na ji ltar sprul pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba dang bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig/ de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos sprul
73b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rim gro ba de dag dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhan cig sprul pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba dang bldag pa des bcom ldan 'das/ 
73b8(dkon brtsegs): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par rnam par byed do// de na 'i che gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di smras so// sbyin pa 'di ni ci zhig 'dra// len par byed pa ci 'dra ba/ de
74a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'i chos nyid thob 'gyur ba// yon ni rnam par sbyong gyur cig/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang // de la gang dag bzhugs
74a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// mi mnyam ma mchis mtshungs pa ste// mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang // len par byed pa'i sems gang dang / 
74a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed pa'i ji lta bar// yon ni myur du sbyong bar shog/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang bas// len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs// gang dag 'dir ni gshegs
74a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams// de dag yon sbyong byed pa yin// kun dag da' bos smras pa/ 'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis spyad// gang dag sems
74a5(dkon brtsegs): lus grol ba de// 'jig rten dag na yon skyeng mchogabyang chub sems dpa' 'od tog gis smras pa/ ji lta bu/ na sgyu ma mkhan// bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa// dngos
74a6(dkon brtsegs): kun de dang 'dra ba ste// byis pas de ni mi rtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/ ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag/ du ma mngon par sprul pa byas pa// yid kyi sgyu ma lta bur
74a7(dkon brtsegs): stong / 'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med// byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa/ seng ge'i sgra ni ma thos na// wa ni nags tshal nang na sgrogs// de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas// phyogs
74a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur// de bzhin sgyu mkhan bzang po yang // de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong na// mu stegs nang na rgyal ba bas// bdag nyid mchog ces sgrogs par byed// bzang po de bzhin
74b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yi// sgyu mas sgyu mar rtogs byed pa// tshad mar gyur pa gsungs na ni// de la bdud kyi gting mi dpags// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis spras pa/ zhes
74b2(dkon brtsegs): zas 'di ni sprul pa ste// bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang sprul pa yin// spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste// sbyin pa dge ba bla na med pa// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ me ni mar dang // 
74b3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i mar gyis// phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu mched// de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ji ltar 'di na sngon
74b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ thams cad byed pa med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni// sngon gyi mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang
74b5(dkon brtsegs): po shin tu gdul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas khyim bdag gci ga sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci
74b6(dkon brtsegs): byed smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u tam 'di gdugs tshod gsol par byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
74b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol zhing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu/ 
74b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ de nang du zhugs te sgyu ma mkhan bzang
75a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u tam 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thong de skad ma zer
75a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs/ 
75a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba mthong ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan zhig sprul te// de nang du zhugs
75a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga dugs tshod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang
75a5(dkon brtsegs): po thang de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi bskyed mo tshol na 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs so// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de
75a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'tshe byed kyi bskyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sgyu ma mkhan
75a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la 'di skad smras so// bzang po ci byed/ smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di gdugs chod gsol bar byed do// des smras pa/ bzang po thang de skad ma zer/ de bzhin gshegs pa
75a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas/ shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas
75b1(dkon brtsegs): na shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo // de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed de thams cad kyi lo ma thams cad dang me tog thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
75b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul
75b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor ba mthong ngo // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rtsig pa 'am
75b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim 'am khang bzangs sam srang ngam lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
75b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa/ 'chags par mthong zhing / de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang / 
75b6(dkon brtsegs): po mag lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas/ de tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde
75b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa rjesu dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshig su
75b8(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bzhed na brgya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing // dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas mang po sprul par mdzad pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul
76a1(dkon brtsegs): de la mos// bdag gis sngon bslobs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags// 'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na// de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas// 'di
76a2(dkon brtsegs): yi grangs dang char yang ma spyod do// bdag gi sha yi mig gis gang mthong ba// thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus// rgyal ba yang
76a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gang lags bka' stsol cig/ gang zhig mchod na legs par mchod pa lags// gang la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba lags// gang gi byang chub mthun par gzung ba 'di// kun tu spyan
76a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de ring 'jig rten mgo dan la bgam bgyis pa'i// nor spa gang lags deng 'di dar kun tu 'chags// gang dag sems can mchog la
76a5(dkon brtsegs): gus mi gnas// sems can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las nyam/ sa// bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang // 'khri ra 'dus gyur pa 'di dag kun gson cig/ sems can
76a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du// byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// bdag gis sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer// bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi/ 
76a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes par bgyi// mthu dang sgrub pas rnam par sad par bgyi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cig/ bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong
76a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang // chags pa med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni// su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems bskyed mi bgyi// byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi// byang chub lam ni bdag
76b1(dkon brtsegs): la bshad du gsol// gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i// de dag rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu// cho ga spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu// mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta bu/ 
76b2(dkon brtsegs): nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba// bdag la the tshom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs// ji ltar thos pa tshol la goms pa lags// thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang // gzhan
76b3(dkon brtsegs): la gsal bar ston pa ji lta bu// srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos la dang // ji ltar 'di dag shes kyi khe mi tshol// zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas// byas pa shes shing rab
76b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phan 'dogs dang // sems can mi phyed gnas par ci lta/ dar 'gyur// grogs po gang dag bsten bgyi ci lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong // ji
76b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur// de dag maH nga nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi// ci ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa lags// de yi bslab pa'i bca' ba gang
76b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig lags// tshul khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur// ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thobs/ ji ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba lags// tshul bzhin
76b7(dkon brtsegs): ma lags ji ltar spong ba lags// ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang // nyon mongs bdud kyi bcing bas mi thub lags// ji ltar dad ldan don ni sems bgyid cing // 
76b8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags// ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing // nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags// ji ltar sems can spyod la 'jug
77a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang thabs dang byams pa'i snying rjes gnas pa lags// mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur// dran dang bla gras gang gis rnam dag cing // 
77a2(dkon brtsegs): so sa yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur// smon lam rnam dag spyod las mi ldog cing // zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas pa lags// sman lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par
77a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ ji ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing // de bzhin byang chub rjesu 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun shes shing // byang chub phyir ni spyad pa mi ldog pa/ 
77a4(dkon brtsegs): kun mkhyen legs par don bsams shes rab mtsho// ye shes 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan phan yon bdag la bstan du gsol// bdag
77a5(dkon brtsegs): gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos kun sprul par gang gis
77a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed// sprul pa de dag zhing rnams bye bar 'gro// de dag song nas sems can bye ba 'grel// ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs
77a7(dkon brtsegs): med las// sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs ni ston byed cing // de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la// 'gro med 'ong med gnas pa med pa ltar// bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal
77a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yis// phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sprul de 'dra// de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas bsam yas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin// ji ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye
77b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ sems pa yod min de bzhin nga rgyal med// 'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min// byin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs med kha dog
77b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dbyibs min spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med// 'jig tshogs lta ba kun nas bslang ma yin// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes med// sangs rgyas gzugs su mi
77b3(dkon brtsegs): lta mtshan dang ni// na tshod rigasu ma yin sgra dang ni// 'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin sems dang ni// rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ma yin// chos nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// / 
77b4(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa// rtag tu sgyu dma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de la bgrang bas darab tu phye ba med// sangs rgyas 'byung gang chos nyid 'byung
77b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung // chos de gnas pa mi g.yo rten pa med// de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin// gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas
77b6(dkon brtsegs): blta snyam sems// des ni gzhan yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// 'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste// dper na na mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin// bzang po gang khyod cung zad
77b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas blta// de kun don gcig yin par shes par gyis// nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs// bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin// de dag ting 'dzin
77b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam// de dag rnam par grol bar mnyam pa yin// rnam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs dang ni// rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin// / 
78a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par mnyam// thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas// kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol// de dag
78a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin// bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te// 'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang // tha dad bya ba nam
78a3(dkon brtsegs): yang yod ma yin// de dag thams cad yon pa zhes sbyong bar mdzad// kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur// de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa se/ sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang
78a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yin// rtse dag cig sems dang dran pa nyer gzhag cing // chos tshul rtogs la rnam par lta bas de// legs par nges bsams
78a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis nga la nyon// bzang po de kun ma skyes yangadag min// phyin ci log gis de kun mthong bar zad// gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na// dngos po thams cad
78a6(dkon brtsegs): du ni zad mi 'gyur// de phyir shin tu ma skyes yang dag min// de dag skye med zad la gnas pa med// des na bltar med ngo bo de dag snang // rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin// 
78a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bzang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang // ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba// gang gzhan phung po rgyal chen rten stobs dang // phung po lnga po'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos// chos
78a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med// mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de// sangs rgyas las ni shin tu ring bar 'gyur// chos
78b1(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin kun tu rtogs pas bslad// dngos po med par yang ni brten nas shes// byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das// ming du 'dzin pas stong rab tu ston// gang gis rgyu dang byed
78b2(dkon brtsegs): po rkyen min shes// des ni chags bral gyur pa'i chos kyang shes// 'dod chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na// des ni rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong // yang de'i tshe tshig su
78b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ches la nges par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa chung ngu skyes so// srog chags lnga stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
78b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so// byang chub sems dang / nga' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/ to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas sprul pa
78b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gsol nas/ sgyu ma mkhan bzang ba'i yon yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin// sbyin pa ji ltar mi rtog
78b6(dkon brtsegs): pa// sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni// bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyam 'di
78b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing ma gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsal// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams de ltar rgyun / 
78b8(dkon brtsegs): brgyan bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te stan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// 
79a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bgengs nas chos bstan pa'i phyir bzhugs// dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 
79a2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad du dong ngo // de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
79a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par thu mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
79a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma mkhan bzang dpos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying
79a5(dkon brtsegs): por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / ba com ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces
79a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// bzang po de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la legaso zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das la
79a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub
79a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can yongasu mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ngoms mi shes pa
79b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying par 'gro bar 'gyur
79b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sdom pa gsum yong
79b3(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / gnas yongs su dag pa dang / shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos
