79b4(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byed chub sems dpa'i chos yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzlog pa dang / sems kyis rnam par
79b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje che ba dang / spobs pa dang / skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/ bzhi pa na ngag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems/ 
79b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa na gnas pa dang / 'du 'jil mi dga' ba dang / de na gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang / 'du byed
79b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par
79b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / sems rtag tu dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang grags pa spong ba dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/ 
80a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dus shes pa dang / tshad shes pa
80a2(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu dben pa dang / yang dag pa nyid de/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tsom med pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba
80a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gnon pa dang / mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / thos pa'i don sems pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng shing gleng ba gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi
80a4(dkon brtsegs): skyon gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi 'di dag ma thong na thos pa tshol bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag dang
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas lhagasapa rnams kyi the tsom gcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa zad mi shes
80a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// zang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos nas chos bye brag du shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin// / 
80a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thos nas gzhan la ston par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no// thon nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan
80a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtong bar byed 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/ 
80b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ las byas nas zas la yongasu spyad pa dang / chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang / gzhan gyi phyogs mthu chung bar
80b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ches ston par byed pa'i
80b3(dkon brtsegs): phan yon yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa chung ba dang
80b4(dkon brtsegs): chog shes pa dang / ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang / bdag nyid kyis chos grub pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// / bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes/ 
80b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi khe las 'byol zhing zang zing med par yang chos ston pa yin// te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzidon// 
80b6(dkon brtsegs): du mi gnyer ba dang / pha rol rjes su srung ba dang / 'phags pa'i ris la gnas pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byas pa la
80b7(dkon brtsegs): lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan byang chub yang dag par lan du 'jug pa dang las byas pa chud mi gson pa dang / bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang
80b8(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur/ 
81a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bani ga she na/ bzod pa'i stobs kyi go dgos pa dang / lan du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang reb med pa dang / snying rje chen po ma 'dor ba dang / log par zhugs pa rnam
81a2(dkon brtsegs): mi spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' shes mi phyed par 'gyur ro// bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i
81a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs po yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / gang dag 'dira'i byang chub nye bar ston
81a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi de dge ba'i grogs po yin par phyig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ theg
81a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dman pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems 'dun pa bzlog par byed pa dang / gang dag bstan na mi dge ba chos la 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams
81a6(dkon brtsegs): las yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur te/ bzhi
81a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrags pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa
81a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang ba byang chub sems dpa' phan yan bzhi po 'di dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar smra bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yin gnas mtsha
81b1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod par 'gyur ba dang / bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod nas byang chub kyi sems
81b2(dkon brtsegs): brtan par 'gyur ba dang / skye bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi
81b3(dkon brtsegs): po de dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro// bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhin mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/ bzhi
81b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bde 'gro thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ral gus pa dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 
81b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po'i de dag ni byang/ chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/ bzhi gang / zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang / sems can thams
81b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa mnyam pa la mi skrag pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
81b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bslab pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid
81b8(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang / lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par yang dag par 'joms ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa
82a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/ bzhi gang she na/ 'du 'dzi med pa dang / 
82a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa dang / sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no// 
82a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang / nang du yang dag
82a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jog la sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par dag pa'o sku dag la 'dris par byed pa dang / nges pa la mi 'jug ste/ bzang po bzhi pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems da / 
82a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no// bzang po tra/ zhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin
82a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang / dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'a
82a7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nges par
82a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can dga'i don gyi phyir yang skal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang / 
82b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyad pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyan mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang dbang po mchog ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir
82b2(dkon brtsegs): ston par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no// bdag gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub
82b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po la 'jug go// bdud kyi dpung pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par byas
82b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum pa yin no// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'a'ajig rten gyi khams skad cig gis go bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa
82b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa yin te/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dang / 'a rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin na// / bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
82b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / mtshan ma
82b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mi gnas pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
82b8(dkon brtsegs): gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye ba dang / rten nas skyes pa dang rten nas skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang / 
83a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po med pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no// bzang po byang chub
83a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang / yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta ba
83a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi
83a4(dkon brtsegs): zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang / dus su bskul bas dran pa byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bdag nyid kyi
83a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba spangs nas gzhan gyi bde ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang yongs/ su smin par byed pa ste/ bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byangachub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu smin par byed pa yin// 
83a6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan nam bsdus pa sdud par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
83a7(dkon brtsegs): par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti dang tshig su bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/ 
83a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / ye shes
83b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen por gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid bsgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag/ 
83b2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon
83b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ste tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid med par
83b4(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pas chos thams cad log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang / rnam par grol ba 'dod pasasnyoms par 'jug pa thams cad mngon par zhen pa med
83b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes bsgom par byed pa ste/ byang chub sa mas dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o// bzang po bzhi po 'di/ 
83b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa bsgom pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag
83b7(dkon brtsegs): gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa dang / bdag gi
83b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa bsgom pa yin no/ 
84a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ngan song du skyes pa rnam bde 'gro'i lam la 'god pa'i snying rje dang / 
84a2(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang / sems can
84a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ 
84a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang sems yang ba dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang / sem can thams cad la gus pa dang / rim gro'i sems bskyed
84a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.ye/ nga ba med pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems da pa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na so so yang dag par rig pa thob
84a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang / 
84a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs thob
84a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rtag tu gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson
84b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa thob par
84b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshogs dang / yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa dag
84b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang / thos pas
84b4(dkon brtsegs): khengs pa med pa dang / thos pa nyung ngu rnams la brnyas pa/ dar mi byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po de bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgyur ba
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ste bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mu ga bsgyur ba dang / nyan thos las bsgyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas las bsgyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshe
84b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'du shes bsgyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag yin no// bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar
84b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par byed pa dang / dgongs pa rtogs par byed pa dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / 'di ltar stong pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa
84b8(dkon brtsegs): ste bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no// bzang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims
85a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bslab pa yongs su dag pad/ las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang
85a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ 
85a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thos na sdud par byed pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin / 
85a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang /  shes pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig gi tshul rtogs pas chos gzhan dag gi
85a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang / chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/ bzang po byang chu ba sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ pha rol tu phyin
85a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim
85a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bo de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi na mkha' la 'phags so// de nas
85a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer des khyab par byas nas/ 
85b1(dkon brtsegs): slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
85b2(dkon brtsegs): tetebacom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis
85b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzub mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// ye shes 'byung gnas/ 
85b4(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags// 'jig rta na gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyas grags/ ngargyal ba rang 'byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa// mi yi
85b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol// phyogs rnams na ni 'gro bar sems can ji snyed gan sa// de dag kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni// 
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dman dang mchog dang tha ma bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen// ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol// lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni gang lags dang // mi 'am ci dang mi dang ba
85b7(dkon brtsegs): byin lha min dang / mkha' lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams// sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod// 'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams
85b8(dkon brtsegs): dang brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa// ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gdab ltar// 'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags// 
86a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing der zab ma 'chos ni rjes su 'thob// stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas// yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su/ 
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa po// deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de// su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas// su zhig dkon mchog gsum
86a3(dkon brtsegs): po rgya chen bskyed par bgyid// gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs// gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsung // de tshe bde gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub
86a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsung na phrag par nub// gang tshe sangs rgyas theg gsungs de tshe spyi bor nub// ji ltar khyod da kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba// bde bar gshegs pa'i
86a5(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub par gyur las na// phan mdzad lha yi lha/ ste phan pa mdzad pa po// 'dir ni sangs rgyas theg pa lung bstan dogs ma mchis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
86a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ kun
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di ni skal ba dgu khri nyis stong na bskal pa legs par sprul pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
86a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i
86b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de ni 'byor par 'gyur/ rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang nyams dga' ba dang mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing / lag 'thil ltar mnyam
86b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ka tsa lin 'di ltar reg na 'jam pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang / rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
86b3(dkon brtsegs): par gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bza' ba dang btung ba ni dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste mi
86b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nye bar spyad pa dang yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu thams cad nye bar ston par byed de des na 'jig rten gyi khams
86b5(dkon brtsegs): de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgya// sa kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag tham// sa cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par
86b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni le khrir 'gyuraro// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos
86b7(dkon brtsegs): lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par
86b8(dkon brtsegs): grags pa 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes byang chub sems
87a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sgra rnam par grag pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo/ 
87a2(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bsti/ 
87a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma tshang dab ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par mi rto// dag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de bzhin nyid dang // 
87a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhi na gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs
87a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob bam cin/ khyod ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de skad smra/ 
87a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang pos smras pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med
87a8(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang yin pa der kho bo yang chung cing / ji ltar kho bo chud pa bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/ ji ltar sems can thams cad chud
87b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chung pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su med pa ni gang na kun
87b2(dkon brtsegs): du shes pa med pa nyid dang yongs su shes pa med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
87b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs
87b4(dkon brtsegs): par bgyis so// da yang shes rab dang ye shes kyis mgo na dngas par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o// 
87b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par byed pa bden namagasol
87b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kya rmongs par bgyid lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste bdag med pa nyid kyis
87b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang / srog med pa dang gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin gshe/ 
87b8(dkon brtsegs): bas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skye ba mi gzigs med kyi 'chi 'pho dang 'gro ba dang skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
88a1(dkon brtsegs): lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung bka' stsol ba ltar/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
88a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legaso legs so// khrod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/ 'di lta ste bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos sten
88a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sreg med pa dang gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs nas chos 'ga' yang
88a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chi 'pho ba 'am 'gro ba'am skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi// 'chi 'pho dang 'gro ba dang skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/ 'di la yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'am yongs su mya
88a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos bstan pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang ma da do// de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'ang/ sa la rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
88a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung shig/ de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung bsnyen pa rdzogs
88a7(dkon brtsegs): par byas so// rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang rtags dang tshul gyis
88a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags pa ma mchis la sems can yongasu smin
88b1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so// yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stang gis ni bran
88b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
88b3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di'i ming ji skad ces gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
88b4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shi/ ga/ rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya// bar yang zung shig/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag
88b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang gis 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan
88b7(dkon brtsegs): pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pas mthong ba yin/ des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis skye bo mang po la bde ba
88b8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / 'di lta ste lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shing / chongs shing / lhogs shing / kun chub pa
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par 'byung ba de dag ni theg pa chen po'ang
89a2(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par rab tu ston te/ des ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub la yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo khyad mos par bya'o// khong du chud par bya'o// gang zhig chas kyi nas
89a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di grags bam du byed pa 'am/ lus la bsrel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bca
89a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gas dal to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sngan dkyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul ba zhes bgyi lagaso// de ci'i slad du
89a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dge 'irgyang rtson bsags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lagaso// bcom ldan
89a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi bu bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i
89a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag
89a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa las sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / pradz+nyA wa ra ma dang / shu chen gyis
89b1(dkon brtsegs): tsA ba ban sde ye shes sde la sogs pas sbyar cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sho lo ka bzhi brgya sum cubam po gcig dang sha loka brgya sum nu'o// 
89b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti dAr+ya u pa de sho nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
89b4(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig
89b5(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 
89b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams 'dul ba
89b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste kun
89b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/ thogs pa med
90a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyad pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dkon mtshan
90a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes pa spyad pa/ 
90a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ngan song dang ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba/ de dag ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes kun rjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan seng rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gang gis de/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yang na nyan thos kyi theg pa
90a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang
90a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
90a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes de kho na bzhin du kun brjod par mdzad pa dang / gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba sa/ 
90a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de yang
90b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / spyad pa ji lta bus sang/ 
90b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to// mkhyen nas kyang de kho na bzhin du kun brjod cing
90b3(dkon brtsegs): lung ston par mdzad pa dang / dge ba'am mi dge ba'am/ dman pa'am bAma'i mchog gam tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin// / 
90b4(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjesu ston dpar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste 'di ni bya ba'o//  pa ning // don
90b5(dkon brtsegs): bskya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni bsgrub pa'o// 'di ni log par bsgrub pa'o// chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o// chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i cha dang mthun
90b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pa rjesu ston pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad spangs pa rjesu ston pa dang / dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad rjesu ston pa dang / lam
90b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// lam 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
90b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/ de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na gnas gang yin pa de rje su 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin pa ste de ni gnas medo// / 
91a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasu khrid par byed do// las
91a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnamasu khrid par byed do// las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni mi rnam su khrid par
91a3(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs na dge ba yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams skyes nas rim gyis yongasu mya ngan
91a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / tshul de lta bus kha na ma tho ba dang rmongs pa med pa'i rjesu ston par mdza dra ba gang yin pa ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu bsdu
91a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzur/ phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul gyi/ 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pas
91a6(dkon brtsegs): btso rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun du ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyuraro// du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyuraro// rtsig
91a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o// rab la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o// ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o// sa la sten du 'byung ba dang bye'u zul byed de dpen tshul bya ba bzhin no// chu la
91a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi nub par 'gro ste dper na sa la bya ba bzhin// na mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab chags bya ba bzhin no// lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed// 
91b1(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi spang nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang dag par 'dzin cing
91b2(dkon brtsegs): kun du nyug par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun du 'bar 'bar bar ston te/ sems can yongs
91b3(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par dag pa mngon par sgrub par byed de/ de ni de
91b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ma su la yi// lha'i bung ni tshe 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma la/ gas pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu yod do// 
91b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
91b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyang shin du tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur
91b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gses/ 
92a1(dkon brtsegs): tobacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thas/ 
92a2(dkon brtsegs): cad phyag gi khyor ba ya cig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la cho 'phrul 'di mnga' lagaso// yang na 'di ni tshe 'phrug
92a3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ming
92a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / sgra ma ma chis pa dang / dbyangs ma mchis pa dang / tshig gi la dam ma mchis pa dang / rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan
92a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis pa dang / spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyu ba/ ma mchis pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa dang // / 
92a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang / byang ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / rtag tu ma mchis pa dang / 
92a7(dkon brtsegs): rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dang tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de gzhan dag la rnam par rig par
92a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing / dmigs pa dang mtshan ma dang yongasu rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge
92b1(dkon brtsegs): skyong dang bram ze thams cad dang shing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni ba/ 
92b2(dkon brtsegs): na stang gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhal gyi sgor stsal kyang gling chen po bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dang / dgung zla dang / gdugs dag dang / khar yug rnams
92b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ri dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang / slar phyung ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyang 'di ltar bdag cag
92b4(dkon brtsegs): yul gang du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas ba ton pa yang mi 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de yangade bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lagaso// 'di ni cha
92b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul chen po dam pa lags te/ gang de bzhin gsheg/ sa pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / 
92b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang byang ba dang phra ba dang / mthong bar
92b7(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dang tha snyad kyi lam
92b8(dkon brtsegs): de dang de dag gis chos bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams/ 
93a1(dkon brtsegs): cad ni mtshan ma dngas po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so// 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul chen po lags te/ 'di lta ste bdag ma/ 
93a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gso ba ma mchis pa lags
93a3(dkon brtsegs): bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes pa ma mchis pa la shed las skyes tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchis pa la
93a4(dkon brtsegs): shed bur tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mang ma mchis pa la mi dang du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugasu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor
93a5(dkon brtsegs): bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du shes ma mchis pa la/ 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnam su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam
93a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / khams ma mchis pa la kham su tha snyad 'dogs
93a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig stong zhes bgyi ba tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / gzugs sted
93a8(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa
93b1(dkon brtsegs): ni'adi snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
93b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad/ 
93b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dags kyang chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong
93b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar bems po dang / sem ngas pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos 'di/ 
93b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la ya nga dag par go bar mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni
93b6(dkon brtsegs): mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lag/ 
93b7(dkon brtsegs): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa yang
93b8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags/ ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes
94a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa ma lags/ chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/ de lta bu'i tshe
94a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i tshe 'phrul lags/ de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par lta ba ma lags/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang
94a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par lta ba ma lags te/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glob mi ches par 'gyur ba lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga dag lags te phung po lnga po mi
94a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa de la byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing de dag gi phung nga po lnga po dag rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba
94a5(dkon brtsegs): lagaso// 'jig rten gyi phung po rdzog rtag ces bgyi bar glob ches pas na/ de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jigarten thams cad glob mi ches pa lagaso// 'jig rten ni phung po
94a6(dkon brtsegs): lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches pa lagaso// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na
94a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams
94a8(dkon brtsegs): cad glo ba ma chis lagaso// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar gro ba ches pas na de dag bdag po ma mchiso zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glob mi ches lag so// 'jig rten
94b1(dkon brtsegs): ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag par zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag yang dag pa ma lagaso zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glob mi ches pa lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul don/ 
94b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lagaso// cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so// tshe 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags
94b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs bgrang ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags slar bgrang ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni rna ba
94b4(dkon brtsegs): dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lagaso// de bzhin du sbyar te cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags tshe su bkra dang ba ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag
94b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'das pa lags// cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags// stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis/ 
94b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na sdang ba nyid brjod pa de ni tshe 'phrul lags// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan ma ma mchi yang yin che 'phrul lags// sman pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis
94b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags// / 
94b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na skye ba ma mchi pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'byung ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul
95a1(dkon brtsegs): lagaso dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na dngos po ma mchis pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na
95a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'di ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'gag pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ 
95a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mya ngan las 'das pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'di lta ste bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can du kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang
95a4(dkon brtsegs): chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'di lta ste lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang / ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang / 
95a5(dkon brtsegs): sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag/ pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / sems skad
95a6(dkon brtsegs): cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / 
95a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'di lta ste nad nye bar zhi ba dang / phyi rol du rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang / sems bsags pa ma mchis
95a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// 'di lta ste ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yi ba rnam par spangs pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang / lta ba'i
95b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags// chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa lags na de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul
95b2(dkon brtsegs): lags// chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad pa de ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na yi ges kun du phye ste bshad pa/ 
95b3(dkon brtsegs): ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na 'byung
95b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni mngon dpar rtogs pa gcig pa lags na 'bras bu rnam par dgod dpa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni ro gcig
95b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni/ cho 'phrul lagaso// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma mchis ba lags na chos thams cad rnam par bshad pa dgod pa ni cha
95b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul lagaso// sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig lags na sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags// zhing thams cad zhing gcig pa lags na zhing sna tshogs
95b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags// sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na sems can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na tha ma dang / 
95b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog dang bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags// chos thams cad ni/ 
96a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na gzhan la rnam par rig pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lagaso// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
96a2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// / 
96a3(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa yin pas de dag brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha bu bri nyis stong bla na med pa yang
96a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu dad
96a5(dkon brtsegs): dpon la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i ci khyod cho 'phrul paste/ na pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin
96a6(dkon brtsegs): yin na de la kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin
96a7(dkon brtsegs): na de la dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis kho bo lnga rnams kyi nang du skyes te bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa/ 
96a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do// de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing / 
96b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang
96b2(dkon brtsegs): bas mi gyis mi khyab bo// bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa
96b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no// yang gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu/ 
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de so/ dan skrag par mi 'gyur ram zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha da ra dwa ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin/ 
96b5(dkon brtsegs): pa des na mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa NITabu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des nam
96b6(dkon brtsegs): khams skrag par mi 'gyur na kho bo yang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// smras pa/ lha'i bu ci khyod na mkha' yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu kho bo na na mkha' yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci
96b7(dkon brtsegs): las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi na mkha'i khamasu gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi na mkha'i khamasu gsungs pa gang yan
96b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa de nyid na mkha'i khams ma yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can yin// 
97a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lnga'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod kyis ring po thogs par cho 'phrul de nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur// smras pa/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag ni/ 
97a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
97a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i did dpon 'di de lta bur ston pa lags na 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa yang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so// 
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dade bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA radwa ti dbu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
97a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byas pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mngon par
97a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig
97a7(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig
97a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam med la 'jig rten gyi/ 
97b1(dkon brtsegs): khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang dngul dang bai dUr dang shel las grub cing lag 'thil ltar mnyam pa/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing / mi khom pa dang ngan song rnams dang bral la
97b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyis kun du gang zhing yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor pa bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya'o// de bzhin
97b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba shes rab kyi snang ba thob pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa tshig
97b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa mngo dran par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa ba du dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa sgrib pa med pa'i rnam
97b5(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pabazhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/ bsod nam
97b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ gsol ba ma btab pa sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa
97b7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang brtan pa dang blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang legs par sdom pa dang / tshul
97b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang thos pa dang shes rab la shin tu gnas pa thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos
98a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sem/ 
98a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sha stag go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 'khor las bsgyur
98a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po glang bzhi'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa mi'i dbang bar gyur pa lta bu zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur/ 
98a4(dkon brtsegs): te de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/  shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs
98a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
98a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshed dang mi dag gi tshe tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to// de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang mtsha/ 
98a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ba dang dad pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum
98a8(dkon brtsegs): tshang bar thugs la dgongs bzhin du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams
98b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas so// rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyini gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus par phul ni
98b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ches nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to// de bu dang bcas pa btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bus 'das nas kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong yang dang yang
98b3(dkon brtsegs): du de la chos nyan pas rjesu dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjesu dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan zhing
98b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran dab ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par bya/ dar to// de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin
98b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos yang dag par 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ma thong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal
98b6(dkon brtsegs): po dge ba bkod pa bu dang bcas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu dag la
98b7(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ngo // de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rjes su gdam
98b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
99a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ma mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de
99a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po che 'phrul de dag ma yin
99a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las
99a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar dbyung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad
99a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa rnams la yan lag gsum du smos pa dang / mngon parartogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod/ 
99a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang rnam pa med pa dang 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang
99a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon
99a8(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa med pa dang byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / byung ba med cing skad cig ma'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang
99b1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / 
99b2(dkon brtsegs): rol dang tshul rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / brtag pa dang bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par
99b4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la ba tang snyoms bsgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub
99b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / thos pa med pa dang rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par grub pa dang / dmigs pa dang sems pa dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams
99b6(dkon brtsegs): la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang lus dang sgra dang brtson 'grus
99b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams
99b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su brjod pa dang
100a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang /  khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnam
100a2(dkon brtsegs): la ni gnas bskyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan la
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das par smon pa'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge bo bkod pa de dang bu stong po de dag dang btsun
100a4(dkon brtsegs): mo'i tshigs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos pa stan pa dang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag
100a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang de'i bu stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag gis
100a6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
100a7(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// ji ltar
100a8(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma 'char ba yis// mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod spu yang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid// ji ltar zla ba nya ba yis// zla ba
100b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs rdzogs ljang de ltar// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi// 'jig rten mgon yang lha de lags// ji ltar me tog pad+ma ni// chab kyi nang du migs ltar// de bzhin 'jig rten
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mgon po yang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags// ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal// nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar// de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang // stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad
100b3(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs// mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang // mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang // mthar lta ba la rnam 'das pas// nges par seng ge sgra zhes bgyi// skye ba 'am yang na
100b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa'ang rung // de dag thams cad bstan 'dzin cing // mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// pha rol dang ni chu rol dag/ de dag rnam
100b5(dkon brtsegs): par rtog par bstan// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba// de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te// shin
100b6(dkon brtsegs): du dri ma ma mchis chos// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni// yongs su rtog las byung ba ste// rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra
100b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi// 'khor ba dag ni mya ngan 'das// de dag lam du gzhug pa ste// chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni// phyin ci/ 
100b8(dkon brtsegs): log las byung ba ste// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// lta dang dmigs pa gnas lags te// de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab/ 
101a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni// gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa// de dag thams cad bshad pa ni// nges par
101a2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge sgra zhes bgyi// sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du// rjes su mthun dang mi mthun pa'i// gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
101a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa'o// zab cing zhi la mthun bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par// dge chos rnams la 'jug
101a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// stong pa'i sgra dang sems can sgra// de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// sgra rnams kun la ma
101a5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi sgra'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes mthun ba/ 
101a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab dang // de bzhin kun la brtson bgyod pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// thams cad bdag la
101a7(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mi spong la// byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la// de 'dra'i chos ni ston
101a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ de la so ma nyi ma mchis pa// de ni rjes mthun bzod pa lags// bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i// 
101b1(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// bla med bsod nams zhing de la// bdag gi sa bon btab pas na// bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags// dgas thams cad
101b2(dkon brtsegs): rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho 'ang bas par 'gyur ba yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yin// sa bon nams kyang chab mi 'tshal// sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzham
101b3(dkon brtsegs): bar rngo thog gi/ byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de ni bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i// dbang dag lnga dang dri za dang // mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom
101b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang // 'dren pa bdag gi longasaspyod dang // gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi// mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// ci 'dra de 'dra de ltar bdag gyur
101b5(dkon brtsegs): cig byang chub lam ni dmigs bgyis nas// bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni// ma chag sdang ba ma mchi/ sa par// bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis// 
101b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byis pa stong rnams dang // mchis brang yongs su smin bgyis pa'i// gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub slad du spro ba mdzod// bdag gis bde gshegs lam mthong/ 
101b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing / chos 'di legs par thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba// bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa// de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'// chos
101b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa// sems can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des// rgyal po
102a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dag 'thun par ma byas kyi ma mthun par byas pas na// khyod
102a2(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams
102a3(dkon brtsegs): cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing dor ba med pas// blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni na mkha'
102a4(dkon brtsegs): la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa/ dbyibs med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag cing gnyen po med
102a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cadadang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes song ba yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas
102a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni brtag pa dang bsal ba dang / bral bar nye bar zhi ba'o// 
102a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi mthun med lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongasu grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes
102a8(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang / yid dang / 
102b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas rgyu ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par
102b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas
102b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o// 
102b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'du sa ma byas pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo bo nyid de lta bu la/ sgrub par
102b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / gang dag sman lam 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin/ 
102b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po byang chub ci 'dra ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang de 'dra ba yin pas/ gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 
102b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa/ 
102b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po
103a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul
103a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyis rlom sems mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad
103a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// bzod pas rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad
103a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byed par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yi na no// brtson 'grus kyis rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyadam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang / shum
103a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ting nge
103a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyis rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab tshogs yang
103a7(dkon brtsegs): su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin/ 
103a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pas rlom semasu mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa bskyed pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dang chos la nges par sem
103b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis sas yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin na// chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rten pa lams pa ni byang chub sems
103b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges par sems mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
103b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yang dag par 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin no// sems kyis rlom
103b4(dkon brtsegs): sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rna dmas kyi spyod pa yin no// na mkha' yong su dag pa dang / 
103b5(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa ra byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
103b6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin// 
103b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang / sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad la bdag med par/ 
103b8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas
104a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub semams dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las
104a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bur so so rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
104a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mdza' bshes dang // 
104a4(dkon brtsegs): mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa de nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni/ byang chub sem das dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lan re ba med pa
104a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis/ lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// thos pa dang bsgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa chol
