104a6(dkon brtsegs): bas ma ngoms pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems
104a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dam pa'i dben pa mnyam pa
104a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis dben pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni/ byang chub
104b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas/ rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongasu tshol
104b2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas/ dga' ba dang / 
104b3(dkon brtsegs): mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos dang rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par/ 
104b4(dkon brtsegs): bkab po// bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis nga / chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du/ gang bdag cag gis skyes bu
104b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bste/ na bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa leg sa par rnyed do// sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub
104b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ces smras so// de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge bkod pa la 'di skad
104b7(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang rgyan tsam gyis mchod pa de ni/ mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis de
104b8(dkon brtsegs): dag khyod kyis bsgrubs shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun
105a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing // ma zhum sems kyis skal pa rdzogs par ni// bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis byang chub kyi
105a2(dkon brtsegs): ni sems bskyed nas// de bzhin du ni rjes su bslabs pa dang // rang 'byung sems kyi gom pa gcig bor ba// de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang dag sngan chad byung
105a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas dang // gang dag ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams// de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par// bla med byang chub zhi pa thob pa med// rang 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 
105a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/ gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal dpa'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim
105a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang // gang zhig rab 'byung nyid dang mtsha na gcig tu// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems
105a6(dkon brtsegs): byed na/ gang zhig rab 'byung bag yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing // dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib
105a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba yin// rab 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // las kyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod// de ni dge ba chud za ma yin zhing // de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin
105a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim las grol banyon mangs mi 'phel zhing // nyan mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med// rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spong // spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// de nas
105b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dge ba bkod pas tshig su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi blta bar gyur cing / skyo la 'dod chags dang
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bral bar gyur te/ rab tu 'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs
105b3(dkon brtsegs): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ 
105b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/ sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod cing skra/ bas yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang
105b5(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa yin gyis// gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la ga dmas shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis kyang gtams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas
105b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid grub pa dang / sems can rnams
105b7(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su yod// de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab bdag cag kyang dad pa khyim nas phyi mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyang / bdag cag mi dor
105b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyed thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zad kyi skye ba'i tshig rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang sems can
106a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des/ rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu
106a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi nang nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya des/ rang gi pha de dang / rgan rabs de dag la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ rang 'byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes/ de bzhin/ 
106a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi// de ltar lags kyang snying rjer gyur pa na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tshe bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong
106a4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi// me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang // de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi bgyin // lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi 'dogs shig/ 'chil lham mi 'tshal
106a5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen gtsug pud min// khri rkang gser las brgya sa par minyal shing // rgyal po'i rkyen gyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil snyan glu dbyangs sbal mi dga' zhing // rma bya
106a6(dkon brtsegs): ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid// skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing // gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab// bdag ni gling nas gling du ma che bgyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams
106a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bshad par bgyi// khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu 'byung ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bgyi// gzugs dang dbang phyug longs spyod dregs pa yis// sangs rgyas
106a8(dkon brtsegs): chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi// byang chub sems ni bskyed par mi bgyi zhing // rtag tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi// sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don 'thun pas// sems can bsdu/ 
106b1(dkon brtsegs): bal na brtson bgyi zhing // tha med theg chen dam pa 'dil yang // srag chags bye ba mang po yangs sprin bgyi// chos den mnyam cing bshad par bgyi skad du// nyin ma dus gsus
106b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma dus gsum du// ri rab lta bu spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rab lta bu des/ 
106b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhin nu snying rje tshor sems la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs legs so// bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yan khyim pa
106b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang / ro yan tan mtshungs pa ma yin na// khyad kyi snying rje chen po nges na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa'ang sgrub par byed pa yin na/ 
106b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/ rgyal po gzhan na/ snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas/ bu steng du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das
106b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i bstan pa la das khyags khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to// de dag rab tu byung nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gtams shing rjes su
106b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas/ de dag gis ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// gzungs dang dran pa dang / chos mnyan pa'i shes pa yang skyes par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhan/ 
106b8(dkon brtsegs): nu snying rje che rasems cang rgyal sring la dbang bskur nas zla banya' tshig la gling chen po bzhi pa dag tu rjes su snyan par byed de/ ci nas kyang sreg chags dung pung phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag
107a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur te// de dag thams
107a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
107a3(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis ci tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing
107a4(dkon brtsegs): da pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de lta ltos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin
107a5(dkon brtsegs): ba snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'o/ ded dpon 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los
107a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du
107a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod yid gnyis dang som nyi za bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal
107a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sem nyi dang yid gnyis za bar
107b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na shA ra dwa tI'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyis sangs rgyas snying po de dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to/ 
107b2(dkon brtsegs): shA radwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyed
107b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa
107b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / shes bzhin dkyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad chub tu nges par byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis
107b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las/ srog chags su khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
107b6(dkon brtsegs): tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun
107b7(dkon brtsegs): ring po nas/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha
107b8(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyis/ kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa yin/ 
108a1(dkon brtsegs): pas de'i phyir kho bo na yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod shes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ kha ba na
108a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyisu sbyor ba yin
108a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis kho bo ni gnyis sbyor ba yang ma yin la/ gnyis med par sbyar ba yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas/ tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs
108a4(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun
108a5(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gzu gas dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang reg bya
108a6(dkon brtsegs): dang chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo na yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/ bdud kyis lam las yang
108a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'dab pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs
108a8(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor ba mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin/ 
108b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/ kho bo na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/ de'i
108b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin/ 
108b3(dkon brtsegs): tede'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyad pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'das ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/ kho ba ni
108b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te/ de'i/ phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal
108b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ no zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i
108b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun
108b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya/ 
108b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par
109a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin
109a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang / sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i mu yin pa
109a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
109a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni lce dang ro'i yul ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med pa'i ma tshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang nga / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma
109a5(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de/ la bsnyen bkur bya ba mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa ni yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings
109a6(dkon brtsegs): su yang dag 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
109a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas/ 
109a8(dkon brtsegs): de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
109b1(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spras pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus
109b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la bzhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi
109b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / 
109b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen debakur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa da ni 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas
109b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu ni la nye bar zhi ba yi na bas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang
109b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang gzugs dang / dbyibs
109b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba lci bas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang
109b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du/ 
110a1(dkon brtsegs): skur pa gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir/ btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di
110a2(dkon brtsegs): skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba la btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa srang pa
110a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rtsab ma yin pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug
110a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsa ba yin pa dang / kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin/ 
110a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa de gang yin ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
110a6(dkon brtsegs): bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang
110a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang
110a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi lam bdun la spro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags
110b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa'i
110b2(dkon brtsegs): chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi// 
110b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sgrib pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba ma yin pa
110b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin/ no// bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsab ma
110b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin/ 
110b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa rtsa
110b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 
110b8(dkon brtsegs): reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tsher ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye ba rtsa ba ma yin
111a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nad dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 
111a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sbyin pas rlom sems byed pa rtsab
111a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin// 
111a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// nyan thos
111a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa den byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byams ba chen po'i rtsa ba dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang / thams
111a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdeg pa thams cad yongasu gtong
111a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba yang / 
111a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul pa dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsi ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rnam pa'i rtsi ba dang / 
111b1(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / gtang snyoms kyang ma yin
111b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba dang / thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 
111b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
111b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin// mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/ 
111b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byang chub kyi snying
111b7(dkon brtsegs): por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa
111b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ tshig
112a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung ba yin par rig par bya'o// sems can gang dag 'jam dpal
112a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad/ 
112a4(dkon brtsegs): bkag pa yin no// de dag ni theg pa chen po la snang ba thob yin no// zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de smras pa la rjes su
112a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rangs pa mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par gyur
112a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin to// de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can
112a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du/ 
112a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan
112b1(dkon brtsegs): mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan ma med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la sman pa med par bshad pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'dun
112b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ 
112b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 
112b4(dkon brtsegs): ngayir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongasu ma bzung bas / yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang / rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa
112b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa
112b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa la phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par bsgrub
112b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gan
112b8(dkon brtsegs): pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes
113a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang / brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas/ dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa/ 
113a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom sems med pa de'i tshe
113a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / mthong ba med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs
113a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba snang ba dang / gsal ba thob dpas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gan
113a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi she sa ba rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi/ rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa
113a6(dkon brtsegs): la sgrib pa med pa mngon par gyur pa dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye ba med
113a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams la/ chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad
113a8(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
113b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar
113b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bems pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du brjod par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams
113b3(dkon brtsegs): cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar
113b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do// btsun pa/ darangadwa ti'i bu chos thams cad btang snyoms pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do// btsun pa shA
113b5(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs/ gang duyang ma khrid pa ste/ de dag bsags pa yang ma yin spungs pa yang ma yin no// de dag ni bshad kyang rung ma
113b6(dkon brtsegs): bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin mi 'dor ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung
113b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni/ lus las kyang ma byung sems las kyang ma byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar yi ge rnams la bsags pa med pa
113b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la yang bsags pa med do// ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/ 
114a1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bsags pa med do// ji ltar nyan mangs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/ shes pa gang gis/ 
114a2(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa de la yang bsags pa med de/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa de
114a3(dkon brtsegs): yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa
114a4(dkon brtsegs): gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i dbu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spangs pa la yongasu skye ba med pa'i
114a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog/ pa shes pa dang / skye ba dang 'byung ba shes pa dang / 
114a6(dkon brtsegs): lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang / rgyu shes pa dang / chud mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba shes pa dang / 
114a7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes
114a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'byung ba mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po lnga shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spangs pa shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa
114b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang / grong stong lta bus sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims
114b2(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rjesu bsrung ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes
114b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongasu shes pa
114b4(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang // sems can bskyab pa shes pa dang / snying rje shes pa
114b5(dkon brtsegs): dang yongasu mi skye ba shes pa dang / dga' ba ni sa pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchogatu dga' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang
114b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa shes pa dang / sems can bzhugs pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas
114b7(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes
114b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang dad pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs
115a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyis ma tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
115a2(dkon brtsegs): dang stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog
115a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtags pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par
115a4(dkon brtsegs): 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la lhag paradags pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba nga'i rtsub thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa
115a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zab pa/ sa pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs su grub pa shes pa dang / sa
115a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor la rab tu bskor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjesu dran pa shes pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag pa
115a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes pa dang / gtong ba rje su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad
115a8(dkon brtsegs): yangasu rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lA rjes dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rje su rtogs pa
115b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang thos pa'i tshogs yong su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar/ 
115b2(dkon brtsegs): ba shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg
115b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjesu rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus
115b4(dkon brtsegs): la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa dmi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / chos thams cad las
115b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang / da ltar byu/ nga ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas/ ba med pa dang / rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / dus
115b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang / ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang / yid
115b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba shes pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrug
115b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes
116a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems can dran pa la 'dzag pa shes pa dang / dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang / sems can le lo tsan yongs su
116a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjesu rtags pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste
116a3(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
116a4(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes dpa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar / 
116a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni go cha ngan ngon dang ldan pas yang dag par ba sdu bar mi nus so// 'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa bskyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin// 
116a6(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par dgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
116a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' ge cha legs par bgos pa yin no// smras pa// 'jam
116a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/ spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu rtsom pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// spras
116b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu shes rab kyis bzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu bas
116b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o// smras pa/ 'dza pal ci'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing / sems
116b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas/ de'i phyir sems na dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir
116b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung / ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas/ de'i phyir sems
116b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
116b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pas/ de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams
116b8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas/ de'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpal yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam du
117a1(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sred pa len pa byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba
117a2(dkon brtsegs): yin smras pa// 'dza dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon gyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pas
117a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin
117a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang // thabs kyis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir kun du snang ba de tsam
117a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang / chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu
117a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bzung ba'i tshig gis/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
117a7(dkon brtsegs): dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / kun nas ldan pa rnam par bsal bar
117a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba spa ba yin no// spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dan smra ba yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi na thos pa thams cad lanan tan stong par byed/ 
117b1(dkon brtsegs): tsacang don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin
117b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs
117b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa
117b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yi/ na/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems 'dod cha gas dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams
117b5(dkon brtsegs): la khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig
117b6(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' ba med pa yin no/ 59/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin// smras lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yi// / 
117b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rgyal med pa yin/ smras gaN+DI / gi tshe sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
117b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin bdag yin/ smras pa/ oM gang gi tshe yongasu bsdu ba'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
118a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na/ srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin// smras
118a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smras pa yin/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnad pa bzod cing / gzhan la gnod par mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang
118a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na/ chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin/ smras
118a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khamasu phyis mi snang ba yin// / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang shes rab kyis bya ba sbyin
118a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta
118a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad na mkha' lta bu shes nas/ byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba
118a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' ba mi ngoms pa yin// smras
118a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyad kyang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phags
118b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad
118b2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang 'thun par ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas/ 
118b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu yod pas chos ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gcig gis sems can thams cad
118b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs
118b5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la/ gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ lha'i bu rna ba thob pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
118b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig
118b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur rnams kyikyis kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjesu dran zhing / 
118b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la/ bdud
119a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi las rnams kyis kyang migs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin/ 
119a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa/ 
119a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi 'khrugs pa'i chosu gyur pa yin// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongasu gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la
119a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang danas ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal daltar na dad pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas/ 
119a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye yang mi phyed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha sa la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
119a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byang chub la rag las par mthong ba yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
119a7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legaso zhes bya ba
119a8(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ 'jam dpal legs legs// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming bshad pa de dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par spras te/ gzhan yang
119b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag yod do// lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig/ 
119b2(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyed spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gags skang pa/ 
119b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la yang sems dang sems las byung ba dag med na sgyu ma sprul pa li lta ci smos/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i
119b4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin la/ de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan denyid kyang de lta bu yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
119b5(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa la spyad/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig la khyod yun ring po ji srid tu gnas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad ces dris na/ cing
119b6(dkon brtsegs): la lan ldon par byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas na/ kho bos ji skad du/ 
119b7(dkon brtsegs): kho bo yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes lan gdab par bya/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo ni
119b8(dkon brtsegs): ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyed ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yongs su mo gtong ba de ser sna na ma yin nam/ spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod
120a1(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig yongs su mi gtong / smras pa/ lha'i bu kho ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir la
120a2(dkon brtsegs): bo ni ser sna can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin to// kha ga
120a3(dkon brtsegs): ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa de ngan song gsum po dag tu ltung ba ma yin/ 
120a4(dkon brtsegs): nam smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba 'i phyir bsams bzhin du ngan song rnam su 'gro ste/ de'i phyir
120a5(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin na// spras pa/ 2ma dpal ci khyod gnod sems kyis sang ldan pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni gnod sems kyi
120a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gnad sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rje su chags pa med pa ma
120a7(dkon brtsegs): yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / byis pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis tham/ 
120a8(dkon brtsegs): cad la rjesu chags pa med de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni gnodas sa dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/ spras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo la
120b1(dkon brtsegs): la can yin no// sbas pa/ 'jam dpal khyed ci las bsams te de sma/ smras pa/ lha'i bu le lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/ kho bo yang chom
120b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med cing brtul bar mi byed pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'dir ba med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod sems rnam par g.ye
120b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin nam/ 9/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sem
120b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de/ sems rnam pa ragayengs pa ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo yang
120b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi ga na/ sa pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i// phyir sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin te/ de'i phyir
120b6(dkon brtsegs): kho ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyed shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no// 
120b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal pa
120b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu kho ba yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing / de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rmongs pa rnams
121a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan cig na dga' ba yin te/ de'i phyir khra za ni shes rab 'chal pa yin na// smras pa/ 'dza dpal 'jig rten na sbyin gnas su yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
121a2(dkon brtsegs): dag bsad pa bsosad pa'i sems skyes pa rnams so// spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gsod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / 
121a3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rnams te/ gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni/ bsad pa gsad par byed pa yin pas/ de ni 'jig rten sbyin gnas yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de
121a4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag pa/ 'gyur na ni/ 'jig rten gnas pa yang skrag par 'gyur// 
121a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' lag zhes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gang dag khya da kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro
121a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyurak+Sha.a lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'dzom dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma
121a7(dkon brtsegs): spangs par ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba 'thob par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyon med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na/ gang dag mos par 'gyur ba/ 
121a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni/ rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal khyad ci las bsams te de skad smra/ spras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par grol ba ni/ yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur
121b1(dkon brtsegs): ba medo/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag rnam par grol ba de dag thams cad sems
121b2(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
121b3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni ci zhig la gnas pa nas yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni
121b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa yin no// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma gtogs par ste/ dang ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
121b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ga nga gi tshe sems can thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung
121b6(dkon brtsegs): pabar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang / chad pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam
121b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi
121b8(dkon brtsegs): dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal na mkhriHgang dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i
122a1(dkon brtsegs): bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu mig gi
122a2(dkon brtsegs): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
122a3(dkon brtsegs): nirna ba dang / sgra dang rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang dri dang rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin// lce'i yul ni
122a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lha dang ro dang / rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas
122a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni lus dang reg bya dang / rnam par shes pa'i yu la ma yin// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yi na te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang chos dang / rnam
122a6(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa'i yul ma yin no// gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugasu rung ba'i yul ma yin no// tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ 
122a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myong ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no// 'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas
122a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i yul ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul
122b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// ma rig pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyis ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi yul ma yin no// rga shi'i bar dag gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas
122b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ni nying 'tshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so ser rnam par rig pa'i yul ma/ 
122b3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i yul gyi khams kyi yul ni/ 
122b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba 'i lam rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ sangs/ 
122b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ni gnyisu sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no// 'dus/ ma byas kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i
122b6(dkon brtsegs): yul ma yin no// lha'i bu de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/ mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir/ yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khongs su chud pa
122b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la/ rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa yang ma yin te/ de ni bdud kyi yul dang
122b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do// lha'i bu gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / mnyam
123a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di yang cho 'phrul chen pa yin na// de la mnyam pa nyid ni gang mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnya
123a2(dkon brtsegs): da gas pa yin// gang dag stong pa nyid la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid las
123a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi g.yar// chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ 
123a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin kyang mtshan dam med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yon// chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa den
123a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid yon no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la rma 'jug pa de dag mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed
123a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sman pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.ya'o// chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa
123a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// 
123a8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang 'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang / dben par mnyam pa nyid dang / dngos po med par mnyam
123b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dang / 'gag par mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no// gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag na
123b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par mnyam pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mig ya ste/ lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang
123b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyad pa yin na// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 
123b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa/ ral spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras dpa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa na
123b5(dkon brtsegs): bsams kyis mi khyab pa yin no// smras pa/ 'adz+ra/ ma dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra/ da pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa yin/ smras pa/ lha
123b6(dkon brtsegs): bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams kyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma
123b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// zhe sdang gi spyod pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams kyis mi khyab ste/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin// / 
123b8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi spyad pa bsams kyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsams kyis mi khyab ste/ shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// 
124a1(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ sbyin pas rlom sems byed pa'i spyad pa ni ma yin no// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang bral
124a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrims kyis rlom semasu byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
124a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// le lo med pa'i spyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ brtson 'grus kyis rlomasam/ 
124a4(dkon brtsegs): su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nga'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ bsam gtan gyis rlom semasu byed pa'i spyod pa ni
124a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// 'chal ba'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin te/ shes rab kyis rlom sems byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// nyon
124a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no// nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongasu gtong bas
124a7(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
124a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu bas
124b1(dkon brtsegs): mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin na// lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdug pa dang / 
124b2(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa yongs su gtong bas tsham chom med pa'i spyod pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyad pa ni// 
124b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yi no// sems can thams cad kyi bur sgrol bas khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sngar
124b4(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa dani byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin no// rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid la gcag pa med pa'i spyod
124b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin no// theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas/ mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
124b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// yi dam ma zhig pas ge cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems la nges par sems pas/ 
124b7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam
124b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad sems mnyam pas tha dad med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dgra thams cad nges par bcom pas
125a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba'i spyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin na// skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bo dang 'thun par 'jug pas/ ma 'dres par spyod pa ni bya
125a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// ga she ba dang / sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas/ rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
125a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa yin no// sangs rgyas lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog tu dga' bas/ dgra pa dang rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i
125a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lus dang ngag dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas/ kyi zhing brgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sem/ 
125a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas/ zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// 
125a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mkhas shing 'dzangs pa rnams kyi rab tu bsngags pas/ ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// tshul bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin
125a7(dkon brtsegs): tu nges par brtags pas/ mi rtsi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// khur blangs pa nyam su lon pas/ skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dang
125a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa yin// brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par/ 
125b1(dkon brtsegs): sdud pas/ chos spyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas/ byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems
125b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum 'dri bar mi byed pas/ dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sdud pa dang yongs su gcad pas
125b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang thabs kyi spyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub
125b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ngar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dang / ral gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal
125b5(dkon brtsegs): khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de ni leg sa par smras// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyad pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni/ de nyid kyis lung bstan
125b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha'i bu gang gi tsheng spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshes
125b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mar me mdzad kyis/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ derangs mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag par
125b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas bcom
126a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni ci lags/ 'jug pa gang gis ni byang chub sems
126a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla/ 
126a3(dkon brtsegs): dgas yin te/ de ni sngon byung bar gyur la phyis ma byung bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// de ni sngon srid par gyur la/ phyis mi srid par gyur
126a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon skyes par gyur la phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid
126a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la/ phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no// 
126a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni sngon yod par gyur la/ phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang
126a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa yin te/ de ni gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no// de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la/ phyis mtshan ma med par bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/ de ni gzod ma
126a8(dkon brtsegs): nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no// gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang / sems kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// 
126b1(dkon brtsegs): de la gzod pa gang zhe na/ de dag ci ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang gzod pa de ni gzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ci ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang gzod
126b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de
126b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gzod pa de ni gzed pa zhes bya'o// de dag ji ltar
126b4(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la yang gzod dpa de ni gzod pa zhes bya'o// gzod pa de yang skad ci/ dag pa yin te/ gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/ skad
126b5(dkon brtsegs): cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// stong pa nyid kyi sku ngapa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin/ tshan ma da gis nam med pa sa skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
126b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de ni de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang
126b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par
126b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de ni de bzhin du/ chos thams/ 
127a1(dkon brtsegs): mas kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no// ji ltar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin
127a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ skye mched thams cad kyi skyem ched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi skad cig pa yin te/ skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya marla yin no// ya ma rA gang yin pa de ni gsog yin// 
127a3(dkon brtsegs): gsog gang yin de ni gso ba yin no// gseb gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags med pa yin no// 'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin// 'dod chags da
127a4(dkon brtsegs): bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin// ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / skad cig pa dang
127a5(dkon brtsegs): ya ma rA dben pa dang / gsag ces bya ste chos thams cad la de ltar gzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o// bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin/ 
127a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin// gzod pa de yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ 
127a7(dkon brtsegs): de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang / gzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na/ de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang
127a8(dkon brtsegs): gzod pa gnyi gar dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o// de la dmigs pa med pa gang she na/ gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// 
127b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang / srog dang / gas pa dang / gang zag dang / bzad pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa doni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phung po dang khams dang / 
127b2(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/ ngo bo nyid de dang / bzod pa de la gnyisu rje su rtog par mi
127b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o skal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul
127b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po bstan pa yin no// bzod pa bstan pa 'di ba sha dad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha/ mas 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// 'jig rten 'di
127b5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to// sil snyan brgya steng yang ma bkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to// me tog gi char pa dag kyang rab tu bab bo// srog chags pa
127b6(dkon brtsegs): khri nyis stong gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni/ chos rnams la rje su 'thun pa
127b7(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad/ rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu yang kun tu snang
127b8(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgra
128a1(dkon brtsegs): nas 'ang ze bdag dum ba dag sna tshogs/ kha dag 'bum phrag du ma 'dis ste/ ldan pa dang / ser po dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / bcad kha dang / 
128a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ngul gyi kha dag la bu dag 'byung bar gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngan par
128a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'ad kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nus
128a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ chos gis phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ puso mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ 
128a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal bde la gsu ngal ma sbya ba bad nas na che bcom ldan 'das la mngan gsum du tshul dang dz+ra/ ba tshigasu bcad pa 'di dgags pa te// grub pa sam
128a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa// mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyed la zhu// 'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyad la zhu// rab rib nyan mongs spong ba khyod la zhu// bde gshegs ci smad 'jum/ 
128a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan mdzad pa// pha rol tshogs rnams 'joms po khyod la zhu// bdud dpung pham par mdzad pa khyod la// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la zhu// rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa
128a8(dkon brtsegs): ston mdzad pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan mtshan brgyan pa// bde gshegs rab dga' 'dzum pa mdzad papo// gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyed la zhu// bcom ldan ci sla/ 
128b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa// mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan snyan pa pa// ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa// ye shes ldan gang mkhyen pa mtshol nu// 'dzin/ 
128b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum grags pa mtha' yas po// gsum rig dri gsum mtha' mar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten gsum rig rnam mthar gsum mthar byen// ci'i slad du 'jum pa bstan pa
128b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa// bcom ldan zhags la dri mchog 'khor lo mnga'// sred med sras po rdo rje 'khregs pa po// thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyar ba ba// 
128b4(dkon brtsegs): sul gsol// gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs sam/ gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam// gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur tam// tsa
128b5(dkon brtsegs): slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad// bde gshegs bla me/ rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar// bcom ldan 'dren pa 'ju ma pa mi ston pas// de thos sems can glo ba rangs gyur
128b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs par gsung 'byung gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ 
128b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags bdun khri nyis stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub
128b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom
129a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dben gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'ad
129a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod par byas/ yongs su zhu ba byas/ yongs dri ba byas shing / sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang
129a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go// kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la
129a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzod par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
129a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhugasu lnga/ na pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang / 
129a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag pa de yang
129a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po las grub cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam
129a8(dkon brtsegs): la rin po che'i dri sna tshogs kyis mig mangs ris su kun nas bkab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
129b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dag dang / bdud rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spang ba'i sems can rnams kyi mang yang med cing mi 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas
129b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang med la/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang / 'khrul
129b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyes pa dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod/
