129b4(dkon brtsegs): dang nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
129b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyuraro// phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha sta/ ga 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de/ 
129b6(dkon brtsegs): ni yongasu dag pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'ang de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
129b7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur phrag drug dang bye ba phrag gnyisu 'gyur te/ kun
129b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob/ 
130a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur bdadag/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs su dag pa dang smra bar gyur// de dag thams sa dkyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcas pa yang / 
130a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal po 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung snyan par 'gyur// de nas 'khor de ni
130a3(dkon brtsegs): dulha'i bu spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis mngon par gter nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// 
130a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
130a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams la/ ngas su dag par skye zhing 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por/ gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
130a6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing / bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
130a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe ga bcom
130a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'ad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'di yang der 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgya
130b1(dkon brtsegs): po legs mthong zhes bya bar gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bcom ldan
130b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
130b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
130b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du byung bar ro// kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de yang dus gzhan zhig na/ bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas
130b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs/ pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub
130b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par mngon par rdzogs por
130b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras// lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas
130b8(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan tam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung bstan pa ltar lung bstan te/ da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa'i de
131a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas/ de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba yang med la/ yongs su 'grib pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ 
131a2(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chong shig ldog shig/ shod cig kun chub par gyis shig skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / da
131a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba rjes su yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bro/ 
131a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom
131a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba tshe sa kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ cho 'phrul chen po pa snyan pa zhes bya bar bzung shig/ 'di ni 'jam dpal
131a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi
131a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / mos pa dang / mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa de
131a8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni bsod nams thams cad kyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i bu ded dpon dang / 'jam/ 
131b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu
131b2(dkon brtsegs): pal mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu ded dge/ 
131b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis zhus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzog so// / sho lo ka dgu brgya bam po gsumo// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su rin dra bo d+hi dang / lo tsA ba zhang ye
131b4(dkon brtsegs): shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha dab pa// / seng ge'i sgra che ngan po bstan pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri ya ma hA
131b5(dkon brtsegs): sing ha nA dan nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 2phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya/ ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po/ 
131b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
131b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang
131b8(dkon brtsegs): phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bru
132a1(dkon brtsegs): phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i chen tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan/ 
132a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'od srung chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
132a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga'
132a4(dkon brtsegs): zhigi zhu lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan dadas kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin
132a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung ba stan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od
132a6(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la
132a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas/ ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
132a8(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung legs legaso// 'od srung khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjesu snying brtsi ba dang / 
132b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyi don dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs
132b2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ 
132b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'odas kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar
132b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas/ legs par gsungs pas chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho ga phun sum tshogs
132b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma/ tho ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang // bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te bslab
132b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos med po dang / kha bsag med pa dang / gzhog slongs med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / rnyed pas rnyed
132b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed 'dod pa med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dzem pa dang ldan par bya'o// 'khor ba la yi skrag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la
132b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang / 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba la phan yon du lta bar bya zhing shing drung na 'dug kyang rung
133a1(dkon brtsegs): ril 'dug kyang rung / gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / phug na 'dug kyang rung / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'a/ 
133a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur/ 
133a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa
133a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam dpar grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/ sangs/ 
133a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa/ yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang ldan pa bden pa gsung ba/ yang
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par gsung ba ji skad gsung ba/ de bzhin du mdzad pa/ mi slu bar mdzad pa/ 'phags pa sman pa chen po// zug rngu 'byin pa/ ma gsol bar bshes gnyen mdzad pa
133a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje dang ldan pa/ ded dpon chen po yin te/ de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa zab pa zab par snang ba/ zhi ba zhi bar ston pa/ stong pa sems can med pa/ 'khrul med pa/ man
133a8(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa/ smon pa med pa/ smon pa dang bral ba/ spros pa med pa/ spos dang bral ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ nye bar gtod pa/ 
133b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos pa dang bral ba/ dben pa dben dang bral ba/ dngos pa med pa/ dngos pos mgos pa/ rgyu med pa/ rgyu yang dag par chad pa/ 'gro ba dang bral ba/ brjod du med pa/ brjod pa
133b2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ rlom sems med pa/ kun du bstan pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnyog pa dang bral ba/ blang ba med pa/ derab med pa/ sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/ srid pa yang dag pa
133b3(dkon brtsegs): pa sten par mdzad pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no// zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la
133b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa la sra yid la bya ste/ bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing / rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang
133b5(dkon brtsegs): thob bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes/ par byas pas na/ bdag le lo byed pa dang / bya/ ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni// bdag
133b6(dkon brtsegs): gi mchi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu yang yod la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
133b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar brgya lam na/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
133b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o// 'od srung de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor
134a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis rjesu bslab par bya ste/ 'ad srung 'di ltar khyad ngam mthang ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de ga// 
134a2(dkon brtsegs): garje su srab pan/ rab tu byung ba na 'ang srung khyed chas 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du maze zhing / mthang nas kyang nye bar/ 
134a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs te/ rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa/ de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ni de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas rje su mkhyen to// rigs kyi
134a4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di la 'bras/ 
134a5(dkon brtsegs): bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// 'od srung de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
134a6(dkon brtsegs): sngar gos ngur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por khas blangs te/ bslab pa rnams blangs nas/ gnas khang du song ngam/ phug tu
134a7(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ sgo bcad nas/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag dang / lhung
134a8(dkon brtsegs): bzed dang / chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang / mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / spongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/ de dag 'di snyam/ 
134b1(dkon brtsegs): du yang sems te/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen mi rig rnam par mi rtogs so snyam du yang sems so// 'od srung gang gi tshe/ dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung / 
134b2(dkon brtsegs): phug na 'dug kyang rung / 'chags na 'dug kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag
134b3(dkon brtsegs): gam mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la/ rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe gnas khang ngam/ phug gam/ 'chags de na/ lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyu
134b4(dkon brtsegs): mar gnas pa de dag gis/ dge slong de'i sems kyis shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs par ga na tsam dul ba la rab tu byung ba la/ sdig
134b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par/ rtog par byed pa ni mi rig so snyam nas yi ma rangs pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bar gyur te/ 'od srung
134b6(dkon brtsegs): de la lha de dag las kha cig ni bskul bar yang byed la/ kha cig gis ni snod ma yin par rig nas/ khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do// 'od srung ltos dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 
134b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang / gzhan gyi sems shes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas/ legs par spyod pa
134b8(dkon brtsegs): spyad pal lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ thugasu ma chud pa'am/ mngon gsum du ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/ 
135a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ang srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / dus las rnam par grol ba dang / brjod par ma byar shes bya'i rnam pa lnga la la/ 
135a2(dkon brtsegs): shes thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / the tshom dang bral ba yin// 'od srung de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rabang byung bas/ bdag
135a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid rang la rag lus par shes nas/ de bzhi gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bcu/ 
135a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang / bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
135a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la rab tu byung nas/ dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes srab par bya'o// 'od srung de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun ga/ bzhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te/ ba
135a6(dkon brtsegs): ga she na/ 'od srung 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dag dang / rtags dang / dbyibs la gnas shing / de yang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na/ de ni dge sbyong
135a7(dkon brtsegs): chom rkun dang po yin no// dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa ni mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog pa byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa'o// bdag nyid 'bras bu ma
135a8(dkon brtsegs): thob cings so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa 'dad pas zil gyis nan pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar
135b1(dkon brtsegs): byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gsum pa yin// bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod par byed na/ de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom
135b2(dkon brtsegs): shrIs no// 'od srung mi gti mug pe/ brlang ba drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ nyam stobs dang ldan pa stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa/ gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung
135b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu des 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas nye bar spyod pa'i longs
135b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'gron bu dang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang sa le sbram dang / dngul dang rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang
135b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad ba dang / yongasu spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs/ 
135b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis
135b7(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du bskyed lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mang du bskyed lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyud
135b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de snyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigasu bcad pas 'dod pas zil gyis non pas
136a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin par khas 'chetshe bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yang su longs spyad par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsad/ 
136a2(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad bskyed pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad
136a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas dpe bstan pas/ sdom pa'i gnas bka' stsal pa/ den ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dpe rin po che de lta bu zas
136a4(dkon brtsegs): nas su shig 'bras bu thob par tha na dad pas stsal pa chabasna gang tsam yang len par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no// ji skad smras
136a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin te/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bus gan sa par bya zhing / 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa'i chu snod gang tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o// 'od srung
136a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ches gtum pa/ ches brlang ba/ ches drag shul gyi lam dang ldan pa/ ches nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa/ gang la la zhig byung bar gyur
136a7(dkon brtsegs): la/ 'od srung mi des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshan gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas/ nye bar
136a8(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / 
136b1(dkon brtsegs): khang khyim dang gzhan pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ral cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongasu spyad pa dang / dga' bra dang / rtse ba'i longs spyad ji snyed yod pa
136b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ 
136b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mang du bskyed lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mang du bskyed lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ 
136b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigasu bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi/ 
136b5(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdag nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par khas 'am bar byed cing / tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yo su longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de ba rje bsod nams ma
136b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no// 'od srung gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad
136b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srung mi gsum pa ches gtum pa/ ches shan tu brlang ba/ ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu nyams stobs
136b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa/ gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong gsum gyi stong chu ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de
137a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshan gyis btab 'am/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas nye bar spyod pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu
137a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mu tig dang / bai dUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / 
137a3(dkon brtsegs): btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongasu spyad pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad btsam zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od
137a4(dkon brtsegs): srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi des bsod nams da ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang du bskyed lagaso// bde
137a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pa mang du bskyed lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya byadu chud par bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / 
137a6(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigasu bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin par khas che bar byed cing // 
137a7(dkon brtsegs): tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongasu longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas bsad nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskye
137a8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'od srung stong chu nga pra mI 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi/ 'od srung mi bzhi pa ches shin tu gtum pa/ ches shin
137b1(dkon brtsegs): tu brlang ba/ ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu nyams stobs dang ldan pa/ ches shin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa/ gang la la zhig byung
137b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ 'od srung mi des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi
137b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dbyug pas brdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btab bam/ khu tshur gyis bsnun te/ pham par byas nas/ nye bar spyad pas
137b4(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUR+Ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / das le sbram dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / 
137b5(dkon brtsegs): khang khyim dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang // yongasu spyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i bde ba'i ma
137b6(dkon brtsegs): byad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhi de las mi des bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis
137b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang du bskyed lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mang du bskyed lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod mos par bya/ khyod khong du chud par
137b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing / so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du/ de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas/ gzhan dag gis mdun
138a1(dkon brtsegs): du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'tshe bar byed cing / ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis bdag dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o snyam nas/ dgra bcom pa steng du 'byung ba ltar steng du/ 
138a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar yang byed de/ dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed la/ de ltar sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ za na gzhan gyis byin pa'i dad pas byin pa'i bsod snyoms gci/ 
138a3(dkon brtsegs): tsam yongasu longs spyod par byed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin// 'od srung de lta bas na gang / 
138a4(dkon brtsegs): stong gi 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad tham das cad 'phrog par spro ba de ni/ sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed de
138a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung du ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa/ rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad gcig shos gzhan ma mtho nga ngo // 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung
138a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs ngag 'dod/ 
138a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin no// gang du 'ga' zhig la smon par byed na/ cher na mya ngan las 'dra
138a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la smon par byed na yang / de yang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas/ dge slong dag nga ni char na/ phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas
138b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ skad cig tsam skye ba yang bsngags pa mi brjod do zhes ston to// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/ rab tu byung ba'i de dag thams cad
138b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa las 'da' ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa
138b3(dkon brtsegs): ste bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/ rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o// 'od srung dge sbyong dang bram ze'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ sdig pa 'dod pa
138b4(dkon brtsegs): med la/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ drang po'i rang bzhin can/ g.yo med pa sgyu can ma yin pa/ khengs pa dam yin pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ched
138b5(dkon brtsegs): du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ 'od srung de dag dbugs 'byin par byed pa brjod par bya ste/ de
138b6(dkon brtsegs): thos na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 
138b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa
138b8(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bas ni yang dag par zhugs pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gis dad pas byin pa/ tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir
139a1(dkon brtsegs): byas par gyur na/ de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ches rgya che bar 'gyur gyi/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa'am
139a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa las lhag par bde'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas pa de la ni lta ba ma yin no// 'od srung ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa
139a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa de/ gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed pa de ltar dgra' dang / gshed ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi
139a4(dkon brtsegs): dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so// 'od srung bzhi pa 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin/ tre/ rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na
139a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du/ sem/ sa can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// gzhan gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la pra dag gi chos nyid dang
139a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/ bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga
139a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi 'chab par byed cing / rnam par 'byed par mi byed 'chags par mi byed pa dang / shes shing rtags bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/ 'od srung bzhi pa
139a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni/ rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha bri ba yin ti/ rab tu byung ba nyin mongs pa cha phra de dang ldan na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'grob
139b1(dkon brtsegs): yin par brjod par bya'o// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang
139b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rgyang 'phan pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med
139b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dang ldan na/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing de mang du thos pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang
139b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang / tshigasu bcad pas rgyags shing de rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa zil gyis na ngan pas/ bag med par 'gyur ba dang / mdza' bshes kyi
139b5(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang / slongs me ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shingade mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'ikhyim gyis spangs pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang / sbyangs
139b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags shing / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags pas bdag la bstod par byed/ gzhan la smod par byed pa de ni bag med pa
139b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ 'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/ rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par
139b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dge sbyong dge sbyong ltar
140a1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa ngur smrig 'tshal pa/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bsal ba bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
140a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'di nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung ba lpags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'ang skad ces bka' stsal to// 
140a3(dkon brtsegs): 'odi srung de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongasu dris pas khyod la ci byas thong cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang / yang
140a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang / g.yo dang chom rkun dang // phyin ci log dang / bdud kyi nyes pa dang / bdud kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi skyon yang dag pa thams cad brjod cing dag
140a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bshad par gyur na/ 'od srung khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig pa kun spyod pa de dag thos na / yang dag pa yin yang snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas
140a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar byin gyis bslab
140a7(dkon brtsegs): tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
140a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag/ 
140b1(dkon brtsegs): par bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed cig gis/ 
140b2(dkon brtsegs): mi blun pa de dag la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan du zin kyang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang / sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba'am bzlog par mi spyod do// 
140b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro ba'am/ sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad la gus par nyan pa bskyed par 'gyur ba dag
140b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gling chen po
140b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang grong khyer dang / grang // rdal dang bcas pa/ brag dang ri'i zom dang bcas pa// / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa/ 
140b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa 'am/ spyo bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las
140b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgya shugs gam/ til lam/ 'bras bu gcig gis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par 'tshe ba ni spro lags kyi
140b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi logs par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
141a1(dkon brtsegs): su rgal ba'i thugs chen po 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur pa'i nang du spyad lam bzhi pa dag gis dgung la bye ba snyed du gnas par na spa lags kyi/ 
141a2(dkon brtsegs): ldanas 'dang/ skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi/ log par spro ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi sme lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad las khro ba dang / smrab
141a3(dkon brtsegs): dang spad pa dang / bshung ba dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdeg brtsog dag/ bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni blun po// chos kyi rgu/ 
141a4(dkon brtsegs): po chos kyi chom kun po// chos la mu tshor smra ba/ ches da ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag gi lag par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
141a5(dkon brtsegs): ni nyi tshe bar spyod pa nye tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i khur 'deg pa'i rngo mi thogs lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i khur
141a6(dkon brtsegs): 'deg par rngo thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di la bdag dpe brjod par spobs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ mi la la zhig rgas shing
141a7(dkon brtsegs): gtugs la/ 'khogs par gyur cing / de yang na tshod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur la/ mi de bre nad kyis thebs shing / glo ba med pa de nas/ mchis mal gyi/ 
141a8(dkon brtsegs): khri steng du mchis nyal bar gyur na/ mi shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas/ mi mchil mal gyi khri steng na mchis
141b1(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba de la/ kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu'am/ nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis kho bo la gter
141b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di byin cig ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing / de ltar gtams nas/ yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la/ mi mchis mal gyi khri stengs na mo chis nyal ba de la yang bu yang ma mchis/ bu mo/ 
141b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis 'khor kyang ma mchis/ de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas/ ring po ma lags par de yang 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na/ nor gyi tshogs de dag thams
141b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang / chab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ ming slar mchis na su la ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig nyan thos nyi
141b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spyod pa nye tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa ma mchis pa/ bzang po ma mchis pa yun ring por mi gnas pa la/ dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na/ de yang
141b6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legaso legs so// ngas kyang de ltar shes te/ 'on kyang khyod
141b7(dkon brtsegs): las dpe'i spobs pa de lta bu thos na/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun du skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba na/ ngas shes bzhin du khyod la dris pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan
141b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag dpe gnyis pa brjod par yang spobs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
142a1(dkon brtsegs): dper bgyi na/ mi bro na ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can brond dang bral ba dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tsho ba/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tshol bar ba/ g.yog 'khor phun sum
142a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs pa/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa/ rus phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i ngang tshul can/ byams pa dang ldan pa snying rje che ba yid dga' ba dang ldan
142a3(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can gyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyomasu 'jog pa/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / skye bo ma po la sman pa dang jig rten la snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / skye bo phal po
142a4(dkon brtsegs): che'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa/ rtul ba brtan pa/ la la zhig mchis par gyur la skyes bu dam pa de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas/ 'di
142a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis khyod kyis gter 'di legs par sba ba dang / legs par bsrung bar gyis shig/ kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu'am nyi shu
142a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam na/ yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin ces smras te/ de'i sug par gter de gtams nas/ mi de ni gter de blangs nas/ legs par
142a7(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa dang / bsrung bar bgyid cing / mi slar mchis nas kyang / gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam chos kyi gta
142a8(dkon brtsegs): 'doms par bgyid cing / de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por yang 'chal bar mi 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po la yang sman thogs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang
142b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gdung dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par yang 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang yongs su bsgrub par bgyid pa'i bgyi ba
142b2(dkon brtsegs): de dang / don de yongs su sgrub par ngo mi thigs lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te/ mngon du mchis
142b3(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la bka' stsol cag dang / 'dis ni slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe na/ 
142b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ rgyas par
142b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par 'gyur lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom lda na 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tutha
142b6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang
142b7(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba'i bu thu'o gang lags pa de'i rgyal po'i 'og tu/ rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur lags pas/ de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du yang
142b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing / chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/ de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i 'og tu ni bdag gis rgyal po bgyid/ 
143a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ dbugs 'byin pa thob par 'gyur zhing / 'di ltar rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag lags pa de dag la yang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du
143a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di yang 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po bgyid du stsol bar
143a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags pas/ 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung
143a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung legs legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de nas ba bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can
143a5(dkon brtsegs): brkyang nas/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa/ mchog tu gnyen pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ rgya
143a6(dkon brtsegs): skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste byugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa
143a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi mI dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang
143a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir spro bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pas gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du
143b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yas/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten du snang ba
143b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po yang byung bar gyur/ sa bla ba dang / bar snang la gnas pa dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
143b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa byams pa khyed skye bo mang ba la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs dartse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / 
143b5(dkon brtsegs): sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba dang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / yongs su gzu nga bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub
143b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
143b7(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du yang / slad ma'i mtha'
143b8(dkon brtsegs): mu'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor ba yang spro lags na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal
144a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun du bsrung ba dang / rgyas par bgyi lags so// byang
144a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu/ de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu/ 
144a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni su la yang 'gran par mi bgyid
144a4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag ni/ skyes bu dam pa'i sug las
144a5(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'dig par bgyid pa'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'deg par rngo mi thog pa'i slad
144a6(dkon brtsegs): du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byams pa legs legs so// ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod
144a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra 'di ltar sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na/ 
144a8(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig/ dam pa'i ches yongs su 'dzin par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
144b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu ma lags pa byang chub sems dpar
144b2(dkon brtsegs): mchid kyis 'che ba dang / dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/ glen pa blun po rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdub mdza' bshes kyi sdum pa dang / slongs mo ste
144b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdum pa la gdub/ bsod snyoms la sbyor bar brtson pa/ de dag gi nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag
144b4(dkon brtsegs): girgyu de dag thos na/ de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar spyod par bgyid cing / nongs pa de dag las bdag nyi dad bsrung bar bgyid pa dang / skyes bu dam pa ma lags
144b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag las kyang / la la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing / de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rtogs rab tu rtogaso zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
144b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams
144b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i gnas gang yin pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste/ byams pa de la phyi
144b8(dkon brtsegs): ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag bshad par bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
145a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bkur sti 'dod pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / 
145a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ba'i 'tshe bas 'tsha bar byed pa yin te/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bani pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa de
145a3(dkon brtsegs): la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'cha ba/ khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi na sngon
145a4(dkon brtsegs): lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu/ khyi gzhan zhig/ rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na/ khyim 'di ni bdag dgi yon no snyam nas/ de la zugs par byed/ 'khren skangad
145a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byin khro bas blta bar byed/ gnod sems kyi nyesab bskyed par byed de/ gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing / bdag gi yin par 'du shes bskyed par byed do// 
145a6(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/ khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang gzhan
145a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyim dang / gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed par byed cing / bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang yongasu 'dzin par byed de/ dge slong des
145a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon phyin pa'i khyim der/ dge slong gzhan 'ong ba mthong na/ de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas/ khro bas lta bar byed/ gnod sems bskyed par byed/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab/ 
145b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa bskyed par byed/ phan tshun dbyen gyi tshig smra bar byed/ tshig rtsub po brjod par byed/ gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yi// 
145b2(dkon brtsegs): do/ dge slong ma che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan par brjod par byed cing / khyim bdag la yang gal te khyod kho bo dang / bsten par 'dod na/ dge slong che ge mo zhig dang
145b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten par mi bya zhing / dge slong ma che ge mo zhig dang yang ma bsten cig ces zer te/ de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ring du mi gnas par smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir/ bsod nam
145b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa mang po bskyed pa yin no// de dag ni yid btags kyi yon tan gyi chos kun du spyod cing / dbul ba dang sem dman pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid gas
145b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang / chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing / bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / sdig pa can gyi
145b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa kun du spyod pa yin bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa yang brjod cing / byang chub sems dpa'
145b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags pa brjod nas/ zas dang gos sgrub par byed do// byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrags cing / seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i
145b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa wa'i sgra bsgregs shing / wa'i las rnams byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i bsngags par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun ring bar yongasu gtong bar mi byed/ 
146a1(dkon brtsegs): la ser sngas zil gyis gnan cing / yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis stong pa'i phyi rol du byas pa/ phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing
146a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems dang / za ba dang / khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang / bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod par byed pa dang / gcig tu gnod semasu byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po pa
146a3(dkon brtsegs): po dag gi bsngags pa brjod par byed cing / sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa 'am/ snyan par smra ba'am don spyod pa 'am/ don 'thun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad par 'gyu
146a4(dkon brtsegs): bal ltos/ de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur / yin gyi/ de dag yon tan yang dag par bla ba dang / 'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mas
146a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa sngan byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa dang / ches grangs med pa dang / ches shin tu grangs med
146a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rgya che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 
146a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes bla na zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
146a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo // byams pa/ 
146b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos shes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig
146b2(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur to// de grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / yul 'khor de dag tu song ste/ phyin pa dang / chos sten par byed cing / rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag dang / skye
146b3(dkon brtsegs): bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla ma byas/ shes par byas/ yongs su shes par byas so// de khyim gang du zhugs shing / gang las tshig snyan pa dang / 
146b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la gus par snyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba thob par 'gyur ba'i khyim der ni/ de lan gnyis su 'a dgro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do// de 'jungs pa dang / ma dang / 
146b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang log par lta ba'i dad pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu sen zhing de dag tu son pa na/ de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/ de dag tshig snyan par yang mi brjod pa'i
146b6(dkon brtsegs): steng du/ de la khro bar byed/ gshe bar byed na yang / de bzod pa'i go bgos shing snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la/ khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi bde ba
146b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des/ khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni/ 'di lta ste chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan
146b8(dkon brtsegs): dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar byed cing / 'gro bar sems bskyed
147a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mo byed mod kyi 'on kyang de de dag la phrag dog dang / ser sna'i sems bskyed par byed snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// 
147a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang / bdag la
147a3(dkon brtsegs): gus par nyan pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing / dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tshe bar byas nas/ de dag tu lan gnyi su 'jug par mi byed pa/ 
147a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jungs pa dang ma dad pa dang / log par lta ba dang / ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag dad par byed cing de/ de dag khro zhing gshe na yang yongasu gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing / 
147a5(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa chung ba nyid dang nga/ chog shes pa nyid dang / nges pa nyid dang / snying rje dang
147a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nyid la ltos/ byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim bdag dad par byas shing / gzhan gyi nye bar 'tshe bar byed kyi bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
147a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no// byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du/ khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar
147a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos shes bya bar gyur to// byams pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su
147b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mes de'i rjes su bsrab par bya/ de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gi rjesu byasas
147b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing / de dag gi chos kun tu spyad par yang bya'o// / bam po gnyis pa// byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la
147b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'di lta ste rnyed pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ 
147b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/ de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjodarab dang / 'byed pa dang / rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur
147b5(dkon brtsegs): ro de dag ji ltar gzhan dag gis mi rnyed pas yid rangs/ par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/ ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde
147b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba ltar/ bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin no// byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la
147b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya ba yin na/ de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o/ 
147b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag cig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig
148a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag par gyur pa de/ le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos btson rar bcug par gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de yod/ 
148a2(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal pos btson der 'jug par 'gyur snyam de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
148a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar bar bgyi ba'i bsam pas/ bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nas bu gcig pa yin
148a4(dkon brtsegs): la bgyid pa kho na dag gis btson ra der 'jug par bgyid de thar par yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyi du lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
148a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pa ngas dpe don ngan shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin// 'dir dan kyang gang shig yin par blta bar byazhe na/ bya mas pa 'di lnga ste dper na/ rgyal po'i btsan ra de ji lta bde
148a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'khor ba'i btson rar blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nas khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dpe
148a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ bu gcig de lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya bar blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nam
148a8(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing / med ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi bu gcig de'i don du btson der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji la ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpas ches gos kyi ched dang / 
148b1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba la blta bar bya'o// byams
148b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ kha cig 'byung bar
148b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur to/ de dag ni chos gos dang / bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas
148b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lan gyi skyes dag dang / khyim rnamasu 'gro bar ba gyur pas/ byas pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bur mi bya zhing / bran dang las mi lta bu yang mi
148b5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pa sa ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya bar ma gtogs par skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya ste/ des ni mang du thos pa
148b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos med pa dang / kha bsags med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par
148b7(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang cudang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrim
148b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing / chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par/ khang khyim gyi ched dam/ 
149a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing las kyi ched dam/ rnyed pa'i tshad dam/ reg pa bde ba'i gtam 'am/ rgyal po'i gtam 'am/ tsham kun gyi gtam 'am/ grong gi gtam 'am/ grong khyer gyig
149a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am ljongs kyi gtam 'am/ bu'i gtam 'am/ bu mo'i gtam 'am/ gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o// byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che
149a3(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i
149a4(dkon brtsegs): byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te rigs kyi bu dam/ rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na/ nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni/ des
149a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me de la snying brtse ba 'am/ ngan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi/ de'i tshigs bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/ de yang
149a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i rna dI rdo lnga rig par grags shing thos pa tsam de kho nar zad kyi/ re shig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang / de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang / phan 'dogs pa dang / 
149a7(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no// byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing
149a8(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson par byed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar gser ram dngul lam/ nor bu dag gam/ rin po che dag gam/ mu tig dag
149b1(dkon brtsegs): gam/ bai dUr+ya dag gam/ dung dag gam/ man shel dag gam/ byi ru dag gam/ bde ba'i yo byad dag gis ni/ sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongasu thar par mi 'gyu
149b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
149b3(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag
149b4(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur gyi/ chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang / skye ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/ sems can na ba'i chos can
149b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams nad rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
149b6(dkon brtsegs): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang / 'khrug pa las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de dag las dgangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces// stong chen
149b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis// bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni// tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig brjod pas// de ltar phan dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin// phan 'dogs
149b8(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gi/ 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi// bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun// sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas// gang gis de la sangs rgyas
150a1(dkon brtsegs): lugs kyin// tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrubs na// de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te// des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar
150a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhes ston to/ byam pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyi rab tu bkang ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul ba
150a3(dkon brtsegs): phul ba bas ni/ snying rje chen po bskyed de/ sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig gis bsgrags par gyur na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed/ 
150a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi gang gis ni gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'jig rten khams mchog rin che dan gang byas te// dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la
150a5(dkon brtsegs): phul ba dang // gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs pa cad byin// rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des/ tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la// char
150a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mi phod grangs su 'ang ma yin na// gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal/ 
150a7(dkon brtsegs): pa bems pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil ni bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu mthun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/ de
150a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa ni bshad na/ phyag g.yas pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu g.yog par mdzad nas/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i ye
150b1(dkon brtsegs): byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub par mdzad cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod rnams la ni gos/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams/ 
150b2(dkon brtsegs): gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang yod mod kyi/ de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas/ chu srin 'jan khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar par mi
150b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas/ byams pa nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de/ de
150b4(dkon brtsegs): thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// byams pa de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya zhing / khyed zang zing la
150b5(dkon brtsegs): gdu bar mi bya'i/ khyed chos gos la gdu bar bya'o// khyams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus lo bab pa'i che na/ 
150b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ltung ba lhag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / lus ma bsdams pa dang / ngag ma bsdams pa dang / yid ma
150b7(dkon brtsegs): bsdams pas sdig pa'i las lhag par spyad nas kyang / nyes pa bshags pa tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems kyi/ phyin chad sdom par yang mi byed la/ phyin chad yang dag par bsdam
150b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir yang mi byed// ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa yin na/ de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon
151a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas/ nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing / phyin chad sdam par ni mi byed do// byams pa
151a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang ngas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi las yongs su bsal ba byas pa na/ mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
151a3(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro gyi gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ dbul por skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan tu yang ltung bar mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpas ni myu
151a4(dkon brtsegs): du byed par byas shing / 'joms mdog dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs pa dar lta ba dang / rtag tu yid skye ba dang / srid par 'gro ba'i
151a5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i gnas thams cad la yid skrag par bya'o// de cing phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag brgal nas/ khyed cag thams cad bsgral bar
151a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// grol nas dgrol bar bya'o// dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ sems can thams
151a7(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te/ byams pa ngas ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcu ba dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ 
151a8(dkon brtsegs): steng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i las ji snyed pa dang / khur ji snyed pa dang / dgongs pa ji snyed pa dang / don bya ba ji snyed pa dang / bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni/ sems can 'ga' la
151b1(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mthong ngo // byams pa 'di lnga ste dper na/ yal zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ brag dang / ri dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang / 
151b2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa 'di mi la la zhig gi spyi bo'am/ phrag pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces kye skyes bu khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ brag dang / ri dang / rgya
151b3(dkon brtsegs): mtsho dang / chu klung dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal ba 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du gdeg
151b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya zhing bzhag par mi bya/ ngal bso bar mi bya'o zhes kyang bsgo na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i khur che ba dang / spro ba mthu dang ldan pa dang / mthu stobs
151b5(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa
151b6(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de bas kyang gang zhig gis kye sems
151b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ngas khyed cag mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes/ sems can thams cad nye bar gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i khur dang spro ba dang / mthu stobs dang / 
151b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus ches stobs dang ldan par blta bar bya'o// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems
152a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi las ji tsam pa de tsam du gyur// des sems can thams cad kyi las de dag kyang de se gol togs pa gcig tsam gyis yongs su sgrub par byed cing / las
152a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' 'ga' tsam yang yongs su nyams par ma gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i las stobs dang ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de/ 
152a3(dkon brtsegs): lha lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa stobs dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
152a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa khyed mos par bya/ khyod kyis khang du chud par bya ste/ byams pa de byas na byang chub sems dadapa' gang gis 'di skad du/ bdag gis sems can thams
152a5(dkon brtsegs): cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las dgrol bar bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod nas/ las su bya bar byed pa de ches stobs da nga ldan pa yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag la la zhig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba mthong na mi mthun pa med pa zhig bdag par gyur la/ khyim bdag de nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi le len gyis bu gcig pa dang bcas
152a7(dkon brtsegs): chung ma dang bcas ka las byed pa dang sho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang bcas/ nor dang dbyig dang / yo byad thams cad bcas te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bkug par gyur cing / de nas rgyal po des khyim
152a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag de la 'di skad du kwa'i khyim bdag khyed 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum gyi pha rol na/ grong khyer che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig yod par don 'di'i phyir/ zhag bdun gyis phyin par song la ma khyer de phyir yang
152b1(dkon brtsegs): dag bdun gyis nga'i drung du phyin par sheg shig dang / de sta na ngas khyad kyi bu gcig pa 'di dang / chung ma 'di dang / 'khor 'di dag thams cad dang / nad dbyig dang / ya byad 'di dag thams
152b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang khyed la phyir sbyin par bya zhing / gzhan yang khyod la rgyal srid phyed kyi sbyin pa yang lhag par sbyin par bya'o// gal te khyod song nas grong khyer de nas cha blangs te/ nyin mtshan bdun gyis
152b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ma 'ongs na/ khyod la chung zad kyang sbyin par mi bya ba'i steng du/ khyed bu gcig pa dang bcas chung ma dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/ srog dang dbral zhing bsad par bya'o zhes bsgo bar
152b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems khyim pa dedag dadi skad bsgo ba na/ bdag pang ba dang ldan pa dang / bu phongs pa dang ldan pa dang / chung ma phangs pa dang ldan
152b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'khor phangs pa dang ldan pa dang / nor phang/ pa dang ldan pas stobs dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i mgyogs pas grong khyer der 'gro bar
152b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis
152b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba ltar na/ de ni don de yongs su ma grub kyi bar du sems rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyid zas kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bgyid/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems bskyed par ma
152b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyid lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de'i slad pha rol gyi dngos po gzhan dag lta zhag lags kyi/ bdag nyid phangs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
153a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gal te sems can thams cad de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa chen po dang ldan par gyur kyang / sems can de dag thams cad
153a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi brtson 'grus chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po de'i brgya'i cher yang mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba phrag steng gi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
153a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun phyogs su ded pa'i sems can thams cad rgyun las bzlog pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ mya ngan las pa'i dbyings su rab tu dgod
153a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na mi/ 'di tsam du stobs dang ldan pa ming 'di tsam du shugs dang / ldan pa 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa 'di tsam du brtson 'grus
153a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la/ des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po de dag na/ chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por
153a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyu las bzlog/ thams cad kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phab par gyur na/ byams pa 'di
153a8(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ mi de dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba dang / brtson 'grus che ba yin snyam 'am/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags// 
153b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de lta lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / byams pa khyod mos par bya/ khyed kyis khong du chud par bya ste/ de bas kyang gang dag ldag pa'i
153b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches
153b3(dkon brtsegs): shin tu bka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang sangs rgyas yod do// chos yod do// dge 'dun yod do// legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas// 
153b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes/ nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed/ rab dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang
153b5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang / gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches
153b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag mdza' ba shes dang / grogs dang nye du dang / rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing / longs
153b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod chung ngu dang / longs spyod chen po'i tshigs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyi/ khyim gyis gnas
153b8(dkon brtsegs): nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/ legs par gsungs pa'i
154a1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// 
154a2(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang gang dag de ltar rab tu byung nas/ gdams ngag la nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang / bslab po'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka'
154a3(dkon brtsegs): ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jigs par lta zhing / dben pa 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te/ gom pa bdun
154a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba
154a5(dkon brtsegs): babyed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i ba zod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang / 
154a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che ba yin no// de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa 'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'dra
154a7(dkon brtsegs): bu rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' bar byed pa dang / ngo mtshar che ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang / 
154a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs dge slong gi dngos po dang 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i
154b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nub par gyur pa 'dus la bab pa'i chen/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te
154b2(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na/ nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las/ 
154b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so// nyi shu gang zhe na/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang / gtong ba chen po
154b4(dkon brtsegs): spel bar bya ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yod su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam
154b5(dkon brtsegs): par spang bar bya ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa ra bya ba dang / le lo'i sems rnam par mnan par bya/ ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang
