180a6(dkon brtsegs): ltos la/ 'od srung skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gis zab mo la bzod pa ded// thabs la mkhas pa de la bslab par bya'o// 'od srung de ltar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis dge slong dang
180a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga de dag zab mo'i bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas de phyin chad de dag thams cad bdag gi don la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dang / bya ba nyu ngar gnas pas gnas par
180a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams kyi drung du'ang mi 'gro/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par yang mi byed// 
180b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gi sems chos zab mo bla na med pa'i bdag nyid la zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung de nas zhag bdun 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod / 
180b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams rdzaHsa la nub par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag thams cad kyang sgrog mar blugs pa bzhin nam/ snod du blugs pa bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
180b3(dkon brtsegs): te 'od srung de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rjesu bslab par bya'o// 'od srung yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i dag
180b4(dkon brtsegs): slong lus ma bsgoms pa sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni de
180b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pas 'tsho bar sems kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// de dag ni
180b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes rab 'tshal ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin bzhin du 'tsho ba
180b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongasu bsgos
180b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dag la bkur bsti bya ba dang / ro mo bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar sems so// de dag ni bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang / zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti
181a1(dkon brtsegs): mug dang bcas pa yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 
181a2(dkon brtsegs): sngang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sku gdung dag la bkur bsti bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang mchod par bya bar sems so// de dag ni bdag nyid ser sna can dang 'jungs pa dang / gnod
181a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang za ba'i nyes pa mang ba dang / le lo dang ldan pa dang / brjed ngas pa dang / shes bzhin med pa yin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag chen po yang
181a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa mnyam par bzhag pa thugs rtse gcig pa'i sku gdung dag la bkur bsti bya dab dang / ri mo bya ba dang / mchod pa bya bar sems so// 
181a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung nga ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las dang / po pa dag gi sems mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku gdung rnams byin gyis rlob par mdzod te/ gang dag
181a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag la mchod pa byed pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyamasu myong bar 'gyur zhing / de yang de dag gi yongasu ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin no// mi
181a7(dkon brtsegs): blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas ngas dge slong gi lasu gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gis bor zhing btang la/ bdag nyid gso ba'i don dang / mdza' bshes
181a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi khyim dang / slongs mo ster ba'i khyim dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i don dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos yongasu btsal ba'i don dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bsti mngon par bsgrub pa'i
181b1(dkon brtsegs): don dang snyan pa dang / sgra dang / grags pa yongasu bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / mchod rten dag la bkur bsti nye bar sgrub par byed do// 'od
181b2(dkon brtsegs): srung de la dge sbyong gi las gang zhe na/ 'od srung ngas gnyis po bsam gtan dang / kha ton bya ba bstan pa gang yin pa dag ste las de gnyis kyang lam la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan/ 
181b3(dkon brtsegs): par zad kyi/ de dag kyang shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin pa ni ma yin no// 'od srung las gang las zad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa de ni dge sbyong gi las yin te/ 
181b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba med pa dang / nyes pa mi 'byung ba dang / log pa dar mi byed pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la bye dad pa med pa dang / nyams pa med pa dang / skye ba med
181b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon du byed pa dang / khams gsum du mtshams sbyorab med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa
181b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi las zhes bya ba yin na/ blun po de dag ni dge sbyong gi las de lta bu de dag spangs te/ las gzhan dang gzhan dag yongasu tshol bar byed do// de dag ni
181b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyim na gnas pa gos dkar po can rnams kyis bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa de tsam la yang slob par mi byed de/ khyim na gnas pa gos dkar po can rnams kyang re shig de
181b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa rnams slob par byed pa na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur na mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas rnam par
182a1(dkon brtsegs): grol ba dang rjes su 'thun pa tsam yang bsgom par mi byed na 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do// 'od srung yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi mal/ 
182a2(dkon brtsegs): dus lnga brgya tha ma de la ming gis zil gyis non cing / kha dog dang rtags dang dbyibs kyis dge slong du 'gyur gyi/ tshul khrims kyis ma yin ting nge 'dzin gyis ma yin/ shes
182a3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis ma yin pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ mi gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis gos la 'debs shing / bsgo bar byed la gang gis gos
182a4(dkon brtsegs): de gyon pa na/ zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyis de'i lu das me lce gcig tu gyur cing kun tu 'bar bar byed pa la ngal zhig yod par gyur cing / des gos de gsang sngags
182a5(dkon brtsegs): dang sman dag gis btab cing yongasu bsgos nas mi mdza'/ bal la zhig la 'di lta ste/ mdza' bshes kyi/ tshul gyis ster bar gyur la/ de nas mi des kyang gis de
182a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes pa yin par rig nas len par byed cing blangs nas gos de gyon par gyur na/ de zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyi bar du ni gos de las dga' ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// de na
182a7(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun nas zhag brgyad 'das nas/ mi de khyim du song ngam lam po cher song ba na/ gos de 'brar bar gyur cing de nas me ga ni des tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal skyes par gyur
182a8(dkon brtsegs): te tshig par gyur shi bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems gos de las ro myang ba ni ji tsam zhig yod/ nyes dmigs / ji tsam zhig yod snyam/ 'od srung gis gsol
182b1(dkon brtsegs): ba bcom ldan 'das ro myang ba ni chung lags kyi nyes dmigs ni dpag tu ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de bzhin du nga'i gos
182b2(dkon brtsegs): ngur smrig tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas bsgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang
182b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas legs par spyad pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin no// mi blun po dge slong ltar bcos pa de dag ni drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyon nas/ grong
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug par 'gyuradar zhing de nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis
182b5(dkon brtsegs): de dge slong yin no snyam nas bkur bsti byed/ bla ma ra byed ri mor byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur zhi nga de dag gos ngur smrig gi gzhi de las mchod pa rnyed par
182b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas de dag des dga' ba nyam su myong bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag lus zhig nas ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing de dag der lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba gyon par 'gyur
182b7(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur lcags kyi khu bskol ba 'thung bar 'gyur/ mal stan rab tu 'bar ba dag gi steng na nyal bar 'gyuraro// 'od srung de dag ni rang gi las des lus
182b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar zad kyi/ gzhi gang las mi blun po de dag gis kyang bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa du ma nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gos ngur smrig gi dpal dang gzi
183a1(dkon brtsegs): brjid de 'dra ba la ltos/ 'od srung ngas kyang de la dgongs nas 'di skad ces lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba dag gyon pa ni bla'i/ tshul khrims 'chal
183a2(dkon brtsegs): bas gos ngur smrig byu go ba ni de lta ma yin no// lcags kyi thu lum dag bza' ba ni bla'i tshul khrims 'chal bas bsod snyoms dag la yongasu longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes gsung
183a3(dkon brtsegs): so 'od srung de la ro myang ba ci tsam yod pa dang / de la nyes dmigs ji tsam yod pa ltos te/ 'od srung de lta bas na ci nas kyang tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyur ba dang / sdig
183a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/ 8 / 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam
183a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding ngam/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'amo ma/ yin pa sus kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam/ sa kyi sku gzugs bya bar nus snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis
183a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zla ma mchis pa sru bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pas de'i slad du de dag gi sku gzugs bgyi ba na
183a7(dkon brtsegs): bla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'od srung phyi ma'i tshe phyi'i dus na lnga brgya tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa sems ma bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims
183a8(dkon brtsegs): ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos bu dang / rtsig pa dang rab dag gi ngos la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'bri bar
183b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing de dag gis 'tshe bar sems par 'gyur te/ las des bdag nyid rnam sems byed/ bstud par byed cing / gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang / spad par yang byedade// des
183b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'on bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la de bzhin
183b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na bsod nams 'di tsam du skye bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'od srung de ni de bzhin te
183b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gsal rgyal ni glus dkar po gyon pas de bzhin dgashegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na/ de na/ de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar zad kyi gzhi des chos
183b5(dkon brtsegs): gas sam/ bsad snyoms sam/ rnyed pa cung zad 'dod par mi byed do// 'ad srung ma thun pa dengadag ni gni des 'tshe bar 'gyur bar sems te de dag ni den bya'o snyam du
183b6(dkon brtsegs): sems la/ ngan med pa kho na byed pa yin no// 'od srung rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dang pa kho na yin pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed du/ 
183b7(dkon brtsegs): bcug na ni de dag bsod nams dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyuraro// 'od srung dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi lus gzugs 'tshong ba yang legs pa ma yin na/ de bzhin gshen/ 
183b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs 'tshong ba lnga smos kyang ci dgos na mi blun pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug nas/ khyim pa'i lag tu 'tshong bar sems par byed de/ 
184a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na mi byis pa dang 'dra ba shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can la la zhig yod par gyur la/ nges bdud rtsi yongasu spangs nas dug za bar byed/ 
184a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du/ 'od srung mi blun pa gang dag zang zing gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dug dang bcas par byed pa de dag kyang de lta bu yin pa snyam dung
184a3(dkon brtsegs): sems so// 'od srung legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni 'di lta ste rnyed pa yin na de la mi thun pa khro bas zil gyis non pa gcig la gcig 'thab pa dang
184a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsod pa dang 'tshang 'dru bar byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs dpa la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer zhing bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar byed/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ 
184a5(dkon brtsegs): mi thabs la mi mkhas pa la la zhig g.yul ngor zhugasab na rang gi mtshon gyis rang la 'debs par byed pa de bzhin du/ 'od sru mau blun po de dag kyang dam pa'i ches rnams
184a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'od srung rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ shin tu zin par
184a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa byi dor legs par byas pa/ chu zheng du ri rab tsam yod pa byed du bcug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de lta bu dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hIHgi bye ma snyed dag 'di
184a8(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing ltar 'dab chagasu yongasu bkang bar gyur na/ 'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
184b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam 'am/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ser ma'i
184b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs tsam zhig bgyid du stsal na yang bsod nams mang du bskyed lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ri rab tsam du ma bgyi du stsal pa lta ci smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan
184b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'ang srung khyed mas par bya khyod kyi khong du chud par byaste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang shig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu rtogs par
184b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na/ za na se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos zab mo rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur na de ches bas dang nams mang du bskyed ngo // de bas kyang gang zhig tshul khrims
184b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po la gnas shing / tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig bzung nas tshig su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de yang rtogs par byed la/ sems can gcig tsam la sten
184b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed na yang de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'od srung de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu brtag par bya zhe na/ 'od srung 'di la byang chub sems dpas
184b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i rjesu bslab par bya ste/ 'od srung sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa ches grangs med pa/ ches shin tu grangs med pa
184b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar// 
185a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od ces bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi
185a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa na byang chub sems dpa'
185a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu zhig gi bur skyes par gyur to// 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus
185a4(dkon brtsegs): na bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dge slong gang dag rab tu byung bar gyur pa de dag las bya ba sna tshogs kyis spags pas sbags pa ni phal po che'i yang dag par
185a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ni nyung bar gyur te/ 'od srung dge slong/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rna/ ma pa sna tshogs byed du 'jug cing / ras bcos bu dang
185a6(dkon brtsegs): dar dang khang pa'i rtsig ngos dag la ri mo 'brir 'jug par yang byed do// de'i tshe na dge slong zhig gis dar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs legs par byas pa/ shin tu zin
185a7(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa zhig bris nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i pha/ rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer ro// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
185a8(dkon brtsegs): des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de mthong nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du lho na sdug pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs
185b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta smos kyang ci dgos te bdag kyang lus 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na ci ma rung snyam nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba
185b2(dkon brtsegs): dang dad pa skyes par gyur te/ de de'i tshe na khyim thams cad la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur cing / de 'di snyam du khyim gyi gnas na gnas pas lus 'di lta bu bsgrub par mi nus pas
185b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir bdag mngon par 'byung bar bya'o snyam du sems par yang gyur to// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po skyes nas lo bcu drug len la/ dbang po rnams
185b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shing yongasu smin pa yang rjes su thob nas rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rang gi pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smraso// yab
185b5(dkon brtsegs): yum bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la khyim// nas khyim ma mchis par legs pa kho nar rab tu/ 'byung bar ci gnang / pha mas smras pa/ gzhon khyod
185b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nged gnyis la bu ga cog pa sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba khyod las med pase gal te khyod ma mthong na/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i
185b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis khyed gnyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la/ bdag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi lagaso// pha mas smras pa/ gzhon nu ji
185b8(dkon brtsegs): lngar bya/ khye'us smras pa/ bdag deng slan chad ji srid du mngon par byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal mal du yang mi 'jug/ mar sar dang 'bru mar gyis kyang mi
186a1(dkon brtsegs): nyug pa/ skam pa yang mi 'tshal dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshig 'ga' yang mi spru lagasas// 'ad srung nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen ba das/ phyogs
186a2(dkon brtsegs): byi ra ma byas pa zhig du 'dug ste/ cang mi smra bar gyur cing nyin gcig zan yang ma zos so// de nas de'i pham gnyis kyis rabargya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing na
186a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan thog thag tu de la gsol ba btab kyang de tshig tsam yang mi smra bar gyur to// 'od srung de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag gnyis kyi bar du zan ma zos
186a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang de nas ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ngan pa'i kha zas thogs te gzhan ni tshig tu mi brjodacing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de dag
186a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gdong du yang mi lta na/ tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag gsum gyi bar du zan ma tha
186a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de nas pa'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te/ gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba bdab kyang / de dag gidong du la
186a7(dkon brtsegs): mi lta tshig kyang mi smra'o// 'od srung de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag bzhi'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang / de nas de'i ne'u lngardzargya dag gis ro brgya
186a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang / de dag gi gdong du yang mi lhan chog smra ba lta sbas kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung
186b1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag lnga'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis rgyal po'i pho brang na/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang
186b2(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / sa laM snga ma dang / dngul dang / gzhan yang rin po che dang / gos dang rgyan sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag
186b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/ na chung lha'i bu mo 'dra brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bkug ste phyogs gcig tu bkod do// 'od srung mdor na rgyal
186b4(dkon brtsegs): bI pho brang de na nye bar spyod pa'i longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de dag tha dmas cad de'i mdun du bzhag ste/ de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma'i nyi du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / pha'i nyid/ 
186b5(dkon brtsegs): du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / ne'u ldangs lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / na chung brgyad khri bzhi stong pa dag dang / skye bo phal po che de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems
186b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i mdun du bkod nas/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing / nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba 'debs te/ de la 'di
186b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gzhon nu longs la zan zo/ khyim 'dir 'dug la sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ bud med 'di dag dang lhan cig du dga' ba dang / rtsed
186b8(dkon brtsegs): mo dang dga' mgur spyad pa dag kyang gyis la rgyal po'i khyim 'di lta bu yongasu ma btang shig ces kyang spras// 'od srung de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de skye ba
187a1(dkon brtsegs): phal po che de ltar 'dus pa de dag la mig kyang mi lta phyir yang mi smra bar de bzhin du cang mi zer bar 'dug cing / zhag drug gi bar du zan yang ma zos par de sangs rgyas
187a2(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog dang 'brel ba'i yid la byed pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan thams cad dang bral zhing kha zas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed do// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
187a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang / skye bo phal po che de dag dang ne'u ldangs de dag dang / nye du'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad kyis gzhan la
187a4(dkon brtsegs): mchi rgyun blags shing skad phyung ste dung mos btab nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs kyang / de de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta'o// 'od srung de nas
187a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i pho brang de na lnga zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa/ de steng gi bar snang la cho 'phrul chen pos 'dug nas / skye bo phal po che de dag la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ 
187a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de dag lhun po 'dra bar ni// mthu brtan rab tu mi g.yo ste// yid dam gtong bar mi byed do// sa rnams thams cad g.yo yang srid// me ni chur yA/ 
187a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur srid kyi// grogs dag 'di ni gnas 'di las// bskyod par nus pa ma yin no// 'di las mi dga' phyis mi bya// sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig/ phyin chad dmus long
187a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar ni// bskal pa bye bar 'khyam sa re// 'di ni sems can thams cad la// phan phyir byang chub zhugs pa ste// mngon par byang chub brtson rnams ni// byang chub dam pa rnyed ma
187b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' 'dod pa'i phyir dang longs spyod phyir// byang chub spyad pa mi spyod kyi// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes tshal rnams ji ltar bde// steng gsum rin chen rnams dang ni// 
187b2(dkon brtsegs): gos dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis// chal par bka' bar gyur kyang ni// de dag chags par bya mi nus// mi shes pas ni gang byas pa'o// sdig pa'i las ni bshags par gyis/ 
187b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa nyes pa bshags nas ni// las dang lhan cig mi gnas// 'od srung de ltar lha des bskul na// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang / mdza'
187b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes dang gros grogs dang / nye du dang rgan rabs de dag dadang / skye bo phal po che dag gis nyes pa la nyes dbar bshags nas/ gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras te/ 
187b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod ji ltar bsam pa bzhin song shig/ rab tu yang byung shig zan yang zo shig/ zas ma zos pa sa 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes byaso// 'od srung de ltar
187b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad du zin kyang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa yid la byed pa dang / zhag bdun gyi bar du lha rnams kyis de'i
187b7(dkon brtsegs): lus la mdangs bcug pas na dbang po gzhan du gyur par yang ma gyur/ gzhan gyi mdangs yongasu nyams par yang ma gyur to// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
187b8(dkon brtsegs): des de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad te khyim gyi gnas la mi lta zhing rgyal srid chen po de mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor nas/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / pha
188a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i nye du'i tshogs de dag gdong mchi mas gang ste/ ngu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te/ rang gi grong khyer chen po nas byung / 
188a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dgon pa mi med pa gcan zan gdug pa gnas pa'i nags shig tu bzhugs so// de der bzhugs nas ras bcos bu'i gzhi gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bris
188a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ras bcos bu'i gzhi de nyid kyi mdun du rtsa'i gdong ba bting ba'i steng du dkyil mo dkrungs bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la rtog
188a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed do// de de la rtog par byed pa ni 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pa di yang 'di tsam du mdzes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das
188a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa de de tsam du mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar bas/ gang ngag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de dag ni dpal
188a6(dkon brtsegs): yon can yin no snyam mo// de 'di snyam du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du yang sems par yang gyur to// de nas nags khrod de na lnga zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa
188a7(dkon brtsegs): des byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongasu shes nas byang chub sems dpa'i de la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
188a8(dkon brtsegs): blta bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du lta bar bya zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
188b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya ste/ de ltar mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems
188b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brtson 'grus chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bltas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la ji ltar blta bar bya/ 
188b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang
188b4(dkon brtsegs): sems par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yi no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di
188b5(dkon brtsegs): ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams ca/ da kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad la/ ming de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo
188b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa/ 
188b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / 'bras bu rtogs bu dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / 'gro/ 
188b8(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / sgra med pa dang / 
189a1(dkon brtsegs): tshul med pa dang / tshul ma yin pa med pa dang / 'dod chags zad pa med pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa med pa dang / gti mug zad pa med pa dang / phung
189a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams med pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' med pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang dbus med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad
189a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di g.yo ba med pa dang / spyod pa med pa de bzhin du
189a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs dpa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi
189a5(dkon brtsegs): byed nyan par mi byedasdom par mi byed/ myang bar mi byed reg par mi byed/ sems par mi byed/ la bar mi byed/ ldang bar mi byed/ dbugs dbyung bar mi
189a6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ dbugs rngub par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra
189a7(dkon brtsegs): yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di 'dod pa'i khamasu gtogs pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khamasu gtogs pa yang ma yin
189a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin// de ltar de bzhin gshes
189b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med/ pha rol yang med/ bar yang med/ thog ma yang med/ tha ma yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ rgyu ba yang med/ spyod pa yang med// 
189b2(dkon brtsegs): blang ba yang med/ dor ba yang med/ bya ba yang med/ byed pa yang med/ ltung ba yang med/ bden pa yang med/ brdzun pa yang med/ bden pa mngon par shes pa yang med
189b3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'dod chags chags pa yang med/ yid la byung ba yang med/ 'khor ba yang med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ chos
189b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no snyam// 'od srung de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa de lta bu des rab
189b5(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog par byed pa na nyin mtshan du dkyil mo dkrung zhig par ma/ gyur cing / des nyin mtshan du mngon par shes/ ba lnga dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / spobs pa
189b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrubs par gyur nas ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba zhes bya ba yang bsgrubs par gyur nas/ de la snang ba yang byung bar gyur te/ snang ba byung bar gyur pa des lha'i
189b7(dkon brtsegs): mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i rna ba bsgrib pa med pas/ sangs rgya
189b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib par ma gyur cing thams cad kyang mnyes par byas// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug par gyur te/ shes pa'i rtsa
190a2(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par zas gzhan yang mi za zhing / lha rnams kyis de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rig nas de'i lus la mdangs bcug par yang gyur to// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'gru/ 
190a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po de glo ngur smrig dag kyang ma bgos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du ma mthong / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs mod kyi/ 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjesu
190a4(dkon brtsegs): thob cing / de ltar bslab par 'dod par gyur pa la ltos/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhi na gshegs pa'i sku rab tu rnam par 'byed de/ ci nas kyang
190a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / 'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par byed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dgra/ ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
190a6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bsnyen bkur bya'o// des de ltar bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa
190a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na ye shes chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyang bskyed par gyur te/ ye shes kyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs
190a8(dkon brtsegs): med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur/ de dag chos ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur to// 'od srung de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de nags khrod de nas phyir
190b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing de srog chags nyi khris ni
190b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod do// sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsod nams dag la bkod pa
190b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to/ pha ma de gnyis dang btsun mo'i 'khor de dag dang 'khor gzhan thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas// 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub
190b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa deg rgan zhig yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang yid gnyis dang / the tsom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste de ci'i
190b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro// 'od srung de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
190b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po de dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rjesu bslab
190b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// 'od srung yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi mI dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ byang chub sems dpa'i thegs pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa brkam pa 'dod pas zil
190b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis non pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni ras bcos bu dang rtsig ngos la bris pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas dngos grub
191a1(dkon brtsegs): dang rdzu 'phrul 'thob par sems shing de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi/ gzhan dag ni mchod pa byed pa ma
191a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no snyam du rlom semasu 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba cung zad tsam po des bdag la bstod par byed gzhan la smod par byed cing gzhi des 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur ro// 
191a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung de'i tshe na gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang / 'dus pa dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag ma gtog
191a4(dkon brtsegs): par/ de ltar lung gnod pa yongasu tshol bar mi 'gyur/ kha don mi byed bsam gtan mi bsgom/ nang du yang ngag 'jog la bces par sems par mi 'gyur te/ de dag
191a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe na khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dag gis mchod pa dang / ri mo bya ba dang / shes pa dang / shin tu/ yong su shes par yang 'gyur zhing / gzhi des de dag gi
191a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gas so sman dang yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro// 'od srung ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi
191a7(dkon brtsegs): las su 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas te/ mang du thos pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na/ de dag ni de'i tshe na tshul khrims 'chal pa kho nar gnas shing chos
191a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu btsal ba spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur zhing gzhi des 'tshe bar sems pa la ltos/ de nas bcom
191b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgyu dang g.yo dang / gya
191b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag mang du bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu thas
191b3(dkon brtsegs): nas su zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu sbyong bar mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos
191b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas bdag cag ni de bzhin gsheg/ das pas mkhyen pa/ bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs dpas gzigs pas na/ bdag cag yul 'di lta bu la spyod
191b5(dkon brtsegs): pa las phyir ldog par bya'o zhes kun du skyo ba skye bar 'gyur/ zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab
191b6(dkon brtsegs): tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa gnas rnam pa 'di lta bu gang
191b7(dkon brtsegs): ci ston pa dang / yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du ste/ 'di ltar de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur
191b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongasu spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lnga dang mi dang / lA ma hA
192a2(dkon brtsegs): dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
192a3(dkon brtsegs): grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+ha
192a4(dkon brtsegs): dang pradz+nyA war ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// shu la ka stang nyas ba
192a5(dkon brtsegs): bam pa bzhi'// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi na ni shu yang / u pa li pa ri br-id tshwa nA ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'dul ba rnam par gtan
192a6(dkon brtsegs): la dbab pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag
192a7(dkon brtsegs): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
192a8(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' stong tham pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sem pa sems chen po de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs te
192b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs
192b2(dkon brtsegs): med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par bzung ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs dang tshul dang bsam pa sna
192b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis yongasu bskyang bar su spro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas/ 
192b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'a/ dus la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
192b5(dkon brtsegs): ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongasu ba/ zung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis par yang
192b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par 'dzin par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' seng ges gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
192b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni thabs dang tshul dang / bsam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongasu skyong bar spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan
192b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag ni sems can rnams ngan song du mchi ba las yongasu thar bar bgyid par spro lagaso// 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can
193a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis gang zag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
193a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can ma 'tshal ba rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par sme lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi sbyin pas
193a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan rnams kyis sems can
193a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub semasadadapa' nyi ma'i tog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ das bdag ni theg pa bde bas sems can yongasu smin par
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' bag tshab med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sem sa can gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag yongasu smin par
193a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa dang yongasu 'dzin par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ming 'bras bu mchis par sgrogs pas sems can rnam
193a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam rgya chen pos sems can gyi khams bsam
193a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba rnams yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
193b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams rab tu 'god par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' mig bzangs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i rtsa ba nye ba
193b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro dag las sems can rnams yongs su
193b3(dkon brtsegs): skyob par spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ngan song dag las ma rgal ba'i sems can rnams sgrol bar spro lagaso// 
193b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' tshogs chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can ma dul ba rnams la dul ba'i shul nye bar bston par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa/ 
193b5(dkon brtsegs): yid bzangs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bad// ga ni sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams yongasu// smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa
193b6(dkon brtsegs): nges pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can shes rab dman pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid phung pos
193b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa rnams yongasu smin par 'gyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med pa rtog par
193b8(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul yang dag par ston pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems
194a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad tshad ma mchis pa dag nye bar bsgrub par spro lags
194a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sdug bsngal dran par bgyid pas/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par sprolags
194a3(dkon brtsegs): sobyang chub sems dpa' rnams par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa tsam gyis yid btags kyi// 
194a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sam
194a5(dkon brtsegs): can yongasu smin pa rnams yongasu smin par bgyid par sprul gso// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems
194a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid stobs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems
194a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gums par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis spong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dman pa la mos pa
194a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams sgrol bar spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams bsdu ba'i slad du legaso zhes bgyi
194b1(dkon brtsegs): bstsol bar spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin/ 
194b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba dpag med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la 'dus ma bgyigyis shul
194b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar ston par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bag tsha ba med par gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sem
194b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yang dag par ston par sme lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams
194b5(dkon brtsegs): la rin po che'i phung po kun du ston par spro lagaso// byang chu/ ba sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gzugs sdug pa ston pas sems
194b6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lags// byang chub sems dpa' dri med gzi brjid kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni btsugs pas sems can rnams yang
194b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'dzin cing yongasu smin par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon gyi skye ba rjesu dran par bgyid
194b8(dkon brtsegs): pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams 'od zer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang dag pa'i smon lam gyis
195a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dren par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' dpal bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las
195a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams rin po che dag gis bde bar bgyid par smra
195a3(dkon brtsegs): lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par bgyid par spro lagaso// byang chub sems
195a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams nyon mongs rab thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags// / 
195a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom/ ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la shul bza/ nga po nye bar ston par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa'
195a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gzugs ston gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsam pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pas sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lagaso// 
195a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos mngon par 'phags kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba ston par spro lags so// byang chub
195a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams sgrib pa dag las yongs su thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa'
195b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'byung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyis sems can rnams yongasu thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' ci yang min gyis gsol ba
195b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad gzhig par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sems can rnams la chos kyi phyogs rab tu ston par spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams la chos
195b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa stsol bar spro lagaso// byang chub sems dpa' gzhonu 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa dag ni sems can rnams dman pa'i gnas nas yongs su
195b5(dkon brtsegs): thar par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dang 'a sangs rgyas dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shul bzang po ston pas sems can
195b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ngan song gi shul 'gog par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lus ston pas sems can rnams yongasu
195b7(dkon brtsegs): sman par bgyid par spro lags so// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can don bgyid pa rnams kyi don bgyid par smra/ 
195b8(dkon brtsegs): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sgo 'gums par spro lags so// 
196a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las sgrol bar spro lags// byang chub
196a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na 'od bstan pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnams rab
196a3(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar bgyid par spro lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i go cha la 'jug pa bstan pa de lta bu thos
196a4(dkon brtsegs): nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung bar 'dzin par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di dag snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa bas ma gyis mi khyab cing brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang / ji tsam du sems can thams cad kyis
196a6(dkon brtsegs): thul bar dka' ba dang / gting dpag par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rdzi bar dka' ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ 
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa rnams kyi drung du mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig slong
196a8(dkon brtsegs): dag mchis te/ dngos po thams cad slong bar bgyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun du zhum par mi bgyid/ sgyid lug par mi bgyid cing rab tu spro bar
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa ni bdag ngo mtshar du 'dzin lags// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/ sems can gang su dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
196b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams la gnod par bgyis te/ nang dang phyi'i dngos po dge slong bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems/ 
196b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag tu 'gyur bar sems lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bkra
196b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / thab ngas dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyi yul ni de lta bu yin/ 
196b5(dkon brtsegs): no/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yu/ la de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
196b7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can khyim bdag gis rgyags pas myos pa rnams la dbang phyug/ 
196b8(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir/ khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// sems can spro bas rgyags shing myos pa rnams la spro ba'i rgyags pa'i rgyags pa
197a1(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i phyir/ chen po chen po'i stobs dang sred med kyi bu'i spro ba'i stobs nye bar ston par byed do// sems can mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer
197a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu
197a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug
197a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par tha
197a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston pa/ ra byed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems pa/ ba' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs sna tshogs kyis
197a6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams yongasu smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rab tu 'god par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes shin tu mya ngan las
197a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi rnam par thar pa gzhan med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
197a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'di thug su chud de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / gdags pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la rnam par rig par
197b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can
197b2(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa rnams la thar pa nye bar ston par mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la lam bzang po nye bar ston par
197b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid gsung ba dang / stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// 
197b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnadams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnam par rmongs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i chos rjesu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji/ 
197b5(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin no// rnam par rig pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa nye bar ston par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid las mi g.ye'o// rim gyis byang chub kyi snying
197b6(dkon brtsegs): bo thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la sgyu ma'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang nye bar ston to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na
197b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya'o// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa la ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
197b8(dkon brtsegs): pa khyim na gnas pa ni rje su chags pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pas sbyin pa de gnyis la gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar
198a1(dkon brtsegs): gtogs pas ni sbyin pa chen po bzhi la gnas par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smyu gu sbyin pa dang / snag tsha sbyin pa dang / glegs bam sbyin pa
198a2(dkon brtsegs): dang chos sbyin pa la ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung bar gtogs pas ni sbyin pa bzhi po de dag la gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sem
198a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni gtong ba gsum la gnas par bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gtong ba dang / gtong ba chen po dang
198a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu gtong la'o// de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'o// de la gtong ba chen po ni chung ma dang / bu dang bu mo yongasu gtong ba'o// shin tu gtong ba ni ma
198a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mgo dang / lpags pa/ dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang su gtong ba'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
198a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas ni yongs su gtong ba gsum po de dag la gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dod chags// 
198a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi 'jigs lags sam/ zhe sdang gti mug gis mi 'jigs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen
198a8(dkon brtsegs): po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa ste/ shA ri'i bu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khan
198b1(dkon brtsegs): mthab chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de la 'dod chags ni kha nam tho ba dang bcas pa chung la/ 'bral ba dul ba yin na// de sdang ma kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa
198b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'bral ba myur ba yin no// gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chel/ 'bral ba bul ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu'i 'dod chags ni 'khar 'di khri shing kun tu 'dzin
198b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir nying 'tshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin pa dang / zhe sdang ni myur du yongasu spong ba'i phyir ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang / gti mug ni rnam par grol bar dka' ba'i phyir
198b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du rab tu ltung ba'i rgyur gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa dang po'i lci ba ni tshegs bcu la drang por bshag+sas/ 
198b5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// bud med kyi lag pa nas 'dzin pa'i lag pa na/ nyes pa lci ba ni tshigs lnga la bshags par/ bya'o// nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis mig gis
198b6(dkon brtsegs): bltas pa'i nyes pa ni gang zag gcig gam gnyis kyi mdun du boshags par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i nyes pa dang / bud med kyi nyes pa dang / 
198b7(dkon brtsegs): khye'u'i nyes pa dang / lag pa'i nyes pa dang / mchod rten gyi nyes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nyes pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa lci ba rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
198b8(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar gcig pus nyin mtshan du bshags par bya'o// de la bshags pa ni 'di yin te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// chos
199a1(dkon brtsegs): la skyabasu mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
199a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'ang 'brel phyag 'tshalo// klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// dpa' ba'i sde la phyag 'tshalo// 
199a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshal la// mthong ba don yad la phyog 'tshal la// rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tsha lo// 
199a4(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal byin la phyag/ 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal// tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshalo// chu lha la phyag 'tshalo// chu lha
199a5(dkon brtsegs): lha la phyag 'tshalo// dpal bzangs la phyag 'tsha la// tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// ga 'di mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od dpal la phyag
199a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tsha lo// sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshalo// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par
199a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// nor dpal la phyag 'tshalo// dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// mtshan
199a8(dkon brtsegs): dpal shin tu yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshalo// dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// g.yul las shin tu
199b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal// rin chen pad+mas rnam par gnon pa la/ 
199b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+mo la rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la
199b3(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i
199b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang skye ba tho/ ngag ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas/ 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i
199b5(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gzhan dag tu sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yid rang ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi dkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi
199b6(dkon brtsegs): dkor ram/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor phrogs pa dang / 'phrog tu stsal pa dang 'phrog pa la rje su yid rang ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / 
199b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yid rang ba'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i lam yang dag par blang ba la zhugs pa dang / 'jug tu stsal ba dang / 'jug pa la
199b8(dkon brtsegs): rjesu yid rang ba 'am/ las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasu mchi ba 'am/ yi dgas kyi yul du mchi
200a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba 'am/ kla klor skye ba 'am/ lha tshe rings po rnams kyi nang du skye ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ ltang
200a2(dkon brtsegs): log pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye
200a3(dkon brtsegs): shesu gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen par gzigs pa de dag gi spyan sngar mthol lo// 'chagaso// mi 'chab po// mi sbed do// slan chad kyang sdom pa/ 
200a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das deng/ ga bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di da / skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas
200a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro ba / gnas su skyes pa la zas kham cig tsam stsal pa ga lags pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa gang lags
200a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems can yongasu smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag
200a7(dkon brtsegs): gi byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te/ snga ma/ 
200a8(dkon brtsegs): nas bla na ma mchis par/ gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar yong su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das
200b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang su bsdu ba dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yong su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs
200b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar yongasu bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// sdig pa thams cad bshagaso// bsod nams zang la rjesu yid rang ngo // 
200b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debaso// bdag gi ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog tu gyur cig/ mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin
200b4(dkon brtsegs): gang ma byon/ yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho' dang kun la/ thal mo sbyar ba bgyis te skyabasu nye bar mchi / shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas ba
200b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga pa de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ga gis sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o// de ltar
200b6(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nyid kyang sems can rnam par thar par bya ba kho na'i phyir zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// de bzhin du byis pa so'i
200b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo 'khrul pa rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo la sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams
200b8(dkon brtsegs): mas pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyam
201a1(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi 'gro ba nye bar
201a2(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar
201a3(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs
201a4(dkon brtsegs): nyebar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid drag po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa/ ru zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya
201a5(dkon brtsegs): byin dang tshangs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtse gcig/ ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par
201a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyi su med pa'o ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can yongasu
201a7(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can
201a8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting
201b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs nye bar ston par byed do// shA ri'i bu de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems
201b2(dkon brtsegs): can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la lar ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs nye bar ston par yang byed la/ chos kyi
201b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ 
201b4(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rig pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar ston par byed kyang de la bdag tu dmigs pa yang med/ sems can du dmigs pa yang med la/ sem can rnams
201b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs nye bar ston par yang / byed pa'i phyir// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du semasari dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra skad gang yin pa de/ phyi
201b6(dkon brtsegs): las bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
201b7(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi glang po che'i khal gang yin pa de bong bus bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzod lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
201b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de mi dbul pos bzod par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ 
202a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das den mo bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya'i rgyal po namakha' lding gi pha rol
202a2(dkon brtsegs): gnan pa gang yin pa de/ bya rgod kyi phru gus bzod par nus snyam mam/ shA ri'i bus gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi bzed lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
202a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems dpa' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs bskyed pa las byung zhing shes pa las nges par byung ba'i nyes pa gang yin pa dang / nyes
202a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'gyod pa'i gnas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom/ sa par 'jug pa thob pas rnam par sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang
202a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis rnam par sbyong bar/ mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin cing yong su brjod
202a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nyes pa 'gyod pa'i gnas la nges par 'gyur zhing ting 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyuraro// 
202a7(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
202a8(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
202b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na sems la yong su rtog pa 'di
202b2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongasu dag pa
202b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa yongasu mi gtong ngo zhes gsungs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs
202b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi thegarab pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par ba gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i
202b5(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ theg pa chen po la yang da ga par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi// so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ btsa
202b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bdag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog lag par bka' stsal na/ ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las 'dul ba la mkhas pa mngon sum du thos shing
202b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du bzung nas mi 'jigs pa thob cing 'khor rnams la rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan du gsol
202b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi lagaso snyam ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dben par gnas nas nang du yang dag par bzhag pa na/ sems la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar mchis
203a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa yongasu zhu'o// snyam pa de lta bu'i yongasu rtog pa skyes par gyur lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de
203a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa la 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa rgya cher bstan du gsol/ de skad ces
203a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nye bar 'khor de'i phyir khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni/ 
203a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba gzhan dang lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongs su dag pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la ya rang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsla
203a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang sbyor ba gzhan dang lhag pa'i bsam pa gzhan gyis yongasu dag pa yin par smros shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyor ba
203a6(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang gzhan lhag pa'i bsam pa yang gzhan
203a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i phyir// nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma
203a8(dkon brtsegs): dag nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa nyid gang yin pa de/ 
203b1(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan zas kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// de ci'i phyir she na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni de'i skad cig cam
203b2(dkon brtsegs): yang srid par skye ba len par mi byed do// de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
203b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang / shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
203b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims yongasu dag pa nyid gang yin pa nyan thos kyi theg pa dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid du gyur pa gang zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di// 
203b5(dkon brtsegs): la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa tshad med grangs med par srid khar skye ba len kyang sems yongasu mi skyo zhing yongasu mi skyo ba
203b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongasu dag pa nyid yin la/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa nyid dang / 
203b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na khyod kyis theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjesu bsrung ba dang
203b8(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa yin par smros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rje su bsrung ba med pa yin par smros shig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang / 
204a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bslab pa ni bco su yod pa yin par spros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni bco su med pa yin par smras shig/ theg pa chen po la yang / 
204a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rje su zhugs pa yin par smros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni mthar chags pa yin par smras
204a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ nye bar 'khor 'di la ji ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rjesu bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
204a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bslab pa rjesu bsrung ba med pa yin zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag
204a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi sems kyi rjesu 'jug par bya dgos la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni mi dgos te/ nye bar/ 'khor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par
204a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjesu bsrung ba dang bcas pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjesu bsrung ba med pa yin no// nye bar 'khor
204a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bco su yod pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa bcosu med pa 'i
204a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen
204b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi sems dang sa bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung ba yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yin// 
204b2(dkon brtsegs): te gung tshigs kyi dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
204b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ma gtugs pa kho na yin// gal te phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nyes pa byung la mtshan me'i thun dang po la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas
204b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhu gas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po so dusu ma gtugs pa kho na yin// gal te mtshan mo'i thun
204b5(dkon brtsegs): dang po nyes pa byung la/ mtshan me'i gung thun la thams ca/ da mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas gnas par byed/ na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
204b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yin no// mtshan mo'i gung thun la nyes pa byung la/ mtshan mo'i gung thun tha ma la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma
204b7(dkon brtsegs): bral bas gnas par byed na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yin// nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg
204b8(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcosu yod pa yin te/ de la ni byang chub sems dpas 'gyod pa'i kun nas ldang ba ha cang bskyed par
205a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bya zhing / ha cang yid la gcags par yang mi bya'o// nye bar 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yang dang yang dunyes pa byung na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul
205a2(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi phung po nyams pa dang / rab tu nyams pa dang / yangasu gtugs pa yin par rigs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad
205a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i phyir mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yangasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams kyi bsla
205a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni bcosu med pa yin no// nye bar 'khor ji ltar na thog/ dpa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ring du rje su zhugs pa yin la/ nyan
205a5(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa mthar chags pa ma na zhe na/ nye bar 'khor 'di la gal te theg pa chen bu la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bska
205a6(dkon brtsegs): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyad pa byas kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
205a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongasu ma gtugs pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
205a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis legs par yangasu zin pa ni rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kun du reg par mi 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yad skabs kyang yod par 'gyur/ 
205b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nye bar 'khor yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni srid pa gcig gis nyon mong bzad zad par mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i/ 
205b2(dkon brtsegs): bayongs su smin pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag ni rim gyis zad par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa bdage ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pas ni de'i skad cig
205b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang srid par skye ba bskyed par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ring du rje su zhugs
205b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi bslab pa da ni mthar chags pa yin no// nye bar 'khor de lta bas na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sem
205b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni rjesu bsrung ba dang bcas pa dang / bco su yod pa dang / ring du rje su zhugs pa yin par spros shig/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi
205b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa ni rje su bsrung ba med pa dang / bcos su med pa dang / mthar chags pa yin par smros shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar 'khor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
205b7(dkon brtsegs): chub ni tshigs chen po dang ldan pa yin pas na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu skyo bas ni bskabs tshad med grangs med par mtshams
205b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyor zhing 'khor bar bslab pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ nye bar 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na
206a1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gcig tu skyo ba'i gtam mi gsung / gcig tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gta
206a2(dkon brtsegs): mi gsung / gcig tu yid 'byung ba'i gtam mo gsung bar dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtam gsung ngo // zab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin
206a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / phra ba dang brtags pa dang / 'gyed pa med pa dang / kun nas ldang ba med pa'i gtam gsung ngo // thogs pa med pa dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis
206a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung ste/ de dag gis gtam de dag zos nas ma na par dga' zhing 'khor bas yongasu mi skyo ba dang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub cha/
