231a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtags na rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi
231a8(dkon brtsegs): nangs dmigs mthong nas brtson 'grus rtsom zhing yongasu skye bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs na
231b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtogs na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing skye bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems
231b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gnyid che ba ni rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te le le che bar 'gyur ba dang / lus sha che ba dang / mdog yongasu ma dag pa dang / de'i 'byung ba chen po rnams nang bzhis non par 'gyurab
231b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i lus la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / le lo can du 'gyur ba dang
231b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i gti mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i shes rab nyams chung bar 'gyur ba dang / de kha zas drad pa las yog 'chu bar 'gyur ba dang / de gti mug mun pa
231b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kur bsti mi byed pa dang / sems brtul bar 'gyu ra ba dang / mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems
231b6(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang / de dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa zhum
231b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams spyod pa la smod pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing / 
231b8(dkon brtsegs): rmugs pa dang gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing yongasu skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom
232a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi lus ni sha che 'khregs ma yin// 
232a2(dkon brtsegs): lo de tshe blun zhing mthun mi byed// de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bad kan rlung dang de bzhin 'khris par 'gyur// de dag
232a3(dkon brtsegs): deyi lus las shas cher 'byung // de yi khams nas rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// kha zas nyes pas lto ni me dag cing // lus kyang
232a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga la za mdog bde ma yin// de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi lus la phol mig mang po 'byung // de na
232a5(dkon brtsegs): nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal// de la rma rnams mi bzad/ mang bar 'gyur// gzhig rmugs dang gnyid la dag 'a 'gyur ba// le lo byed cing brtson 'grus yongasu nyams// 
232a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 'gribs// de ni rtag tu zhen cing sems kyang rmongs// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// gti mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing // 
232a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni the tshom can de lta ba thob// de ni lte bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ye shes rab shin tu nyams chung 'gyur// de yi blo yang yongs su
232a8(dkon brtsegs): nyams par 'gyur// ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// mi shes le le snyam las shes rab 'tshal// mi ma yin pa dag gis
232b1(dkon brtsegs): glags rnyed de// nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tshe bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// sems kyang rdul zhing de yi dran pa rmongs// lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas// 
232b2(dkon brtsegs): chos smra na yang de ni rtag tu thogs// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur// rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang // de yi sems ni
232b3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags// lus kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongasu gdungs// bag la nyal ba 'phag
232b4(dkon brtsegs): bar des mi shes// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'a gyur pa// de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de// de ni tshe das la 'dun pa skye mi byed// phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dga'
232b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams// byis pa yon tan kun nas yongasu nyams// dkar po 'joms shing mun
232b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// 'jigs par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum// de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur// gnyid kyis non pa lus
232b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang lhod par 'gyur// gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba// bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog byed// brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams
232b8(dkon brtsegs): la mi snyan smra// nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rtogs gyur na// mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed// shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu// don bzang ngam chos yon tan chud gson pa/ 
233a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyid 'di brtson 'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur na// mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su der dga'// sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing // ngan song yongasu spong ba'i/ 
233a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhir gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags// gang yin de ni rtag tu bsten par gyis// 'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang // 'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag
233a3(dkon brtsegs): ci yod pa// brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dga' na// mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo// gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa// de dag rmugs gnyid sbyin
233a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong nas ni// rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed// / 'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin// de nas bco ma ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233a5(dkon brtsegs): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bya nga chub sems dpa' gang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sku/ na 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na spong bar mi bgyid cing skye bar
233a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyid pa de dag dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi bgyid pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang / lhag
233a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag zos na/ le lo bgyid cing
233a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i ches rnams bskyed par mi bgyid/ brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang / phan yon 'di lnga bu thos na byang chub kyi yan lag yang su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i srang du/ su zhige brtson 'grus ma
233b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
233b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i spags pa'i spags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la
233b3(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233b4(dkon brtsegs): las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/ byang nga chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya rab nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing skyob
233b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyuraro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten ba'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur ba dang / las ngan pa thad
233b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thes padas
233b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongasu 'dzin pa'i las brtsams par 'gyur ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang / de ni sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 
233b8(dkon brtsegs): chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yod smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang / 
234a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi bya ba dag brtson pa dang / de dag lags cher 'dun cing chags pa bskyed pa dang / len pa med par ma dga' ba dang / kun nas mnar sems mang ba las kyis
234a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur ba dang / de'i zas kyi rnam par rtog pas nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag gi rgyun du 'dra/ 
234a3(dkon brtsegs): pabar byed pa dang / ma rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa dang / 
234a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog dpar 'gyur ba dang / don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa 'i gtam dag la skye nas brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi
234a5(dkon brtsegs): shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas spags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa
234a6(dkon brtsegs): chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
234a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing // las mchog dag las de ni rgyang yang ring // 'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur// rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag mi
234a8(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis// de la brnyas shing 'dod pa mi byed la// bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin// 
234b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khar ba' las la mngon par bdun pa dang // thar pa las ni chang rang bcings par gnas// de ni yul 'khor zas la ma rigs srung // nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa yin/ gcag
234b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po dag ni len par byed// yongasu 'dzin pa la ni dga' mi bskyed// nor med nor na don du gnyer bar byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// khyim du rgyu ba dag ni chags pa
234b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'du 'dzi dga' bas thams cad 'jig par byed// gzib kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin// khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed/ 
234b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung // nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// bla mas bskul na bka' blo mi bde zhing / 
234b5(dkon brtsegs): rjesu bstan pa mthun par 'dzin ma byed// de ni myur du tshul tshwa mas nyams par 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yan// khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag
234b6(dkon brtsegs): sems pas// da ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan dang ni spang ba de mi byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye// de ni ri bro rnams
234b7(dkon brtsegs): la chags shing zhe na// de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di ni las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'khor mang phal chen dgar 'gyur te// de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ 
234b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur// las rnams 'phel zhing zad par mi 'gyur te// sred
235a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khri shing dag gis dam du btsangs// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi bsten// phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni brten par byed// tshul khrims/ 
235a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dag la phrag dog byed// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni// zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed// de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma
235a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri// rigs pa min pa'i smra ba rnams la dga'// rigs pa'i smra la de ni dga' mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las// 
235a4(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i yin// sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe/ dbang phyug nyes pas de dag nges tshar gcod// mi sdugalas rnams mngon par 'du byed de// nyes pa 'di dag las/ 
235a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i yin// de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyen rtog cing // bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la// yon tan ldan pa rnams la 'khrul pa tshol// nyes pa 'di dag las
235a6(dkon brtsegs): la dga' ba'i yin// byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas// de ni pha rol dag la chos ston tsha// blo nyams pas na mngon par shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin// gnod/ 
235a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// las ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed// dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed// byas pa gang yin chud ni gsen mi byed// lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig/ 
235a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dzin pa// de ni blo can dag gis spro ba yin// gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la// dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu spang // de lta bas na mkhas mis de rtag tu// las ngan dag ni rnam par spang/ 
235b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang 'thub dbang rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yi// bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
235b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongasu spangs nas las ngan pa de dag rtsom pa de dag no shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman pa
235b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lagaso// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa de de bzhin te/ de
235b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems de dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongasu spangs nas las dngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung shing shes rab
235b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no// byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o// byams pa byang chub sems dang pa'i gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong
235b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongasu tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/ 
235b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / spongs pas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/ khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas
235b8(dkon brtsegs): phye ba ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten bya bas spags pa ste/ byang chub sems
236a1(dkon brtsegs): dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi
236a2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin/ bkur bsti byas pa ma yin gyi/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pa
236a3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam// 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'chad pa des ni nga la bkur bsti byas/ bla mar byas/ 
236a4(dkon brtsegs): ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhen// byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/ dngos por yongs su
236a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa ga la te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtso/ 
236a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas spags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa yang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de tsog
236a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir// byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang
236a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongasu gang bar 'gyur ba'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub
236b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu gling gang
236b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pas rje su yid rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/ 
236b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas pa yin no// gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyes par 'gyur// 
236b4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi las de ni dka' ba'i las dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / 'ji dag rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing
236b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa don du gnyer zhing brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson
236b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya zhing shes rab yongasu btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
236b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzil dga' ba dang / las la dga' ba rnams kyi nongs dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
236b8(dkon brtsegs): dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas pa
237a1(dkon brtsegs): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdu na nyi shu po 'di dag tu
237a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par bya'o// rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te mthar thug par yang mi 'gyuraro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba tshe 'di nyid la
237a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas pa dang / bzod pa las yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba dang / de'i mi mdza' ba rnams yid rang bar 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur/ 
237a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / de la bdud kyi 'khor kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa dang khon du
237a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang 'gyed pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thab pa/ dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i la/ sa mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang / bag med par
237a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams legs legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / mdo sde lung ma
237a7(dkon brtsegs): mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis yongasu spangs par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur
237a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der the tshom du 'gyur/ 
237b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / de la ma khom pa brgyad pa de dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ byams pa nyi shu po de dag na smras pa la dga'
237b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyes dmigs rnams 'dir bsdus pa yin te/ de dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te// de ni tshe 'dir bde bar ma
237b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// bzod dang ring shing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas// de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste// spos spyad de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// 
237b4(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur// de yi dge dba'i chos skyes chud za bar 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes dpa 'di dag go// de ni nams kyang dge ba mi skyed de// 'chi
237b5(dkon brtsegs): kar tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang // ngan song 'gro ba'i sa ni byed par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dang / go/ mi mdzes pa dang blta na mi sdug dang / de ni rtag tu
237b6(dkon brtsegs): rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur// de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyu te/ spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas shing // lung mnos ma byas
237b7(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde thos mi 'gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam par spong // spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang phrad par 'gyur// dka' ba'i theg pas rnam/ 
237b8(dkon brtsegs): par dga' 'gyur zhing // mi 'dod pa yi tshig rnams rgyun du thos// spros spyod de yo nyes pa 'di dag go/ byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der// yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing // rtag tu nges ni/ 
238a1(dkon brtsegs): the tshom rnyed par 'gyur// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur// de ni dal ba ldan zhing mchog mi 'gyur// de la 'dod pa 'di
238a2(dkon brtsegs): dag rtag 'byung ste// spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go/ de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang // bgegasu 'gyur bas myur du 'thob mi 'gyur// brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung // 
238a3(dkon brtsegs): spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go// mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni// spros pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya// spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed pa sla// de lta bas na spros la dag/ 
238a4(dkon brtsegs): mi bya gang na spros pa 'am rtsod pa yod pa las// dpag nga tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro ba mchog/ gang na nyon mongs yo dad pa de dag tu// yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya/ 
238a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams// sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed cig/ khyed la zhing med zhing / las tsheng bya med// gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung bar spros
238a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed la chung ma bu dang bu mo med// khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin// bran pho bran mo med cing dbang phyug med// rab tu byung nas rtsod par ma byed cing // zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa yi// 
238a7(dkon brtsegs): ngur smig gos rnams dad pas blangs nas ni// zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhi bar byos// spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa bskyed// mi bzad sems ni sbrul gdugs 'dra ba bsrungs// spros la spyod
238a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang mi ring 'gyur// de lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus bskyed// tshogs pa gcig phyir spros par byed na ni// sdug bsngal gsod dang
238b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba ci yang rung // go rar brdeg dang bsdigs pa de dag ni// 'jig rten 'di na gnas pa rnams la 'byung // tshogs par gyur la nyes pa 'di dkon// tshogs gyur bag la nyal la 'phel ba med
238b2(dkon brtsegs): tshetshogs gyur rnams la dga' bar 'byung gyur// mkhas pa su zhig tshegs pa bskyed mi byed// glags tshel dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur// nams kyang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te// 
238b3(dkon brtsegs): de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung // spros pa spangs pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin// theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dag 'gyur zhing // las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byung nas ni// stobs dang
238b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig/ brtan pa gang / yin des na bzod pa bskyed// spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon// mang chags// nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus// rtag tu/ 
238b5(dkon brtsegs): spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur// su zhig don ga nyer des ni bzod pa bskyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
238b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs de tsam du gleng ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub
238b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skye bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa lnga
238b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi lam 'di lta bu 'di dag zos na skye bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur ba 'byung ba
239a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni nyung ngo // byams pa gang dag sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang / gcig la gcig the tshozab mang
239a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni phal che/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed// kha ton du mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ 
239a3(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par mi byed/ de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa de shas ches pas yon tan de dag dang / phan yon de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tshom za
239a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/ 'chang // bar mi byed/ de dag gi drung du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha lugasu 'dug nas 'di skad du/ mdo sde 'di dag ni rang
239a5(dkon brtsegs): bzer byas pa yin te/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa
239a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa bzlog par byed do// de dag de ltar mos pa bzlog pas mdo sde zab mo dag ni 'dod cing the tshom du 'gyur te/ lung nod par mi
239a7(dkon brtsegs): byed/ kha ton mi byed/ mi blun po de dag gis yon tan de dag thos na/ 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni spyang bar mi nus snyam du shes so// de nas bcom ldan/ 
239a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
239b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba zhig yid la bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur/ 
239b2(dkon brtsegs): na bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bkra/ 
239b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// byams pa sems bskyed pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag ni byis pa'i
239b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa ma yin/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i se mas bskyed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/ byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu
239b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag yin// bcu gang zhe na/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
239b6(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar mi nus te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'tshe ba yongasu spangs te sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la
239b7(dkon brtsegs): mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur bstis ma
239b8(dkon brtsegs): gos pas bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / brjed pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang / zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad
240a1(dkon brtsegs): la bla ma bzhin du gus pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la nges par gyur pa'i bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / ma 'dres pas
240a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang / mtshan ma yongasu spangs te sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po ni
240a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag yin te/ sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur
240a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang nga ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam
240a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni nga mtshar lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legaso zhes bya ba byin
240a6(dkon brtsegs): te kun dga' bo legaso legaso// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkra/ 
240a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri/ 
240a8(dkon brtsegs): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa
240b1(dkon brtsegs): las lhag pa'i bsam pa skul pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo nu ba ban de ye shes
240b2(dkon brtsegs): sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing shus te/ gtan la phab pa// sho lo ka drug brgya bam po gnyis so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri prad+d+hi/ nA ma ma dA ya na su tra/ bodas/ 
240b3(dkon brtsegs): du/ 'phags pa lag bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
240b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 
240b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lags bzangs shes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
240b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas byung nas// 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
240b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po lag bzangs kyis bcom ldan 'dra
240b8(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur/ 
241a1(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sem
241a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po lag bzangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir/ pha rol
241a3(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
241a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtangan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems
241a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du/ yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol
241a6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'dadi la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod pa rnams yongasu tshol gyi/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin// 
241a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid yin gyi mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no// de srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/ nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa byin te brjod pa dang sgra dang tshigasu bcad
241a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin/ lan du phan 'dog su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/ tshul 'chos ma yin/ kha bsag byed pa ma
241b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ brnyas pa ma yin// sbyin gnas sam sbyin gnas ma yin pa 'am/ mngon par grags pa 'am mngon par grags pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am tshul khrims 'chal
241b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'am 'dris pa'am ma 'dres pa'am/ mdza' ba 'am mi mdza' ba yang rung ste/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod par byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po
241b3(dkon brtsegs): dang dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na'ang rung nyung ngu sbyin/ mang du bdog na yang rung mang du sbyin/ ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/ gya nom pa bdag na yang gya nom pa sbyin no// lag bzangs
241b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang / rlabs po che'i sems dang / rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du/ ka kA ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems
241b5(dkon brtsegs): dang rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no// de zas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i
241b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zas sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no// gos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
241b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rdzogs pa'i
241b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa sbyin no// spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsrung thams cad thob par bya// 
242a1(dkon brtsegs): bya nga'i byor sus sbyin no// me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis teg blan med pa thob par bya
242a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir me tog rnams sbyin no// phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can nyes par spyod pa 'dring ba'i dri ma gzham pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin// drug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems
242a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no// gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyan mongs pa'i gdung pa thams cad / 
242a4(dkon brtsegs): bapar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no// lha dam 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lha ma
242a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cadalha dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde ba sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin/ 
242a6(dkon brtsegs): stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed par dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir stan sbyin no// 
242a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang gnas dang mgon dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no// phru tog dang / bum pa dang / 'tshegs
242a8(dkon brtsegs): chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu thob par bya ba'i phyir phru tog dang bum pa dang / 'tshog chas sbyin no// sems can thams cad zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge
242b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dga' thub kyi nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin na// sems can thams cad skyes pa/ 
242b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams la rgyan sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha'
242b3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam/ lam rnams la mar me sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
242b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/ chos la mchod pa/ rnams sam/ dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la la me'i dbyangs sgra'i sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad na
242b5(dkon brtsegs): byang dang tshul khrims dang spyad pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob pa bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang ches gos sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i stobs sa
242b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir snod chags sbyin pa sbyin// sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ smyu gu dang / snag tsha dang / glegs bu dang / chos kyi
242b7(dkon brtsegs): khri stan sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa byin no// sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsu
242b8(dkon brtsegs): gyis dang / bdud rtsi dbyings kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir sa bzhi sbyin pa sbyin no// sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten mthon po/ 
243a1(dkon brtsegs): sku gzugs mthon po byed do// bdog pa lta na sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myur zhing yongasu nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin
243a2(dkon brtsegs): babyin// sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no// sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po ya
243a3(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu mi gcod par sbyin no// sems can thams cad snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyin pa
243a4(dkon brtsegs): byin no// sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed pa tham sa cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang / gnod par mi nus pa 'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
243a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gnod par sbyin pa byin// lag bzangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med kyi/ nga 'byor pa med par gyur na/ de 'jig rten gyi khams thams ca
243a6(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mthuyas shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing sman la smon la ma 'debs te/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag/ 
243a7(dkon brtsegs): byin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung / nus pa dang mi ldan pa yang rung ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems cacan bdag gi bde bar sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang / yang dag
243a8(dkon brtsegs): bar ldan par 'gyur cing 'bad pa med pa dang 'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin du yong su rdzogs shing / bsam pa ma/ 
243b1(dkon brtsegs): lus par yong su rdzogs nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig/ bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing sman la smon lam 'dasas
243b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debaso// dbyig gi ri dang gser gyi ri dang / gos kyi ri dang / yo byad
243b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi ri dang / bza' pa rgya mtsho dang / btung ba rgya mtsho dang / gnas legs par byas pa/ legs par gnas pa/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa dag kyang sbyin par 'dod
243b4(dkon brtsegs): cing smon la smon lam 'debaso// 'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad
243b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba gang yi na ba zang zing sbyin pa'am/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 'am/ chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de thams cad la tha na dus gsum
243b6(dkon brtsegs): du yang mngon par dga' zhing rje su yid rang ngo // gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na yang rang gi zas skal sbyin pa 'am/ grogasu 'gyur ba 'am/ kun du btsal ba'i thabs
243b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de la ston par 'gyuraro// chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do// de sbyin par 'dod par gyur pa na yang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams
243b8(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang sangs rgyas/ 
244a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// sbyin pa dag byin nas kyang sbyin pa de sem
244a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad
244a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo'o// gal te sbyin pa dang gtong ba
244a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan paradagur na de 'di ltar yang dag par srab ste/ dus dus sa 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang chags pa dang / ser sna dang / 
244a5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'jigs pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang bsal bar rtsol 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / rnam par gtong ba la slob pa
244a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur// lag bzangs byang chub
244a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub smon lam 'debs pa gang
244a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang / gtong ba chen po dang / rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
244b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la dam pa chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang / dam pa rna chos kyi char gtang ba 'dang ba dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi
244b2(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa dang / bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin dang gtong ba dang / rnam par gtang ba thams
244b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nang na mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshigs chu ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myu
244b4(dkon brtsegs): du skyen par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed de// lagasas byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rna dmas kyis bslangs pa na yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam bcwa
244b5(dkon brtsegs): nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid kyi sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur/ ba dang / mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongasu ma sbyin pa'i
244b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/ sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang nying lag yongasu mi gtong ba ma yin// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 
244b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na pha ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas/ bu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / 
244b8(dkon brtsegs): zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas nas/ bdog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sem
245a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/ ji ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed cing ma spong la sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bran pa dang / bran mong/ 
245a2(dkon brtsegs): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spongs ste/ sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa yang sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gas pa byed do// 
245a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram sems can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma yin no// lag bzangs de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gnod
245a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/ byang chub semasangs dpa' rnams kyis yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ngag la 'gyur/ lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshub
245a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ 2 ga bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog rga/ phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang / sems can gzhan
245a6(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / sems can gzhan rnams la mi brdeg mi sod cing / gsod pa la rjesu yid rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang ma byin par mi len la ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing ma byin
245a7(dkon brtsegs): par len pa la rjesu yid rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa mi byed la/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing 'dod pa la log par g.yem
245a8(dkon brtsegs): pal rjesu yid rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang brdzun mi sprul brdzun zer du mi 'jug cing / brdzun smra ba la rje su yid rang bar mi byed do// srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung la chang 'thung
245b1(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'jug cing / chang 'thung ba la rje su yi rang bar mi byed do// de bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo// 
245b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang / 'ching ba dang 'ching du 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / go rar gzhug tu 'jug pa dang / brdeg pa dang / brdeg tu 'jug pa dang / 
245b3(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa dag spang ba dang / dor ba dang bsal bar 'bad pa byed do// de de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te/ 
245b4(dkon brtsegs): mi lhod par gnas shing bsgrub bo// de bzhin du phra ma'i tshogs dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spang ba dang // dor ba dang bsal bar 'bad par byed do// de srog chags
245b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma lta ba bzhin no// bu gcig pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhi/ ti/ ji ltar pha ma dang bu gcig po phangs pa bdag la 'khru/ 
245b6(dkon brtsegs): yang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/ lag pa'am/ bong ba 'am/ dbyug pa 'am/ ral gri'am mangs brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar bsad par mi bya zhing / ji ltar
245b7(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bu gcig pa phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du bdag srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis lag pa 'am// bong bskyes klu'am mangs brdegs kyang slar
245b8(dkon brtsegs): brdeg par mi bya/ gsod kyang slar bsad par mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob po// dper na pha 'am/ ma 'am/ bu gcig pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyu ste 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur
246a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bzhin du lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' yang srog chags thams cad dang / sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang / yod bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i srog gcod
246a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad/ 
246a3(dkon brtsegs): mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs
246a4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i brdzun du smra ba spangs pa tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa 'i tshul khrims brdzun du smra ba spang ba la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i
246a5(dkon brtsegs): chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chang 'thung bsngal la dgod pa'i phyir ro// de'i zhing rmed pa dang / zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs
246a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'tshang ba dang / 'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams
246a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro// de'i go rar 'jug pa dang / go rar gzhug du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag
246a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bsal ba'i phyir ro// de'i brdeg pa dang / brdeg du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyis
246b1(dkon brtsegs): mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa dang / gcod du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can thams cad lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya/ 
246b2(dkon brtsegs): phyi de kri cigi spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// de'i tshig rtsub bo spangs pa'i tshul khrims na/ yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lamang/ 
246b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ tshig bzung bar 'os par thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyiraro// de'i 'chi bas 'jigs
246b4(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa yongasu skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems can tha mas cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi da ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
246b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chud za ba yongasu skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni/ sems
246b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni
246b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'gug pa gtong bar byed pa dang / gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/ rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'ching ba/ 
246b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grel ba dang / 'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni/ dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro// de'i khyim nas 'brug
247a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i brdeg pa mi 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis
247a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa zab par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i gcod pa bzlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun du bsrung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir// de'i ma slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul
247a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i slob pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing
247a4(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phag das pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mo phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir// de'i tshig snyan pa dang 'jam pa smra bo'i tshul
247a5(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du' / bden pa'i ngag thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i kun du 'thun po smra ba'i tshul khrims ni tshar mchod
247a6(dkon brtsegs): cing bzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'du
247a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
247a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa'
247b1(dkon brtsegs): pobo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por mi phyed cing sral shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus
247b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod
247b3(dkon brtsegs): pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed bri
247b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gas dam du dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir// 
247b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dkon ma ga gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ste ngas par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni/ 
247b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur ba gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams cad la skal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims nis
247b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu pa chos kyi sprini thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sa sor 'dor ba dang / sdig pa thams cad la spang ba'i tshul khrim
247b8(dkon brtsegs): ni bag chags kyi 'chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni pa
248a1(dkon brtsegs): tu byin pa thams cad yongs su bskang bathob par bya ba phyir// de 'dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / 
248a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gtogs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad dang / sems can 'gro ba thams cad du seng ba 'jig rten gyi khams
248a3(dkon brtsegs): sems cad du gtags pa/ 'das pa dang / mangs pa dang / dgrang byung ba thams cad kyi dag pa'i rnab thams cad la dus med yab tshul khrums ni drang chub kyi chags mtha'am ma sha
248a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsags pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro// dngo'i dus gsum du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sman pa'i chu/ khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa la 'jug pa
248a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir// de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsab thams cad \u0f7f/ sa pa'i byang chub thob par yongasu bsngo ba'i tshul khri/ ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs dang mi 'jigs pa
248a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha ma dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis ma non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// 
248a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'jigs pa dang / sbags pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
248a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i rgyal po dang chom rkun dang / me dang chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongasu bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin
248b1(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po yongasu bsrung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rje su bsngag/ 
248b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i pha rol gyi sems rje su bsrung ba dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / 
248b3(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang / pha rol gyi sems rjesu bsrung ba dang 'thun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims
248b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / pha ral gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang / yang / dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems ma
248b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i 'di'i don dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don
248b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang / brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag par bskyed pa'i tshul khrims dang dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa
248b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul
248b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// de'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par 'dod pa dang / lhag par spyad par 'dod pa na yang
249a1(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad bskal pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams/ 
249a2(dkon brtsegs): dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / lhag
249a3(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa dang / yang dag par blangs pa dang / lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad bskal pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs
249a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs dpar bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsdu bar byed do// gal te tshul khrim
249a5(dkon brtsegs): de ma zhig pa dang / ma ral ba dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltarayang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad/ 
249a6(dkon brtsegs): du yang mi dge ba spang ba dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasu
249a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems/ 
249a8(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu son pa dang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa 'di nyid de dag gi dge ba'i
249b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyad pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ 
249b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed pa
249b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i tshul khrims lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin// 
249b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan// tshegs chung ngu dang sdug bsngal chung ngas myur du sbyin par
249b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' dzi/ ra bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce
249b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gis rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam chung ma 'phrog gam/ brdzun du smra ba'am/ 
249b7(dkon brtsegs): phra ma'am/ ngag rtsub po'om/ tshag kyal ba smra ba'am/ gshe 'am/ gsod dam/ 'dzin nam/ brdeg gam/ gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing srar mi khro ste/ shar gnyer
249b8(dkon brtsegs): zhing khon du 'dzin par mi byed// de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang / srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag
250a1(dkon brtsegs): gi 'bras bu ni 'di dag yin/ de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang rang gi las rnam par smin pa rang gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan/ 
250a2(dkon brtsegs): la slar gnod pa bya zhing slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du semaso// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gal te bdag gi
250a3(dkon brtsegs): srog gcod pa'am/ bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa 'am/ chung ma 'phrog pa'am/ brdzun du smra ba 'am/ phra ma 'am/ ngag rtsub po 'am/ tshig kyal pa smras la gshe ba'am/ gsod pa'o// 
250a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ gcod pa yang rung ste/ gzhan dag la slar gnod pa byas sam/ slar khro 'am/ ra gnyer zhing khon du bzung na slar gnod pa byas pa dang / slar
250a5(dkon brtsegs): khros pa dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du bzung ba sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa yi/ da du mi 'ong ba 'dis bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / 
250a6(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rgyu 'thun pa brgya 'gyur ram/ stong 'gyur ram/ de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro snyamo// lag bzangs/ 
250a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ srog yod pas srog gcod par 'gyur/ rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/ rna ba'i dbang po yod pas brdzun du smra
250a8(dkon brtsegs): zos par 'gyur/ phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/ lus yod pas 'dren pa dang / 'chi ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / brdeg pa dang gcod par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid
250b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal gyi dngos pa sdug bsngal gyi gzhi/ srog gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / lus blangs par gyur na/ ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du bcu
250b2(dkon brtsegs): pabar bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// 
250b3(dkon brtsegs): chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/ me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni cheb rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni chos nyid/ de ni rang bzhin no// de bzhin du srog tham
250b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/ dgod pa'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can no// dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug
250b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal myong ba'i chos can// lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/ de ni ngo bo nyid/ de ni ches nyid
250b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni rang bzhin no// srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/ 'god pa'i chos cana'agog pa'i chos can/ zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang / dbang po drug sdug bsngal gyi chos can/ sdug bsngal
250b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/ sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pas ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa'am/ slar khro ba'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du zu
250b8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid 'di ni chos nyid/ 'di ni rang bzhin snyamo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste bdag gi mig dang / rna ba dang // 
251a1(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/ gzhan dag gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag
251a2(dkon brtsegs): med cing bdag gi med pa yin na/ mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med cing / yid bdag gi med pa la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / 
251a3(dkon brtsegs): lce dang / lus dang yid bdag med cing / bdag gi med pas ji ltar dga' ba 'am/ rje su chags pa 'am/ yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ slar gnod par byed pa/ 
251a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ slar khro ba 'am/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snya mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa'i 'di ltar slob ste/ 'di lta ste mir skyes pa'i sdug
251a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ni nyung zhing chung gi 'di ga kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la ches bzod par dka' ba yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
251a6(dkon brtsegs): yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin/ bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang / slar khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khong du bzung
251a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya snyam// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang bdag gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang / bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas/ gzhan
251a8(dkon brtsegs): dag la phyir gnod par byed cing phyir khro ste/ shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa yang mi rigs te/ cha ma yin na bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan par 'dod
251b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ yid dam bcas pa chen pos yid dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongasu bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang
251b2(dkon brtsegs): dgos te/ mi bzod pa dang / phyir gnod pa byed pa dang / phyir khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang / 'phel ba dang yongasu rdzogs par
251b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur gyi/ bzod pa dang phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang / phyir mi khro ba dang / shar gnyer zhing khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs shing 'phel te yongasu rdzogs
251b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur snyam mo// lag bzangs rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bskang bar 'dod pas/ mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gangs gaHgzhan dag
251b5(dkon brtsegs): la slar gnod par mi bya/ slar khro bar mi bya/ shar gte ra zhing kho na bzung bar mi bya na mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de spyos sam/ brgyad dam/ 
251b6(dkon brtsegs): smad dam/ mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang / 
251b7(dkon brtsegs): du len no// de drud bshal tam/ bcings sam/ bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / skad cig gcig la ma rig pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir
251b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len to// de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can gyi rje su 'chags pa dang / khang khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no// 
252a1(dkon brtsegs): de rna ba bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no// de sa
252a2(dkon brtsegs): bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing / bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du le/ 
252a3(dkon brtsegs): no/ de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du le no// 
252a4(dkon brtsegs): de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sam/ das dang / sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag brkang pa sbyin pa sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i
252a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir bzod tsang dang du len no// de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang nying lag yongasu rdzogs/ 
252a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len no// de'i mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig g.yung drung thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 
252a7(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing dang du len no// de mgo bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du/ 
252a8(dkon brtsegs): len no// de bzod pa 'di dag dang ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams
252b1(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar
252b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba
252b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed// / 
252b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bzod pa 'di dag dang / ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mnyam das pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa/ dar slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag
252b5(dkon brtsegs): par slob ste dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang mi bzo da pa dang / mi snyam par ma byas pa spangs pa dang / dor ba dang / bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su
252b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang bzod pa dang / mi snyam pa la slob pa dang / mngon por 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa
252b7(dkon brtsegs): na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang
252b8(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag
253a1(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad zag pa med
253a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i bzod
253a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni bzod pa kun du spyod pa dge ba dang / bzod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin no// lag bzangs/ 
253a4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde da ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
253a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dang / 'ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems
253a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sems can mtha' yas so// de lta
253a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin/ mu yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go
253a8(dkon brtsegs): bgos la sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing / mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang
253b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dag bag med par 'gyur tam/ sems gzhan du gyur tam/ gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du
253b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa
253b3(dkon brtsegs): dag skye ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad
253b4(dkon brtsegs): cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa brgyas par 'gyur ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa yang dag par rje su mthong la gzhi de las
253b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dga' bar yang dag par rje su mthu/ nga bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyurab/ 'i brtson 'grus sreg gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam
253b6(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba
253b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhom par 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur
253b8(dkon brtsegs): na/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 
254a1(dkon brtsegs): ma sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'dod pa mi 'byur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / dud 'grob skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / gshin rdo 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal
254a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// 
254a3(dkon brtsegs): lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig
254a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa'i sems kyi skal cig gcig tsam dang 'brel ba/ bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyis/ dad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'phel la/ dge ba
254a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pargyas par 'gyur na/ gang shig ma 'ong shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med pa rnamasu sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas
254a6(dkon brtsegs): shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du btsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
254a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par slob ste/ gang zhig rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan nam nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa 'phel la
254a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yon tan mtha' yas shing yon tan mu med pa/ stobs mtha'
254b1(dkon brtsegs): yas shing stabs mu med pa mtha' dag chub pa yongasu rdzogs pa 'dod pa dang / smos pa dang smon pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bag med par gyur ram gnyid kyis log kyang / rgyu bzhi dang / 
254b2(dkon brtsegs): rkyen bzhi dang / dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi sems kyi
254b3(dkon brtsegs): skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig lo dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skyes pa dang
254b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yasadang mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' na bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad
254b5(dkon brtsegs): cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po ma yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang / rdzogs pa'i byung chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa
254b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi yang dag par rje su mthong la/ gni de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par ming ka/ 'a bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus su// 
254b7(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam// rgya mtsho chen po bzhin shar phyogs kyi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon la/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi mtha'
254b8(dkon brtsegs): yas mngon zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas mu med pa bzhi po de dag la ni mtha' dang mu yod pa ma yin na bdag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba byang/ 
255a1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi chogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'phel zhing rgyas na/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba la srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams pa
255a2(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam mo// lag bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par sleb ste/ gang dag seng ge dang / stag dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / bya rgod dang / khrung khrung dang / bya
255a3(dkon brtsegs): rig dang / 'ug pa dang / sran bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang du gyur pa de dag gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/ bdag mir gyur bzhin du sreg sa
255a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyurababartson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo// lag bzangs ga/ na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob
255a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ ma brgya'am/ mi stong gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid gas shing thob na/ bdag gis 'diba'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
255a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
255a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing brnyes pa 'gyur na bdag gis 'dir srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam me// lag
255a8(dkon brtsegs): bzangs gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ sangs rgyas ston pa'o zhes ston na/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyis bshad pa'am/ byang
255b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas bshad pa 'am/ zan bsnyon pa rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos gang yin pa dag dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed/ 
255b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sa
255b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thob par 'gyur ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thobs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag mgo dang gos la me
255b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du nyan no// nges par bya/ dad do// rtog go// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru shing bzhi na du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog
255b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang de mgo dang gis la ma 'bar ba bzhin du rtug par/ rgyun du chos de dag 'dzin no// yongasu shes par byed// / 'chang ngo // klog go/ rje su sems so// gzhan dag
255b6(dkon brtsegs): la ston no// go bar byed do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de bcol yang rung / ma bcol kyang rung / sems can thams
255b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi don dang ci bya ba chos dang ldan pa 'jig rten 'di la bde ba'am/ 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba dag la rang gi lus nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du 'gyur bar byed do// 'di lta
255b8(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na 'byung ba chen po bsgribs pa med pa yongasu bzung ba med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni sems can thams cad la nye bar spyod pa dang yo byad du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lag bzang
