256a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang mang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi nye bar spyod pa dang ye byang du gyur par byed de/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'du/ 
256a2(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / rgan pa dang / nad pa dang / mgon med pa rnams la yongasu spyad par bya ba dang / sri zhu bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas/ 
256a3(dkon brtsegs): bye brag tu 'gyur// de mge dang gisal me 'bar ba bzhin du gzhan gyi sems dang gzhan gyi snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig da su 'thun dang 'thun par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'ged pa dang
256a4(dkon brtsegs): glegs byed pa dang / gragasu gyur pa dang / dge ba'i/ thun pa dang / ngan 'thun pas rdzas zhugs nas mngan dad par byas shing bsdus te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'as
256a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'phrul lo// 'ged do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'as pa rnams ni ring sangs rgyas kyi thig pa la'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub
256a6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la'os pa rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud do// 'dul lo 'god do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du sa
256a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rgyu dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ched dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi ched dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang / dge ba'i ched la grang ba yang khyad du gsod la/ chab
256a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bkres pa dang / skam pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / ldog sbrul gyis reg pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi las dang / 
256b1(dkon brtsegs): ngal ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gnyid dang / mi dga' ba dang / lus dang sreg kyang khyad du gsod do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
256b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched la lha'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// mi'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// yi dgas kyi
256b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do// mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis
256b4(dkon brtsegs): bzlog kyang de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bskang ba thob par bya ba dang / spyod lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i
256b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus brtan zhing brtul ba brtan no// de brtson 'gru sa 'di dang rtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang / brtsam par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba
256b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yong su rdzogs
256b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / rtsom pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can tham/ 
256b8(dkon brtsegs): cad dgrel ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsdu/ 
257a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// gal te brtson 'grus 'di ma nyams pa dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na/ de 'di ltar yang dag par
257a2(dkon brtsegs): slob ste dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang snyom las dang le lo spang ba dang / dor ba dang bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ chung zad chung zad du yang brtson 'grus dang
257a3(dkon brtsegs): brtul ba la slob pa dang / mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing spyod lug par mi 'gyuraro// 2
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bzangs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems/ bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon pa dang // 
257a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi brtson 'grus dge ba dang / rtsol ba dge ba grangs med cing / dpag tu med pa yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'jig/ 
257a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob
257a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang brtson pa dag pa thams cad kyi mchog yin no// de ni dam pa yin// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems
257a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung nga dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du sbyin par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// / bam
257b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig
257b2(dkon brtsegs): gis gzugs rnams mthang na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtag su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdam pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang / 
257b3(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjesu zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do// de bzhin
257b4(dkon brtsegs): du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tsher ba/ dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg/ bya rnams reg pa dang / yid kyis chos rnams rnam par
257b5(dkon brtsegs): shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin zhing mngon rtag su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang
257b6(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjesu zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing bsrung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do// 
257b7(dkon brtsegs): de 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas dang zhi gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro// rnam par mi 'dor ro// de la mi rgad
257b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mu tser mi smra ba dang / tshig mi mang ba dang / mig mi g.yeng ba dang / dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / tom col med pa dang / lus 'khrul pa med pa dang / ngag 'khrul
258a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med dang / sems 'khrul pa med pa dang / dben yang nga/ maud ben yang rung su lam mnyams pa mnan// bka' ba dang btung ba dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / gnas dang / 
258a2(dkon brtsegs): napa'i gsos sman dang yo byad ji lta bu yang rung bdag gis chog shes shing gas sra ba dang / dgangs pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / cho ga dang spyad yul dge ba dang / 'du 'jims dben pa'i spyad
258a3(dkon brtsegs): yul yin/ thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med do// ma khengs ma dud pa yin/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stod pa dang / smod pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang
258a4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba dang / 'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ mkha sa mi 'dud pa yin/ mdza' bo dang dgra dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang 'thun pa dang / yid du mi'ong
258a5(dkon brtsegs): / bdang ma 'thun pa dang / 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang / dben pa dang yang long rnam la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de/ mkhengs mdud pa yin/ 
258a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sdug pa dang ma thug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang ma 'thun pa med pa yin/ swa dang / dra dang / raM dang / reg bya dang chos sdug pa dang / ma sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang mi 'thun pa
258a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin na// de 'ad pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun du bsrang nas lag par rnam par rtag pasar myang ba yin pas gang rus lta bur yod la byed// 'dod pa rnams na dgra mang ba'i phyi
258a8(dkon brtsegs): sA gu lta khung yod la byed// 'dad pa rnams ni grangs na sdug bsngal la yong su bta na bde ba'i phyir na me lta bur yid la byad do// 'dad pa rnams nogand pa mang ban byor shing gi dri ma'i shing rtags
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir spong ba lta bur yod la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni skad cig tsam zhig nor bas dga' ba'i phyir rmilam lta bur yid la byed// 
258b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bu yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni shes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang / 
258b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro log par ltung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil pa lta bur yid la byed do// 'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa dang / skem pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tsha chu lta
258b4(dkon brtsegs): bur yid la byed do// de 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang / bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba
258b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yong su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med dpyod pa med pa
258b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas zhing dran pa dang shes bzhin
258b7(dkon brtsegs): can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste bsam gtan gsum bsgrubs te gnaso// 
258b8(dkon brtsegs): de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid na pa dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin btang snyoms dang dran pa yong su dag pa/ 
259a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can
259a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med
259a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can rnams sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba yang med pa yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de gzugs la/ 
259a4(dkon brtsegs): rags pa'i 'du shes yid la mi byed cing na mkha' la zhi dba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas na mkha' mtha' yasaskye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par shes pa la
259a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de ci yangamed pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas ci yang med pa'i
259a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched bsgrubs te gnas so// de 'du shes med 'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par bsgrubs te gnas
259a7(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang / rgyun ring ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du she/ 
259a8(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can gyi lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te/ 
259b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// de 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// den pa dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyis dmigs kyi 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de kha zas
259b2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu tshol ba dang 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang gnod pa'i rgyur yid la byed pas kha zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgrubs te gnas so// de khyim dang grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi 'jig rten
259b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'byor pa dang 'brel ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pa dang / nags tshal rmad du byung ba dang / kun dga' ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pas 'jig rten
259b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes bsgrubs te/ nas so// de nang gzugasu 'du shes pas phyi rol gyis zugs chu ngu kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams
259b5(dkon brtsegs): la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye ma ched dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs gzhan med pa kha dog
259b6(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de shi ba'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam chus
259b7(dkon brtsegs): thal ba yang med pa de byed pa'i 'du shes dang / zhigs pa la phye ma yang med pa dang / rdul du gyur pa la rdul kyang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgom shing bsgrubs te/ nang
259b8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa bsgrubs
260a1(dkon brtsegs): te gnas so// de de bzhin du dung gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dag bzang po dang / kha dag ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas/ 
260a2(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon pa tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid
260a3(dkon brtsegs): la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar ba chad
260a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas za ral gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang / bdun ra ba dang / brgyad pa bsgrubs te gnas so// des 'di mtha'
260a5(dkon brtsegs): yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par sar bsgra bas te gnas so// de chu dang mi dang rlung dang / sprin po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nam
260a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par chu dang / zad par me dang / zad par rlung dang / zad par sngon po dang / zad par ser po dang / zad par dam
260a7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / zad par dkar po dang / zad par na mkha' dang / zad par rnam par shes pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de snyams par 'jug pa na dge ba'i rtsab thams cad la dmigs pa la sem
260a8(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'dogs te/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la dmigs pa dang dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
260b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku dang rgyan la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang / sngan rgya sman lam la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya
260b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bkod pa la dmigs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams
260b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogaso// de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do// sa'i khams la
260b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas chu'i khams la mi gnas/ me'i khams la mig/ nas/ rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi
260b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam gtan byed do// de ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya/ 
260b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la dga'o// de bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa na yang sems can thams
260b7(dkon brtsegs): cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
260b8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byas pa dang / langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can
261a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chas zad ya su rdzogs par bya
261a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// gal te bsam gtan de dang ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du/ 
261a3(dkon brtsegs): yang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ma yin pa spang ba dang / der ba dang bsal bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcog tu bya/ 
261a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sems mnyam par bzhag par slob pa dang / ma na par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang shum
261a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// lag bza sa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang
261a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems sgom pa dang / byang chub tu smon lam dang / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs
261a7(dkon brtsegs): med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / 
261a8(dkon brtsegs): mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par
261b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no// lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dang / 
261b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa'
261b3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed ce na/ lag bzangs 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang / gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/ thos pa 'dzi
261b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ don shes pa/ bshad pa she das pa/ dpyod pa can ji ltar thos pa'i don la yongasu rtog pa / de dag la bsnyen cing brten te/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de thos
261b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ched dang / bshad pa'i ched dang / don gyi ched dang / den la yong su rtog pa'i ched dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan/ po la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i ched la/ grang ba yang khyad du
261b6(dkon brtsegs): gsod tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyis rag pa dang / gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi
261b7(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/ rtsub pa/ mi bzod pa/ srog 'chad par 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do// de chos rnams la ni rin po che'i 'du shes nye bar gnas/ chos smra ba rnams la
261b8(dkon brtsegs): ni rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/ chos nyan pa la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/ chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par sreg phyogs par 'du shes/ chos kyi yan tan mang du byed pa la ni srogs
262a1(dkon brtsegs): yod par 'du shes/ chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la/ mang du byed/ 
262a2(dkon brtsegs): cing yongasu rtog pa na/ khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/ phung po rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dus
262a3(dkon brtsegs): dang theg pa rnams dang / dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes so// khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/ khams ni gnyis te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/ 
262a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po de dag go/ 'dus byas kyi khams ni gang / 'du sa ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste/ sku dab dang / gnas pa dang / 'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi
262a5(dkon brtsegs): khams shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ skye ba med pa/ dang / gnas pa med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni 'du sa ma byas kyi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar 'dus byas dang / 
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes// gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/ dge ba'i khams dang / mi dge ba'i khams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams te/ khams
262a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag go/ dge ba'i khams ni gang / mi dge ba'i khams ni gang / lung du ma bstan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/ gang ci yang rung ste chags pa med pa dang / chags pa
262a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti mug med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni/ 
262b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// gang ci yang rung ste/ chags pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gang ci yang rung ste/ gti
262b2(dkon brtsegs): mug dang / gti mug dang ldan pa de ni/ mi dge ba'i khams shes bya'o// de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes// gzhan yang
262b3(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams so// 'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/ sems can
262b4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lhan dmas dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dag
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag 'thun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / smen/ 
262b6(dkon brtsegs): lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams shes bya'o// gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don rnams dang / tshang
262b7(dkon brtsegs): chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes
262b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / gti
263a1(dkon brtsegs): mug pa dang / yid kyis sman pa dang / sman lam 'debs pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams shes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/ nam pa
263a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / 'du shes
263a3(dkon brtsegs): med 'du shes med mon skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ gang de dag la 'dun pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug pa dang / yid kyis smon pa dang / spen lam 'debs pa dang / 
263a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i dmas shes bya ste/ de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes // gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/ bzhi ga zhen/ 
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzug sa med pa'i khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams sa bya ba'i khams bzhi pa de dag ste/ de ltar khams bzhi
263a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gnod sems kyi khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang / mngon par 'byung ba/ 
263a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / gnod sems med pa'i khams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so// gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/ drug gang zhe na/ 
263a8(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams te/ khams drug po de dag rab tu shes// de la sa'i khams
263b1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi rtag pa/ mo brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / ma la
263b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o// sdug
263b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa ste/ de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yong su rtog pa na/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i
263b4(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang / 'du shes kyi phung po dang / 'du byed kyi phung po/ dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ phung po lnga rab tu shes so// gzugs ni lbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang / ngan pa
263b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / tshor ba na du chu bur lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / ring dum gnas pa dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu dang / ngan pa dang
263b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu dang / ngan pa dang 'jig pa dang / ring du mi gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / ngan pa dang / 'jig
263b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ring du mi gnas par de ltar phung po lnga rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yong su rtog pa nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig nang gi skye mched dang / rna
263b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go/ de la mag nang gi skye mched ni/ na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 
264a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gos snang ba dang / 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi mi dang / gti mug gi sa kun du 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rgab dang / 
264a2(dkon brtsegs): bdang / 'tshab dang / mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis kun du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'ab ba
264a3(dkon brtsegs): tu shes sa// de bzhin dun pa dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid nang gi skye mched la yang na ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / bdag dang bdag gis steng ba
264a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi me dang // zhesdang gi mi dang / gti mug gi dkun tu 'bar ba dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsnga
264a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yong mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis du 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar rab tu shes to// de ltar nang gi skye mched drug po dag ra'i tu
264a6(dkon brtsegs): so// gzhan yang phyi'o skye mched drug rab tu shes te/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang / rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par
264a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched
264a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams shes bya ba ste/ skye mched drug po de dag go// de la mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyi'i skye mched la skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / nyams
264b1(dkon brtsegs): chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa'am/ brtan pa 'am/ ther zug pa'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dam/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma de ni yod/ sgyu mar
264b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de ni yod/ sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod pa dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang / 
264b3(dkon brtsegs): lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos phyi'i skye mched la yang / skyabs med
264b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / stobs med pa dang / 1das chung ba ste/ de la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa'am/ zug pa'am/ de bzhin nyid dam/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam
264b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin ni gang yang med kyi/ sgyu ma ngon yod/ sgyu mar byas pa de ni yad / sems rmongs par byas pa de ni yod de/ gang ci yang yod par phyi'o skye mched
264b6(dkon brtsegs): drug po de ltar rab tu sheso// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yong su rtog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes// bzhi gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags
264b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa de

265a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / bdag med pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du lta'o// 'dod chags dang /

265a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa dang / gzugs can du 'gyur snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin par 'gyur snyam pa dang / 'du shes can du 'gyur snyam pa dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par 'gyur snyam pa
265a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phung po rnams las bdag gi snyam pa dang / phung po rnam sa las bdag gzhan na snyam pa dang / phung po rnams dal bdag gi snyam pa dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched
265a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams bdag go snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang / skye mched rnams la bdag gi snyam pa dang / bdag la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang / 
265a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor bar byed / bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang / gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag gi snyam pa dang / gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang / 
265a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag gi snyam pa dang / bdag rtag go snyam pa dang / bdag mi rtag ge snyam pa dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag ge snyam pa dang / rtag pa
265a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod de snyam pa dang / bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la/ mtha' med kyang medo snyam pa/ 
265b1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/ mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro snyam pa dang / 'byung yang
265b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung la/ mi 'byung yang mi 'byung snyam pa dang / de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba yang ma yin/ mi 'byung ba yang ma yin snyam pa dang / srog de lus yin snyam pa dang / srog kyang /

265b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu mngon par zhen te/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / sems kyi gnas dang / mngon par zhen pa dang / nga rgyal gyi ba ga la nyal ba dang / snyems pa/ 
265b8(dkon brtsegs): dang nga rgyal byed pa dang / bdag tu smra ba'i len pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang / lus sam/ ngag gam/ sems kyi las
266a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba dang / 'dod par gtogs pa'am/ gzugasu gtogs pa/ 
266a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang /

268a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la smon pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la smon lam 'debs pa rje su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang / dga' ba drag po dang / dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /

268b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang / dge ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang sem sa can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung

268b7(dkon brtsegs): bag med par mi byed do// gang 'das pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni 'das pa/ 'gags pa/ med pa yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni da ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med bsgom
268b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa ste/ de ni de ltar bdag med pa/ bdag gi med pa'o// gang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phung po dang / 
269a1(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye mched doni mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// skad cig pa de'i skye ba'i dus kyi
269a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/ 'gag pa'i dus kyang gzhan/ gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas med pa/ 'dug pa med pa'o// skad cig gi dus gang yin pa de ni/ nang dang / phyi'i phung / 
269a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / khams dang skye mched do// nang dang / phyi'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so// da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang yin pa de ni skra/ 
269a4(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam yang mi gnas pa/ mi 'dug pa ste/ mi gnas pa/ mi 'dug pa la ni bdag dang / bdag gi med do// de yang gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshem skyes pa/ ma byung ba la/ 
269a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa'o// bdag tu ma gyur cing / bdag gir ma rgyur pa'o// gang gi tshe 'das te 'gags pa dang / ma byung / ba ste yod pa ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang bdag med pa dang / 
269a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang yang dus gsum dag tu bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o// 'di ni nga'i
269a7(dkon brtsegs): 'o/ bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta bar 'os pa ma yin no// de srid pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes
269a8(dkon brtsegs): dang spangs pa'i 'du shes dang / 'gog pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin no// gang de ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de/ chos de dag nyan cing
269b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yong su rtog pa na/ theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i theg pa dang / tshangs pa'i theg pa dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa ste/ de dag ni theg
269b2(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum zhes bya'o// bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/ bas pa can gnyis pa dang / lung ba das pa yang lha'i theg pa'o// byams pa ni tshangs pa'i theg pa ste/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
269b3(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol
269b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting ngo // 'dzin ces bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de dus dus su
269b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/ dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/ sems can rnams kyang de la 'god do// dus dus su 'phags pa'i
269b6(dkon brtsegs): theg pa can rnams kyang de la 'god la/ rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du yang mi byed do// gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang // 
269b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste/ de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o// mos pa dman pa dang / dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/ sred
269b8(dkon brtsegs): pabar mi byed kyi 'dor te/ skad cig de la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong bas/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag
270a1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa dang rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa 'bring dang / dbang po 'bring dang / dben par dag
270a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rang gi don lhur len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rab tu rnam pa skyed pa la ra'as pa dang byang chub na pa dang // 
270a3(dkon brtsegs): rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o// mos pa khyad par 'phags pa/ dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bskal ba dang / 
270a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can tham das cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dra thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
270a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskang bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drugayongasu bskang bar 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi don/ du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang / 'khor ba'i
270a6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la yang smod pa mang ba yin na/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la spad pa mang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ tshul khrims dang / spyad pa khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa
270a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams klog pa dang / kha den du byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / yid la byed pa la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems
270a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang / de dag gi byin gyis brlabs bzhi po bden pa dang / gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la slob pa/ 
270b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes bya thams cad nyan pa dang / len pa dang / 'azhi ba dang / dpyod par dga' ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang / rang gi don la mi
270b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi don lhur len pa dang / stabs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dgod par spro ba dang / bdag nyid kyang byung
270b3(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / mi phyed pa dang / mi bskyed pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang / rtag par rgyun du byang chub tu smon cing / byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg
270b4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po zhes bya ste/ de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so// de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / mang du byed cing yongasu rtog pa na dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes
270b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
270b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang / dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dmigs par byed do// de phyag lan gcig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing dpag tu
270b7(dkon brtsegs): med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de byang chub tu smon pa na/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams
270b8(dkon brtsegs): cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de bzhin du skyabs su
271a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba yang sems bskyed nga// de 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / za ba dang / 'thung ba dang / shing rmob dang / sa bon 'debs par/ 
271a2(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad byed pa na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan
271a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na yang / sems can thams cad bskal ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bad/ 
271a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba phyir/ mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chubatu smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bsred de// mang du byed de/ 
271a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba dang / mtshungs pa med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / 'jig
271a6(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs
271a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab po zhes sems bskyed do// mang du byed do// de dge ba gang ci spyad kyang / de sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro'i rgyud bca
271a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa theb par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsde bar byed de// nyan pas
271b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'dra
271b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yong su bsngo bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems
271b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams/ 
271b4(dkon brtsegs): bskal par bzhugs pa dang / bskal par chos ston pa dang / bskal par dge 'dun 'thun par 'gyur bar yongasu bsngo bar byed do// mtho ris kyi lam la dgod pa 'am/ nyan thos
271b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam la dgod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dge da pa'am/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod/ pa 'am/ sbyin pas rje su 'jug pa 'am/ snyan par smra bas
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa 'am/ don spyod pas rjesu 'jug pa 'am/ don 'thun pas rje su 'jug pa 'am/ ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par bskyed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs
271b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so// de chos kyi tshig 'di dag la nyan cig bzhin du dus gsum du 'jug go/ yid la byed do// de 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad na// / 
271b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la// gan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing // 
272a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam mnyam pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas can// yon tan dpag med de dag thams cad la// bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabasu 'chi// sangs rgyas dang ni chos
272a2(dkon brtsegs): dang tshogs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams// gang yang brgya lam stongs par mi 'gyur bar// de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// zhi ba'i chos ni
272a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston mdzad cing // bskal pa ma lus rnamasu bzhugs par yang // 'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la// mgo bos gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs// sngon dang
272a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung // bdag gis sdig pa ga dang gang bgyis pa// sdig pa de dag thams cad spang ba/ bgyi// sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi// skad
272a5(dkon brtsegs): cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di// ma lus par ni yang dag bzung bar bgyi// tshe yis ji tsam thub kyi radu ni// dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal// sangs
272a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'jig rten 'dir ni byung dang byung gyur dang // 'byung 'gyur rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang // rgyal ba/ 
272a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi// tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang // rnam grol che dang chos rnams gang yin pa// de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig/ 'gro ba lnga
272a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dag/ byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi// dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi phyir shing // mgo bas mtha' yas rjesu yi rang // yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa/ 
272b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas// sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang // yod par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs// bdag gi dge ba dag ni 'das padang/ ma 'ongs pa dang
272b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad kyis// 'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du// dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bskal
272b3(dkon brtsegs): par bzhugs pas phongs par ma gyur cig/ bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang // pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang / 'jigs pa
272b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang / mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par// de dag la ni smon lam mthar
272b5(dkon brtsegs): phyin cing // tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang // khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog/ rdzogs pa'i byang / chub smon lam 'debs pa na// mtha' yas dpag tu med par
272b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'debs// sems can thams cad bdag gi sdug bsngal dang // nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhi gyur cig/ chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir// 'jig rten gyi ni khams rnams thams cad
272b7(dkon brtsegs): kyisargyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la// rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar du// ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab// skye
272b8(dkon brtsegs): dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la// bdag ni yongasu spyad par bgyi bar sheg/ 'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ 
273a1(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang // phreng ba me tog chun pos mchod byed shog/ lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang / gas dang rin po che yi phung ba/ 
273a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzhal med khang bcas bzhon dang mal cha dang // bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing // skyabs dang lus dang pa 'drar gyur par
273a3(dkon brtsegs): shog bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang // 'gro la chos ni rab tu sten gyur cig/ byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang // dkon mchog gsum phyir ge tshe sra ba bgo/ 
273a4(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing // sangs rgyas chos rnams yongasu rdzogs byed shog/ sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang / yid kyi las mtha' dge ba
273a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur cig/ byang chub las ni mi ldog bdag 'ar zhing / byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dang / gyur// srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
273a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la sreg/ bdag gi chos rnams de dag kun la yang // 'jog rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyi// de de ltar na bdag dang gzhan dag gi/ dge
273a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes// de shes rab de dang / ye shes mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang // yid la bya bar 'dad pa na yang / sems can thams cad bskul ba dang / sa
273a8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba ni/ 
273b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir yongasu bsngo bar byed do// mngon sum du byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mngon sum du byas pa dang / yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang/ sems can
273b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs
273b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngo bar byed do// gal te shes rab de dang ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/ dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cung zad du yang 'tshal ba'i shes/ 
273b4(dkon brtsegs): rab dang / mi shes pa spang ba dang / dor ba dang / brtsal ba/ dar rtsol lo// 'bad do// dus dus su 'am/ cung zad cu dang zad du'ang shes rab dang / ye shes la slob pa dang / mngon
273b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phel bar bya ba dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya bar rdzol lo// 'bad do// srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // sgyid lug par mi 'gyuraro// lag bza
273b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rjesu dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang / byang chub tu smin pa dang / byang chub tu smon la
273b7(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ 
273b8(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang / zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'ad
274a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi slob pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa don shes rab dge ba dang / ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin na// de ni das pa yin pa
274a2(dkon brtsegs): byaphyiro lag bzangs de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la/ yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang / sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du sbyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
274a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 
274a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i sku dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dag pa gsum dang / mtho sa su skye ba'i don byas par gyur te/ 
274a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag bzangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan sa
274a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
274a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lag bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha na shI/ 
274a8(dkon brtsegs): la dang 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de zhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / bam po gnyis
274b1(dkon brtsegs): dang shokabargya rtsa brgyang / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su ra ta pa ri brid tshwan ma ma hA ya nA sU tra/ bod skad du/ nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam
274b2(dkon brtsegs): po gcig pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
274b3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyos stong dag dang thabs gcig tu
274b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi rnamasakyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas rim gror byas/ mchod pa
274b5(dkon brtsegs): byas la de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi dra bul po nges pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa
274b6(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongasu bzung ba / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la sems
274b7(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa/ snying rje la gnas te yid yongasu skyo ba med pa/ dga' ba la gnas te chos kyi kun dga' la dag shing mos pa gtang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis mi
274b8(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams yongasu smin par
275a1(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / dbul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po ngas pa shin du
275a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/ yid 'khrug pa med pa/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa/ gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyen du mi lta ba/ sems can
275a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems bsrung ba/ brkam pa med/ shes bzhin du spyod pa/ chog shes shing gang sra ba/ gso sla gabasam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ g.yo med pa/ nga rgyal med pa/ bka' blo bde ba
275a4(dkon brtsegs): mthun par 'dzin pa/ rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ lag na shing lo'i snod thogs pa/ rtswa bting ba la nyal ga/ gos ngan pa gyon pa/ rnyed kyang mi len pa/ bzang / 
275a5(dkon brtsegs): rung / ngan yang rung / bgo bsha' byas nas za ba dus gsu/ ma du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/ chos nyan pa ra 'dod pa/ gtam sna tshogs byung ba la spobs pa dang ldan
275a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sems can rnams kyis mtho dga' ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yod dam la brtan na mi brtan pa bdag gis brtag go snya mo// de nas
275a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing spyod par byed do// bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon cha dag
275a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang bstan na nges pa de'i bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/ mi 'khrug cing gnod sems mi bskyed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan dag cig sprul nas des pa de'i/ 
275b1(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bzhag ste/ des pa de lta dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bcag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/ ci ste khyod 'dod pa lta na/ khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gra/ 
275b2(dkon brtsegs): char gcad par bya'o zhes smraso// nges pas smras pa/ grogs pa dag zong de sang ma zer cig/ gal te mi 'di dag gis kha bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bur btubs su zin kyang / kho bo na ma 'di
275b3(dkon brtsegs): la sdig pa'i sems mi bskyed do// grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la de'i 'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o// mings
275b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o// de bas na kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed pa yang mi 'dod na gtse ba lta ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag smraso// 
275b5(dkon brtsegs): sa bon cha ba rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur// sa bon dang rab rnams kyi ni// 'bras bu dang rab skye bar 'gyu 2// dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis ni// sdig pa rnam smin che ba dang
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dkar po'i 'bras bu dang ra ba dang / mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi// sdig pa rnams gsum mi bya zhing // gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis// rjesu
275b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba mi bya'o// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu byas// gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa// gzhan dag la yang yid rang ba// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
275b8(dkon brtsegs): dus gzhan zhig na/ nges pa la dbyig dang / gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smraso// nges pa'o ni las khyer la sbyin pa dag byin cig/ bsod nams ngag gyis shig/ gos dang rgyan pa
276a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang thogs shig/ khyad ngan gang dbul bas mi shig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs pa dag spun sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par srung ba dang / ngag dang
276a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyes par spyad pas/ 'dir dngul po zhes bya bar gyur to// de bas na kha bon ma byin par len pa de byed par ma 'dod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ nges pa khyed da ltar je bde bar 'tshe bar gyis shig
276a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jog rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ nges pas smras pa/ grogs gang tshe 'di ched char 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos yin gyi/ mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi ma ched cher 'dzin to// 
276a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas zil gyis nan pa dang / zhe sdang gos zil gyis nan pa dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang / dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par tshan
276a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no// sag jig ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par bye mkhas pa dag ni sog 'jog mi byed do// bdag gi
276a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongasu 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongasu 'dzin par mi byed do// lus dang srog la lta ba dag/ 
276a7(dkon brtsegs): ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o// ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni ngomos shes shi
276a8(dkon brtsegs): chog shes pa yin no// 'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni 'chos la su dag pa yin// las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag
276b1(dkon brtsegs): ni las mthong ba yin no// rnam par 'che ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to// byams pa'i sems med pa
276b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no// phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa ni ma byin par len par byed kyi/ mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin/ 
276b3(dkon brtsegs): ci ma log pa yin no// gzhon yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigasu bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig/ bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang // gang dag
276b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni gtong med pa// de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes// / thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad// gang la zad cing med bzhin du// de ni gtong la rab gnas na// de ni
276b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten nor che zhes// yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyi sa bshad// gang la sdig med 'phags pa ni// rnam/ ba kun gyis mdzes pa yin// byis pa sdig pa byed pa
276b6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// mkhas pa dag gis spros bla yi// byis pas bsngags pa de lta min// byis pas sdig pa bsags par byed// mkhas pa dag ni sdig
276b7(dkon brtsegs): la smod// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig tu sprul to// de nas des gser mang po khyer te/ nges pa la 'di skad ces smras// kye nges pa gser khyer la
276b8(dkon brtsegs): kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che bzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyis/ der kho bo'i cha bzhi gyis shag/ des pas smras pa/ grogs po zong khyod de skad ma zer cig kho
277a1(dkon brtsegs): ni brdzun zer du mi 'dod do// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing pha rol la ya sru la// 'phags pa la yang slu ba yin te/ grags pa nyams par byed pa dang / yid
277a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ches pa dang yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / brnyas par byed pa dang / sems yongasu gdung bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang / lus smad par byed pa/ 
277a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no// kye grogs po brdzun du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rku ba dang / dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang / mtho ras kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no// kye grog
277a4(dkon brtsegs): po brdzun du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis brtsan par mi bya ba dang / yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang tshig mi mdzes pra dang / mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa dang / sdig pa thams
277a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rtsa ba dang / brtul zhugs yongasu song ba'i rtsa ban/ chod pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad kyirtsa bar gyur pa yin/ no// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dngul po nges pas tshigs
277a6(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag spras// brdzun du smra ba'i kha nas ni// rul ba'i dri yang mnam par 'gyur// dgon par ji ltar bcom pa bzhin// sngon gyi dkar rnams spongs par byed// rmongs pas bdag
277a7(dkon brtsegs): dang lnga rnams dang // 'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed// ma ni gang shig brdzun zer rab// de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur// brdzun du smra ba byed pa de// sdig pakun gyi rtsa ba dang // 8/ 
277a8(dkon brtsegs): grub can gyi rtsagacad dang // ngan 'gror 'gro bags kyang bya// gal te 'jam gling gang ba yi// gser dag khyed kyis byin na yang // kha ba chis ni bsrung ba phyir// rtag tu brdzun ni spa'i byed// \u0f7f
277b1(dkon brtsegs): barma byin gyis sprul pa'i mas nges pa brdzun zer du gzhug ma nus nas song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nya 'od dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras/ 
277b2(dkon brtsegs): khyed gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang dka' thub byed pa 'di ci 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhig gam/ 'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde/ 
277b3(dkon brtsegs): sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam langs nas phyogs gang na nges pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas/ nges pa la tshig snyan pas smras te/ des pa bzhengs/ bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi
277b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lagaso// nges pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/ sha tshugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / lus byugs pa dang / rgyan dang / 
277b5(dkon brtsegs): chas dang / lhab lhub la gzigs/ na tshod dang po'i lang chu la bab pa la gzigs/ nges pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur ba gyid pa 'di 'dra bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa
277b6(dkon brtsegs): la gzigs/ nges pas bltas nas smras pa/ khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ 
277b7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no// khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo // khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni lbu ba dang / chu bur dang / smig rgyu lta
277b8(dkon brtsegs): bur mthong ngo // khyed tsan dan gyi 'de gus byugs pa ni lpags pa rlan pa shas g.yogs pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyed kyi rgyan dang / lcab lhub ni mi slu ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo // khyod
278a1(dkon brtsegs): lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong ngo // bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis la khrel mamamapo bye ma ni sle'u dang / bud med kyi sem/ 
278a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi/ sems dran pas kun nas bsrung ba dag gi ni ma yin no// che zhe dag 'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi sdug pa'o// 'dod pa la brten pa de ni drin pa'o// 
278a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la bsten pa ni rul pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni bde ba thams cad yongasu 'grib par byed pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni sems can/ 
278a4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la bsten pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni ngan 'gro/ ngan gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni 'thab pa dang / rtsod
278a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la bsten pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi mthun pa dang / go ran gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten
278a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sred pa'i bag la nyal gnas pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la kun tu rmongs pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la rab
278a7(dkon brtsegs): tu gzir ba'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni kun du gdus shing rnam par gdungs la yongasu gdungs pa'o// 'dod pa la bstan pa ni mi dge ba'i su 'jug cing / dge pa yong su nyams par byed/ 
278a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o//  'dod pa la bstan pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsab bskyed pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni mi dge ba'i sprin gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o// 'dod pa la bsnyen pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang
278b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang / sha ba ma dang 'dres par byed pa'o// 'dad pal bsnyen pa na bgrang dang / bang bu dang / khyi dang / bag dang / ngam dang / glang ba ma dang / rta dang / lugapa
278b2(dkon brtsegs): wa la bsten pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la bsten pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtang ba yong su 'dor ba bsten pa'o// 'dod pa la
278b3(dkon brtsegs): bsten pa ni brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub 'dor ba'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu phel bar byed pa'o// 'dod pa la bsten pa ni shin
278b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu gcod par byed pa'o// de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi drabu/ la po nges pas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// 'dod dpa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa ste/ shin tu sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig
278b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed// rtag tu ngan songs rnams khyim du gyur// sems rmo sa gyur pa dag gis rtag tu bsten// 'thab rtsod can te mi bden 'tshang du gyur// rtag tu 'gyed cing mo mthun go ra rag rma// 
278b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag phyin ci log bskyed bzhi yin te// 'dod bsten sred pa 'phel byed bde ba med// rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs// 'dod bsten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa bsten// 'di ni kun
278b7(dkon brtsegs): gdungs rnams gdungs yongasu gdungs// sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba chud gsen pa// 'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste// 'dod bsten dper na sprin gyi dra ba 'dra// 'dod bsten sha za mo dang srin mo dang / 
278b8(dkon brtsegs): bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed bzhin// 'di ni ba lang bong bu rta dag dang // phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang // glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang bsten pa ste// 'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis// 
279a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs 'dod bsten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang // dka' thug brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste// 'di la rtag tu bag med nyes pa 'phel// de phyir thar
279a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod rtag tu bud med spong // gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i// mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang // yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang // 'dod chags la ni// 
279a3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyang rtogs mi 'gyur// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu lo bde sogs dang / lha'i bu mo nya 'di song nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ nges ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi spyan yang
279a4(dkon brtsegs): dag gang lags de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchi/ sa// ji ltar de'i sems ni yul las log gyur pa// de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis/ 
279a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa'i zad du song nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ ci zhig don gnyer nges pa chos spyod pa// brtul zhugs de ni spyod pa rnams
279a6(dkon brtsegs): dag smos// 'di yis nyi zla 'am yang na dbang po 'am// tshangs pa'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed// nges pas smras pa/ nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang / tshangs pa 'am rgyal po 'am 'di na
279a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag kyang // 'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun// gar byed la bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na// mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med// sdug dang mi sdug
279a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang phrad pa'ang med// 'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes// de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa nges// brgya byin gyis spras pa/ phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjesu yod rang ste/ khyod
279b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig/ bdud rnams sder bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni// shAkya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur cig/ de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po
279b2(dkon brtsegs): nges pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che ran thang med pa zhig rnyed nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na
279b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin pa gor ma cha go snyam nas/ de grong bar du song ste/ thams cad kyi nang na dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags
279b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dbul po mgon med pa la phal po che der 'dus te / bdag cag dbul po yin gyis bdag cag la byi na cig ces 'dzer to// nges pas smras pa/ khyed ni dngul
279b5(dkon brtsegs): po ma yin gyi/ mnyan yod 'di na ches dbul po gzhan zhig yod kyis de la sbyin no// de dag gis smrasapa/ gang yin des pas smras pa/ rgyal po gsal
279b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal 'di yin no// de dag gis smras pa/ khyod de skad ma zer shig/ rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yin gyi/ bdag cag ni dbul zhing mgon
279b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin no// nges pas smras pa/ nor mang gi ni ci zhig bya// rgya mtsho la ni klung rnams bzhin// gang dag la ni chog med pa// ma bsdam de dag dbul po yin// gang dag 'dod pa/ 
279b8(dkon brtsegs): rab 'phel zhing // yang yid ni skye 'gyur ba// rmongs pa de dag tshe 'di dang // pha rol tu yang dbul por 'gyur// de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa skye bo phal po che dag gis
280a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskor cing // nor bu rin po che de khyer nas// rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la bder song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong dpon
280a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogaso// grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/ rgyal po che/ 
280a3(dkon brtsegs): po nor bu rin po che ring thang ma mchis pa// 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rib bdag gis rnyed pa 'di la bdag gi 'di snyam du bsams te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags
280a4(dkon brtsegs): ba de la stsal to snyam mo// de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bas mus te/ khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lag sa so snyam bgyid kyis/ kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhe su gsol/ 
280a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul yul por gyur cing ngo cha/ bar gyur nas/ grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di ska/ da ces smraso// des pa cing khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/ 
280a6(dkon brtsegs): nges pas smras pa/ lha de lta lags te bdag pas ches khyod dbul ba lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis dbul/ nges pas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ gang gi
280a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal// gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrul cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa// de ni 'di na 'jig rten mi
280a8(dkon brtsegs): bsrung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin// de phyir 'di na de la rtag tu chos 'dod rnams ni dbul po lags par sems// gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams
280b1(dkon brtsegs): lathang ma mchis shing // rtag par rgyun du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod pa ma mchis la// nyam thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa// den
280b2(dkon brtsegs): phyug cing nor bzad shin du nor tshe dad pa la sogs longs spyod gnas// gang zhig 'gro ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang // gang zhig 'di na skye bo dman zhing sdug
280b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gzir ba gzung nas chad pas gcod// gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba// de ni chos srung mi bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman pa'i mi shes
280b4(dkon brtsegs): rig par bgyid// dad pas bsam pa dri ma med cing rab ba rtun tshul khrims dag la yang dag gnas// rtag tu po/ shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dag
280b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun/ la blta bgyid pa// de dag tu ni mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags// gang
280b6(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la// lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang // gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag/ 
280b7(dkon brtsegs): tu yid myos rnam par rgyu ba dang // lhan cig gang dag dran pa ma mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags// gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang // lus
280b8(dkon brtsegs): dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag/ rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis// lhan cig gang dag chos kyis brgya
281a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags// lhan cig me ni rtag tu nags kyi sman spun skam po bsregs pas chog ma 'tshal// lhan cig 'din rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu
281a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pas kyang chog ma 'tshal// 'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas chog mi 'tshal// rgyal po brkam phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par
281a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yong mi bgyid// de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid// 
281a4(dkon brtsegs): chu'i thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig pa dar rab phyogs na// gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'jom das pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal// de nas rgyal po
281a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas// grong khyer gyi dbul po dbul po nges pa la 'di skad ces smras// nges pa de ltar nga ni dbul// khyod ni phyug par khyod la dbang du yod// 
281a6(dkon brtsegs): nges pas smras pa// lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yod 'di nyid na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa
281a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas mthong yang mthong ngo // nges pas smras pa/ lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/ de ni bdag gi dbang lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ song la
281a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drongs shig/ des ji skad du lung bstan pa bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o// nges pas smras pa/ ston pa de la ngan bu'am/ pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags/ 'dir ni
281b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bsam bgyis na// de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di'am pha rol na// des ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang // 'dren
281b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur// sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// de la nga rgyal skye mi mnga'// sems can rnams la legs dgengs pas// shin tu rab tu'ang gshegs
281b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyis// rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la// da ni legs par thugs rjes mdzod// gang gis ston pa 'dir gshegs pa'i// bden pa'i byin brlabs bgyi bar 'tshal// me tog
281b4(dkon brtsegs): spos dang me tog phreng // rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang // sil snyan sta gon mdzod cig dang // 'dren pa de ni/ gshegs par 'gyur// nges pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang // 
281b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar 'dug/ pus mo sa la bcu gas byas nas// 'di skad ces ni tshig kyang smras// kun mkhyen pa ni gang gis su// bdag gi bsam pa
281b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen ce na// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis// thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs// de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang // sa ni rab tu g.yos par gyur// sa bzhi rnam par rtol nas ni// de bzhin
281b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byung bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi// nyan thos lnga brgyas yongasu bskor// brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// skyong ba dang ni lha
281b8(dkon brtsegs): klu dang la brgya byin tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas// de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin// rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas// ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud
282a1(dkon brtsegs): par byed 'a der ni srog chags stong dag gis// ston pa la ni mchod pa byas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod byas nas// byang chub don du yid btud do// de nas grong / 
282a2(dkon brtsegs): khyer gyi dbul po nges pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
282a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag mnyan yod 'di na 'khyam zhing mchis mchis pa la// nor bu rin po che rini thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid te/ mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dngul
282a4(dkon brtsegs): po gang lags pa de la stsal lo snyam nas/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni tham sa cad kyi nang na ches dbul ba ste/ 'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'brog/ 
282a5(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid pas ni ngoms ma 'tshal ba lagaso// slar/ zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na chog ma 'tshal ba lagaso// gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba lags// sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam par tho 'tsham pa lags// skyid pa rnams tha mar 'byin pa lags so// dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lagaso// phyug
282a7(dkon brtsegs): po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so// shin tu rab tu myos pa lags so// rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang / sred par rnam par bcings pa lagaso snyam nas de la bdag gis stsal
282a8(dkon brtsegs): na len par mi bgyid par// 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la/ khyod ni 'byor par khyod la dbang su yod ces kyang mchi'o// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs
282b1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa/ ngos bzlog mi spyod pa mi mngag za ba dang / dri ma dang / khong khro ba mi mnga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di lags par lung bstan par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi

282b3(dkon brtsegs): le sbram dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / gzhon pa dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam
282b4(dkon brtsegs): du sems so// rgyal po chen po nges pa ni sbyin pa dang / du ral ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka'
282b5(dkon brtsegs): thub dang / bag yod pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // ye byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang / byams/ pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gan
282b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyu dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dang ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang
282b7(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang / sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang
282b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni/ nges pas gom pa bdun pa'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / bag yod pa'i bsod nams
283a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// gsal rgyal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yul na sems can
283a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyis che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na sems
283a3(dkon brtsegs): can yon tan gyis che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nges pa la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal
283a4(dkon brtsegs): nges bcom phyir// nges pa khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste// rgyal srid 'di kun kho bo dpung dang bcas// khyod kyis slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag spobs shig/ 2
283a5(dkon brtsegs): bo yun ring dag tu rgyal gyis kyang bslus// sdig pa'iH/ gas po dag gis bskor cing bzung ba las// des pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pa na// rab tu bsdams
283a6(dkon brtsegs): khe bos chos bzhin du sprad par bya// khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni// nor gyi ched du kho bas go ra bcug pa ste// kho bas thams cad btang gis bde bar 'khod gyis shi
283a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin chad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bos yong mi byed// lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang yin de dag kyang // nges pa la ni zhes legs par bskyed nas kyang // sems ni skyo bar gyur cing ci la 'ang

283b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa// mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po
283b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa de ni// bcom ldan 'das la blta bas chog ma 'tshal ba lags na// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par gyur pa de lta de lta
283b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// bzhi
283b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ yid ches pa dang / dad pa dang / phangs para'adzin pa dang / gus pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// 
283b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong na bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
