283b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir yang sems bskyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan
283b8(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ gzugs dben par mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
284a1(dkon brtsegs): dben par mthong ba dang / khams bzhin mkha' dang / 'dra bar mthong ba dang / skye mched grong stong ba lta bur mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin

284a4(dkon brtsegs): yang bzhi ste/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig kun du spyod pa dang / chos kyi mig dgi so sor rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan rje su rtogs

286a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung steng chos

286a8(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pa brdzis shig/ nges pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes spras nas/ ras bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo // rgyal pos spras pa/ nges pas ras pa
286b1(dkon brtsegs): buzung khyod kyi rkang pa'i dman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya/ des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig/ rgyal bri/ 
286b2(dkon brtsegs): des pa de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal pos mi rnams la bsgo ste/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di/ 
286b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis nges pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / nges pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis de dag gis bar
286b4(dkon brtsegs): snang la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag thos so// 'dod pa bzhin/ du lan ni glan bya ba// me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa/ dang // zas skem nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te// byang chub
286b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur// des pa zas dang gos 'dod ma yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin/ nges pa byang chub sems las tshe 'dod de// byang chub sems kyis
286b6(dkon brtsegs): nges pa dga' ba skye// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod kyi skyes
286b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo // de nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lnga'i dbang
286b8(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkram pa blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mtho ba la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi khang bza
287a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/ dbus su shing yongs 'dus rdol sprul lo// yongs 'dus rdol gyi drung du yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri
287a2(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du mas bting ba mngon par sprul to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ 
287a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa/ lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas/ sil
287a4(dkon brtsegs): snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag byed cing nges pas g.yog bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen
287a5(dkon brtsegs): po de dag 'ong bar thugasu chud nas/ gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rna/ mas kyis yongasu bskor cing gdan bshams pa la bzhugs
287a6(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/ bzang mo tshur shog/ nges pa'i g.yeg bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
287a7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa bya'o// de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis/ lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang / thabs cig tu rgyud kyi slar sbyar ba'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod pa khyod kyis skal pa brgyan
287a8(dkon brtsegs): ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad// khyod ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dges/ khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongasu dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag phyag
287b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal la khyod ni thab mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dges// khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs// khyod ni bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgas// dri ma
287b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sel la dges// khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjer ldan// khyed ni yang dag gsung zhing dam
287b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don yang mkhyen// srid pa gsum po thar par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' das
287b4(dkon brtsegs): sel khyod ni 'gro ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar/ mdzad// bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skyabasu mchi dbar bgyi// lha'i bu mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa
287b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ dbang bas dran pa shin tu rgya chen thob 'gyur te/ dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur// 
287b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gis brgyan rnams kyis// legs par brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba// gsung mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag/ 
287b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// 'phags pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog phrag mthil sdug/ thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stabs/ 
287b8(dkon brtsegs): sman tshugs legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes// dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyod la 'dud// rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa
288a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi// bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa// de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas
288a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam gyur cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu nges pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongasu bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
288a3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas/ 
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu nges pa khri'u ston bzang po de la 'dug go// rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang / btso ma ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang
288a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi stan la 'khod do// de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag ni/ sa nges pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du/ dbu/ la po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la/ 'od lta bur mchod pa
288a6(dkon brtsegs): byed do zhes 'dzer to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji
288a7(dkon brtsegs): snyed dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to// grogs po dag khyod re shig sdod cig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu des
288a8(dkon brtsegs): pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs
288b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des nges pa'i lus la reg nas/ lha'i rgyal po
288b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi dus du grub pa ci 'dra ba de la 'bum gyur pas kyang ches lhag par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ nges pa la me tog dag gis gtor to// 
288b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa la bka' stsal pa/ nges pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i la sengs ma su srid bya khyod ma u pa 'is
288b4(dkon brtsegs): ma drunas su ni gyung kyi ma ldan par byed pa 'di ni de'i ba dkod pa yin no// ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes pa dar sten cing / mi shes par ston kyang / shes par snang ba/ 
288b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes ma thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyis dang pa bskyed par byed cing / ye shes thob pa rnams la
288b6(dkon brtsegs): yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas/ rdzu 'phrul ston pa byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar ston cing / tshangs pas
288b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang mched pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang / skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin// sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la// / 
288b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung ba ston pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshed/ 
289a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu nges pas/ ji srid tsag nas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa bgyis lakra/ bcom pa/ 
289a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshog pa bzod pa gsum thob pa/ spobs pa zab pa/ 
289a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pas rnam par rje ba byas pa/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/ ngan cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis
289a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed cig brtul lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag dbo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
289a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas te/ mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid cig na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
289a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra zhig du 'gyur/ ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom lda
289a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dag bol tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang // grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas pa/ 
289a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyon cig/ 'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir
289b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brtson byed pa// nges pa yi na spyod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni bgrang ba nus par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs// mngon par shes
289b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis sngan chad rtse ba byas// tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyir par song // thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par bslabs// 'dir ni de yis 'dus
289b3(dkon brtsegs): byas skyon rnams legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas// 'dis ni sems can ji lta ji ltar thar gyur pa'i// rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid la yA/ 
289b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par bslabs// 'jigs pa med cing blo dang rtog/ das dang dran dang ldan// spobs pa dang ni gzugs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste// bdud kyi lcags kyo nyon mongs rdzab las
289b5(dkon brtsegs): nges byung zhing // sangs rgyas spyod yul don chen la ni rab tu gnas / 'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gi ma gos la// chags pa la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar yongs mi g.yos
289b6(dkon brtsegs): su yi drung du mi 'gro ring du byed pa'ang man// na mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin// snying rjes gnas shing sems kyang yongasu skyo ba med// shin du bsdams shing nem nur can la
289b7(dkon brtsegs): byams sems ldan// sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par blta// skyon la mi lta 'khrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams la gnas// 
289b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed// sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na// der ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed// 
290a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du gnas pa der// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni stongs pa ma yin te// de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas// ji
290a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis// nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe// nges pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang // sngon chad gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i
290a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams// mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur// brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang // zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongasu btsal ba dang / 
290a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu smin bya'i phyir// skal pa grangs med gsum du sgyu dad pa spyod par byed// de yi 'og tu de ni sgrub pa rgyal bar 'gyur// ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang phyug ces kyang bya// 
290a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba yi// zhi dang de yi 'jig rten du ni mtshungs ma yin// 'jig rten khams de legs par sprul pa zhes bya ste// yon tan
290a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin// de yi tshe yi tshad ni lo khri thub par 'gyur// de yi dge 'dun shin du mang ste bgrang las 'das// nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur/ 
290a7(dkon brtsegs): phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su// de dag thams cad ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// gcig pu nges par chos ni leg/ 
290a8(dkon brtsegs): bapar bshad rnams kyis// 'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra chen bsgrags par 'gyur// de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med// de dag thams cad yang dag rig cing rnam par dag/ 
290b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs de yongasu mya ngan 'das gyur nas// le ni brlad cu dag las bzhi lhag rnamasu yang // de'i dam pa'i chos ni rab tu spyod par 'gyur/ de 'i ma chos tshul ni 'khrug pa med// des
290b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de yis gang dag yongasu smin byas pa// de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i don du spyod// zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams// de dag thams cad sbyin rnams dang ni bral ba
290b3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yas te// lha'i me
290b4(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan gyi char yang mdo na par bab pa// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi/ sa kyang rang rang gi gos rnams rigs kyi bu des pa la bkag
290b5(dkon brtsegs): potshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze brgya phrag mang po dag kyang rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa la nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag kyang legs
290b6(dkon brtsegs): pabar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu nges pa'i mgo bo la phyag gis byugaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi
290b7(dkon brtsegs): bu nges pa'i mgo bo la reg ma thag tu gos ngur smig bgos shing // dge slong du snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
290b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga po// dus kyi snyigs ma dang // sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / zhing gi snyigs ma dang / tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i dus// 
291a1(dkon brtsegs): nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der nges pas ji ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis gdul bar mi bya'o// kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi
291a2(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi/ kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas bsdigs pas sems can rnams
291a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar byed do// kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul nye bar bstan du zin na/ sems can gcig kyang 'dul
291a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ nga dang nges pa ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis kyang sems can 'dul bar gyis shig/ 
291a5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang / rtogs pa mang / ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis chos kyi rna/ ma grangs 'di thos na/ dad pa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par
291a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de
291a7(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
291a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ nges pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'dus pa nyi shu bdun pa rdzog s+ho// 
291b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dzin mi tra dang / su ren dra ba d+he dang / zhu chen gyi la tsA ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// rgya ga sa / 
291b2(dkon brtsegs): du Ar+ya k+ki ra dang ta pa ri br-i tsunA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bide skad du/ 'phags pa dpal sbyin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mi // bam pa gcig pa/ 
291b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
291b4(dkon brtsegs): mgan med pas skyon gyi kun dga' rab na/ dge slong so nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dathams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag bzad pa/ nyan mos
291b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shinarnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par/ la ba/ cang shes pa/ grang ba chen po// bya ba byas pa/ 
291b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa byas pa// khur bar ba/ bdag gi ngan rjesu thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyar ba yang su zad pa/ yang dag par shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyang bangs
291b7(dkon brtsegs): cod kyi dam pa'i pharal tu san pa/ mngon par shes pa lags pag zag gicig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lnga ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpa' lnga bcu
291b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang gzungs zab pa/ ting 'dzin zab pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i ma grong khyer chen pa mnyan yangan// khyim bdag dpes sgron zhes bya ba/ drug pa/ 
292a1(dkon brtsegs): nor che ba/ bdag dbang ba mang ba/ nor dang yo byad mang ba/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs mang/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ra lug dang / 
292a2(dkon brtsegs): ba lang mang ba/ bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / 
292a3(dkon brtsegs): sa le sbram dang / dngul mang ba zhig gnas pa de/ khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe/ bar skabasu yang 'di lta bu'i gtam
292a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod de/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par da ka'/ mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/ dal ba phun sum tshe/ dgas pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ 
292a5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing
292a6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gson na/ mang po lta ci smos te/ de dag rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid
292a7(dkon brtsegs): chos pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas/ nan tan gyis sgrub pa ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de ba
292a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/ 'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'am/ 'on te/ 
292b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ len te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes mthun par 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta bu'i dbyed pa skyes nas/ bdags
292b2(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pas ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin snyamo// de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin
292b3(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag
292b4(dkon brtsegs): rab ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
292b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan/ 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyi// na dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/ 
292b6(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag khyed don gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de
292b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
292b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/ bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te mchis par gyur nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te
293a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad bar skabasu 'di lta bu'i bka' mtshad brjod pa de byung ste/ kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' mar skye ba rnyed par dka'/ dal ba bu/ 
293a2(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/ rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/ dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/ nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/ sems
293a3(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shing la/ gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gson na/ mang po lta ci smos te de dag rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
293a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la yid ches rnyed par dka'/ de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nga nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'
293a5(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan/ pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka' na/ 'khor/ ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/ ci bdag cag nyan
293a6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi theg pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya 'am/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/ 'on te theg pa chen po bla na mod pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bya'o zhes bka'
293a7(dkon brtsegs): mchid bgyis// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog lags
293a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te/ de bzhin gshegs
293b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thang du mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu/ 
293b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas
293b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po dag la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag rnams legs legs// khyim bdag rnams khyed 'di
293b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa ya dra dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags pa
293b5(dkon brtsegs): khyed yang legaso// khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang byang chub sems da/ pa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
293b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyed la bshad do// bcom/ 
293b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bkra
293b8(dkon brtsegs): stsal tokhyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can
294a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya/ kun tu bsten par bya/ nges par bsten par bya/ bsgom par bya/ mang du bya'o// khyim bdag rnams byang chub sem/ 
294a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya// 
294a3(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad rnams la chags
294a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag rnams sems can dag ni phal cher lus dang srog la chags par gyur nas/ sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i
294a5(dkon brtsegs): las byas shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log/ par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye'o// sa/ ma can zad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus dang
294a6(dkon brtsegs): srog la ma chags par byas na bde 'gro rnamasu skye'o// khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
294a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ lus la chags par mi bya/ srog la chags par mi bya/ de bzhin du nor dang
294a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
294b1(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/ yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya ba dang / yongasu btang ba mang ba dang / rnam par sman
294b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la re ba med par bya/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongasu dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa la ji mi snyam par bzod
294b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nges pa phun sum tshogs par bya/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems rtse gcig tu bya/ bdag
294b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bur lta ba dang bral bar shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par
294b5(dkon brtsegs): bya des sbyin pa byin pa na/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ sbyin pa byin par bya/ sems can tha/ mas cad yid la byas te/ tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ 
294b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ bzod pa bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ 
294b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ shes rab bsgom par bya/ sems can thams cad yid la byas te/ thabs la mkhas pa bsra
294b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing
295a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa lags/ srog la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la lta zhing gnas pa
295a2(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/ ye byad
295a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor rtog cing / lus la mi lta ba lags/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar sreg la mi
295a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba lags/ de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo rnams la mi lta ba lags bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / 
295a5(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang // phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta ba lags// yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan
295a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
295a7(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di la rnam pa du mar so sor brtag par bya'o// rnam pa du ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di mthar gyis grub pa dang / mthar gyis 'jig pa dang / rdul phra rab bsags pa dang / 
295a8(dkon brtsegs): khong stong dang / gye gu can dang / bu ga dgu dang / spu'i khong bu nas zag pa dang / grog mkhar ltar sbrul gdug pa'i gnasu gyur pa dang / sbrul bdug pa ltar byas pa mi bzo ba dang / ma
295b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang / bshes gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang / lbu ba rdos pa yang nga banan gyis nyam chung bcu bu ltar byung nas 'jig cang 'ju ba dang / sprus rgya
295b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar sru ba'i bdag nyid can dang / chu shing ltar gshig na snying po med pa dang / sgyu ma ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang / rgyal po ltar bsgo blag mang ba dang / dgra ltar glags lta ba dang / rkun pa lha
295b3(dkon brtsegs): yid gtan du mi rung ba dang / gshed ma ltar rjesu chags pa med pa dang / mi mdza' ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi srog gi bar tshad byed pa dang / phyir rgol ba
295b4(dkon brtsegs): ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang / grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang / rdza mkhan gyi snod lta dar mthar 'jig pa dang / sbrang ltar me gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis
295b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gang ba dang / sbrang ma'i snod ltar mau gtsang ba zag dang / sbrul dang / mi dang / khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang / ngan skyugs kyi khu ba ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'byung gnas
295b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rma ltar bskyod mi bzod pa dang / zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can dang / rde'o sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka' ba dang / khang rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing brten pa dang / gru rnying
295b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcos legs bya zhing spyad pa dang / bum pa so ma btang ba ltar nan tar gyis bag bya dgos pa dang / grogs po mi srun pa ltar rtag tu rje su bsrung dgos pa dang / chu 'gram gyi shing
295b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang / chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho la thug pa dang / blo bur ba'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang / mgron med pa'i gnas
296a1(dkon brtsegs): khang ltar yongasu gzung ba med pa dang / brtson bsrung ltar gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / bye ma'i
296a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer ltar rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang / me ltar cho ga mi shes pa dang / rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang / sbrul gyi gzeb ltar nan tan gyi bag bya ba dang / byis pa chung ngu ltar
296a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu yongasu bskyang dgos pa dang / snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang / yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang / zas dug can ltar rtag tu yongasu spang bar bya ba dang / 
296a4(dkon brtsegs): re shig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma lta bu dang / khur bkur da ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu yin pa 'ba' shig tu blos gzung bar bya'o// khyim bdag rnams gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
296a5(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di yi thog ma dang / tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag par/ bya'o// pha ma'i khu chud dang / khrag 'dus pa las 'byu/ nga ste/ 'di la khu chu dang / khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu
296a6(dkon brtsegs): yin no// tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/ kham gyis bza' ba'i zas zos ma thag tu bad kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o// zhu zhing skyur por 'gyur te/ rlung gi gnasu 'gre'o// zhus te/ 
296a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi gnasu phyin na/ rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig/ dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/ tshigs ma las ni gcin dang ngan skyugs la sogs te/ dri ma rnams 'byung / 
296a8(dkon brtsegs): dngas ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/ khrag las sha'o// sha las tshal lo// tshal las rus pa'o// rus pa las rkang ngo // rkang las khu chu'i// khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/ de ltar
296b1(dkon brtsegs): theg ma dang / tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir/ lus mi gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o// lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na/ byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du
296b2(dkon brtsegs): sam par bya ste/ lus shes bya ba 'di ni rus pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa bslang ba/ shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum brgyas sbyar ba/ rtsa 'dra ba bzhi brgyas klas pa/ 
296b3(dkon brtsegs): sbar tshad lnga brgyas g.yogs pa/ sdom rtsa drug gis khyabs pa/ rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/ rgyus pa bdun brgyas spel ba/ chu ba bcu drug gis brtan pa/ chu ba gnyis kyis khyab pa
296b4(dkon brtsegs): bkres pa/ rgyu ma 'dem phyed dang bzhis nang grol byas pa/ long ka dang / pho ba dang / 'brel ba'i gnyer ma rim pa ba cu drug tu 'khyil pa/ rtsa bran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung
296b5(dkon brtsegs): byas pa/ gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis snod chag pa ltar/ shig shig por gyur pa/ spu'i khung bu bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus rtswa ltar khebs pa/ dbang po lnga'i
296b6(dkon brtsegs): bug dgu yod pa/ gnas bdun dang ldan pa mi btsang bas yongasu gang ba/ klad pa snyim pa gang dang / tshil snyam pa gang dang / zhag snyim pa gsum dang / bad kan snyim pa drug dang / 
296b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khris pa snyim pa drug dang / rlung gis mtha' dag drangs pa dang / khrag bre gang dang / ngan skyugs phul gang dang / de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar bcad pa ltar so sor yongasu gang
296b8(dkon brtsegs): ba lpags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ ro bro ba drug gis gsu ba/ lus kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin bsreg byed pa/ rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/ lus kyi yan lag de
297a1(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyis blta na mi sdug pa/ dri nga ba/ rnag gi rang bzhin yin na/ 'di la su zhig gus par byed de/ skad cig dgos pa'i phyir/ snod brnyan pa
297a2(dkon brtsegs): tsam du zad pa dang / khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 'ba' shig yin par chos kyis blos gzung bar bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'di ltar mi btsang phung po'i lus la ni// gzugs
297a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon nga rgyal can gang gus byed pa// byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du// mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro// de'i sna nas rnag gi rnam pa 'dzag/ kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung // mig
297a4(dkon brtsegs): rdul chags shing skye bo srin bu can// de la su zhig chagadas shing gus pa byed// dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su// 'di ni dkar por bya zhes bdar byed kyang // dkar po'i
297a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos por mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur// byis blo phyin ci la ga gi nga rgyal can// de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros ldan// nga yI lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te// bskus phyis
297a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas kyang // 'di bdag dbang gis za 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag dpa' sbyin dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de
297a7(dkon brtsegs): dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
297a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas/ rnam pa bzhi cu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/ rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
297b1(dkon brtsegs): lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang / rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa ste/ spad par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rnag zag pa ste/ dri mi zhim par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dang / 
297b2(dkon brtsegs): lus tha mar 'jig pa ste/ snying po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel ba ste/ nyam chung bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
297b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/ mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas
297b4(dkon brtsegs): pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrul pa byed par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang / bu ga dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dang
297b5(dkon brtsegs): lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par/ bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes chog par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus gti
297b6(dkon brtsegs): mug gi mes me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis ldongs par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas
297b7(dkon brtsegs): lus 'dod chags kyi dri bas khebs shing srid pa'i dra bar chud par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus kun nas bugs yongasu gang bas bu ga'i gnasu brtag par bya sa
297b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis gtses par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus srin bu'i rigs brgya khri bzhi stong gi gnasu brtag par bya/ byang chub
298a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag pa
298a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus mthar gyis grub cing mtha' mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyis gnon pa mang pos gang bas nyams
298a3(dkon brtsegs): thag par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas brtan pa med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis
298a4(dkon brtsegs): glags par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dgang dka' bas sa'i gting lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang bde ba'i
298a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs la zhen pas me long lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chu ba sems dpas lus 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems
298a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus rje su chags pa dang khro ba dag gis 'joms par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang gnod pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/ byang
298a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs
298a8(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis yid kyi sems pa yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/ 
298b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus sbyang ki dang / lce spyang dang / khyi rjen sha za ba gzhan gyi za su brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang / rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel bas
298b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs dang / rnag dang / khrag gis yongasu gang ba ste/ blta
298b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skem las byung ba ste/ rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus
298b4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa ste/ shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas/ don med pa'i glags par brtag par bya/ byang chub se mas dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas dgra lta
298b5(dkon brtsegs): bur brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus ya/ nga dang yang sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta burabartag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas lus sdug
298b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gsum gyis gtses te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis ste/ 
298b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga grub pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus
298b8(dkon brtsegs): rkyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang / bdag po med par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bral bas srog med par brtag par bya// 
299a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lus phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus rmi lam lta bu ste/ gsog tu brtag par
299a2(dkon brtsegs): bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul bar byed par brtag pa nga byang chub
299a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas lus brag cha lta bu ste/ slu bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpas lus mig yor lta bu ste/ slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/ khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems
299a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po ded/ gu gis lus la brtag par bya'o// de ltar rtogs pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus
299a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dun pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus bdag gir byed pa dang / lus la sred pa dang / lus la gan/ sa pa dang / lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad
299a6(dkon brtsegs): spong ngo // srog la srog du 'dun pa dang / srog la dga' ba dang / srog bdag gir byed pa dang / srog la sred pa dang / srod la zhen pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / 
299a7(dkon brtsegs): khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
299a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / yo byad thams cad kyi bar dag la 'dun pa dang / dga' ba dang / bdag gir byed pa dang / srid pa dang / gnas pa dang / zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste
299b1(dkon brtsegs): de lus dang / srog la mi lta'o// de bzhin du nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me
299b2(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams la mi lta bar/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongasu rdzogs par byed do// khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems
299b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan
299b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe/ tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// mir rnyed shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed pa la// lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa ma byed
299b5(dkon brtsegs): cig 'di ni dur khrod pa ste lce spyang zas// lus kyi phyir ni/ yang ram 'jug cig/ g.yo ldan lus la sra/ dpa bskyed nas na// byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te
299b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khyam// lus 'di byas pa mi bzo dngos yin pas// nyon mongs tshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // rtag tu nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor// lus 'di ngan skyugs dang ni mchil mas
299b7(dkon brtsegs): gang / bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses// mkhas pa su zhig lus la sred pa skye// lus ni sa gting 'dra ste tshig mi shes// gshed mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso// / 
299b8(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed// de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba skyed// lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sra ma yin// lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig/ 'chi bar rtogs nas bsod/ 
300a1(dkon brtsegs): nams myur du byos// de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa bskyed// zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis// lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te// 
300a2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa byas kyang 'jig par 'gyur yin na// 'di la 'bad pa don med ci phyir bya// bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba// thub 'byung 'di khyod kyis rnyed pa la// sangs rgyas bstan la de
300a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dad pa bskyed// shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro shig/ lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tshe 'gyur ba// des kyang chags pa yongasu spang ba na// su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba/ 
300a4(dkon brtsegs): de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos// ma bsdams mi rnam ras kha cig 'di skad du// ma ri rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnye dad pa la// gzhan tsho rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing // nor btsal/ 
300a5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba myong ba bya zhes zer// nor tshol ba la bde ba ga la yod// bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong ba ra 'gyur// de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spang la// / 
300a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos// longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs// 'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin// skad cig 'byung zhing skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/ 
300a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa bskyed// sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs// dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba// longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid// de ltar
300a8(dkon brtsegs): log pa tshol zhing byis pa 'khyas// sdug bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba// lus la gnod pas mtshungs med bskyed byas nas// rgyal po mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa
300b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba bskyed// bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar// rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa// nyes pa 'di 'dra de dag rig nas su// mkhas pa rnams ni
300b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim la sred mi bskye// rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa// de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing // bu dang chung ma la yang mi byams pa// de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed// bdag gi
300b3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes// brnab mo byas gzo nams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa// brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton// sems
300b4(dkon brtsegs): can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid// yid bzhin sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed// yid brtan kyang ni de la yid mi rton// 'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed// sems
300b5(dkon brtsegs): can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba// sman dang bstan chos dang ga la mkhas ston cing // smad 'tsheng lta bur chi/ ga gis 'dri byed la// khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin// 
300b6(dkon brtsegs): brnab mo dag la mdza' bo rnams kyang med// nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med// 'on kyang de dag nor phyir ston par byed// skye bo brnab la mkhas pas yid mi rton// brnab mo langs
300b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod ched du bya min byed// shin du mi bzad sems ni kun tu bskyed// de phyir mkhas pa yang dag rtogs byas la// ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes kyis// gser dang mu tig nor bu
300b8(dkon brtsegs): byi ru dang // las dges de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung // de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas// de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed// byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste// de bzhin / 
301a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de ni byung ba'i tshe// sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung bas ste// brdzu
301a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed// dper na so ka' nyi ma'i gung dus na// smig rgyu chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin// bskal pa gcig len nas ni 'jig rten 'di// na mkha'i rang
301a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin na mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong // lhun po dag kyang tshig cing rnam par 'jig/ de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro/ chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams// de dag med 'gyur skam 'gyur
301a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po ma dad // mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed// mkha das pa su zhig blo yi stobs ldan pa// de dag rtag tu khyim gyi sgra
301a5(dkon brtsegs): la rtog/ 'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na// de dag ci'i phyi ra ni spong mi byed// 'dren ma'i las kyis longs smra/ da tshol byed cing // bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed// shin
301a6(dkon brtsegs): tu sdug bsngal gyur pa de dus na// bu dang chung ma skyabasu 'gyur ma yin// ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin// bu dang chung ma dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur// bdag nyid gcig pus
301a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong // de dag de che bdag gi skal mi len// mya ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs// 'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur// srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes
301a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang med// de bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med// pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang // bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyis rnams// shi ba'i gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med// las
301b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams rje su 'brang zhing byis pa 'gro// las ni rjesu 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong // las kyis gnas pa 'jig rten rnam par rgyu// skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid reg gyur nas// mkhas pa dag ni
301b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las rnams byed// mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas// pa ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams dang // rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang // de dag ched du mkhas
301b3(dkon brtsegs): pab sdig mi byed// las de yongasu zad pa ma gtogs par// rab tu mi bzad 'jigs las mi mi grol// de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis// bsgrims te sdig pa
301b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spang bar bya// ji ltar las rnams byas pa ma gto/ dgas par// gshin rje'i ring rta dang // mdza' bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshegs dang spun// pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi
301b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la// thob nas/ sdig pa spangs pa ma byas pas// kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // 'di ni mi dge las kyi rnam smin
301b6(dkon brtsegs): yin na las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches// khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas// 'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes// de las chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra// rang gis byas
301b7(dkon brtsegs): rang la rnam par sman// rang gis las kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis// ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa// sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis// de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams
301b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal nyen pa yongasu thar mi byed// legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur// de ltar khyim ni yongasu spang bar bya// khu sgo dbyug pa lhung gi chad pa rnams// su zhig spong 'dong zhi ba don gnyer
302a1(dkon brtsegs): bas khyim la 'jigs par gyis te spang byas la// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cing // khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa// sems las
302a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar// me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la// mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa bskyed// khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed// khyim gnas de bzhin
302a3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod mya ngan byed// nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med do// de ltas khyim ni rab tu spang bar bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa// ma btab ma rmos bde dang yid bde'i
302a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu sdug bsngal mang mo'i rtsi ba khyim 'di la// blun po/ dga' yi mkhas pa gzhan mi dga'// lpags pa chu darmyas sha dang rus pa'i lus// 'di ni nga yi chung ma 'du shes
302a5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed// byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags bskyed par byed// bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes// shes rab ldan pa khyim gyi nyes rig nas// de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba
302a6(dkon brtsegs): kun spangs te// chos la sman gyi 'du shes bzhag byas nas// ma chags khyim nas myur du 'byung bar byed// de nas khyim bdag dpa' byin dang // khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag
302a7(dkon brtsegs): gis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te// de dag bzod pa thob nas/ mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te/ de'i tshe tshog su bcad pa'i
302a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gsol to// sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas// gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa// kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che// 'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste// sa
302b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i// sems 'dir su dag dga' bskyed pa// de dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tshe// sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i// sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa// 
302b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems can thams cad dga'// de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems la su dga' ba// de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing // mtshan gyis shin tu spras pa dang // 'jig/ 
302b3(dkon brtsegs): rten snang ba byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni sems che ste// sems kun nang na dge ba mchog/ yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems
302b4(dkon brtsegs): can bsod nams chung ngu rnams// byang chub sems ni 'dod mi bgyid// 'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa// byang chub sems kyis skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bsod
302b5(dkon brtsegs): nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam kha'i khams ni kun gang ste// de ni bas lhag para' gyur// gang+gA'i bye mgrangs snyed kyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnam
302b6(dkon brtsegs): mi gang gis// rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste// 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas// gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te// byang chub tu ni sems btud na// mchod pa 'di ni khyad
302b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags// de la mtha' ni ma mchis// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba// drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis// dpal yang gzhan ni mchis
302b8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags// sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis// byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan// nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid// sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid// me gsum dag gis gdungs
303a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yis sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// skal ba dpag tu med par spyod// mkhas rnams skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa// / 
303a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnan pa'i rgyal po 'dra// de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob// skye ba rtag tu rnam par spangs// dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal ba// 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du// sems de 'das
303a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi bgyid cing // de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston// sems 'di la ni gang dga' ba// shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog/ sangs rgyas ci 'dra sa gyur// bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ 
303a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// thad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe dzum pa mdzad pa na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
303a5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'o// da 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma byung ba/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
303a6(dkon brtsegs): po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med dag khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon
303a7(dkon brtsegs): par byung ste/ nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas// slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas
303a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga ba de leg su thal mo sbyar
303b1(dkon brtsegs): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
303b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dzum nga mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ga lags rkyen nang la grwa da'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa 'a
303b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mi ston na// ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten phan dgongs thugs brtse bdag la gsungs// khyod kyis ci skad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs// dka' mchid
303b4(dkon brtsegs): chetshe ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa// dbul por gyur pa no//  dang ldan par mdzad// 'jig rten ljongs la myur du mig kyang stsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
303b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang da/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin
303b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags// bcom
303b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' bo khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ kun dga' bo khyim
303b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'di dag thams cad na sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa dag ste/ 
304a1(dkon brtsegs): khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shing phos nas/ nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas/ mthar
304a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed de/ sti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed
304a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing / thugs byung bar mi byed de/ 
304a4(dkon brtsegs): sti stang byed par 'gyur/ btsun par byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan par
304a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa
304a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
304a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
304a8(dkon brtsegs): tokye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ 'di ltar rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 
304b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'is bstan pa zhes bya bar zung
304b2(dkon brtsegs): shig dpa' byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub
304b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag dang / khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
304b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dko' mchog pa rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag ba rgya pa las khyim bdag dpa' byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes
304b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tri dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes
304b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ud yan bad sa rA dzA pa ri bri tsun ma pa ri bar ta/ bod skad du
304b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
304b8(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bi na/ dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu
305a1(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na ma du'i bu mo dpe med phrag dog dang ser snas zin pas/ btsun ma snga sangs can la lhag par dmigs nas/ 
305a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dasa'i rgyal po 'char byed la/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ btsun ma snga sangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni/ dge slong gi'u ta ma dang / lhan cig tu rab tu sbyin chags par
305a3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de/ de'i slad du bdag gis lha la gsol ba lags kyis/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsel zhes brdzun gyis tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to// de nas bad sa'i rgyal
305a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'char byed/ ma du'i bu mo dpe med kyis dbyen byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dal za ba dang / 'khrug pa dang khro ba skyes par gyur to// de yid/ 
305a5(dkon brtsegs): ma rangs shing khro da rngam pas zil gyis non pas/ bcu na mo sngo sangs can bsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdungs nas/ mang 'a ste'u kanya rngam blangs te 'phang so// de nas de'i med la btsun ma
305a6(dkon brtsegs): sngo sangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing bcom ldan
305a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod nas/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ mda' ste'u ka nya ma de de nas phyir log ste/ bad sa'i rgyal
305a8(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo bo'i drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'tshed de/ 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur te/ phar 'gro tshur 'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas/ bdas
305b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi g.yon rol logasu 'dug par gyur to// de'i lus la ni ma phog go// lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa
305b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / de nas btsun mo sde sangs can gyis/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas/ gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
305b3(dkon brtsegs): na khyod la yang bde legasu 'gyur lags so// de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 'jigs shing bsngangs la/ sgyid lugs cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ sa la skyel nas
305b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun me sngo sangs can la tshogasu bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni lha mo 'am dri za mo// sha za mo'am srin mo 'am// nga sra ni ji ltar bzung bar bya// nga yis dris pa de smros shig/ 
305b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i// bud med 'ga' ya/ nga yod min te// ngas ni 'di la gang du yang // thos sa ma mthong ngam shes pa'ang med// nga ni stobs ldan
305b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus can// 'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas// nga yi mnga' 'di gdon mi za// nam yang mi phog yod min te// spre'u 'am yang na bya dang ni// mi 'am yang na 'ben yang rung
305b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la nga yis ma dang 'phangs pa// nam yang mi 'phog yod man na// de ring mnga' 'di 'phangs pa ni// bzlog pa'i tshul du phyir 'ongs te// lus la gnod pa med par ni// nga yi mdun / 
305b8(dkon brtsegs): du 'dug par gyur// gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas kyang // nga ni khyod la gsod 'dod na// nga ni khyod la skyabasu 'gros// sdug bsngal gyur pa ngal skyobs// phyin chad 'di 'dra ma byed kyis// 
306a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba la der bzod kyis// khyod sngon dga' ba dran byos la// dang bar gyis shing khro thul cag/ de nas btsun ma snga sangs can gyis// bang sa'i rgyal po
306a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chang byed la// tshigasu bcad de spras pa// bdag ni lha min dri za ma ni// sha za mo min srin ma mni// bdag ni btsun mo sngo sangs can// 'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma// lha khyod la
306a3(dkon brtsegs): ni snying brtse bas// bdag gis sems ni mnyam bzhag gis// khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod// bskal pa bye ba stong rnamasu// gang gis byas
306a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i legs bsgoms te// byams la gnas pa'i skyes dbu dang // bud med dag ni mi gsod gsungs// gang zhig lo tog smin pa la// ser ltar yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen
306a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams kyis gnod dedang// de'i bstan la bdag dag 'alags// 'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis// bud med rnams ni spang bar gsungs// bud med rnams la/ 
306a6(dkon brtsegs): mi blta ba// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams// bud med bsten par mi mdzad de// de ni
306a7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i spyod yul lags// bud med rnams la brten pa ni// kun nas bdud kyi zhags par gzung // sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni// rku 'joms dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra// 
306a8(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas bud med chags pa dang // sdig pa'i las ni bgyid pa dang // ye shes slong bar 'tshal ba yi// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid// mkhas pa thab 'tshal ba yis// 
306b1(dkon brtsegs): bud med bsten par mi bgyi ste// zhugs bltam du ba mchis pa yi// dong du mtshangs par mi dang lags// yid 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang // bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid ci
306b2(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bas na// khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan// bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te// bdag ni yid ni rab tu dang // khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la// thugs ni rab tu dang
306b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzod// rgyal po chen po bzhung mdzad de// khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la// de yis chos ni gang bstan pa// g.yel ma mchis par khyod kyis gson// de nas bad sa
306b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'chang byed btsun mo sngo bsangs can gyis bskul dbas/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byorapa chen po dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches yongasu bskor
306b5(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdar nas/ brtan cing myur ba myur bar/ ba com ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang / des brtsam ldan 'das mdzes pa dang bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba
306b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags
306b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dpal gyis mdzes shing lam me/ lha me lha nge ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
306b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
307a1(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas pa mthong bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
307a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das la
307a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar ci ga nang / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bang sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bkra
307a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de lta/ ra smros shig/ zlos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la brad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
307a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i ga zhi dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pas/ deng ma du'i bu/ mo dpe med kyis tshig gis khros shing rngam pas zil gyis
307a6(dkon brtsegs): non nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems kyang bskyed/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can dgum pa'i slad du/ 
307a7(dkon brtsegs): mda' ste'u ka nya rnga zhig 'phangs na/ de bar snang la 'bur kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing / me lce gcig tu gyur nas/ bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste/ bdag gi g.yon rol logs
307a8(dkon brtsegs): su mchis par gyur cing / lus la ni ma phog nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can gyi sug pa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ mchis brang sngo sangs can la
307b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du/ khyod lha mo zhig gam/ 'on te klu mo 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ sha za mo'am/ srin mo'am/ su lags zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du/ rgyal po chen po
307b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni/ lha mo yang ma lags/ klu mo yang ma lags/ dri za mo yang ma lags/ sha za mo yang ma lags/ sran mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi bdag
307b3(dkon brtsegs): ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma lags te/ khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i srad du/ sems mnyam
307b4(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag pa lags so zhes mchis nas/ de nas ma chis brang sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba sngags pa rnam grangs du mas brjod pa dang / bcom ldan
307b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di yang de lta bu'i snying
307b6(dkon brtsegs): rje'i bsam pa dang / de lta bu'i byams pa thob pa dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / de ltar mthu che ba dang / de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
307b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar byas pa lta bu dang / 
307b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar mangs pa dang / 'di ltar mi gsal ba dang / 'di ltar mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis tha ba dang // zhe sdang gi sems bskyed/ 
308a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du yang nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ thugs brtse ba
308a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du/ bdag gis nongs par bshags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rjesu gzung bar gsol// slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
308a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyal po chen po khyod longs la rang gi ste na gang yin pa la 'dug shig ces/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rje su gzung bar gnang ngo // de nas bad sI
308a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'char byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gdag tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan
308a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums tshol/ drag shul can lags pas/ bdag
308a6(dkon brtsegs): gis bud med kyi tshig gis/ sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyis pa des bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na
308a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ ci nas kyang bdag slan cad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas/ sdig pa'i sug las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing / 
308a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi skyon de dag
308b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par yang dag par rab tu bshad cing / bud med kyi skyon rnams dang / bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang / bud med kyi sgyu rnams dang / bud med kyi g.yo rnams dang / bud med kyi
308b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / bud med kyi mi brtan pa rnams dang / bud med kyi 'gyur ldog rnams dang / bud med kyi bsten pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshig rnams dang / bud med kyi 'khrul pa rnams
308b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ba shad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gnas de lta bu
308b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu zhus pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bcom ldan 'das dal bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis/ yang 'di skad ce sa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bud med kyi
308b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang du mchis par gyur na/ bud med ni ma rungs ma/ khon can gtum mo// drag shul can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bud med de ni/ bdag sems can dmya
308b6(dkon brtsegs): bar mchis par bgyid 'tshal ba la grabs/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid nyan par 'tshal lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po
308b7(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis je rang gi skyon rnams yongasu rtogs shig dang / de nas phyis bud med kyi skyon rnams yong su rtogs par 'gyur/ 
308b8(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs lag so// legs lagaso// skyes
309a1(dkon brtsegs): pa skyon ji lta bu dag dang ldan na/ skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchis par 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par ra
309a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la/ rab
309a3(dkon brtsegs): tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bco
309a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na/ skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i
309a5(dkon brtsegs): skyon ni bzhi po 'di dag yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa rnams/ la chags par gyur cing / de 'dod pa rnams la bag
309a6(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur nas/ phyir zhing bud med la blta 'dod de/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag la blta bar mi 'dod
309a7(dkon brtsegs): cing / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong na/ bsnyen par mi byed/ bstan par mi byed/ bsnyen bkur mi
309a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis yongasu spangs pas/ dad pa las yongasu nyams/ tshul khrims lnga
309b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu nyams/ gtong ba las yongasu nyams/ shes rab las yongasu nyams shing / dad pa dang bral ba tshul khrims 'chal pa/ zos pa nyung ba/ ser sna can du gyur pa/ yid
309b2(dkon brtsegs): btags kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu spyod pa/ shes rab 'chal ba/ rmal chags pa/ brtsog pa'i spyod yul can/ bshul bar mnam pa la mngon par dga' ba/ mi gtsang/ 
309b3(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga'/ bud med la dad pa che ba/ zhi ba yongasu mi tshol ba/ chags pa'i spyod yul can/ 'gro bar bya ba ma yin par song ba/ smad par 'os pa/ mi gtsang ba'i srin bu
309b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra ba/ snyigs ma la len pa/ 'dod pa la brkam dab/ khrel dang ngo tsha bor ba/ lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/ ngan par smad pa'i 'tshe bas 'tshe ba/ mkhra
309b5(dkon brtsegs): pas smad pa/ byis pa'i skye bo la brten pa/ sdig pa'i ba sam pa dang ldan pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pa sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/ sdig pa la gzhol ba
309b6(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud pa/ bud med kyis 'khol ba/ bud med kyi dbang du song ba/ bud med la gzhol ba/ bud med dang gnas pa/ rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/ rma'i sgo la rten
309b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rma'i sgo la gnas pa/ kha chu dang / snabs dang / mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / she'u rul dang / glang rgyas dang / mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul can/ lug dang
309b8(dkon brtsegs): baglang dang / bya gag dang / khyi dang / phag dang / wa dang / bung bu'i chos spyod pa/ gnod pas 'tshe ba/ pha ma la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sbyin gnas la
310a1(dkon brtsegs): phangs par mi 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa yongasu nyams pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba las yongasu nyams pa/ sems can dus
310a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la zhugs shing gzhol ba/ seng ge dang / na mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/ lcags kyi shing gshal ma ro
310a3(dkon brtsegs): mthon po dang / ma ma mur la gzhol ba/ sems can dmyal ba yang sas dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu cha
310a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag zos nas kyang / bud med la chags shing bud med dang bsten pa// 
310a5(dkon brtsegs): rgad pa dang / ngu ba dang / ca co 'don pa dang / bro brdungs pa dang nga / glu blangs pa dang / rol mo byas pa dag rje su dra na par byed cing / skyo ba mi bskyed/ yid byung bar mi byed/ 
310a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun du spyod cing / kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod
310a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la rten cing / ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa/ 
310a8(dkon brtsegs): dring mi gtsang spad par 'os pa dang // mi mthun 'jigs byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed// don med phung bar byed cing dman pa yin pas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skem la/ 
310b1(dkon brtsegs): brten par byed// brtson pas gang ba'i cha ba khung dring lta bu dang // mnam par gyur tsang rul ba'i khyim rnams ji bzhin dang // shi ba dur khrongs na shin tu smad pa ltar// de bzhin 'dod pa rnam/ 
310b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mchog tu smad pa yin// sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // phag ni ngan skyugs mthong na rgyug pa ci 'dra dang // khyi na sha ya don du she na sar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin mi/ 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed// grags pa med cing mi stan yon tan 'bri ba dang // de las tshul khrims dam pa nyams par gyur pa dang // mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung/ 
310b4(dkon brtsegs): bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par byed// ji ltar ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na// lus ngag rma zhing rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams
310b5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dod pa'i rgyus// rang gi lus kyi dbyibs ni dug tu mo ri/ ga go/ ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i mi zhig/ gis// rnam par 'phrul pas sems can brgya dag dgag
310b6(dkon brtsegs): byed ltar/ de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar 'dod pa rnams// 'dod pa dga' bo'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung // zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang // glu bro sil snyan
310b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po tha dad pa dag gis// khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa ni// gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal sogs pa yin// 'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod
310b8(dkon brtsegs): yin te// mi gtsang mtshon 'dra rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa brjod// 'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing bsten nas ni// dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// 
311a1(dkon brtsegs): gnol 'dod pa dag gis yul rnams rang bsngags shing // 'dod pa gnang ba yon la dga' bar byos pa rnams// de dag don med 'tsho ba rnam par spangs nas ni// 
311a2(dkon brtsegs): bzad g.yang sa chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skye dgu 'di dag ni// rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du// lcags kyi me lce lnga po das/ 
311a3(dkon brtsegs): la chags gyur nas// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur// 'di na byis pa myos shing shin du rmongs pa rnams// shin du mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems/ 
311a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar// lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i dad kyi phyir// rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin/ shes 'dzer// gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las ngag mi/ 
311a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas// 'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gus payod min pas// pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni// don gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thos ma yin// / 
311a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa brjod byed cing // de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed// de dag gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab sogs shing // ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i
311a7(dkon brtsegs): lam yang sogs par byed// mi rnams de dag der chags bde bar 'du shes shing // pha dang ma yang yongasu rab tu spong bar byed// de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par mi
311a8(dkon brtsegs): byed cing // smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag ni tshol bar byed// phan tshun gdung bar 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing // rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom mi rnams nyon mongs pa// bku
311b1(dkon brtsegs): bsti yongasu tshal la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams// chos ma yin par 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed// gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang // de bzhin 'ching / 
311b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jig su rung bar 'gro/ tshe 'ang nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung
