311b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jig 'gyur la// mtho ris nyams zhing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed// lcags/ 
311b4(dkon brtsegs): las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i khrod dag tu// mkhas pas bdag nyid khrod du bor ba de blang zhing // mdzad das pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas bral// ral gri dag gi
311b5(dkon brtsegs): khrod du ma la yang bcas sla zhing // rab tu me 'bar thu lum/ bzung ba de sla la// de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar kha za sla zhing // me dong 'jig su rung ba rnams la reg sla'i// 
311b6(dkon brtsegs): lag pa gnyis ni nam yang bud med reg mi bya// mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa rnams bsten pa// de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing // 'di ltar 'dod rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal
311b7(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang bas// 'dod pa sdug bsngal bdag rnam par spongs// 'dod pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi por gyur pa dang // gang phyir nor ni chud zar 'gyur bar byed pa dang // yid 'ong skye bo rnams
311b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas// bud med nges par bsten pa gnod pa gnod pa thob pa yin// skyes pa gang gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni// bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba// 
312a1(dkon brtsegs): des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam sbyangs shing // des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dga' ma yin// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin/ 
312a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ zla ba dgu'am/ zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar gso zhing / gcin dang phyis yang 'phye bar byed/ bang du blangs nas nu zho ldud par byed pa// phung po rnams bsku
312a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ khams rnams gso bar byed/ 'jig rten ston par byed/ 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed/ don du 'dod / phan par 'dod/ grub pa dang / bde bar 'dod/ 'jig rten la
312a4(dkon brtsegs): phan par 'dod pa te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yin la/ bu la phan pa dang / bde bar 'dod pas/ de dag gis rang gi nar gyi tshogs kyis/ gzhan gyi khyim nas/ gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa
312a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / de de la chags shing myos la 'chums shing brgyal ba dang / lhag par zhen pa dang / lhag par zhen cing dug par gyur nas/ gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de
312a6(dkon brtsegs): la chags shing myos pas sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma dag rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs la/ lus nyams chung zhing mig gis mi mthong ba dag brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang / nor med par byas
312a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rang gi khyim nas phyung ste/ skrod par byed do// rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma dka' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag pa'i bde bas/ sti stang du
312a8(dkon brtsegs): byad bla mar bya/ brjod par bya/ mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/ des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung ste/ bskrad nas gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la/ bza' ba dang / btu
312b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing sti stang du byed/ gcesu byed/ rim gro byed la mchod pa byed cing / yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i snying
312b2(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba med pa dang / mi lta ba dang / ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin
312b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni yang dag par blangs te/ 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/ rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas/ 'dod pa rnams la rten cing / pha ma la brnyas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar
312b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gse bar
312b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni// de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bder 'gyur/ la// 'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang // de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigasu 'gyur// gang
312b6(dkon brtsegs): dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag song nas phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste// de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed
312b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa yi// tshong dpon de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing // de bzhin zhing las 'bras bu phun sum tsho gas 'byung ste// bsod nams
312b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grang ba'i don du brjod par mi nus so// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang // yang na glang dang bung bu rtag tu mi 'gyur te// mi rnams
313a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag spu gri'i so la rdzi mi 'gyur// gang dag pha margas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang // spu gro'i sa dang ldan pa la yang mi rgal te// de dag
313a2(dkon brtsegs): khu bskol ba 'thung ba yong mi 'gyur// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyang sang ba dang // chung ma dang bu mo dam pa dag dang yang // bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sa
313a3(dkon brtsegs): le sbram yang rnyed// gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni// de dag rab 'phrul lha'i pho brang dag dang ni// rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong 'gyur te// lha rnams du
313a4(dkon brtsegs): mas rtag tu dun du bdar bar 'gyur// mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa// thub pa chen pod de 'dra'i ga srung ni thos gyur na// rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyams
313a5(dkon brtsegs): chung gyur pa yi// pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso ma bya/ da// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yi nan// skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing // log
313a6(dkon brtsegs): par blta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi brtan pa yin pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing / byis pa'i skye bos
313a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gis rmongs par gyur pa dang / skyes bu 'dzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang / khrobs zil gyis non cing / sdig pa'i las
313a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / sangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu spangs pa dang / longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang / ser sna can du gyur pa dang / gzhan la gnod par
313b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' zhing / chos goms pas mi dga' ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa/ skyes bu ngas pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing / skyes bu dam pa
313b2(dkon brtsegs): las la mi dga' ba de la ltos// rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams la rten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'dug pa de ni/ skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
313b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dod pa rnams kyi gnyis ni skyes bu rnams nyams shing // gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed// log par lta bas rmongs
313b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'dir ni 'khyam 'gyur zhing // de ni rnam par 'khrul pas dngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// log dang ldan pas yo/ tan kun gyis rnam spangs shing // de ni rtog pa med cing blo sa
313b5(dkon brtsegs): nor ba yin// gang dag chu klung dag tu ud pal rtsa tshol lta ra// log par lta bas yongasu 'khor bar byed pa mi na// bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongasu skyong byed cing // 
313b6(dkon brtsegs): chos ma yin la chags pa'i mi rnams mang po dag/ de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba// de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ gang dag 'dod pa
313b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni// de bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang // 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye bo sdig can dang // 'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga la yod// 
313b8(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams de dag byams pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing // dad pa rnams nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang // 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na// dmyal ba/ 
314a1(dkon brtsegs): bzod drag shin tu 'jig su rung bar ltung // gzugs dang sgra dang rol chags pa'i mi rnams ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing // log pa
314a2(dkon brtsegs): blta bas chos kyang nyan par mi byed la// lan 'ga' 'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas// 'phags pa rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung bas na// de phyir mi yi srid// 
314a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni rnyed pa la// sbyin dul yang dag sdom la nges par bsten cig dang // de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu ni bzo'i gnas/ 
314a4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs dang / las kyi mtha' sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yi ge 'am / rtsis sam/ grangs sam/ lag rtsis sam mtshon chal
314a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba'am/ zhing las sam/ cha nga byed pa'am/ ba lang 'tsho ba 'am/ de lta bu'i bzo 'i gnas sna tshogs dang / las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag
314a6(dkon brtsegs): gis 'tshe bar byed cing / 'di lta ste/ nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/ lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/ cong rong dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ mtsho
314a7(dkon brtsegs): cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/ rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par yang byed/ grang ba'i dus na yang lpags pas gnod par byed/ dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par
314a8(dkon brtsegs): byed cing / bkres pa pa dang skem pa dag gis gnod bzhin du/ 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/ longs spyod yongasu tshol ba na/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag gis longs spyad/ 
314b1(dkon brtsegs): yangasu btsal nas kyang / rang gi 'tshe bdag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs ma bdag la spyan
314b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin par mi bzod cing / bud med rnams kyi dbang du byas pa dang / bud med rnams kyi rdul 'og tu chud pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bkol ba dang / bud med rnams la
314b3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa de nyid kyis/ bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing / de de la chags la/ bud med kyis spros pa
314b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod par byed cing / bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang / bltas pa dang / brgyab pa dag kyang bzod par byed de/ de skyes par gyur kyang / bud med kyis bsdigs pa
314b5(dkon brtsegs): dang du len cing mi dgar med par de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni/ 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yi na te/ rgyal po chen po bud med la brten cing / ngan 'gror// 
314b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni/ skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la 'du ba dang / mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang / shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin/ 
314b7(dkon brtsegs): tetergyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni/ 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
314b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba na// rab tu myos pa ga la bde// 'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pa// de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i// las rnams byed
315a1(dkon brtsegs): cing mi sdom la// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa// de dag rab nyams chud kyang za// mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa// rnga mo bung bu'i chos spyod cing // bud med mthong na rab
315a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyags pa// ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin// gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i// 'dod rnams dring mi gtsang yang // 'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong ba// sa yi steng na dmus
315a3(dkon brtsegs): long bzhin// gzugs kyi 'tshang bas bcings pa rnams// 'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug/ byis pa'i 'dod rnams bsten pa dag/ khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no// sgra dri re dang reg rnam
315a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang la so so'i skye bo rnams// byis pa 'khor bar yongs 'khor ba// spre'u rnams phur la btags pa ba bzhin// byis pa ma rig khyebs pa rnams// mun pa'i phung
315a5(dkon brtsegs): bos bsgribs gyur cing // bud med rnams la chags/ pa ni// mi gtsang gnas pa khwa bzhin no// gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin// 
315a6(dkon brtsegs): ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa/ ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin// bsad pa'i gshed ma rnams kyis ni// ji ltar mi zhig bor ba ltar// shes nas thar pa thob 'gyur zhing // bud
315a7(dkon brtsegs): med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur// 'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i// kun tu sbyor la 'jigs pa skye// byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams// 'dod pa'i srid pa rab tu 'phel// so ka'i dus na/ 
315a8(dkon brtsegs): mi zhig ni// dgon pa chen por song gyur nas// byis pas lan tshwa 'thungs pa na// skom pa 'phel zhing rab skyo ltar// de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i// byis pa rmongs pas 'tshe ba rnams
315b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di na phyir shing bud med la// 'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur// ji ltar mi lus mdze can la// srog chags rnams ni za ba ltar// 'dod pa rnams sa'i skye bo rnams// de bzhin dud
315b2(dkon brtsegs): med rnams kyis zos// mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig/ kha dog ldan par snang mod kyi// nang na ha la ha la'i dug/ drag po chen po yod pa ltar// de bzhin bud brgyan pa dag/ gang dang gang na
315b3(dkon brtsegs): snang ba yang // gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yin// rgyal ba rlung gis bkang ba bzhin// 'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon// gos kyis bkris pa ji bzhin du// de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang
315b4(dkon brtsegs): ral gri klong ba g.yogs sa bzhin// ji ltar me dong gang gyur la// du ba med cing 'bar ldan ltar// bud med dade bzhin me 'dra zhing // srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo// 
315b5(dkon brtsegs): bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na// sa ni kun tu 'bar gyur la// rtswa dang gel ba 'jig 'gyur zhing // chu klu nga dag kyang skam par 'gyur// 'byung ba chen po'i gnas
315b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ rgya mtsho yang ni skam 'gyur zhing // ri bo chen po rnams bsreg la// de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po 'dzin pa yi// sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig
315b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // brag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur la// skyob par byed pa yod ma yin// ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang // rgya mtshor bcas pa bsreg pa ltar// de bzhin bud med me
315b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ste// gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed// snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang // glad rgyas rus pa'i klad pa dang // lus la dri nga 'dzag de la// byis pa rnams ni sbrang rtsi bzhin// khasgra
316a1(dkon brtsegs): rus pas gang ba dang // sha dang lpags la sogs brtsams shing // de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste// dring spang par bya ba yin// mi gtsang sna tshogs gang ba dang // 
316a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras ni smin par gyur pa ltar// de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba// sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no// lte ni mnyem mchar pa dang // gro bos gang zhing mkhal ma dang // khrag dang 'khris pa
316a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gyur la// glang rgyas kyis ni glad pa dang // khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i rigs// brgyad khri bo dag gnas gyur kyang // gti mug dra bas bsgribs pa yi// byis pa rnams kyis phyis ma
316a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong / rma sgo dgu nas rtag tu ni// mi gtsang rul pa zagaH kyang // smra ba dag dang lta ba la// byis pa rnams ni ma tshan mar 'dzin// gang zhig kun gyis spang ba'i yul// 
316a5(dkon brtsegs): chags pa rnams kyis phyis mi shes// mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams// snabs dang mtshal ma za bar byed// spad pa 'os la chags med pa// sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong
316a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin / mchan khung dag nas rdul 'dzag cing // smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa// de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo// des ni myur du phongs gyur te/ 
316a7(dkon brtsegs): nya rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin// 'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis// ji ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar// mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no// / 
316a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam rgyal lag na mtshon thogs pas// ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa ltar// 'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis// 'dod la chags rnams de bzhin bsreg/ shen pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar// 
316b1(dkon brtsegs): myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams// ji ltar dgra yis bsreg pa lhur// myur du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// rang gis las kyi nyes pa yis// de la skyeb pa med ltar// de ba/ 
316b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi nyes pa yis// sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas// bud med rnams kyi rnag la rten// sems ni rol chags gyur pa// de 'aM/ 
316b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni// shing gzhan du ni gyur pa'i tshe// de ni gnas der gtses gyur na// de nyid du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la/ 
316b4(dkon brtsegs): brkam pa dang // sdug bsngal 'dod chags bsten pa dang // gti mug rgyal thogs pa rnams// dus ni yang dang / dang du 'da'// mi bkren rnams ni gsal shing la// rab
316b5(dkon brtsegs): tu btsugs nas 'phyang ba ltar// de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams// shal mi li yi mtho la 'phyang // ji lta 'a mon sran sde'u dang gre'u// lcags zangs rnams
316b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs byas nas// mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na// lbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar// de bzhin dge ba mo mthong shing // 'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams// shi nas ngan song 'gro/ 
316b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // lcags zangs rnamasu btse bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa'i// sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas// zangs ni bye ba drug cu dang // gzhan yang bzhi po
316b8(dkon brtsegs): dag yino// zangs ni so so re ra la// tshad ni dmig su yod min zhing // me yi phung por ldan rnamasu// bskal pa du mar btso bar 'gyur// kha cig zangs rnams de dag tu// rang gi las kyi
317a1(dkon brtsegs): skal brgya 'am// nyin+da suM rgya tshang bar 'dod// yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar 'gyur// sra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni// bzung zhing yang dang yang spags pas// de dag
317a2(dkon brtsegs): sha ni yod min zhing // dung ltar dkar ba rnamasu 'gyur// lcags kyi gzhong par 'dug nas ni// rab tu che zhing 'dren pa med// shi zhing shi zhi skye 'gyur te// rang gi la sa kyis gnas
317a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// gang tshe dmyal ba'i srungs rnams kyis// ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni// brtun la sogs pas brdungs pa na// sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur// de yi tshe na de dag la// shin tu grang
317a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rlung yang ldang // des ni dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// brtun bu drag po rnams kyis 'joms
317a5(dkon brtsegs): sta re rnams kyis gshog pa dang // de bzhin gsal shing ga/ zugs par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byedapa'i// sems can rnams kyi lus la ni// lcags
317a6(dkon brtsegs): mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ral gri mchu can kha rnams kyis// mgo yang glad pa gtogs 'gyur zhing // wa dang spyad
317a7(dkon brtsegs): kis zos par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// ngan skyugs rul pa dri nga zhing // kun gyis snad par ltung 'gyur la// spu gri'i chu klung rnamasu ltung // mi rnams gang dag sdig
317a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa// rab tu tsha bar bsregs 'gyur zhing // ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che// thig nag tu yang bsreg par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang // yang
317b1(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du me mur dang // spu gri chu klung rnamasu lhung // gang tshe lcags kyi zangs po cher// mi rnams gang dag 'tshed pa na// khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nas// de dag bde ba tshol bar
317b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa// dmyal ba drag po chen por ni// lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing // lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur// mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag/ lcag
317b3(dkon brtsegs): las grub pa'i brag chen dang // mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni// de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed// des ni rang gi las byas pas// 'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur cing // de yis tshor ba myang / 
317b4(dkon brtsegs): ba nasade la skyob pa 'ga' yang med// ji snyed rten pa thams cad ni// bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med// der ni/ mgon med bdag cig pu// sdug bsngal tsher ba mye/ 
317b5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes pa ra spyad byas kyang // pha ma de dag de ring ni// rnam par gro/ la ba'i mthu yang med// gang dag bde phyir don min
317b6(dkon brtsegs): par sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams// di ring bdag la 'grol mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // mdza' bshe
317b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid de dag kun// rnam par 'grel par yong mi nus// gang dag bde phyir don min par// sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang // bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun// de ring 'grel bar mi nus so// 
317b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten cing // dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni// nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag/ de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab 'chal pa mnar med par/ 
318a1(dkon brtsegs): song nas sdug bsngal tsher ba myong // sangs rgyas rnam sa bud med dag/ phyi sa 'dri ltar mnam par bsgrags// de phyir dman pa rnams dang ni// dman pa
318a2(dkon brtsegs): bud med rnams bsten pa// byas pa doni phyis yi// rgyal pa bzung nas gnas pa yin// ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar// de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'thob 'gyur te// rgyal po yin chad pa dang
318a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal cing ba'ang myong bar 'gyur// bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang // bsad dang btsang ba myong 'gyur dong // dmyal srungs rnams kyis bsregs pa dang // nges par 'chi ba'ang/ 
318a4(dkon brtsegs): myong bar 'gyur// bud med rnams la brkam pa yi// blo tra nu de dag bde mi 'gyur// gsal shing mthon po rnam su ni// btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur// sa
318a5(dkon brtsegs): yi ser khar bcug nas ni// de bzhin ral gris gdab pa/ ra 'gyur// de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni// de dag chad bde mi 'gyur// rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu// yang
318a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du 'du 'jibyed// sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams bston cing // dman pa rnams kyang smra bar byed// rmongs pa rnams kyis rmos nas// dge ba gsungs shes brjod byed kyang / 
318a7(dkon brtsegs): de sems bud med phyi bzhin song // byi ba la ni byi la bzhin// rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang // ha la ha la'i dug 'dra ba'i// 'dod chags kyis
318a8(dkon brtsegs): ni de yang 'khrug/ ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig/ bsdangs shing skrag pa byung gyur kyang // des ni phyi sa mthong ba na// chags pa bskyed par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnam/ 
318b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni// 'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas// des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams la chags myos nas// shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing // 
318b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims can dag bslus byas nas// phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing // de 'dra'i chos ni chos gyur nas// 'dod kun spangs nas 'di la ni// mkha
318b3(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon byung rab byung shig/ rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'dod pa la rten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te// 'dod pa'i gzhi dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni// 
318b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis rtag par rgyu/ na du sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom par bya'o// khyod kyi
318b5(dkon brtsegs): lus su gtogs pa'i sems rje su dran pa bsgom par bya 'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal ba 'char byed la/ de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de// chos
318b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa des/ bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ba sI
318b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
318b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing / legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan
319a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su mchi ste/ mtshan cha spangs shing dbyug pa spangs la/ ngo tsha mchis shing / srog chags 'byung po thas
319a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la snying brtse bar zhugs pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzungs du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bad sa'i rgyal ba
319a3(dkon brtsegs): 'char byed dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
319a4(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtse gas pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs/ stong phrag brgya dpa las bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa'i le'u
319a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hid zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba/ ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas
319a6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ bam po gcig sho lo ka nyis brgya/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu
319a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa// / bam po phyed/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ Aru su ma ti dA ri ka brid tshwan ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo blo
319a8(dkon brtsegs): gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
319b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems
319b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bu mo blo gros bzang me zhes bya ba btsas
319b3(dkon brtsegs): nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa// 
319b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khra ngag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa/ 
319b5(dkon brtsegs): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas bar/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
319b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol/ 
319b7(dkon brtsegs): pa gal te skabs phye bdag gis ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhe// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
319b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa// yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni// bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun// ci 'dra khyod la bstan par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
320a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo bla gros bzang mos tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur// gang gis nor ni che ba dang // mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur// thub
320a2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di ni bdag la gsungs// chos kyi rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni// gang gis brdzus te skye 'gyur zhing // mdab ma stong ldan pad+ma la// mchis par yang ni gda' ba dang // zhing rnams bye ba
320a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas pas// sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchis pa yi// rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 'gyur ba'i// spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur// tshig kyang
320a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun par 'gyur ba dang // las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang // bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang // 'chi ba'i dus ni brgya dad pa na// mngon sum sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // de las chos
320a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang nyan pa dang // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur// de skad ce/ sa gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu me blo gra sa bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis de
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legaso legaso// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bu mo blo gros bzang mos bcom
320a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la legaso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
320a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tha na dgra la yang khro bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa la gnas pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug
320b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// mdzes par 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed// byams pa la gnas byed dang rwa
320b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na ni// mdzes par 'gyur te lta bar 'os pa yin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// nor che bar 'gyur te/ bzhi
320b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re bar sbyin pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
320b4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag dang ldan na/ nor che bar 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dus su sbyin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang // yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba// dpa' bo rnams kyi las 'di byas
320b5(dkon brtsegs): pas na// rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin// bu mo byad chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// 'khor/ mi byed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i
320b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig spangs pa dang / sems can log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos
320b7(dkon brtsegs): srung ba dang / sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'khor mi/ 
320b8(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong // dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe na srung bar byed// sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na// 'khor
321a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams mi phyed phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na/ na pa
321a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang she na/ 'di lta s+t+wa~M/ phyi ma 'am/ me tog ud pa la'am/ pad+ma'am/ gu su dadang / pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhi/ 
321a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang / gzhan dag la yang gnod sems mi bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs/ 
321a4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs
321a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rin po rje chen po'i pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang // gnod sems spong
321a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang // mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed nas// rgyal ba dag gi thad du brdzus te skye// bu me byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs
321a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar tshod mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang / 
321a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
321b1(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang // gzhan gyi chos gtam dag la mi smod dang // rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams la
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mar me 'bul// ting 'dzin bsgom pas de ni zhing du 'gro/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par dge ba'i bshu
321b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyen dag la brten pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad khong khro bar mi byed// 
321b4(dkon brtsegs): cing / mi snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dang / chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dgra zla med par 'a/ gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
321b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de g.yo med// gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na// rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems/ 
321b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang // 
321b7(dkon brtsegs): klan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang / gzhan chos smra ba dag la 'phya bsgyur mi byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ tshig btsun par 'gyuraro// de la
321b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing // klan ka mi tshel chos ni nyan byed na// 'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun pa/ 
322a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'bus byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing / yong su dag pa yang myur du rtags par 'gyur te/ bzhig she na/ 
322a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa sgrub pas/ sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang / mdo sde zab mo rnams ma spong ba dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams
322a3(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ las kyi sgrib pa med par
322a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / yongasu dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam dpas sdom pa gsum la gnas// mdo sde zab mo rnams rtag tu
322a5(dkon brtsegs): mos sangs rgyas sras la thams cad mkhyen ltar ba lta// sems can rnams la byams pas las dga' gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// 
322a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom pa dang / 
322a7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi las med par 'gyur// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos rnams la ni chos kyi
322a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul rtogs la// brtson 'grus gnas shing sangs rgyas rje su dran// yongasu bsngo zhing bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba// de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// bu mo byang chub
322b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing / de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myang bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
322b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / mos pa mang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub pa dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa
322b3(dkon brtsegs): la brtson pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing de las chos kyang nyan la/ sdug bsngal yang
322b4(dkon brtsegs): myong bar mi 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ded ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // mos pa dag ni sbyin pa rgya che ba// mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin par byed// de
322b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
322b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslabs pa ji skad bcas pa 'di dag la/ bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bslab pa bzhi
322b7(dkon brtsegs): bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag las chos gcig ma spyad na yang / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal
322b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og du chud par dka' na/ khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par
323a1(dkon brtsegs): len par byed na/ ci khyod kyis sems la dbang thob bam/ de skad ces smras nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la
323a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden
323a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ lha'i me tog char 'bab par gyur cig/ ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra
323a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo blo gros pa zang mos/ de ltar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya das ma thag tu/ de'i mod la steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i
323a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ lhan me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cing / ma bkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to// btsun pa mo'u
323a6(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ ma 'ongs
323a7(dkon brtsegs): dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams
323a8(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dag can du gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang me'i tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ thams cad dang / 
323b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
323b2(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas
323b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so// blo gros bzang mo khyod/ 
323b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la gnas te/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di byas/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas/ de la gnas pa/ 
323b5(dkon brtsegs): mi nus te/ 'di la dri ba ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo byang chub ces bya 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras
323b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
323b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni/ na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyi tshig bla ngag so// 'jam
323b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis spras pa/ tha gros bzang ma ci/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa mdzad dam/ the gros bzang mos sbas pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ smig rgyu dang brag/ 
324a1(dkon brtsegs): chas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyang // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo khyad cil bsams te/ 
324a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la yang bsam pa'am/ bsam pa ma lags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
324a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang mo bsam pa de lta bu yin du zin na/ byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro// blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ byis pa rnams
324a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzhan la/ mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te/ byang chub kyang gzhan par de ltar gzigs sam//  ci'i slad du ni na/ 'di lta ste chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du/ 'di ni dbyings
324a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig pa lags te/ blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma maH/ sa la/ sgro btags pa ma mchis so// 'jam dang / la gyis smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo bshad pa 'di'i don
324a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed cig yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni// sgyu ma sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed do// 'jam dpal gyis
324a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang med na/ de'i sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yod/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa
324a8(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
324b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni/ ngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// ji skad
324b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin te/ bu mo blo gros bzang mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ skal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag
324b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// khyod kyang bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan
324b4(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/ bu me bla gros bzang mo la phyag byas na/ das/ tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring mo zhig nas mthong ngo zhes kyang smras// bla gros bzang
324b5(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ma rtog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi ga pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci'i phyir slob
324b6(dkon brtsegs): dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las da dung ma bsgyur/ blo gros bzang mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ni bud med do// 'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod
324b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi the tsom med par bya'o// bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur ba'i bden pa des/ bdag skye
324b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces spras ma thag tu de'i mod la/ de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par gyur te/ chos gos ngur smrig gyen nas/ 
325a1(dkon brtsegs): des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis byang chub thob pa na/ dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud
325a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'byung bar mi 'byung ba dang / ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang / bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs na// 
325a3(dkon brtsegs): lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de'i mad la/ de dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs
325a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur rgyu dar to// 'jam dpal bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang dang ga gi/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sems ca
325a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang / bas mas pas bza' ba dang / btung ba 'grub par 'gyur/ te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi spyod pa dang / 
325a6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongasu spang bar 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che 'dra bas yod/ 
325a7(dkon brtsegs): su bskor cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis brgyan la/ steng rin po che'i bla re bres te/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur
325a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad ces smras
325b1(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu de'i mod la/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to// de nas sa pra'i lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad
325b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis go bar byas te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ de lta bur 'gyuraro zhes
325b3(dkon brtsegs): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang
325b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang de dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
325b5(dkon brtsegs): par skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar
325b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// be com ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang// 
325b7(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to// lha be ba phrag brgyad bcu ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags brgyad
325b8(dkon brtsegs): stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi ses la phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga steng tsam yang / byang chub sems dang / 
326a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba nyid mthong nas/ de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol
326a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngos nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bla na med pa yang
326a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos ma thag tu bskal
326a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te/ bor nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog/ dpar gnas par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan
326a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag/ ni bskal pa bcu gnyis na/ bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka'
326a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
326a7(dkon brtsegs): pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thams cad ming mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
326a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yino// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa steng gi bar du/ thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral
326b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad la/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du lan re bklags na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni bsod nams kyi phung po 'di/ 
326b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang mi phod stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam
326b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis/ khyed 'thun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
326b4(dkon brtsegs): shig chongs shig/ shod cig/ lhogs shig/ ston ci dag/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 2'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid
326b5(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa de srid du/ rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyurar la/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po shi na/ ri/ na po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de/ 
326b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'jig rten na/ ji srid du spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chu
326b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal de bas na/ mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu
326b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi ger bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
327a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// 'di ni nga'i rjesu bstan pa yin no// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod
327a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la ngas bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad/ 
327a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
327a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grang das stong phrag brgya pa las 'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu pa rdzogs
327a5(dkon brtsegs): so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
327a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gang god ta ra pri tsA ma hA yA nA nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 
327a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe grong khyer chen
327a8(dkon brtsegs): po mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mgon med zas sbyin gyis
327b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ra ba ga la 'der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
327b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog la/ gang+gA'i khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes smras so// gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis sprul
327b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la smras te khyod de gzod gang nas 'ongs shes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa la
327b4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'greng ba med/ 'dug pa med/ nyal ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ 'chi 'pho med/ skye ba med na// 'di nas 'ongaso zhes de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i
327b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+ga'i mchog de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom
327b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs shes ci'i slad du smras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i
327b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho ris su mi 'gro/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro na/ ci gang+gA'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro/ mtho risu mi 'gro/ yongasu mya
327b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/ gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags
328a1(dkon brtsegs): par mthong na ni/ dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog/ ngan song du 'gro ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags
328a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bdag sprul pa dang / bstan du yang mi rung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhon nas gzhan lags par ma mthong ste// 
328a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ma mthong na/ bge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho risu mchi ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'chi ba zhes ji skad
328a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang 8/ g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / bskyod pa dang / sgo ngas pa ma mchis na/ 'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba'i
328a5(dkon brtsegs): mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni/ nams
328a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i
328a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod ci yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom
328a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skye ba la smras te/ khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom
328b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig bla dgas yin na/ de ni ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/ gang+gA'i mchog gis
328b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mtshungs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mya ngan
328b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa mtshungs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mtshungs pa lags na/ gang+gA'i mchog khyod yongasu mya ngan 'das pa
328b4(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de ci zhig smra ste/ dbacom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la smras/ te/ khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par
328b5(dkon brtsegs): ma zhugs sam zhes de skad ces bgyis na/ ji skadalan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs
328b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas smras lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mo/ 
328b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag gis don chen por 'gyur bas dris so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin gshegs
328b8(dkon brtsegs): bas ni chos nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ gang de las byung ba'i chos yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la zhig yod/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom
329a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sang ma rgyas te/ de las byung ba'i chos lta ga la zhig mchis par gyur na/ bac+doMs kyis byang chub
329a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi slad du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub
329a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe/ yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro// gang gi tshe yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi
329a4(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ bsam gyis mi khyu dab pa zhes bgyi ba/ ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab
329a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog chos 'a de ni sems pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/ sems
329a6(dkon brtsegs): bas thob par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/ gang+gA'i mchog sems mi
329a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtog pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon sum
329a8(dkon brtsegs): du byas pa ma yin te/ de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang+gA'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ 
329b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad na mkha' ltar nges par thugasu chud de/ gang+gA'i mchog chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos
329b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes gtags pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
329b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa zhes btags pa dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa
329b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
329b5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang+gA'i mchog 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag bdag ce/ sa 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhi na du gang+gA'i mchog ngas/ gzugs shes btags te// 
329b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ngas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes pa
329b7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi dmigs so// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun
329b8(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang ngas btags te/ mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so// gang+gA'i mchog
330a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yang med de mi dmigaso// gang+gA'i mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs shes bya bar btags kyang / gzugs gang yang mi
330a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// ngas tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar btags kyang / rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmig so// phung po rnams dang / 
330a3(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 
330a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar ngas da btags kyang / don dam par na de dag thams cad ma dad cing mi dmigs// gang+gA'i mchog gang la mchog tu 'dzin
330a5(dkon brtsegs): pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyad pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yino// gang+gA'i mchog mngon pa'i nga rgyal
330a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas la dmigs nas/ tshangs pa spyad pa spyod par de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongasu ma dag pa'o zhes ngas smras so// gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa de dag ni/ 
330a7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ bsngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
330a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu mi 'grol te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bskal pa can du 'gyuraro zhes nga smra'o// gang+gA'i mchog da ltar ram/ nga 'das/ 
330b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyin yang rung ste/ gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la mi gti mug pa dag gsod pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag log/ 
330b2(dkon brtsegs): par zin pas/ bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gang+gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba/ ci'i slad du/ 
330b3(dkon brtsegs): na rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang+gA'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud bcad pa'am/ dbye ba'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyud chad pa zhes byas
330b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab dpa'i rgyud ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyis
330b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu
330b6(dkon brtsegs): dag byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ 
330b7(dkon brtsegs): slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ 
330b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par
331a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum par mi mdzad na/ 'dzum par mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ngas mngon par
331a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis/ gang+gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag la brtsams te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// dge bsnyen ma de ngag
331a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
331a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci nga lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs
331a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya b.razung shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ dge/ slong bdun brgya dang / dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa med pa/ 
331a6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te/ 
331a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na/ dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig smra yang / de'i lus ngal bar
331a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yang gang+gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dag pa spyad pa dang / yun ring po nas tshangs
331b1(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'din ngo mtshar to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon
331b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya bar byas pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring po tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge bsnyen
331b3(dkon brtsegs): ma gang+gA'i mchog dang / lha dang mau dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pad/ 
331b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag/ brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gang+gA mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes da bya ba ste 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dan ts+li
331b5(dkon brtsegs): ya dang zhu chen gyi po tsug gde ye shes sdes bsgyur 'i nus te/ gdags mad kyis byangs sa nas/ zhal bab// su log brgya dang cu'o// rgya ga ga du/ A s+yas shoka dang ta bya kar/ na ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan med/ 
331b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po gcig go// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
331b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
331b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ steng pa nyid la gnas pa
332a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas pa'i chos ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang
332a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa
332a3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa'
332a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po de las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung
332a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang / chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sa mas dpa' lag na rin chen thogs dang / byang chub sems
332a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo bsgyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo bsgyur chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub
332a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub
332a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang / byang chub se
332b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang
332b2(dkon brtsegs): zathabs gcig tu bzhugaso// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs
332b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / zhang blon gyi bu tsha dang / zhabs drung na 'khod pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams
332b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mtsho dra ba byas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya ste/ rang du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos
332b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba bar/ du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ de na bzang po tshig 'bru ba zang po ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ 
332b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa
332b7(dkon brtsegs): byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / 
332b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs
333a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chagasu bsad
333a2(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi phyir rgyu zhing mthar gyis/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ phyogs gcig tu cang ma smra bar 'khod do// yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bo dra/ 
333a3(dkon brtsegs): na bu mo mya ngan med kyi byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas/ lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po// rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ 
333a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bku byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de
333a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis thA na bas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong nas/ khri de las ma
333a6(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bsur yang mi 'gro phyag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan yang mi 'dings/ bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras
333a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas/ rang gi khang bzangs kyi snga khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin
333a8(dkon brtsegs): pabs/ mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo
333b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras// bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ 
333b2(dkon brtsegs): che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rje su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes
333b3(dkon brtsegs): pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying brtse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam cin// 
333b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gta dam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ 
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa dang gus pa yang mi bskyed par/ ci'i phyir ma gus pa sten cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don gyi dang zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med
333b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smraso// yab 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ ci 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po// rgyal phran la ldang ba'am/ sur mchi ba nam yang
333b7(dkon brtsegs): gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam sur 'chi 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ 
333b8(dkon brtsegs): bu ma de ni ma yin// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/ sur mchi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo don ma yin no// bu mos spras pa
334a1(dkon brtsegs): yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos
334a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri nag po gzhan dag la 'dud pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba gsen tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu
334a3(dkon brtsegs): modo ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin// 
334a4(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ yab ci dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ni/ dawal ldang ba'am/ sur mchis pa gsan tam/ gdazigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu ma doni ma yin no// 
334a5(dkon brtsegs): mos smras pa/ yab bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la/ 
334a6(dkon brtsegs): dman pa la mos pa nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldan pa 'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bkur bsti brtsi
334a7(dkon brtsegs): dam yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor ram/ bskor bar/ bgyid pa na/ nyan thos dman pa zhan pa zhum pa/ nyi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la// 
334a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba'i/ 'dud par bgyid/ yab lha'i bdag po// lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag/ 
334b1(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba'am/ sur mchi bar bgyid/ yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i lnga khang / bla na med pa don du gnyer ban/ 
334b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi
334b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi rmag rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjesu song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/ sur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal
334b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid/ yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang 8/ rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs bu'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu ting
334b5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la/ ldang ba'am/ su ra mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am// / 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa bskyed par byed/ yab su zhig
334b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyo ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thob nas/ srin bu ma
334b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
334b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ 
335a1(dkon brtsegs): srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid 'angag gnams pa gan gas kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyuraro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten na/ thams
335a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems bskyed pa gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di
335a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag mthong bzhin du/ mi ldang zhing sur mi 'gro la/ phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang / bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyod lhag pa'ing
335a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can zhig go// de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya nga na med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga
335a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyed grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/ sur mi ba zhung / stan mi 'dings pa lags na/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga
335a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de dag ning dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po
335a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa spangs te/ sems can
335a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ bu mos smras pa/ yab byang chub sems dpa' ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spangs pad
335b1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshalo// yang nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 
335b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa spang ba dang / dge ba'i rtse ba yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ za ba dang khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa bsal bar bgyi bar yang ma mchis/ spangs par bgyi ba dang / da
335b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis/ nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed
335b4(dkon brtsegs): pas chos bstan du lags kyang / yab de dag la ni tshul khrims kyang galas mchi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang galas dmache/ shes rab kyang galas mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang
335b5(dkon brtsegs): ga las mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ya ngag las mchi/ yab 'di lta ste dper na/ bum pa chab kyis gang ba'i nang du char bab na/ de chab kyi thigs
335b6(dkon brtsegs): ba gcig kyang mi len la/ der gnas par yang mi 'gyuraro// yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la/ gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags kyang / de dag 'dzin mi
335b7(dkon brtsegs): la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'phel ba/ 
335b8(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyuraro// yab 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni
336a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang da
336a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin cing chos bstan thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen gyi gyis kyi da de ni
336a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra yi bu mor gyur pa ni/ mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid brgyan/ nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lcags kyur
336a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang / de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma lags// ma skyes dedagra yis de la smras pa ni// bu mo don 'ding las nya dpar gyis// khyod kyi nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du/ phyag byar
336a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ldang mi byed// bu me mya ngan med kyis byin na re// nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// ci phyir pha/ ga 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba// bdag mchis yab cig tshig ni
336a6(dkon brtsegs): gsan par gsol// dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang // rin chen 'byung khung nas ni mching bu blangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos
336a7(dkon brtsegs): blangs snyam bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// kar sha pa ni gcig tsam gsol na ni// de yis rgyal po bstan pa don
336a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis// gang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas// bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni// des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des ni rgyal po legs par bstan
336b1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// kar sha ba ni spong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang shig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams// thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod bskyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid// 
336b2(dkon brtsegs): nor rnams sgrub bgyid mo ni ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste// rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub re gnas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dpe
336b3(dkon brtsegs): na nad pa nad brgyas gzar rnams sman pa yis// grol ba bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi ngag phyir 'brang ba yi// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa'
336b4(dkon brtsegs): sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid// sems can mngapo grol bgyid sman pa btang nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs
336b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas sman par gnyer ba na// sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// ji ltar nad pa sos par gyur/ pa thams cad la// sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi
336b6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do// 'di na sman pa gang zhing bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso bar sems kyi sems
336b7(dkon brtsegs): can gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dra'i bdag nyid khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyi// sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed// sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta ba
336b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa// de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis 'dud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags// gang gis
