337a1(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas// bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyid pa ltar// mkhas
337a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis mchod pa bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags// gang gis ye shes rig pa gtso ba rtogs gyur nas// sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa// de dag byang
337a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste// de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags// e ran da yi shing sdang mdzes pa ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma 'ang yangs pa
337a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lags te// e ran da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi// rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags// tsan+dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis// 
337a5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags// de bzhin bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis don bgyid
337a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam kha lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma langs// tshabs gdungs pa zhi bar mi bgyid la// gang+ga'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong // tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// bal
337a7(dkon brtsegs): rmig rjes chu 'dra nyan thos kun// sems can kun gyi tsha ba zhi mi bgyid// gang+gA'i klung 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid// ji ltar
337a8(dkon brtsegs): rin chen char ni 'bab pa na// dbul po dag ni mgron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin
337b1(dkon brtsegs): chen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// semams can don slad mang du len par bgyid// ji ltar sems can// 
337b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ri rab kyi// drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur// ri bo gzhan la sems can rnam mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab
337b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu rnams// rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid// yab cig ji ltar rtswa bran rtse mo ya
337b4(dkon brtsegs): zil pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid// rab khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di// tshim par rab gyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad
337b5(dkon brtsegs): zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' ra ba 'bebs sprin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni// stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par
337b6(dkon brtsegs): bgyidaka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog mni// des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 'gyur// tsam pa ka'i me tog dri la dga'// ud pa la bar shi ka yang de bzhin no// nyan thos ka ra bi
337b7(dkon brtsegs): ra'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur// kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu 'chi ba
337b8(dkon brtsegs): de la mtshar ci mchis// gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad// nyan thos mi rang gtsag pu mchi ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra// 'gron zhig
338a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyis stsal ba 'tshal ba dang // skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun 'gron bzhin// sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa'
338a2(dkon brtsegs): kun la 'gron bgyid bzhin// gzings las brten pas chu bo chen po las// gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// brtan gyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni// sems can
338a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid// nyan thos gzings las brten pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i byang chub gru zhugs byang chub sems// sdug
338a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid// ji lta g.yul nger bong bu zhon na ni// dgra las rgyal b.ranus par mi 'gyur gyi// glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni/ 
338a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yul du lhags pa'i ngagra rnams choms par nus// 1na thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste// sems can kun la pa/ 
338a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bde slad du// de dag shing dbang drung du bdud rnams 'joms// ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni/ 
338a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mo mkha' la thig le bzhin du mdzes// yab cag nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman sman du// 
338a8(dkon brtsegs): shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid// yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyis// 'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna ma// 
338b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi// shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can
338b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grol ba yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang // ri dgas tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi// seng ge'i skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'bye
338b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// yab cig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud rigs skrag
338b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi bskyed// su zhig/ bla med byang chub spangs nas ni// theg pa dman la 'dod pa
338b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bgyid// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs spang sa nas// theg pa dman la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid/ de dag 'tsho na rnyed pa thob ma 'gyur// de dag mir skyes pa
338b6(dkon brtsegs): ni nyes par mchis// gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub mchog la 'dun pa bskyed par bgyid// de dag legs 'tsho rnyed par legs par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob pa
338b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten sman slad las bgyid yid kyang rton// gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag u dum ba ra'i
338b8(dkon brtsegs): me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigasu bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'dis
339a1(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na ci bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snya mo// de nas tshe dang ldan
339a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras// ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa ma yin// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang
339a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs sam/ smras pa ma yin no// bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga'
339a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig don du gnyer na ni/ bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrogs rab zhig na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag nangs gang yang don du mi gnyer te/ de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra
339a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrogaso// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci bu ma khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni// btsun pa sha ri'i bus chos gang mngon sum du bya
339a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos de la ci nyan thos shes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par bzhig pa yod dam/ gnas brtan shA
339a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chas de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhag pa maud/ chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
339a8(dkon brtsegs): la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ches de la ni don du gnyer ba ci yang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad
339b1(dkon brtsegs): ces smras// bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod// tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa
339b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid la bye brag ni ci yod// tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ni tso yang med do// bu mos btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la ji/ 
339b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang
339b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' dadang bla gab med pa la yang / bye brag med tsang tha dad/ du dbye ba ci yang med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sang+yas
339b5(dkon brtsegs): byis rnams dpa sa'i skyeb kyi mi rnam la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra/ bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po
339b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu chos lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams
339b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dman pa mthong ngam ci na/ khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ sur yang mi 'gro/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang
339b8(dkon brtsegs): spyan 'dren par mi byed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stang
340a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ skar ma'i gzugasu gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo
340a2(dkon brtsegs): snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bas grangs shes kyi/ snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par
340a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pa nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thad kyi sems kyi spyad
340a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
340a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khyu/ da par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun ba mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 
340a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cag yod/ 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mau'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
340a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'u gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ ma byon pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ ma dag
340a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mes smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed ci
340b1(dkon brtsegs): yod/ gti mug la spyad pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ cha mnyam pa la spyad pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ ma'u gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu ma ngon mo shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun/ 
340b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma'u dgal gyi bu chen po// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni/ 
340b3(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu me de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
340b4(dkon brtsegs): ni ji snyed cig yodam dgal gya bus smras pra/ bu ma dan me shes sa// bums smras pa/ tsun pa ma dgal gya bu chen pa nyan thos kyis 'dul bar/ 
340b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can na ji skad cag yang / rang sangs rgyas kyisa'adul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ sa sa rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ 
340b6(dkon brtsegs): shes sam/ mo gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ 
340b7(dkon brtsegs): log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed yod/ ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji skad cig yod/ shes sam/ mo dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes// bu mos smras pa// / 
340b8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na// 
341a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin// btsun pa ma ru gal gyi bu
341a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/ btsun pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na
341a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
341a4(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljon/ pa thams cad las rba la gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang
341a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mod gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ma yang nga kho bos ngag dang thos na/ sangs rgyas la lta bad
341a6(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khrid las ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis byang chub sems
341a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos
341a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des/ bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar
341b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces byaso// de nas bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed/ 
341b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od zer gyis/ de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par
341b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o// chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
341b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// tsan+dan sbrul gyi snyingadapo'i dro des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di khya ba par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed
341b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'od zer des kyang / gsung gi yan lag drug bcu dang / ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 
341b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
341b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tsher nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i
341b8(dkon brtsegs): dri 'di ga las byung lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyi
342a1(dkon brtsegs): byin pa 'dis/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi kham
342a2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 
342a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsin+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo dag
342a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dra gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sem ras dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / rnam
342a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba/ 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos nas/ nyan thos dam/ na ba zhan pa zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la
342a6(dkon brtsegs): ldang ba'am/ sur 'gro ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de jo tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/ mau dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu
342a7(dkon brtsegs): mo don mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po// gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis/ stong gsum gyi sta
342a8(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sa lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ 
342b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa/ bgrang ba'i thabs kyis
342b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang ba
342b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di ces smraso// bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
342b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de bzhin
342b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas/ gang dag nga la gzugasu mthong // gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa// log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams
342b6(dkon brtsegs): ni chos nyid lta// 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam par shes mi nus// zhes ma gsungs sam/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bu mo
342b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sngon mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po
342b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te gzugasu ma yin no// lha'i mig gis ma yin te tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin
343a1(dkon brtsegs): te 'du shes kyis ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te rnam par shes par ma yin// btsun
343a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen
343a3(dkon brtsegs): po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong te/ dper na/ gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos
343a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pad / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin// chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so// 
343a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'o/ srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te de dag ni mi blta bar mi nuso// 'od srung chen pos
343a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga'
343a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig yongasu grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongasu grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta
343a8(dkon brtsegs): ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongasu grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam 'on te med pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 
343b1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par sbyang
343b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas ni/ bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// 'od
343b3(dkon brtsegs): srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ chos tham/ 
343b4(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin med pa'i nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis na ba dag la lta ba rnam par 'gyuraro// 'od srung chen pos sgra das pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 
343b5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin// rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no// 
343b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/ bu mo
343b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes pa la ni rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo zhes de skad gsungaso// bu mos smras
343b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa las lta ba rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ro// btsun pa
344a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra ma tshol lo// btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 
344a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na/ dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin// 'od srung
344a3(dkon brtsegs): chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems can tham
344a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes paskyed par mi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dang de'i tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po
344a5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad ni sngon gyim tha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar
344a6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyar ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs
344a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med/ mi sbyor ba yang
344a8(dkon brtsegs): med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
344b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos thams cad la gnyi su med par mthong la/ mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na/ de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no// btsun pa 'odang srung chen po mthong ba zhes/ 
344b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni/ mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dag so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar mthong
344b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du blta bar bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo // bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de
344b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o// gtam de sa/ da brjod pa'i skabasu gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo
344b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi spobs pa 'di 'dra ba ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs/ par rnyed do// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras/ pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur
344b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma
344b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na
344b8(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ 'jig rten ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma
345a1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin// rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i chos mi dmigs shing
345a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi rlo mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis
345a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis
345a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu// bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci brjod cing // smrar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kyi de
345a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid de la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyi sa smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa
345a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ rab
345a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor
345a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag cha la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med de bu mo rgyu dang rkyen chos/ 
345b1(dkon brtsegs): pab las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang brten
345b2(dkon brtsegs): nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bum chos thams cad ni brten nas byung ba'o// bums smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams
345b3(dkon brtsegs): cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
345b4(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so// de bzhin grashegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na' byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma
345b5(dkon brtsegs): snyed ni de ltar bzhugaso zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smra/ nyes pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'argyu/ ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings
345b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni nub par 'gyur bar mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa
345b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bstan du med pa'o// de ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/ de ni bstan kyang rung ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/ dngos po med pa dang / brjed du med
345b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos la gnas shing / 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa ston pa 'di ni ngo mtsha
346a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
346a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis phye ba yin/ ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/ rab 'byor/ 
346a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang / kho bos mnyan to// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ khyim pa 'am rab
346a4(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba zhes ma bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
346a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshe gas pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir// sems can
346a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongasu mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no// 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin/ 
346a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir/ btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no// yongasu bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin// lta ba thams
346a8(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yang yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams
346b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan par shes pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad pa de dag dang ldan/ 
346b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi ba ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du/ kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis/ bu mo
346b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod mal khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas/ nyan thos chen po dag dang / gtam
346b4(dkon brtsegs): zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no// bu mo mi nu bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la dug pas chos bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis
346b5(dkon brtsegs): mthos sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan/ med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la' de skad ces smraso// btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'jig rten na
346b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag ni rung ba yin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shos sam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo kho bos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa
346b7(dkon brtsegs): slob cing / bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bu mo mya ngan med kyis
346b8(dkon brtsegs): byin pas spras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin tha~Mng de skad ma zer cig/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir
347a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag na rtag cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtag pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa
347a2(dkon brtsegs): sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de dag ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan
347a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab par 'dod pa ma yin pas/ de dag ni rung ba yin no// de dag ni khams gsum du
347a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag pa dar 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes bya'o// de lta/ dar na de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te khams gsum pas
347a5(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbya ba ci zhig yod/ bu mos
347a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na/ gser dul ma rgyan du byas pa dang rgyan du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo tha dad / 
347a7(dkon brtsegs): du dbye ba ci yang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// de ci'i
347a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du/ stan shin tu mtho ba la
347b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ chos nyan tam zer ba/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis khyod de skad
347b2(dkon brtsegs): smra bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la 'dug ste/ byang chub thob par gyur/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ rtsa
347b3(dkon brtsegs): bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob po// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zan ci byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
347b4(dkon brtsegs): khams na tshangs pa 'am/ brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ngam/ de las gzhan pa 'og man man chadalha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud te
347b5(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs lag tu ga par byed dam/ sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// 
347b6(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang / stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug
347b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyis/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras// / 
347b8(dkon brtsegs): bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zan ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sras yin te/ bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na/ tsau khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med
348a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas smras pa/ yab zong shig thong shig/ 'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsung shig/ 
348a2(dkon brtsegs): ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan btags pa lta bus/ bu wa bskyed par 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// 
348a3(dkon brtsegs): bu mos smras pa/ yab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa sang ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba zham 'bring ba ni/ nyan thos mdzes pa ma
348a4(dkon brtsegs): lag so// yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin/ zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smran/ byang chub sem/ ngas dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag yang dag pa'i smra bas sma
348a5(dkon brtsegs): yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par brgya'o// 
348a6(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabasu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas/ btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i bu brgya
348a7(dkon brtsegs): zam pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed te/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang / ma
348a8(dkon brtsegs): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu ma mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya
348b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las 'bas te/ nyan
348b2(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhi ba pa dang / myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byas
348b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ dad pa dang / gus pas rang gi lag nas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar snga dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa
348b4(dkon brtsegs): dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so// de nas bu me mya ngan med kyis byin pa/ pha ma la sog/ nges pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal ches yongasu bskor
348b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'am la te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// rgyal po btsun mo'i
348b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal na snang ste phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dang
348b7(dkon brtsegs): stebacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
348b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyen
349a1(dkon brtsegs): ba na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis
349a2(dkon brtsegs): bud med kyis lus ma bsgyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o
349a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugasu ston to// de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden
349a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i byin gyis brlabs byas te/ bden pa'i byin gyis bdabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma na/ bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na/ bden pa dang bdun/ 
349a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ tham sa cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong b.ragyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ bud med/ 
349a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung nas/ steng gi bar snang la ta la / srid tsam du 'phagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal
349a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol
349a8(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan
349b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba'
349b3(dkon brtsegs): shig tu 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai DUR+Ya las grub pa/ 
349b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing / mig mang ni das su bris la/ rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang // ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// 
349b5(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyad par med do// shA ri ru dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang
349b6(dkon brtsegs): der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 
349b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgang zla dgur rum na bzung ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lagaso// / 
349b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od
350a1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du/ 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa/ 
350a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sring mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
350a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bu rin chen
350a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa da' byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i ma rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gzhon mthong na dga' ba
350a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos
350a6(dkon brtsegs): thog ma dang / bar dang / tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes
350a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed cing mchod par 'gyur// de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ 
350a8(dkon brtsegs): des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
350b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'agyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste yin/ 
350b2(dkon brtsegs): rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tog gi do shal brgya stong rib phul te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyal pos gnang nas bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems
350b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ lhas phul ba'i me tog man 'da' rab dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to// de nas bar snang
350b4(dkon brtsegs): las babs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshig 'di/ skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
350b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de dag thams cad brdzus te skyes shing chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin po che'i pad+ma dag la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na bden pa
350b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bden pa'i tshig des/ dper na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod la ma ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so// byang chub sems
350b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod lam dang ldan par snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
350b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste rnam par bsgrubs pas nyes
351a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / yongasu brtags pa las langs pa med bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzigs/ 
351a2(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / di ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la/ bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs/ khye'u yi gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs/ da ni bdag la dge slong gi gzugasu yang khyod/ 
351a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzigs na/ 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma rA'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas bkri bas kun glags shing
351a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam sa kyis yongasu bsreg go/ yongs su bsregs pa das chos 'dul ba 'di ma 'tshal te/ 'gyod pa ma lags
351a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la 'gyod par sems so// rgyal po chen po de ltar/ na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la rgyal srid nyam sa nga ba na bzhags bzhin du rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
351a6(dkon brtsegs): zad du bzhud cig dang / 'dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing
351a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa mang ba lags kyis bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dag dang / btsun mo zla ba can dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'as dang byang chub sems
351a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni brgya
351b1(dkon brtsegs): ba mang shing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis bdag cag mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po da de'i dus bab par shes na song shig ces bka' stsal/ 
351b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo // de nas/ 
351b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shog/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub
351b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ste/ na cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung
351b5(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs/ 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
351b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ gzhan
351b7(dkon brtsegs): dadag la yang ston cig/ kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 
351b8(dkon brtsegs): grang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di za nan lam du thos na 'don debs ches bsod nams mang du bskyed na/ gang 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang po dang klog
352a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang brjod pa'i lung ji skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrub pa lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
352a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
352a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis
352a4(dkon brtsegs): byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 'dus pasu ma cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// dargya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / sU ren ta bo d+hi dang // 
352a5(dkon brtsegs): lo tsA bzhang ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab paM// / bam po gcig shol ka sum brgya// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bim
352a6(dkon brtsegs): la dang ta pa ri brid tshan ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// 
352a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi cha
352a8(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra btsob/ 
352b1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po
352b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol/ 
352b3(dkon brtsegs): ba sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems da / 
352b4(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / byang chub se/ 
352b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang / byang chub sems da / pa'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems da pa'i grags pa'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs
352b6(dkon brtsegs): dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / byams pa dang / mya ngan med kyis byin dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang / 
352b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu rgyan dang / gser gyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal
352b8(dkon brtsegs): can dang / sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems thogs pa med pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs/ 
353a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig go de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang / 
353a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po
353a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong dang / rin chen tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / sgrib pa thams
353a4(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug dang / spobs pa brtsegs drang / byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang / 
353a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya/ da po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang tshe/ sa gos bgos nas/ lhung bzed thogs te bsod snyem
353a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas/ de dag lam gyi bar skabasu gtam 'di skad ces gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i
353a7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
353a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab thogs pa med de/ de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun nag
353b1(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta'i ting nge 'dzin la kho ba snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos spras pa/ gang gis grong khyer
353b2(dkon brtsegs): du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan
353b3(dkon brtsegs): pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun du rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshob pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag grang
353b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan dbar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho dbo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe
353b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ ci nas kyangagrong khyer na skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo gang dag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'alnga
353b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du longs spyod zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong
353b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting
353b8(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam grus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin pa/ 
354a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa
354a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyems par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par byar// 
354a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
354a4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya de'o// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas smras pa/ ci/ nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang / skar khung dang
354a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsig pa dang / snod dang rgyan dang / shing dang lo ma dang mi ta ga dang 'bras bu dang / gos rnams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra
354a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par
354a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid la yang
354a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba den yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems
354b1(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam
354b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rtog gis spras pa/ gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la
354b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas smras pa/ gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshigs thams cad
354b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
354b5(dkon brtsegs): gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can/ gang dag gis bcings pa dang bsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams
354b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa gang
354b7(dkon brtsegs): gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang spobs pa yang thob par
354b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gem pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas grong khyer na sems can gang
355a1(dkon brtsegs): dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de/ 
355a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa de lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod cing mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin
355a3(dkon brtsegs): to yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyu
355a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la ba dazod pa dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga po da/ ga thob pa zhig yod de/ bu mo des lha'i mig dag pa mi'i/ 
355a5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi bar skabasu gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos// / 
355a6(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de yang gzugs mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/ de
355a7(dkon brtsegs): dpyid zla tha chung tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyan par pha mas dge mtshan dang bkra shis byed du gnang nas/ bram ze zho dang rtswa ku sha dang me tog dang / yam bsreg shing dang mar
355a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te/ khrus byas sar khrid pa las bram ze de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag kyang mthong // 
355b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur te// de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze che ba tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des dri ma med kyis byin pa
355b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shes te/ de dag mthong na dgos pa'am nor ram brtul zhugs sam mchod sbyin nam bkra shis
355b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rung ste mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// 'di dag chags med mchog tu
355b4(dkon brtsegs): dge shes pa// skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jigs par byed// 'di dag rnam par dag cing bden bzhi mthong // / dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag/ 'di
355b5(dkon brtsegs): dag rkang gnyis dag pa bsod nams zhing // 'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yo na phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob// byin nas sems can
355b6(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las brgal cing sdig med re ba med// 'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu// sdug
355b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar par byed// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de yi sras dag rdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa'
355b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang mang // shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang // 'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhing // bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pa sbyin char phab// 'di
356a1(dkon brtsegs): dag rnams la bkur bsti chung byas kyang // mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub// 'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan
356a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig dang byed pa// de ni bsod nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo
356a3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigasu bcad de slar smras pa// byis pa'i sems kyi dbang du ma bzhud cig/ mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig/ ngur smrig gos
356a4(dkon brtsegs): can de bzhin mgo bregs pa/ de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyid// yab dang yum yang dgas par mi 'gyur zhing // bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis
356a5(dkon brtsegs): smad par 'gyur// khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis// de bas dge slong rnams ni shin du/ spongs// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bra
356a6(dkon brtsegs): ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigasu bcad de slar smras pa/ yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma gtogs par// pha dang ma yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin// gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tshe man// 
356a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs// bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lung btang zhing // de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang // dkon mchog gsum nyid
356a8(dkon brtsegs): skyabs yin ma gtogs par// kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo
356b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas nas khyod kyis sngan sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs sngan chas kyang ma gsan sngan dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur kyang ma mdzad na/ khyad ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dang bar 'gyur
356b2(dkon brtsegs): bupa drim med kyis byed pas smras pa/ bram ze kho ma btsas nas zhag bdun lan pa na tsan+dan gyi khang bzangs kyi nang na gser gyi khri lo bzhag pa'i rmi lnga'i bu lnga brgya snang ga
356b3(dkon brtsegs): snang la 'dong pa khoms mthong ste/ de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa kho mos thos so// de nas lnga'i
356b4(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag ga nang nas gang gis sngan de bzhin gshegs/ rab mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams kyis drisadab/ grogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'drang
356b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig de ni ji ltar shes par bya// de nas lha'i bu des khwa me'i bsam pa shes nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
356b6(dkon brtsegs): de yi dbu skra dri med sdum zhing mdzes// gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba'i lcang lo can// zhal mdog pad+ma mdab ma rgyas pa 'dra// zla nya ma chen ma na mkhar mdze pan// 
356b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang // smin mtshams par nas 'khyil cing shin du mdzes// de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug cub rig la yang shis yangs pa byed// 
356b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra// sems stobs mi zhum tshems mnyam thags kyang bzang // de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs// de yi zhal na dri med
357a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mdzes// de yi gsung ni phan zhing stan la ran// tshig rtsub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med// skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing // 'gro la
357a2(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir rgyal ba gsung yang sgrogs// de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra// de bzhin mi dbang phyug gi sor mo ring // de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra// brang yangs
357a3(dkon brtsegs): dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zab// rta mchog lta bur 'doms kyi sba ba nub// de bzhin spu yi khong bu gser dang 'dra// brla yi dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs// zhabs ni legs/ 
357a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas byin pa e na'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden dgasung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan ltas bco dam pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lta ba 'jiga'akhor gyi nang du
357a5(dkon brtsegs): dridrang bye ba dris byas kyang // 'khrul med skyon dang bra bas sems can kun tshim mdzad// gya gyur med drang tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das
357a6(dkon brtsegs): pab bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi// skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston// de ni rang gis sangs rgyas
357a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa ste// bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyi sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge ba shes shing // 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan par mdzad// ston pa
357a8(dkon brtsegs): de yi yon tan 'di dag dang // gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos dang ma brjod// thos nas lha rnams yid dag gyur nas// rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang bsgom// de nas bu/ 
357b1(dkon brtsegs): ma dri ma med kyis byis pas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kha ma bcas nas zhag bdun lon nas sangs rgyas
357b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so// mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i
357b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so// mngon par dran te de tshun
357b4(dkon brtsegs): chad nam yang phal dga' ba 'am/ ma la dga' ba 'am/ ming po la dga' ba'am/ spun la dga' ba 'am/ nye du la dga' ba'am/ nor la dga' ba'am/ 
357b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyan la dga' ba'am/ gos la dga' ba'am/ lus la dga' ba'am/ srog la dga' ba'am/ grong khyer la dga' ba'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma
357b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rje su dran no// bram ze kho mos ni gsum yid la bya ba yid la byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhug/ 
357b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongasu bzung zhing / kho mos don nam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang
357b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang chud zos par ma byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to// kho mos nyin mtshan
358a1(dkon brtsegs): gang du yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang chos mthos pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to// bram ze khoms ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang
358a2(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal
358a3(dkon brtsegs): bo dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul du song ste ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to// bu me dri ma med kyi
358a4(dkon brtsegs): byin pa ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rno gras pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas
358a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsngags pa brjod chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu
358a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par/ 
358a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA
358a8(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu bud med ni shes rab song gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa dreg pa/ bag med pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin du ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du ma/ 
358b1(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste ci nas bdag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs
358b2(dkon brtsegs): par bstan du gsol/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam 'byung ba 'di dang bram ze'i tshig zos nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos de dag
358b3(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na re kho me nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// nam
358b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang yid bde ba la/ brtson nam/ 'on tam 'di ltar yang byung ba'i tshul gyis
358b5(dkon brtsegs): smra/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byad lha yi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra// rgyan rnams kyis
358b6(dkon brtsegs): ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin// ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyis kyis ma non pa// ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur// khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin du legs
358b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'byor// ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa yin// bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na// de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma 'gyur// sdug cing phangs
358b8(dkon brtsegs): la yid du 'ong ba ste// skye bo kun la dga' ba bskyed yin na// yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod// ci yi phyir ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med// bu mo khyed kyis ci zhig/ 
359a1(dkon brtsegs): zos gyur cing // ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde// yong su nyams shing yid byung semasu gyur// khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'drang la spros// de nas bu me dri ma
359a2(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgyal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// yab cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang // khyim gyi spyan rnams thugasu ma chung ngam// 'kho
359a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas ni gar la blta dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa can// sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la// gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis// 
359a4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste// srid pa se dmas pa bde ba ga la mchis// mi mdza' tshogs kyi sa rab tu gtses gyur cing // dgon par phyin la dga' ba
359a5(dkon brtsegs): ga la mchis// kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba// ji ltar bde 'thob rgyal po bka' stsal cig/ dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis// bsad/ 
359a6(dkon brtsegs): sar bkril dga' ba ga la mchis// g.yang sa che 'dir su zhig yid rton bgyi// rgyal po 'tsho ba 'jig rten de dag mtshungs// blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tsam gyi/ 
359a7(dkon brtsegs): phung por gyur to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na// 'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton// pha dang ma sdug dang ming po dang // bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshegs
359a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di 'dra'i mo sdug gang la su yid rton// gang tshe bdag gis ring byung rgyal ba mthong // de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam
359b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang bskye// byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni// yab cig bdag gis ma mthong ma zos so// bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba balnga 'tshal gyur// bde bar gshes
359b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong // yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas
359b3(dkon brtsegs): cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pa cang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod
359b4(dkon brtsegs): la zhug pa zhus pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol// 'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu
359b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags// de gal te/ 'dus byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus
359b6(dkon brtsegs): byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to// ji ste 'dus ma byas lags nas 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa
359b7(dkon brtsegs): phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
359b8(dkon brtsegs): mo gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// shA ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'dus byas mi
360a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dri'i bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen
360a2(dkon brtsegs): po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci
360a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston// gal te sems can du 'du shes
360a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas te ston na sems can ni ma mchis pa te// de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur/ ra ro// ji ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te
360a5(dkon brtsegs): ston na chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog/ pa ma mchis na rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang
360a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen po la
360a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// mo gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mo gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'dri'i bu mos ni 'gyur ba med
360a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dris te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang rnam pa rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
360b1(dkon brtsegs): byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan
360b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam/ 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/ gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye
360b3(dkon brtsegs): bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du ste/ de lta bas na btsun pa yang byas pa so so'i skye
360b4(dkon brtsegs): bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// / ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na/ ni chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te de/ 
360b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mi 'thad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po ya cang mismra/ bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung na pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang
360b6(dkon brtsegs): po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri yi bu mos ni don dam pa dris te de la ni lan gdab par mi nus
360b7(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms
360b8(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyis bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur// 
361a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes na/ de ci btsun pa'i lus kyis sbyin pa sbyong ngam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa sbyong / gal te lus kyis sbyong na lus ni bems po g.yo ba mchis pa
361a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang sbyor bar mi nus so// ji ste sems kyis sbyong na sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa
361a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so// ji ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis sbyong na de ni ma mchis pa ste ma mchis pas ji ltar sbyong bar bgyid/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa
361a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung chen po yang cang mo smra bar gyur to// rab 'byor/ dgyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ 'od srung chen pos
361a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i// bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dra bas de'i lha gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu ma dri ma med
361a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan
361a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni
361a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma
361b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa den de bzhin nyid de// de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'phru
361b2(dkon brtsegs): bam mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis
361b3(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
361b4(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba'o// ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phag sa pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshed dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// 
361b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ rab
361b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di la brjod du ci yang maud/ cang mi smra ba de 'thob byed/ spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed/ ji srid
361b7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po skye yod pa// de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med// 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas che / 
361b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci sems la
362a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam// 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad
362a2(dkon brtsegs): nasems na brjod du ma mchis shing sbru ma lta bu ste yang dag pa ma yin bkun brtags pa lags na/ ci yang dag pa mayin bkun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan ma
362a3(dkon brtsegs): dam dzasas nas ma mchis pa gnas ti bsam gtan na mdzad nani nu dang shing dang rtsig pa dang rdol sogs pa byung ba dang zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
362a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// tshe dang / ngan pa nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshed dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa nam grul 'di skad ces
362a5(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bums dris pa'i lan rdzo ne ga nam grus smras pa/ bu mo ni de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i yul yongasu 'dri ste de ni nyan thos rnams kyis
362a6(dkon brtsegs): bsten par mi nus// bu mas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan la nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lags sam/ gal te chos kyi
362a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyuraro// de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag ma mchis na ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad ces gsung // nam gru
362a8(dkon brtsegs): yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can
362b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/  lha tshogags dngas pa gzigs sam 'on te sa pa ma mchis pa gzugs/ gal te dngas po gzugs nan rtag pag par 'gyung // ji snyed ma pa
362b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta par 'gyur te de yang ma rigs so// ma 'gags pa yang cang mo smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas chedang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di na
362b3(dkon brtsegs): ces thAg/ chadang ldan dam gags pa brims rnas pa'i lan pa shigamed ldan pa mi 'gags pas smras pa/ zhums ni shes rab na du 'joms pas dris pas ngon pan
362b4(dkon brtsegs): gdab par ma nus so// de nas bum dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
362b5(dkon brtsegs): mang du zas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci mang du zas pa nyid don du lta'am 'onate/ tshig 'du/ rag/ gal te den du ljon dan ni brjod du ma mchis shong bsnyad du/ 
362b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa te de ni rna ba'i rnam par shas pra she par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma
362b7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// ji ste tshig 'brur lta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas/ de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa ni/ 
362b8(dkon brtsegs): rton pa ma lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
