363a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' ba thams dras pa'i lan thas shig/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ bum na mo ge dang dral ba 'di sa don smras tsam par byed ma nus pa// 
363a2(dkon brtsegs): bu mon sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dra ste slob pa rnams kyis ma yin nade ji ltar bstan par bya ste chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos so// de nas bu
363a3(dkon brtsegs): ma dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas zad ma lams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog
363a4(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan pa lags na ci rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab pa'am 'on teng ba nyid zab pas zab/ gal te rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni rten
363a5(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dral bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma ma n+ta sa so// de ci'i slad du zhen 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni sang ba ma lags 'ong ba ma 'grete/  rjel
363a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'byung ba ni mog gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis ma mchis la kun du 'byung ba ma mchis
363a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i slad du'o// je ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha'i zab pas kho bo zab bo// 
363a8(dkon brtsegs): bum dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/ de slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras
363b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig
363b2(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas kyang ma lags te dmigs su ma mchis pa ni tshig bla dgas las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa bu mo 'don ji ltar gzhan dgal
363b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so// 'jam
363b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu ma dri ma me da kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba den yod dpal 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du
363b5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa'am bud med dam khye'u 'am bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong
363b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lto bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad dam 'on tam chos kyi skur mthong ba mdzad/ 
363b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad na de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ gang dag ngal gzugs su mthong // gang dag ngal slar
363b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa// 'dun po 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi mthong / zhes gsungs so// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na chos kyi sku ni bstan du ma nus
364a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa te blta bar mi
364a2(dkon brtsegs): nus pa'i slad du'o// mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mthong
364a3(dkon brtsegs): ba don yod kyis smras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byon pas smras pa/ bdag ni dngos po 'am dngos po ma mchis pa mi
364a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dri'o// bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig/ mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog la 'di
364a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang / gis grong khyer na khyim thad rin po che gang ba'i gter rnam sa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam
364a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs par mdzad dam 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan
364a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas
364a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad na zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so// rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo
364b1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' dun sang skang la 'di skad ces smras sa// rigs kyi bu khyung kyis 'di skad du gang gis grang khyen 'dan sems can rnams kyi las nganas myong bar
364b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba gang yod pa de che 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa da lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam
364b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab par bstan te de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do// gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ji ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin
364b4(dkon brtsegs): du mang po myeng par 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang ni chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad de bdag po ma mchis pa de'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te de
364b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ngan song spong gis smras pa/ kho bos ni smon lam gyi dbang gos mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i
364b6(dkon brtsegs): las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni sman lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lags so// gal te nus par gyur na sam
364b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'das ni smon lam gyi dbang gis
364b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgyur mi nus par rig par bya'o// ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces
365a1(dkon brtsegs): smras sa// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen par skye ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi slob balnga po dag rnam par sel par/ 
365a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de tsi ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sa mo 'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags// gal te bdag la ra
365a3(dkon brtsegs): las pa lags na ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzadaji ste gzhan la rag las pa lags na ni ting nge 'dzin
365a4(dkon brtsegs): de khyod kyi ma lags so// gang khyod kyi ma lags pa das ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sa la bas smras pa/ 
365a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o// durma dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bus ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas
365a6(dkon brtsegs): ba lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can rnams la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa yang mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba yang cang mi smra bar
365a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can/ 
365a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bcings pa dang bsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang / 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa
365b1(dkon brtsegs): de/ ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di lan pa dang bcas pa lags sam 'on te len pa ma mchis pa lags gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang bcas pa lags
365b2(dkon brtsegs): te byis so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na de yang mi rigs so// ji ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa lags nani mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te mngon par/ 
365b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs
365b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ byang chub sems dpa'
365b5(dkon brtsegs): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos smras pa/ bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ spun
365b6(dkon brtsegs): ros gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gog pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa// bu mo gang na skye ba
365b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing 'gag pa med pa de na yi ge 'jug pa medo// bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston
365b8(dkon brtsegs): te yi ge rnams la mi chagaso// chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te de la rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
366a1(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so// rig
366a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa yang thob par
366a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de/ ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam 'on te rgyu
366a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtogadapas bskyed pa lags na ni 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi
366a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// ji ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spongs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems
366a6(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spabs pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo/ bu mo dri ma med
366a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin pas smras pa rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam gdab pa'i sems bskyed pa de mchis sam 'on te ma mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so// / 
366a8(dkon brtsegs): ji ste ma mchis na chad par lta ba lags te de gsung na ni khyod kyis gsung ba log pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spongs pa brtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma/ 
366b1(dkon brtsegs): med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na
366b2(dkon brtsegs): snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci byang chub
366b3(dkon brtsegs): demachi pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am 'on ta ma mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyigal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// ji snya ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med
366b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so// byang chub sa mas dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/ mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// 
366b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba la gas sam/ 'on te zhi bas phye ba lags lag te skye bas
366b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ji ste zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni de dmigs
366b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma mchis so// gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye bo zhe'am/ nyan thos so zhe'am/ rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas so
366b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/ mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog
367a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor bdon yod kyang cang ma smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' da
367a2(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'o slar 'dong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas
367a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdag pa
367a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang bzhag pa med pa de la ci zhig khyod kyis btsal bar sa mas btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni smras ba ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dga' ba ni ma lags so// 
367a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags so// // bam po gnyis pa
367a6(dkon brtsegs): ste tha ma// de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / rgyal ba
367a7(dkon brtsegs): gsal rgyal dang / de las gzhan pa skye bo bal po che rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba
367a8(dkon brtsegs): byas na phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar dgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
367b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas la gdug te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der la gsubral ma sbyar ba bdu nas chagasu bcad pa'i dbyas kyis du bzhus pa/ ti 'dzin snangs ldan grags pa mapa' yas mngam// 'jig
367b2(dkon brtsegs): rten mgan pa bdud rtsi dga' stsol ba/ mtshus med ye shes bod gshegs khyod la du// byang chub sems dpa ji ltar spyad pa spyod// ji ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams 'joms// 
367b3(dkon brtsegs): dza ltar rir bcas sa rnams gal par bgyid// grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'ad zer gtong / byang chub spyad tshul legs par ba shad du gsal// sangs rgyas nar gyi gzus ni dzi ltar thag
367b4(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar bsgom// mi yis rdzu 'phrul da stabs na ji ltar 'thog/ sems can rin chen rnams dkyi spyad pa gsungs// gang gis dran dang rtags dang blo gras
367b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// spongs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur/ gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du// snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid// gang gis ma ni tshe rabs dran
367b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// dri ma ma mchis lha yi mig kyang 'thob// ldan 'thob cing pa ril sems tshul rig/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na zhing rnams brgyar yang mchi// ji ltar sbyin pa gtong la brdzun
367b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'// ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu brtson// mngal gyi gnas na dza
367b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar rnams spangs nas// pad+ma las ni rtag tu brdzus te skye// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid// bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod// ji ltar de yid dga' dang ma
368a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' mtshungs// sred pa spangs shing za bzhe sdang spangs// mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis// sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis
368a2(dkon brtsegs): ri rab mtshungs// rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang // bstod dang smad dang bad dang sdug bsngal dang // ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan nas// 'jig rten kun na zla ba lta bur
368a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod/ nga yi ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis// ji ltar rdul bral nga rgyal rgyags pa spong // zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas brtson// blo ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur// 
368a4(dkon brtsegs): chung ma bu nor mdza' la dga' ma mchis// ji ltar bsam tha'i mal la mngon par dga'// rtag tu bya dang ma tshungs shing zla ba 'dra// ji ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing
368a5(dkon brtsegs): mos kha chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra rlung dang mtshungs// mkha sa pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rtag tu tsa la nga ma mchis mi rtog lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing
368a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' mtshungs// ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid// bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yang mi gtong // 'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas// ji ltar gnas
368a7(dkon brtsegs): te byang chub 'jug par bgyid// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos thos shing // ji ltar tshe
368a8(dkon brtsegs): rang sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son// dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog bgyid par// spyad
368b1(dkon brtsegs): cing rtag tu dga' mas ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur// brdzus te skye bar gang gos 'gyur// langs spyod chel shes rab che// kun mkhyen rtogs par 'ang / 
368b2(dkon brtsegs): du chud// gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu 'thob// bsad nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang gis skye bar 'gyur// zhing ni ji ltar
368b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang du de yis smon gtab pa// der ni ji ltar skye 'gyur lags// che ba dran par dri ltam gyur/ ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams
368b4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jal/ bskal pa bye ba steng rnams su// ngan 'gra/ ra mchi bar mi 'gyur lags// rnam par 'dren pa de ji ltar na// mdog dang gzi brjid spyan grags 'bog/ 
368b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams// ji ltar thu/ kha bar mi 'gyur lags// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos dang yang // dge 'dun la ni skyab su mchis// lus dang
368b6(dkon brtsegs): sreg na gtang bgyid kyi// de dag chas ni 'dor mi bgyid// byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing // the tshom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyed pa thams cad spangs nas su// sreg
368b7(dkon brtsegs): chags rnams la chos kyang stan// khyed la ma mkhyen cang mi mnga'// thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems dpa' spyad gang lags// go rom bzhin du bstan
368b8(dkon brtsegs): du gsal/ de skad ces gsal ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu ma legs legs so// bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 
369a1(dkon brtsegs): don 'di lta bu 'dra bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ 
369a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes legs so te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
369a3(dkon brtsegs): na bdud 'dul bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongasu spongs pa dang / skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrub
369a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i byams pa bsgom pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar bya/ dad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ phrag dag mi bya phra mas
369a5(dkon brtsegs): smra mi bya/ skye bo mang po dge ba rnams la sbyar// phyogs/ bcu rnams su byams pa bsgom byas na/ bdud 'a/ dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub
369a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / chos zab mo la mos pa dang / yid ma
369a7(dkon brtsegs): la brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed
369a8(dkon brtsegs): do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod// yi dam la yang shin tu bstan// dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed// rdzogs pa'i
369b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub bla med pa// skye bamang bdaga' bar byed// de ltar chos pani de dag gis// nang rnams bye ba gas par byed// bum byang chub sems dpa' tshas pazhidang ldan nasangs rgyas kyi zhing mapar
369b2(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa rnam su 'od zer dag gtang ste/ bzhi ga she na/ mar me ston pa dang / dam pa'i chos yang su 'dzin pa dang / sems can bag med par gyur cing mi kham par gyur pa rnams kyi gan
369b3(dkon brtsegs): du song ste chos ston pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dgal rin po che'i dra ba 'gabs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha'
369b4(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med pa rnam su 'od zer dag gtong ngo // de la 'disadade ces bya ste/ mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par dag/ zad pa'i dus na dam chos yong su 'dzin// bag med gyur pa
369b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos skyed byed// mchod rten dag la rin chen du ba'adug// des na bye bo ngas ma yas zhing 'gro zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ad gi gtong bar byed// don ni
369b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dodang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa byang chub bla med don du gnyer// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bani dang ldan na gzungs 'thab ste/ bzhi gang shan/ rgyan sna tshogs gtsa
369b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / rgyun ma 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
369b8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la mang du gnas pa ste// la byang chub sems dpa' chas bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs thob pa/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur// slong ba rnams
370a1(dkon brtsegs): la bu mo brgyan te sbyin// rgyun mi 'chad pa sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab bsgom// chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs thob 'grus
370a2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud ma ze// phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa// de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
370a3(dkon brtsegs): na ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor ba la yid byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur kun du dga' zhing mgul mos pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / las
370a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' shin du yongasu mthar byin pa yin te/ bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin thod go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sred pa'i 'gro ba kun la
370a5(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang byung // bas ru lta bur gcig pur spyad la dga'// gtu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa yon// de las rtagatu shin du mthar yang phyin// rtag tu chos bzhi dag la zhugs
370a6(dkon brtsegs): nas su// byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur tshal byed// byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob// rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi/ 
370a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'o thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / khams bzhin mkha'i khams dang
370a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa ste/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chos ban pad dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// lus yang ba dang de bzhin sems kyang ma
370b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid// namakha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du// khams bzhi po dag ni byin gyis rlob pa byed// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// blo ldan de
370b2(dkon brtsegs): yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas 'thob// skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong // bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
370b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba med de brtse ba dang tha ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag bya bar mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims/ 
370b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdoms pas bsdams shing tshur shog legs par 'ongs zhes rtag tu smra ba dang / chos smra ba rnams la khrog nyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/ bum
370b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzha zhal khro dang khon du 'dzin ma byed// nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba
370b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang bral// rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra// gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed// de ni tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu srung // de ni rtag tu legs par 'ong zhes
370b7(dkon brtsegs): smra// chos smra rnams la de ni tha ba med// de yi sems ni rdo rje ri rab mtshungs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na brdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin
370b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug cing / me tog ud pa la dang pad+ma dang pad+ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am de bzhin
371a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mchod rten la mngon par 'thar ba dang / phan pa 'das pa mnganapayang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i nga rdul can dang / gzhan du/ 
371a2(dkon brtsegs): gi sbyin ma 'dzin pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yang su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ bu mi byang chub sems dpa' chos
371a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad+ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug/ chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste dbul bar byed// 
371a4(dkon brtsegs): kha rol dag la dga' ba bskyed pa'i chog kyang smra// dga' dbar byed la mngon par brtson gyi sbyin mo 'dzin// sem das tsan kun la phan byir bsod nams yongasu bsngo// thub
371a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa shes/ sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi bstan na de/ rgyal ba mchog rnams drung du brdzus te skye bar 'gyur// bu ma
371a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur te// bzhi gang zhe na/ brnyes pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang / chags pa med par dngos po yongasu gtong ba
371a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mos pa mang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cod dang bral ba yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces
371a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ nges pa brnyas pa med pa'i sbyin pa byin par byed// de ni dngos pa kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med// rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na// don phyir shing longs spyod chen po
371b1(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// dad dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med// pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par yong mi byed// lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gi lta ba dang 'gyur ba// des na de 'dir
371b2(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldan// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan no shes rab chen por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos la sar sna mi byed pa dang / mi mthun par mi
371b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pos 'gyod bsal ba dang / gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang / stong pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
371b4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa nam yang se dar sna yong mi byed// mi mthun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sem/ 
371b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rab ldan gdam ngag ston par byed// rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid bsgom// chos bzhi 'di da ga nges par bstan byas na// rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub
371b6(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'thob// sangs rgyas rje su bstan pa bslab byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par
371b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lung nod pa dang kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnos pa dang gdams ngag brjod nas yun ring du lon te gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed
371b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang banye bar bsgrub pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par dbyung ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i
372a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba la mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
372a2(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lung mnos kha ton brjod pa dran par byed// gzhan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs// skyo ba
372a3(dkon brtsegs): med par chos kyang rjod par byed// ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma lags par 'dzin// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// mthu chen ldan pa tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// bskal
372a4(dkon brtsegs): pa stong phrag bsam yas rjesu dran// rnam par 'dren pa'i ma/ cho ga nyid myur du 'thob// bu mo byang chub sems dpa 'chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phrad pa 'thob
372a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spang ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams da nga mi bsten pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa
372a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
372a7(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub kyi tsam spong mi byed// chos smra ba la skur ba yang mi 'debs// des ni sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong // g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs
372a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dran/ chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na// bde gshegs rnams dang phrad pa des thob bo// bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang // 'dres pa ga la bzhugs pa der
372b1(dkon brtsegs): de skye/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po dag thob ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
372b2(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten la rin po che sbar gyis 'thor ba dang / 'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang me tog dang spos dang sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul
372b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan pa dang slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa ste/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
372b4(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod rten la ni smar gyis dbyig rnams 'thor/ dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru// spos dang me
372b5(dkon brtsegs): tog sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul// yid du 'ong bas mkha na po slob dpon bstan// des lus sum cu rtsa gnyis ma tshan dang ldan rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang
372b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan// gang gis shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa// chos 'di dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcug
372b7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang / gzhan la bsti stang byed pas mi skyo ba dang chos smra ba la thabs rgol ba dang / sems can
372b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu po dag 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// stan rgyu
373a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul// gzhan la bsti stang byed pas skyo ba med// chos smra ba la thab mo yang ma rgol// sems can rnams ni byang
373a2(dkon brtsegs): chub 'dzin du 'jug/ 'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams// 'di na de yis rnyed par dka' ba med// yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsnyen byas na// byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan
373a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang / nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi
373a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi ma thun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga'
373a5(dkon brtsegs): ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang / lus dang srog dang yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos pa zhi ba de dag dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob po/ de la 'di skad ces
373a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni// nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed// 'jig rten kun dang mi mthun pa// skye ba med par rab tu sgrogs// mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas// sangs
373a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed// lus dang srog la mi lta bar// de ni byang chub lta bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na// de yi spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
373a8(dkon brtsegs): rten kun/ sna tshogs phreng 'dras tshim par byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser
373b1(dkon brtsegs): sna med pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa
373b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyis rnyed la nam yang phrag dog med// mthong nas dga' bar gyur te ser sna med// sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms// 'khor
373b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dre bar de ni yong mi byed// chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing // myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// bum byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun
373b4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / mi 'thun pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug
373b5(dkon brtsegs): pas phan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i tshogs yongasu spong ba te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan ni dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces
373b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yong mi 'byed// skyes mthun pa dag 'dum par byed// lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud// pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra/ chos bzhi 'di dag
373b7(dkon brtsegs): nges par bsten byas na// dge 'dun rgyu chen rnam dag thob par 'gyur// de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu bstan par bya// bu mo byang chub sems
373b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye ste// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes kyi khye dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi bskyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas
374a1(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yong su dag pa yongasu tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed de tha na sems dang po
374a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa na byang chub sems dpa' la yang bsti stang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi
374a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med// pha rol phyin pa dag la yongasu tshol// byang chub sems dpa' ston par
374a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems// shes khe 'di ba'i don du tshul 'chos med // yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bskyen byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de phrad 'gyur// zhing gang dag tu
374a5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab byas pa// 'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo drim mo dkyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
374a6(dkon brtsegs): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i
374a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces
374a8(dkon brtsegs): smras// bu mo khyod 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' ba mi shes sam/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas
374b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo gal gyi bu chen po bden pa'i tshig gang dag gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs
374b2(dkon brtsegs): ba mngon sum du bzhugs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar brtags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par
374b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/ sems can gang la yang
374b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa med par gyur cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i cha dag gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa de'i chos 'di dag yongasu yang dag par blangs te gnas par
374b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me ta ga gi char mngon par bab par gyur cig/ ma dka bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur
374b6(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig/ smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas
374b7(dkon brtsegs): do'o mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong gi sgra yang byung // lha'i me tog gi char yang
374b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bab bo// bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa yang bud med kyis lus mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po zab nas lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom
375a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams na
375a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
375a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyu 'di dag so sor yong su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di ltar
375a4(dkon brtsegs): mthu che ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ mo dgal gyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa debazhin te/ dang por sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang
375a5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sprin gnas yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang
375a6(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe
375a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang leb rgan dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog
375a8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dag byung te/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom ldan
375b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun ga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu babar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcug te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
375b2(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logasu thal me sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan pa// mgon po lha sgra
375b3(dkon brtsegs): yid 'od ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa'o// gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas bskyed mdzad pa// stabs bcu yon+tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi
375b4(dkon brtsegs): don du 'od btang bstan du gsol// rir bcas nags tshal bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drugad tu g.yos// lha rnams na mkhar gnas shing lha'i ma
375b5(dkon brtsegs): tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs// seng ges wa pa ma bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad// dpa'o gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di
375b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol// nyi zla bye ba stong gi 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang / lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa// shAkya
375b7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas// 'od rnams thams cad mog mog por bgyis sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnamasu mdzes// khyod kyi smin mtshams par
375b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi mdzod spu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang // 'bar zhing pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid// thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyis
376a1(dkon brtsegs): srin bu me khyer bzhin du rgyal bas mdzes// mi'i seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por der 'gyur bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
376a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu ma dri ma med kyis byin pa 'ang byin gyis brlabs gang gis bud med kyi dngos po gyur
376a3(dkon brtsegs): teskyes pa'i dbang po gyur pa mthong ngam// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs
376a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo dgas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyad de/ bskal pa grang sa med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad nas/ phyis bu mo 'di/ 
376a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dang / la gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems
376a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' brgyad khri dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+dan bkod pa gcig tu 'gyur
376a7(dkon brtsegs): ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo dgal gyi bu chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yun ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
376a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po las ma bsgyur/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/ gnas
376b1(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo dgal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin la/ btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las mi bsgyur/ gnas brtan mo dgal gyi bu chen
376b2(dkon brtsegs): po cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis byin pas mo dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo gal gyi bu
376b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin/ skyes pa'i lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i
376b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni ma skyes ste/ de ni lus sa ma sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
376b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma maud kyis byin pa 'di zab mo la mos pa na ngo mtshar lags// 
376b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba drug bcu'i thad nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// 
376b7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms so// bskal pa brgyad bcur mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgom so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum nu dang byang chub sems dpa' tho ba ma'i tshul
376b8(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dris so// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brag brgyad bcu la na bza' dang zhal zas kyis bkur bsti byas so// spobs pa rnam
377a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sa pa bstan pa chos rgya rnam grangs 'di yang yang su dris so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi mo gang gis snang gsum gyis
377a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
377a3(dkon brtsegs): dbul ba phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ len tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 
377a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ba sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas
377a5(dkon brtsegs): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyed kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig lhog
377a6(dkon brtsegs): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dge la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
377a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'o mang ci lags// 'di ji ltar bzung bar brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos
377a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di spobs pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ces bya bar yang rung shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang
377b1(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/ dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu las srog chags khrag khrig phrag
377b2(dkon brtsegs): brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
377b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
377b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag grang das med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 
377b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med pa/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'a dun dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa// lha'i longs spyod pas
377b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhad cing 'dzum pa dri ma
377b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon gsum du lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' ba
377b8(dkon brtsegs): dang mchog tu dga' ba des ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
378a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis brlangs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum
378a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs// de yang na mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag la bstod cing phyag
378a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te bsti stang byas nas na mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la len steng bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa
378a4(dkon brtsegs): bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yong mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgunas
378a5(dkon brtsegs): yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ge ba la de lon/ su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sgra skad 'thun par bcom
378a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de gsol ba gang dag sangs rgyas gus mchis dang // gang dag sangs rgyas chos slad du// bla na shin tu nges gyur pa// de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyed/ 
378a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad sdig pa'i las bgyis pas// bdag cag bram ze'i khyim du skyes// ston pa'i nyan thos mthong gyur na// bkri mi shes shes tshig tu brjed// sangs rgyas sras dag
378a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong gyur nas// bkra mi shis shes bgyis pa yi// tshig tu brjod pa gang mchis pa// btsun pa nongs par bshags par bgyid// tshogs kyi rgyal po mchog gyur pa/ 
378b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba// mi de dag gis nongs pa rnyed// de dag kha zas ngan pa btsal// dri med byin pas mchod sbyin slad// bdag cag 'gron du bos gyur// ston pa'i nyan
378b2(dkon brtsegs): zothos rnams mthong nas// ma gus pas na sdod cing mchis// de la bdag cag rnams kyis dris// khyod kyis 'dren po gang na mthong // de smras btsas nas zhag bdun nas// 
378b3(dkon brtsegs): kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchi// de yis sangs rgyas bsngags mang ba// de bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod// de yi tshig thos bdag cag kun// byang chub mchog tu yang
378b4(dkon brtsegs): dag zhugs// bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nams dang / sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'i sgras bskul bas// shA kya seng ga'i zhabs la no// phyag bgyi'o slad du lhags
378b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis / chos kyi dam pa thob par gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong bas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun
378b6(dkon brtsegs): las grol// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyas chos kyi don slad du// bdag cag de la slob par bgyid// sangs rgyas chos thob bgyi
378b7(dkon brtsegs): slad du/ byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa' spyod gang dang // lam dang sgo yang bstan pa la
378b8(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten rnams kyi mchod rten gyur// de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas// thub pas de tshe 'dzum pa mdzad// thub chen lung bstan mdzad
379a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol zhes// sangs rgyas la ni kun dgas zhus// bcom ldan 'das 'di skad bka' stsal to// bram ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang // bram pa
379a2(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i lha de dang // de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe/ rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga brgya tham pa la// tshe rabs sdo mar mchod byas pa// de nas phyin chad
379a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod tshe yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// skal pa bye ba brgyad bcur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// de dag bskal pa re re yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// 
379a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mdag 'gyur te// 'od byed ces bya'i bskal gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur// de dag tshe tshad mtshus
379a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu thub// zhing mtshungs da ge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te// dge slong bye ba brgyad cu/ yod// sems can rnams kyi don spyod cing // chos 'di/ 
379a6(dkon brtsegs): la yang spyad byas nas// de dag thams cad mthar gyis su// mya ngan 'das bzhi pa 'thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / 
379a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / ma
379a8(dkon brtsegs): dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos
379b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs la'u snang phrag brgya ba las dri ma med kyis byin pas nus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste 'dus pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin ma tra dang / su ran dra badz+ra/ 
379b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / shu chen gyi la tsA ba ban de ye shes sde bsgyur cing zhus ste gtan la bab pa// bam po gnyis dang / sho lo ka brgya lnga bcu yod do// rgyag bskad du/ ar+ya gu/ Shad nas ku su
379b3(dkon brtsegs): mi ta/ brid chan ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
379b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos dpa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dag/ 
379b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ste/ nga phrag rab tu mang po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems
379b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i li tsa bya gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
379b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su
379b8(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ btsun pa
380a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol
380a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan+tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bko' stsal te// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu
380a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci sa pa dris shig dang / zhu ba de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par
380a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po yon tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
380a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de rnams kyi mtshan bzungs/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs
380a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag bzhugs pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
380a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon+tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa legs
380a8(dkon brtsegs): legs so// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snang
380b1(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa ni yon+dan rin chen me
380b2(dkon brtsegs): tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das
380b3(dkon brtsegs): da ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
380b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan rin chen ma tog kun du rgyas pa shar phyogs na chos thams cad kyi yon/ tan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
380b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing / 
380b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// de nas sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
380b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid
380b8(dkon brtsegs): kye rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni bskal pa stong phrag drug bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar byed do// tshe brjes nas kyang slob pa med par
381a1(dkon brtsegs): ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spongs pa nye bar
381a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par mdzad do// chos ston pa na bag tshab yang med par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// de la yanan 'di rnams
381a3(dkon brtsegs): myur du 'byung // de la bde bas lhag pa'i gzhan yang 'byung // de la bla med byang chub dka' ma yin// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lnga phyogs na yon tan rin chen
381a4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal ba
381a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
381a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni che brjes ma
381a7(dkon brtsegs): zag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// tshe
381a8(dkon brtsegs): brjes ma thag tu skyes bu chen po mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// 
381b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di
381b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste// mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// de la ting 'dzin bsam yas de skyes shing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lus 'thob la// de ni byang chub skye ba
381b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig thogs 'gyur// yan tan rin chen me tog kun du rgyas pa nub phyogs na mya ngan dang / mun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ 
381b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad ngal spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar ba/ dgas te 'tsha zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni shA
381b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i
381b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma dad pa can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis ma yin chus ma yin te mas kyang 'chi bar
381b7(dkon brtsegs): dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// brdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro// che ba rjes ma thag tu yang shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/ del 'di skad ces byas// mi gang
381b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjed byed pa// 'di la mdo'i lus mes ma 'chi zhing // mtshan gyis mon la chus man dug gis min// de ni brdzus te skya ba kho nar 'gyuraro// yon tan ni ma/ 
382a1(dkon brtsegs): me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang phyogs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
382a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugasate/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po
382a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang dag par spyad pa'i blo de'i mtshan
382a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad paca na ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed pa raru 'gyur ro// thams cad du rje su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang
382a5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba 'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas bla na med pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i
382a6(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang 'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skyes pa'i
382a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams yongasu thar par byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di
382a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod byed pa// de yi yon+tan bgrang bar mi nus shing // de ni byang chub dam pa 'thob par the tshom med de la the tshom med par gzungs skye'o// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar lho 'tsham
382b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba
382b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'cha zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
382b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mamo dad pa can de ni che brjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
382b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi 'thab par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
382b5(dkon brtsegs): pa che dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa / 'dra ba de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi rmi brdzes nas kyang skyes pa'i lus zab par 'gyur ro// de la 'ang
382b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ gang shig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di dang gzhan// bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub
382b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sangs rgyas mang ba mthong // yan tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub 'tshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// de bzhin gshegs
382b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpa po zhes bya ba zhig de ltar bzhugs te 'tsha zhing gzhes pa yad de// bskal bden chos thams cad yang dag par byed/ 
383a1(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa
383a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de'i mtshan de thos pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar
383a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rgyu gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas
383a4(dkon brtsegs): nas chos ston par 'gyur zhing de chos ston pa ni ting nge la dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas stong gsum gyi steng chen por/ 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag
383a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhi/ na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongasu thar par 'gyur te/ de dag nas yongasu grol nas lha dang ma'i lus 'thob par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang
383a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa// de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs
383a8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po// tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub byang 'tshams kyi phyogs na sdig pa dang bral
383b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa
383b2(dkon brtsegs): yod do// bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang
383b3(dkon brtsegs): de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe brjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshegs chung ngus
383b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa de'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga ya na tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba
383b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston pa yang thos par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang zhig rgya la ba de yi mtshan 'dzin pa// tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas
383b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing du de/ de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur// skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshang rgya// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang shar 'tshams kyi phyogs
383b7(dkon brtsegs): na mya ngan thams cad las brgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub
383b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
384a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs med pa byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
384a2(dkon brtsegs): bum dad pa can de ni che brjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug nu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spabs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'theb par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad tshul dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ 
384a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgra dbyangs yon lag drug cu phun sum tshogs// de ni kun tu shes pa'ang pha rol phyin// rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'o// 
384a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gang yin bsam yas de 'thob 'gyur// yan tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa steng gi phyogs na ya dan tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten
384a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsar bzang ba dang na mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya ba
384a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni tshad med len zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
384a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang na mkha' nges par sgrogs pa'i bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag
384a8(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa yongasu spong bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin kye phung po dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang / rnam
384b1(dkon brtsegs): papar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sa nas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshig bzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// spobs pa
384b2(dkon brtsegs): bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yi ge dang sgra'i brda
384b3(dkon brtsegs): yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs mthon po dang / rigs mthon po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// 
384b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'thob par gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang shig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa// da ni yan
384b5(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob// de ni sangs rgya sa bral bar yong ma skye// mo de mi thogs byang chu pa 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu
384b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa 'og gi phyogs na tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi
384b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// skal ba de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das/ 
384b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phral pa'i bzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
385a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni cha ba rjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yong su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye ba gcig gos
385a2(dkon brtsegs): thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur// zos
385a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyi chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba
385a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig thogs bla na med pa yo/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sa/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen mo
385a5(dkon brtsegs): tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs thob par gyur to// 
385a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob bo// lha dang mo'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang
385a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog
385a8(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
385b1(dkon brtsegs): gsus pal mngan pa dag thAdang// 'phags pa dag na mchag brtsegs pa chen pa'i chos kyinam grangs le'u snang phrag brgyab las yan tan na chen ma tog kunaH/ 
385b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pas zhus pa la sunas bya ste 'dus pa sum nun bzhi pa rdzogs/ rgyag gyi mkhan padzin ma da bradz+ra war ma dang / chen gyi
385b3(dkon brtsegs): rU ba ban de mi shes sde la sogs pas bsdu cing zhes te gtan la phab pa/ @/ rgyag skad du/ a byas can tu bud rtapa la yen de sha na ma ma hAs na sa
385b4(dkon brtsegs): bodi skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen por med/ bam pa dang ga// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
385b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyan gyi kun
385b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na dge slong stong du chang ba'i dge 'dun chen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' khro dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ 'ad pa na spyad pa dang gzugs na spud pa'i lta bu rnams dang / 
385b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskur te mdun gyis bltas nas chos stan na// yang de'i tshe 'jam
385b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu dpal bzang yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
386a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyad kyis chos dang ldan pad gtam las brtsams te ldan
386a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la spabs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spabs par rgya
386a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrum ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul las brtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rgya
386a4(dkon brtsegs): yul ni gang mag gi yul ma lags pa dang / gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang / rna ba'i yul ma lags da pa dang / sgra'i yul ma legs pa dang / sna
386a5(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags pa dang / dro'i yul ma lags pa dang / lce'i yul ma lags pa dang / ro'i yul ma gas pa dang / lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang / reg bya'i yul
386a6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa dang / yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang / chos kyi yul ma lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yul khyad par ma mchis pa ni sangs
386a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul
386a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar khong du chud par brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i yul ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal lta bar 'gyur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi
386b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob pa'i yul lo mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo// khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo// 'du
386b2(dkon brtsegs): byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni yulo// 'dus byos mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang 'du byed pa med pa ni yul// gsol pa/ bcom
386b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems ma
386b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te de la brjod pa ma dmachis lags so// brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis pa lagaso// bstan pa ma mchis pa
386b5(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
386b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongasu btsal bar bgyi lag so// 
386b7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongasu rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/ gang 'di sam
386b8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongasu rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa 'am ldog pa
387a1(dkon brtsegs): yod dam can/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongasu bcal// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
387a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis/ ldog pa ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa med na// sangs rgyas
387a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongasu shes/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis
387a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang la dgas pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma ma chis lags// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs
387a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal
387a6(dkon brtsegs): te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yang gzhan du gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan zhig lags na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon
387a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin
387a8(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ de'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi/ 
387b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas bshes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam
387b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid gang gis gnas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug kun tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid des de
387b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal po/ 'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas te 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug kun du 'byung // 
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang smon pa ma dmachis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam dpa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so// bka' stsal
387b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal ci stong pa nyid la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom lda na 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchim pa ma 'ang chags/ 
387b6(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe snang dang gti mug rnams mchis lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod cing / yod pa gang gis 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
387b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams yod/ gsol pa/ yi ge dang skad dang sgra dang brjod pa'i mchis pas stong pa nyid mchis lags so// yi ge dang skad dang sgra dang brjod pa mchis pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang
387b8(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rnams mchis lags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa
388a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par 'dum byed pa na yad de/ dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang / mabyung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par dus ma byas pa dang / mdzan
388a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dus byed pa na med pa ma yin na// dge slong dag gas te ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed po medang du benan ste
388a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag la 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang / ma/ 
388a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mngon dpar 'du mi byed pa yod do// de'i phyir skyes pa dngabyung ba dang / byas pa dang / mngon par 'dus byas pa dang / 
388a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdag so zhes pa/ 'astsal pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gal te ste nga pa nyid ma mchis su lags na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
388a6(dkon brtsegs): dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis pa de'i slad du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang ga ta/ 
388a7(dkon brtsegs): mug go nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar gdags lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/ gang su dag
388a8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor smod pa gang 'dod chags dang
