388b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang gti mug las gud du stong ba nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te rnal 'byor ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang she sdang dang ga
388b2(dkon brtsegs): mug las gud du stong pa nyid btsal bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang sha sdang dang gti mug nyid stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
388b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam 'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
388b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi stong pa de nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam ste/ gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma
388b5(dkon brtsegs): lags 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags te zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags zhe sdang dang bral ba/ yang ma lags/ gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags
388b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang bral ba yang ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mun dang bral ba yang ga par rjes su lta zhing / pha rol la 'dod
388b7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bcas pa dang zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bcas par yang dge par rje su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so// gnyis gang lags zhe na/ cha
388b8(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / rtag par lte ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su/ 
389a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba de ni de dag gi chad par lta ba lags so// gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pazhe sdang dang bcas pa gti mu gamam ma pa sa sa de ni de dag gi/ 
389a2(dkon brtsegs): rtag par lta ba lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang / bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rje su mi lta
389a3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag par zhugs pa de ni gang du yang
389a4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang lam
389a5(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/ gang 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du ga/ la 'gyur lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
389a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus bgyis pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa dang ldan pa slad du'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das
389a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la grangs mchis par gyur na de 'dus bgyis pa nyid du 'gyur gyi 'dus ma bgyis ma lags
389a8(dkon brtsegs): so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
389b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams la gras gang yang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa grangs dang bral ba lags so/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod 'pha/ 
389b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/ 'on te 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lag so// 'phadra/ 
389b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lag so// ci lags bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ 'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ 
389b4(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'a/ dgas pa'o chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'phags pa ni/ yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa/ 
389b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ 'ja/ ma dpal de lta'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
389b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags la/ bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ ra'/ 
389b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa
389b8(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan pa lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/ gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na bdag gi
390a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnyed lags// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs
390a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi yul gang yang rnyed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul
390a3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa yang med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med yul brnyes pa yang med de// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ni rjesu
390a4(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba med par chos ston te/ khyod ni las dang dpe pa rnams rje su mi bsrung ngo // smras pa/ de bas na gnas dbartan nyid la yongasu dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin
390a5(dkon brtsegs): du lan thob shig/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'odi dza snyam du sems/ gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongasu bsrung zhing kha ba dang skur ba dang cha ba'i sman ma byin pa na/ ci des nad pa
390a6(dkon brtsegs): la nad med pa'i bde ba byas pa yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos smra bas las dang po ba yongs su bsrung shing zab
390a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'i gtam bcabs te/ gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang du 'chi ba las thar pa byas par mi 'gyur zhing shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro// bstan
390a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par
390b1(dkon brtsegs): dgag// lha'i bu bdun brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skabs pa zas nas 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// yang / 
390b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can rnams 'dul na/ ci khyed nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par/ 
390b3(dkon brtsegs): grol ba yin nam smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khe ban theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yin no// 
390b4(dkon brtsegs): kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin no// btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba 'ang yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod
390b5(dkon brtsegs): ci nyan thos sam/ don de rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo na nyan thos yin te pha rol las
390b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ma yin no// kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te snying rje chen po dang mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no// kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 
390b7(dkon brtsegs): te bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos yin/ smras pa/ chos ma thos pa mnyan pa sems can thams cad thos par byed de/ des na
390b8(dkon brtsegs): kho ba ni nyan thos yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs te kho bo rang
391a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon/ smras pa/ kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su/ 
391a2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
391a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gang la nges pa yin par gzung bar bya/ smras pa// btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo nas thams cad la nges pa yin par zung
391a4(dkon brtsegs): shig smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya 'am/ smras pa/ bcu na pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa
391a5(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa 'o// nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/ kho bo yang nges par der nges pa nyid do// des na kho bos
391a6(dkon brtsegs): so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yinan/ 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi
391a7(dkon brtsegs): sa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par bzhag pa gdags par ga la 'gyur// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
391a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i na mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs bcu'i na mkha'o// 'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o// 'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o// 'od ni shar lho'i'o// 'di ni
391b1(dkon brtsegs): lho nub kyi'o// 'ad ni nub byang ga'o// 'di ni bya shar bya'o// 'don 'ag ga'o// 'ad ni steng gi phyogs kyi namakha'o zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yid kyi na mkha' la ni tha dad pa med pa
391b2(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thabs mkhas pas 'di nas so'i skye bo'i sa'o// 'don nyan thos kyi sa'o// 
391b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang // sa rnam par bzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag pa nyid
391b4(dkon brtsegs): du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dang/ la khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/ smrasadang// zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba yang yin no// smras pa/ 
391b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la byung ba ya nga yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab dang / 
391b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes blta bar bya ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod do// de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// btsun pa rab
391b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig lo sdug pa/ mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba blta na sdug pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod/ de la mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba phyir
391b8(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te
392a1(dkon brtsegs): des de bsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te/ de sngon goms par byas pas shin tu brgyug
392a2(dkon brtsegs): te mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o// 'di la don du lta ba gang zhe na/ btsun pa rang
392a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byor 'phong gi slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor bu gcog pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig
392a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no// gsod pa phyir no// la ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshedag bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya
392a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'don 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dag so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slong dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la bu gcig pa'i lus la
392a6(dkon brtsegs): ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'du byed thams cad skye ba
392a7(dkon brtsegs): med par so sor rtog/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag po'i mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang / 
392a8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dzud do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di byang chub sems dpa'
392b1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gi yul yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis kyang mi gos shing / 'jig rten na
392b2(dkon brtsegs): yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang
392b3(dkon brtsegs): la sa ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang brtson la chos kyi dbyings zad par na
392b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rje su mi lta ba dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang / btsun pa rab
392b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes lo mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du mi gnyer zhing bsam pa yongasu
392b6(dkon brtsegs): ma rdzogs pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob la sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang / btsun pa rab 'byor
392b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang // btsun pa rab
392b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong la sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi
393a1(dkon brtsegs): gtang b.ra'i byang chub sems dpa de dag g.yul la// smras pa 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa 'don 'jig rten thams cad dang ma mthun par// smras
393a2(dkon brtsegs): btsun parab 'byang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi ras yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ 
393a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jom dpal khyod 'jog rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba la brtsams te spongs par gyis shig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par
393a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dil/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya dab ni phung ba lnga'o// lnga gang zhe na/ gzugs kyis dang po dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed pa
393a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i bung ba'o// de la gzugs na dahU~M brdos pa lta bu'o// char ban chu'i chu bur lnga bu'o// 'du shes ni smug rgyu lta bu'o// 'du byed ni chu shing / 
393a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'o// rnam par shes pa na sgyu ma lta bu'o// dbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing dang / snum gang yin pa de la 'jig rten yang med 'jig rten du gdags pa yang
393a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ phung po rnams kyang med/ phung por gdags pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mas pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o// gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos
393a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o// gang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lngani rang bzhin gyis stong
393b1(dkon brtsegs): gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med pagang gnyis med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med nga yir 'dzin pa medade// gang la ngar 'dzin pa med pa dang gang yir
393b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med pa chags pa med pa rnyed pa de ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da' 'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus
393b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o// gang dag rag lus pa med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o// gang bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o// gang
393b4(dkon brtsegs): dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'o// gang dag yongasu 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med pa'o// / gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod
393b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de dag dge sbyong gi tshes rtsod pa med pa'o// gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag na mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/ chos thams cad kyang na mkha' la
393b6(dkon brtsegs): lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings
393b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ gang khams med pa de la mig khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig go rnam par shes bamos med do// rna ba'i khams med de// sgra'i khams
393b8(dkon brtsegs): med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams medade// dri'i khams med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lce'i khams med de/ 
394a1(dkon brtsegs): khams med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg bya'i khams med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
394a2(dkon brtsegs): med do// yid kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// 
394a3(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// na mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// 'dod pa'i khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// 
394a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams med do// 'dus byas kyi khams med do// 'dus ma byas kyi khams med do// gang kha mas med pa de la bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med// gso
394a5(dkon brtsegs): ba med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes pa med// shad bu med do// gang gis de dag rjesu rtogs/ ba'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las
394a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de nas dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol// de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang
394a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi bla gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med mngon
394a8(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig tha ci ci zhig mngon par rtogs// 
394b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do// mngon
394b2(dkon brtsegs): par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni rlom sems nyid do// g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo// bdag gis mngon par rtogs
394b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams shes sam/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pa
394b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te/ bdag cag no ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal yongasu she so zhes smra ba/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhes// kun
394b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / las kyi tshan nam la bdag gi lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba lta/ pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
394b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba med par
394b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o// chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de de la ni gang sdug bsngal
394b8(dkon brtsegs): yongasu shes so// gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo // gang 'gog pa mngon du byed do// gang lam bsgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di
395a1(dkon brtsegs): thos nas skrag pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o// de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka'
395a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid
395a3(dkon brtsegs): las zab mo chos bstan pa 'di lta bu zos te/ chos zab mo mnyam pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon par shes pa myur bar gyur to// zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la yang rje su mthun par/ 
395a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur te mi mthun pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gto/ dgas par gang dag nga'i gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di
395a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan cing zos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'das pa ga sum gyi grangasu gtogs par rig par bya'o// gang yang zag pa
395a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal
395a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod rgyun du 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnasu bzhud do// der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol// de la lha'i bu
395a8(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de/ de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang khyed la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas
395b1(dkon brtsegs): na de dag chos mi nyan pas yongasu nyams par gyur te/ de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lha'i bu
395b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal babangs dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba dang / nyams dga'
395b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshal dang nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang nyams dga' ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang rim pa bdun dang brgyad dang bcu dang nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsil khang dang / ba gam
395b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / stegs bu dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang nga ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo rkang la ngag 'jam zhing mnyen pa gser gyi dra ba ltar 'od rnam par dag pa
395b5(dkon brtsegs): smin ma legs pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ bzhin la/ gas pa mig pad+ma mdab ma brgya pa sngon po lta bur/ mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin tu yangs pa 'dod pa'i sems
395b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa// zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/ bzhin mdzum pa dang bcas pa/ de dag rgyud gcig pa dang / bi wang dang / sgra snyan dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg
395b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang grus dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga mnyam pa dang / gling bu dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra dbyangs dang / gar dang / bzhad gad dang / 'jo ba dang / dga' ba dang / rtse bas
395b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyags shing dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang dga' dgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya nga ma6/ de 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab so// de nas lha'i bu dpal
396a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang gis rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong / rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te 'jam
396a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su byin te/ nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas dga'
396a3(dkon brtsegs): dang rtse ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa dang / bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te 'di dag snang ba ngo mtshar to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal
396a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang la 'di skad ces smras// lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la dga' ldan gyi gan das su yang ma phyin te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan
396a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor 'di dag dga' ldan gyi gnasu zhugs pa'i bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang / lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' lnga na gyi gnasu zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni/ 'jam
396a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'di skad ces gas
396a7(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thams
396a8(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag ga dang shAn gyi gnas su phyin te snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
396b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyed kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/ lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yonan/ 
396b2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag gtsug phud
396b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis phug ste/ steng gi bar snang gi na mkha' la 'jog go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ rgya mtsho chen po 'gyur ba'i chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khang bu gcig
396b4(dkon brtsegs): tu blugs kyang chu yis sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na ga nus par bdag nyid kyis shes// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de da/ 
396b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri/ gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de
396b6(dkon brtsegs): dag la yang gnod pa med de/ thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis sheso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de
396b7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag la
396b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub po// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsreg par byed pa'i ma de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gis me lce tsam gyi mar byon gyis rlobs te/ des bya ba byed pa
397a1(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA klung gi bye ma rnyed dag na nyom dang zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis ril
397a2(dkon brtsegs): du brlag par byed do// lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te/ 'jam
397a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyi stabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma// de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas
397a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlab das nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par
397a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs pas ci sman gyis bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig/ 
397a6(dkon brtsegs): can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis
397a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul ston cig dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtse ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan
397a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas/ chos thams cad sems kyis dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems
397b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang bsgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i modo la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bcom
397b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang ma lhag pa dang mi mang bar mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sas rgyas 'byung ba legs leg go// sangs rgya gyu ba nas// 
397b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la don chen por nye bar gnas so// de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ba yin no// cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no zhes ched du brjod
397b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ched du brjod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de/ mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo sbyar te 'jam dpal dgazhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// 
397b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyi me khyab ste ngo mtshar to// sems can gang dag cho 'phrul pa shad pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis
397b6(dkon brtsegs): bsamaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud sdig can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag
397b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gsheg pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa dang / brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar
397b8(dkon brtsegs): tshad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang po brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu
398a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gos mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag mi mchi bar bdag cag mi mchi bar bdag gi yi dam de lta bu blangs par bgyi// 
398a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'chang ba dang 'chad pa dang ston pa dang so sor rtogs pa dang bsgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyang / bdag gi 'khor gang de bzhin gash+ya
398a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang brtson pa rnams g.yengs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa dag mchis te de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang
398a4(dkon brtsegs): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyi'o// tad ya thA.a na da le/ bi ma lai/ s+thi ta twe/ a kal pa ni rdzi ta sha tra/ da/ dza ye dza ya ba ti b+hu tra ma ti ma ti/ sha me shan ti/ a pu
398a5(dkon brtsegs): mai/ pu pu me/ d+hi ri/ a khe/ mkhe/ kha khe/ mi si li/ a ga me/ pu la le/ phu la/ phu la/ pa shu me/ !shu me/ d+hi d+ha ra/ a na ba na te/ s+thi ta twe/ kr-i ta ra ta/ 
398a6(dkon brtsegs): krid ta bi d+yA/ bi ro tsa ta na/ sad d+harma b+ha Na ko s+ya/ su'u tra s+ya d+ha ra ka/ a b+hU mu ta/ i b+ha su rur+ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis
398a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu gsungs pa de la bdud kyi res kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar tshad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng tu de la gos dang zla dang mal
398a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub pa dang spro bar bgyi ba dang spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
398b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod nas g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i rgyud kyis gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri ba dang
398b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te/ de dag la slar rgol ba'am mi mdza' ba gang gis glegs bltas kyi
398b3(dkon brtsegs): glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legaso zhes bya ba byin te sdig can leg so lags// 'di ltar khyod kyis gsang sngags kyis tshig bstan pa
398b4(dkon brtsegs): brjod pas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam padang drug tu g.yos te/ khyod kyi spobs pa de thams cad ni 'ja dam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlab su rig par bya'o// 
398b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul kha'i cho 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs 'di bstan pa dang bdud kyi gsang sngags kyi stobs dang rig sngags kyi skabs

398b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams bsdus shig dang kho bo yang der 'ong ngo // de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam
398b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / jam dpal gzhon nur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dge 'dun
399a1(dkon brtsegs): la bskor ba byas nas 'khor dang bcas par 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi gan su byin te de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis dga' ldan gyi ris kyi
399a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnams la smras pa/ grogs pa dag shes par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa 'u bu cag la snang brtse ba'i phyir 'dir ring gis de la dga' ldan gyi ris lta bu khyed dga' ba dang
399a3(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba la bag med par dor te ngag yod par gyis la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du shig shig/ de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi
399a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbusu lha'i yid las byung ba rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams chur sha ngar nub du dpag tshad sum brgya drug khri nyis stong yod la zheng lce
399a5(dkon brtsegs): byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas te/ der sengaga'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa'i lha'i ras bcos bu brgya/ steng du ma btang ba stong phrag du ma byas// de nas lha'i bu
399a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzang gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang sang ga'i khri rnams kyang byis nas tham pa s+ya te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis
399a7(dkon brtsegs): khyams bkod pa dang seng ga'i khri bkod pa bgyis lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na gshegasu gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' khro nyis stong
399a8(dkon brtsegs): dang nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
399b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas byin to// de nas 'jam
399b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang / 
399b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod do// rgyal chen bzhi'o ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
399b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi ris rnams dang / gzu dgas na spyad pa tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste 'og min rgyab dar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra zos pa/ 'di ltar
399b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'dra la ba'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis bdag ga kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir nges par der 'dong bar bya'o// skyes bu/ 
399b6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni legs par mthong ba'o// de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra thos nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na song
399b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha'i bu tshad med grangs med pa dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis
399b8(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas des lha'i 'khor de tsam du tshad med pa dag rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'khor de nyid du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang gis 'jam dpal babang+gA kri
400a1(dkon brtsegs): / gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus lags na chos kyi bka' mtshad las brtsams te spobs par mdzad du gsol// de skad ces
400a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu dpal bzang dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
400a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba dag go// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang / bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang / 
400a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i ye shes dang / zab das la gnas pa'i bag yod pa ste// grogs po dgachos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i
400a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// grog po dag de la yong su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug na/ yongasu dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di lta
400a6(dkon brtsegs): ste lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / ngag dag pa'i rnams pas 'jug pa dang sems dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / 'am/ 
400a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / tshul 'tshes pa dang khabasag dang gzhag slong dang thob kyis 'jal ba thams
400a8(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam par spong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems mi brjed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar yong su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go// 
400b1(dkon brtsegs): grags pa dag de la yong su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yang su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang sha na/ 'di lta ste bla ma la gus pas yang su dag pa dang nga rgyal bcom pas yong su dag padang / 
400b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang 'dzin pas yang su dag pa dang / dran pa ma g.yeng bas yong su dag pa dang / bstan pa dang rab tu bshad pas yang su dag pa dang / bdag la me bstod cing gzhanas
400b3(dkon brtsegs): mi smod pas yongasu dag pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongasu dag pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub pas yongasu dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis zas
400b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu dag go/ grogs pa dag de la rnam pa brgya dad kyis bsam gtan yongasu dag ste/ rnam pa brgya dad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa la
400b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas yongasu dag pa dang / 'du 'dzi spong bas yod su dag pa dang / yul dang ma 'dra bas yongasu dag pa dang lus dang sems las su rung bas yongasu dag pa
400b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tshabs yong su dag pa dang / dmigs pa la 'dzag pas yongasu dag pa dang / sgra dang mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pas yong su dag pa dang / 
400b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang zang zing med par so sor yang dag par 'ged pas yong su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongasu dag go/ grogs po dag de la
400b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongasu dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongasu dag pa dang / khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongasu dag pa
401a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yo u dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yang su dag pa dang / bden pa la mkhas pa
401a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas yongasu dag pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongasu dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongasu dag pa dang / bag la nyal dang kun nas bkris
401a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yong su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongasu dag go/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad
401a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon par shes pa yong su dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa med par gzugs thams cad ma/ dang bas lha'i mig yongasu dag pa dang // sgrib pa med par sgra thams
401a5(dkon brtsegs): cad zos pas lha'i rna ba yong su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas par la gyi sems shes pa yong su dag pa dang / sgrib pa med cing
401a6(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjesu dran pas sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa'i shes pa yongasu dgo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongasu dag pa dang / zag
401a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal cing dus ma yin pa'i yongasu spangs pas zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang / g.yo ba dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon pa
401a8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yong su dag pa dang / ji ltar sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas bshes pa brtan pa yong su dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa
401b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dgag/ grogs pa dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yong su dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga yongasu shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yong su dag pa dang / sred pa
401b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu spongs pas kun 'byung ba shes pa yong su dag pa dang / rten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa shes pa yong su dag pa dang // 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa
401b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongasu dag pa dang / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pa yong su dag pa dang / bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang srog med pa dang gso ba med pa// 
401b4(dkon brtsegs): rkyen shes pa yongasu dag pa dang / 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pas dus gsum shes pa yong su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jug
401b5(dkon brtsegs): pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes pa yongasu dag pa ste/ grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongasu dag go/ grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis nges
401b6(dkon brtsegs): par sems pa yongasu dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang nye bar zhi bas yongasu dag pa dang / phyi rol du mi rgyu bas yong su dag pa dang / khams gsum la mi gnas pas
401b7(dkon brtsegs): yong su dag pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yong su dag pa dang / skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas yong su dag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pas so sor
401b8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas yongasu dag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par sa sor rtog pas yongasu dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khrugs pa yong su dge ba/ grogs po dag
402a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongasu dag pa'o// grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongasu dag ste/ rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 
402a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongasu dag pa dang / zos pa yongasu byang bas yongasu dag pa dang bsam gtan de la ma chags pas yongasu dag pa dang / shes rab dang
402a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung rab kyis yongasu dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pas yong su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi rlom sems med pas yongasu dag pa dang / nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs
402a4(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa dang / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongasu dag pa ste8/ grogs po dag rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa lo dang su dag go// grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis
402a5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ bag yod pa la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa ni bde ba gsum las yong su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lha'i bde ba dang // bsam gtan
402a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o// ngan song gsum las yongasu thar par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
402a7(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten dang gsum po de dag go/ sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang / 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal te/ 
402a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum po de dag go// 'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'tsho ba med pa'o 'jigs pa dang / tshig su bcad pa med pa 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba la bas
402b1(dkon brtsegs): mapa'i 'jigs pa ste gsum po dag go/ srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'dara' bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang / gzugs kyi srid pa dang / gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o// dri ma gsum sbyong ste/ 
402b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi dri ma dang / zhe sdang gi drom dang / gti mug gi dri ma'o// bslabs pa gsum yongasu rdzogs par byed te/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems dang / lhag pa'i shes rab ba/ 
402b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa gsum 'thob par 'gyur te/ lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yong su dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa'o// bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po gsum po yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ 
402b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgo dam pa las byung ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa dar byed// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// 
402b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang chos kye rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigaso// pha rol tu phyin pa rna mas kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs gsum gsum rab tu spong ste/ ser sna'i
402b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dang / ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims las bzlog pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / gnod/ 
402b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / bzod pa las bzlog pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus las bzlog pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / rnam pa
402b8(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba dang / bsam gtan las bzlog pa dang / bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dang / shes rab las bzlog pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la
403a1(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rton pa gsum gyis nye bar rton te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / rnam par smin pa la mi reg
403a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba dang / bzod cing nges pa dang bdag dang gzhan
403a3(dkon brtsegs): rjesu bsrungs pa dang / byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba dang / brtson 'grus gces pa mi 'dor ba dang / blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba dang / bsam gtan nye bar
403a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang byang chub tu yongasu dbasngo ba dang / shes rab kyi snang ba dang / spros pa med pa dang / byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba ste/ grogs po dag bag yo
403a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rten pa 'di gsum gyis nye bar rton to// grog po dag de lta/ bas na khyod cag bag yod par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas
403a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob po// grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
403a7(dkon brtsegs): ni tshigs chung ngus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang / tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang / 
403a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gnas med pa dang / chos kyi gnas med pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// tshegs chung ngus yang dag pa'i spong ba
403b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi bskam pa yo su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i spang ba bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma 'thun pa/ 
403b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par ma grub par yang sa sor rtog cing / sdig pa ma dag pa'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/ yang dag pa
403b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed
403b4(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag / bar rab tu 'jog pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang bar bye du bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus
403b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du yang mos la/ dge kho'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed/ 
403b6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la/ dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par
403b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa la chos thams cad
403b8(dkon brtsegs): la rtsom pa med cing rtul ba med par yang mthong ste/ yang nyams pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba yang mid 'gog pa yang med pa 'don yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgoms pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi
404a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/ gang lus dang sems la su rung ba ste/ de sems las su
404a2(dkon brtsegs): rung bas dge ba'i chos las 'dun pa yang mi 'dor la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la
404a3(dkon brtsegs): brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ro// sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab
404a4(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du yang spyod la chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing mngon pa dar zhen pa yang med pa'o// de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongasu
404a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dbang po drug la brten par mi byed / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu smin parabya ba'i phyir shes pa yang gtong la gcig tu gnas pa yang thob
404a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang / thams cad kyang yongasu thob la blangs pa yang med cing dong ba yang med pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la dra yang
404a7(dkon brtsegs): med cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang / thams cad kyi rje su yang song la rtag tu mnyam par yang bzhag par gyur cing chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / rab rib med
404a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par gyur la/ spros pa dang lta ba yang yang / sa chad pa 'do ni de'i dbang po'i bsgom pa yong su rdzogs pa'o// de stobs lnga bsgoms pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 
404b1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyi thub par dka' ba dang / dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis
404b2(dkon brtsegs): zad du mi 'phrogs pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis zil gyis mo gnon pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/ de
404b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar stobs lnga yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i chos thams cad
404b4(dkon brtsegs): mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag pa skem pa dang / rten cing 'brel pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa
404b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myong bar bya ba'i phyir dag
404b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / lus dang sems mi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / 
404b7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang / mthon dman med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
404b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshigs chung ngus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lam bsgom
405a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhe na/ gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i
405a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la gtong ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang gzhog slongs dang thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang / 
405a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom pa dang lus dang sems nyams chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang / bdag la bstod pa dang gzhan la smad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang / 
405a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang / rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba 'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam
405a5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag
405a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o// grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go// zhugs nas 'du byed thams
405a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'dam las brgal to// brgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste rnam par bltas nas mi mthong ngo // me 'bar ro// shin tu nye bar zhi ste rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do// shin du nye bar zhi bar
405a8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin zhe na/ gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa des ma byas// gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o// gang myong ba med pa de la gdag pa med do// gang gdags pa med pa de ni shin tu nye bar zhi ba'o// / 
405b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khro nyis stong chos rnams las chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu dpal bzang gis gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la 'a/ 
405b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar bsgom/ smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba yang ma spong la 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos so// 'dus
405b3(dkon brtsegs): ma byas su yang mi ltung la 'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang bsgom la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang snang ngo // lha'i bu gzhan yang
405b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lamo ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa ngar dag pa yang yin la lta bar gyur pa la yang mkhas shing lta babyung lnga mngon pa na pa lnga'o// mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag par yang yin
405b5(dkon brtsegs): la mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing mtshan ma la mngon par zhen/ pa yang med do// smon pa med pas rnam par dag da yang yin la khams gsum pa la yang mkhas shing khams
405b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do// skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la skye ba dang 'jig pa la yang mkhas shing skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa yang
405b7(dkon brtsegs): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pa de dag rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa lta bar gyur pa/ bag la
405b8(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems pan/ 
406a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang skye ba med pa dang / byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i
406a2(dkon brtsegs): rjesu mthun par 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa bag la nyal ba byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de yang 'byung ba dang 'dzeg pa med pa nyid du
406a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
406a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o// 'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong
406a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'phags pa'i lam du'o// 'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongasu smin par
406a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba na mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mtha
406a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// 'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// 'ong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i phyir ro// / 
406a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ni gang du yang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'og ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro// 'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
406b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang thun pa med pa bam par gyurar// 'ong ba rnam par rtag pa gsum snang ba chas snyan par byar// 'gro ba nad sa bcas pa brtan par byed par gyur// 'ang ban dpa lam
406b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams pag tu chud bar byed par phyir // byang chub sems dpa'i 'grab na byang chub snang bar 'gro bar phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ba na byang chub kyi spyad baspyod par byar/ lha bu
406b3(dkon brtsegs): 'don byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ang ba zhes bya ba'o// bstan pa 'ang bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la babad pa skyes so// de nas ldan
406b4(dkon brtsegs): bu dpal babang gis 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa lag daskad ces smras// 'jam dpal bdag gis 'dzegarten gyi khams sonan thams cad kyi 'ad ces brgya gzhig thos
406b5(dkon brtsegs): na'ajam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis de na de dran/ na gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhog chos ston
406b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu steng gi phyog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan
406b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to// smras pa/ 'jam
406b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal bdag gis 'jijog rten gyi khams yon+dan thams cad kyi 'od de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang ba de blta bar bgyi'o// de nas
407a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur
407a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa snyams par zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang mthun pa'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed pa de dag snang bar byas nas
407a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jog rten gyi khams yornyan thams cad kyi 'od de yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi nang
407a4(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'di de mthong nas de mtshar du gyur te thal ma sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar
407a5(dkon brtsegs): 'od yongasu dag pa 'di gang nas mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da ga 'og gi phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
407a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
407a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho'o bzhes so// chos kyang ston to// de na byer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya
407a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab pa/ 
407b1(dkon brtsegs): des 'jig rten gyi khams pang yang snang ba chen pas khyab pa// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
407b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi
407b3(dkon brtsegs): mthil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong byung // 'od zer de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams ma
407b4(dkon brtsegs): mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab pas byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mo mjed 'ad mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
407b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kye thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa/ dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong
407b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yan+tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
407b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
407b8(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag der chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der 'gro bar spro ba su yod/ byang chub
408a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin zhes bya ba der 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig
408a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spro lag so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal po/ rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes nas shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
408a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes sgren ma 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun
408a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dab kyi ma grus tsam gyis skad cig/ thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang ba
408a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun rgya/ steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to// 
408a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i g.yog 'khor de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par gnas pa rnamasu phyin to// de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas thal mo sbar te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing
408a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang
408a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo // khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de yang 'jog rten gyi khams der byin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyad pa'i lhar
408b1(dkon brtsegs): bu de dag gis byang chub sems de dag mthang nas ngam char du gyur te/ kye mdza tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der byin pa dang / 'di ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dga'adzi/ 
408b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'ang ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes
408b3(dkon brtsegs): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa de la tsa nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis bsam pa zag pa nas bla na med pa
408b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de lta lta/ chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji snyed du dga' ldan gyi gnas lha rnams kyi don bya ba
408b5(dkon brtsegs): de srid du de byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phra ga bcu po de dag dang lhan cig/ rang gi 'khor dang lhan cig/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
408b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi 'gyur ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan
408b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi stan la
408b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang / lhan cig lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
409a1(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
409a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang ba gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngom/ bskyed pa yang ngam/ stabs dang bde ba la reg
409a3(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas sam/ zhes bsnyun gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga'
409a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag pa/ ra gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzadad de// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug la/ yang dag par
409a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod de/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas kyang / tha mas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa grogs po dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang / 'jam dpal
409a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang / sems can sdud pa dang / 
409a7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par byed pa dang / thabs dang rig pa dang / ye shes dang / shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba dang / spobs pa la ltos/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni
409a8(dkon brtsegs): skal ba grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go/ sems can gang dag gi dbang ba drug pa 'od dag la skyes bu dam pa
409b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag mngon par gyur ba de dag na byas bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// zhes brjod par byag// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes smranas/ 
409b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed pader byin pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chas thos nas ma skye ba'i chos la bzad pa zab par gyur to// de nas
409b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes smin ma 'dzin dang lhan cog lhogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa bye ba drug bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgongs phyag 'tshas
409b4(dkon brtsegs): lan bdun bskor ba byas nasasteng gsum gyi steng chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad rab tu g.yos par byas te bcom ldan
409b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi drung nas maM snang bar gyur nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de la 'dzan rten gyi khams der byon to// de nas bcom ldan
409b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ tshangs shig/ lcogs
409b7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi
409b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'do ni bzung lags na 'da' mong ji skad bzung bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
